The_DT the_DT queen_NN was_VBD permitted_VBN to_TO answer_VB ,_, but_CC she_PRP remained_VBD hard_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD no_UH ,_, I_PRP did_VBD not_RB open_VB the_DT forbidden_JJ door_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT virgin_JJ mary_NN took_VBD the_DT new-born_JJ child_NN from_IN her_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, and_CC vanished_VBD with_IN it_PRP ._.

At_IN last_JJ ,_, when_WRB she_PRP caame_VBD to_IN the_DT youngest_JJS ,_, a_DT soft_JJ voice_NN cried_VBD ,_, dear_JJ mother_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP in_IN the_DT clock-case_NN ._.

There_EX were_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT king_NN and_CC a_DT queen_NN who_WP lived_VBD happily_RB together_RB and_CC had_VBD twelve_CD children_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD all_DT boys_NNS ._.

The_DT woman_NN became_VBD her_PRP$ step-daughters_NNS bitterest_JJS enemy_NN ,_, and_CC day_NN by_IN day_NN did_VBD her_PRP best_JJS to_TO treat_VB her_PRP still_RB worse_JJR ._.

Ah_UH ,_, yes_UH ,_, with_IN all_PDT my_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, she_PRP answered_VBD ,_, for_IN she_PRP was_VBD glad_JJ to_TO get_VB away_RB from_IN the_DT mother_NN and_CC sister_NN ._.
So_RB she_PRP got_VBD into_IN the_DT carriage_NN and_CC drove_VBD away_RB with_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP arrived_VBD at_IN his_PRP$ palace_NN ,_, the_DT wedding_NN was_VBD celebrated_VBN with_IN great_JJ pomp_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT little_JJ men_NNS had_VBD granted_VBN to_IN the_DT maiden_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT year_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, the_DT young_JJ queen_NN bore_VBD a_DT son_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT step-mother_JJ had_VBD heard_VBN of_IN her_PRP$ great_JJ good-fortune_NN ,_, she_PRP came_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN the_DT palace_NN and_CC pretended_VBD that_IN she_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO pay_VB her_PRP a_DT visit_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, when_WRB the_DT king_NN had_VBD gone_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC no_DT one_NN else_RB was_VBD present_JJ ,_, the_DT wicked_JJ woman_NN seized_VBD the_DT queen_NN by_IN the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ daughter_NN seized_VBD her_PRP by_IN the_DT feet_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP lifted_VBD her_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC threw_VBD her_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT window_NN into_IN the_DT stream_NN which_WDT flowed_VBD by_IN ._.
Then_RB the_DT ugly_JJ daughter_NN laid_VBD herself_PRP in_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ woman_NN covered_VBD her_PRP up_RP over_IN her_PRP$ head_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT king_NN came_VBD home_RB again_RB and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO speak_VB to_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, the_DT old_JJ woman_NN cried_VBD ,_, hush_JJ ,_, hush_JJ ,_, that_WDT ca_MD nt_RB be_VB now_RB ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ lying_VBG in_IN a_DT violent_JJ sweat_NN ._.
You_PRP must_MD let_VB her_PRP rest_VB to-day_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN suspected_VBD no_DT evil_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB come_VB back_RB again_RB till_IN next_JJ morning_NN ._.
And_CC as_IN he_PRP talked_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC she_PRP answered_VBD him_PRP ,_, with_IN every_DT word_NN a_DT toad_NN leaped_VBD out_RP ,_, whereas_IN formerly_RB a_DT piece_NN of_IN gold_NN had_VBD fallen_VBN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP asked_VBD what_WP that_DT could_MD be_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT old_JJ woman_NN said_VBD that_IN she_PRP had_VBD got_VBN that_IN from_IN the_DT violent_JJ sweat_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD soon_RB lose_VB it_PRP again_RB ._.
During_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT scullion_NN saw_VBD a_DT duck_NN come_VB swimming_VBG up_RP the_DT gutter_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP said_VBD -_HYPH king_NN ,_, what_WP art_NN thou_NN doing_VBG now_RB ._.
Sleepest_RBS thou_NNP ,_, or_CC wakest_RBS thou_NN ._.
And_CC as_IN he_PRP returned_VBD no_DT answer_NN ,_, it_PRP said_VBD -_: and_CC my_PRP$ guests_NNS ,_, what_WP may_MD they_PRP do_VB ._.
The_DT scullion_NN said_VBD -_: they_PRP are_VBP sleeping_VBG soundly_RB ,_, too_RB ._.
Then_RB it_PRP asked_VBD again_RB -_HYPH what_WP does_VBZ little_JJ baby_NN mine_NN ._.
He_PRP answered_VBD -_HYPH sleepeth_NN in_IN her_PRP$ cradle_NN fine_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP went_VBD upstairs_RB in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT queen_NN ,_, nursed_VBD the_DT baby_NN ,_, shook_VBD up_RP its_PRP$ little_JJ bed_NN ,_, covered_VBN it_PRP over_RP ,_, and_CC then_RB swam_VB away_RB again_RB down_IN the_DT gutter_NN in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN a_DT duck_NN ._.
She_PRP came_VBD thus_RB for_IN two_CD nights_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT third_NN ,_, she_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT scullion_NN ,_, go_VB and_CC tell_VB the_DT king_NN to_TO take_VB his_PRP$ sword_NN and_CC swing_VB it_PRP three_CD times_NNS over_IN me_PRP on_IN the_DT threshold_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT scullion_NN ran_VBD and_CC told_VBD this_DT to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP came_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ sword_NN and_CC swung_VBD it_PRP thrice_VBP over_IN the_DT spirit_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN ,_, his_PRP$ wife_NN stood_VBD before_IN him_PRP strong_JJ ,_, living_VBG ,_, and_CC healthy_JJ as_IN she_PRP had_VBD been_VBN before_RB ._.
Thereupon_RB the_DT king_NN was_VBD full_JJ of_IN great_JJ joy_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP kept_VBD the_DT queen_NN hidden_VBN in_IN a_DT chamber_NN until_IN the_DT sunday_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT baby_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB christened_VBN ._.
And_CC when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD christened_VBN he_PRP said_VBD ,_, what_WP does_VBZ a_DT person_NN deserve_VB who_WP drags_VBZ another_DT out_IN of_IN bed_NN and_CC throws_VBZ him_PRP in_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
The_DT wretch_NN deserves_VBZ nothing_NN better_RBR ,_, answered_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, than_IN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN and_CC put_VBN in_RP a_DT barrel_NN stuck_VBN full_JJ of_IN nails_NNS ,_, and_CC rolled_VBD down_RP hill_NN into_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
Then_RB ,_, said_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, you_PRP have_VBP pronounced_VBN your_PRP$ own_JJ sentence_NN ._.
And_CC he_PRP ordered_VBD such_PDT a_DT barrel_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ woman_NN to_TO be_VB put_VBN into_IN it_PRP with_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT top_NN was_VBD hammered_VBN on_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT barrel_NN rolled_VBD down_RP hill_RB until_IN it_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT river_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT girl_NN who_WP was_VBD idle_JJ and_CC would_MD not_RB spin_VB ,_, and_CC let_VB her_PRP$ mother_NN say_VB what_WP she_PRP would_MD ,_, she_PRP could_MD not_RB bring_VB her_PRP to_IN it_PRP ._.
At_IN last_JJ the_DT mother_NN was_VBD once_RB so_RB overcome_VB with_IN anger_NN and_CC impatience_NN ,_, that_IN she_PRP beat_VBD her_PRP ,_, at_IN which_WDT the_DT girl_NN began_VBD to_TO weep_VB loudly_RB ._.
Now_RB at_IN this_DT very_JJ moment_NN the_DT queen_NN drove_VBN by_IN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP heard_VBD the_DT weeping_NN she_PRP stopped_VBD her_PRP$ carriage_NN ,_, went_VBD into_IN the_DT house_NN and_CC asked_VBD the_DT mother_NN why_WRB she_PRP was_VBD beating_VBG her_PRP$ daughter_NN so_IN that_IN the_DT cries_NNS could_MD be_VB heard_VBN out_RP on_IN the_DT road_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT woman_NN was_VBD ashamed_JJ to_TO reveal_VB the_DT laziness_NN of_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB get_VB her_PRP to_TO leave_VB off_RP spinning_NN ._.
She_PRP insists_VBZ on_IN spinning_VBG for_IN ever_RB and_CC ever_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP poor_JJ ,_, and_CC can_MD not_RB procure_VB the_DT flax_NN ._.
Then_RB answered_VBD the_DT queen_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN that_WDT I_PRP like_VBP better_JJR to_TO hear_VB than_IN spinning_VBG ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP never_RB happier_JJR than_IN when_WRB the_DT wheels_NNS are_VBP humming_VBG ._.
Let_VB me_PRP have_VB your_PRP$ daughter_NN with_IN me_PRP in_IN the_DT palace_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP flax_NN enough_RB ,_, and_CC there_EX she_PRP shall_MD spin_VB as_RB much_RB as_IN she_PRP likes_VBZ ._.
The_DT mother_NN was_VBD heartily_RB satisfied_JJ with_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC the_DT queen_NN took_VBD the_DT girl_NN with_IN her_PRP ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD arrived_VBN at_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, she_PRP led_VBD her_PRP$ up_RP into_IN three_CD rooms_NNS which_WDT were_VBD filled_VBN from_IN the_DT bottom_NN to_IN the_DT top_NN with_IN the_DT finest_JJS flax_NN ._.
Now_RB spin_VB me_PRP this_DT flax_NN ,_, said_VBD she_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB you_PRP have_VBP done_VBN it_PRP ,_, you_PRP shall_MD have_VB my_PRP$ eldest_JJS son_NN for_IN a_DT husband_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN you_PRP are_VBP poor_JJ ._.
I_PRP care_VBP not_RB for_IN that_DT ,_, your_PRP$ untiring_JJ industry_NN is_VBZ dowry_RB enough_RB ._.
The_DT girl_NN was_VBD secretly_RB terrified_VBN ,_, for_IN she_PRP could_MD not_RB have_VB spun_VBN the_DT flax_NN ,_, no_UH ,_, not_RB if_IN she_PRP had_VBD lived_VBN till_IN she_PRP was_VBD three_CD hundred_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, and_CC had_VBD sat_VBN at_IN it_PRP every_DT day_NN from_IN morning_NN till_IN night_NN ._.
When_WRB therefore_RB she_PRP was_VBD alone_RB ,_, she_PRP began_VBD to_TO weep_VB ,_, and_CC sat_VBD thus_RB for_IN three_CD days_NNS without_IN moving_VBG a_DT finger_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN came_VBD the_DT queen_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP saw_VBD that_IN nothing_NN had_VBD yet_RB been_VBN spun_VBN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD surprised_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT girl_NN excused_VBD herself_PRP by_IN saying_VBG that_IN she_PRP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO begin_VB because_IN of_IN her_PRP$ great_JJ distress_NN at_IN leaving_VBG her_PRP$ mothers_NNS house_NN ._.
The_DT queen_NN was_VBD satisfied_JJ with_IN this_DT ,_, but_CC said_VBD when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD going_VBG away_RB ,_, tomorrow_NN you_PRP must_MD begin_VB to_TO work_VB ._.
When_WRB the_DT girl_NN was_VBD alone_RB again_RB ,_, she_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB what_WP to_TO do_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN her_PRP$ distress_NN went_VBD to_IN the_DT window_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP saw_VBD three_CD women_NNS coming_VBG towards_IN her_PRP ,_, the_DT first_NN of_IN whom_WP had_VBD a_DT broad_JJ flat_JJ foot_NN ,_, the_DT second_JJ had_VBD such_PDT a_DT great_JJ underlip_NN that_IN it_PRP hung_VBD down_RP over_IN her_PRP$ chin_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT third_JJ had_VBD a_DT broad_JJ thumb_NN ._.
They_PRP remained_VBD standing_VBG before_IN the_DT window_NN ,_, looked_VBD up_RP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT girl_NN what_WP was_VBD amiss_JJ with_IN her_PRP ._.
She_PRP complained_VBD of_IN her_PRP$ trouble_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP offered_VBD her_PRP$ their_PRP$ help_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, if_IN you_PRP will_MD invite_VB us_PRP to_IN the_DT wedding_NN ,_, not_RB be_VB ashamed_JJ of_IN us_PRP ,_, and_CC will_MD call_VB us_PRP your_PRP$ aunts_NNS ,_, and_CC likewise_RB will_MD place_VB us_PRP at_IN your_PRP$ table_NN ,_, we_PRP will_MD spin_VB up_RP the_DT flax_NN for_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ._.
With_IN all_PDT my_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, do_VBP but_CC come_VB in_IN and_CC begin_VB the_DT work_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP let_VBD in_RP the_DT three_CD strange_JJ women_NNS ,_, and_CC cleared_VBD a_DT place_NN in_IN the_DT first_JJ room_NN ,_, where_WRB they_PRP seated_VBD themselves_PRP and_CC began_VBD their_PRP$ spinning_NN ._.
The_DT one_NN drew_VBD the_DT thread_NN and_CC trod_VB the_DT wheel_NN ,_, the_DT other_JJ wetted_VBD the_DT thread_NN ,_, the_DT third_JJ twisted_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC struck_VBD the_DT table_NN with_IN her_PRP$ finger_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB often_RB as_IN she_PRP struck_VBD it_PRP ,_, a_DT skein_NN of_IN thread_NN fell_VBD to_IN the_DT ground_NN that_WDT was_VBD spun_VBN in_IN the_DT finest_JJS manner_NN possible_JJ ._.
The_DT girl_NN concealed_VBD the_DT three_CD spinners_NNS from_IN the_DT queen_NN ,_, and_CC showed_VBD her_PRP whenever_WRB she_PRP came_VBD the_DT great_JJ quantity_NN of_IN spun_JJ thread_NN ,_, until_IN the_DT latter_JJ could_MD not_RB praise_VB her_PRP$ enough_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT first_JJ room_NN was_VBD empty_JJ she_PRP went_VBD to_IN the_DT second_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ to_IN the_DT third_JJ ,_, and_CC that_DT too_RB was_VBD quickly_RB cleared_VBN ._.
Then_RB the_DT three_CD women_NNS took_VBD leave_NN and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT girl_NN ,_, do_VBP not_RB forget_VB what_WP you_PRP have_VBP promised_VBN us_PRP -_, it_PRP will_MD make_VB your_PRP$ fortune_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT maiden_NN showed_VBD the_DT queen_NN the_DT empty_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT great_JJ heap_NN of_IN yarn_NN ,_, she_PRP gave_VBD orders_NNS for_IN the_DT wedding_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bridegroom_NN rejoiced_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO have_VB such_JJ a_DT clever_JJ and_CC industrious_JJ wife_NN ,_, and_CC praised_VBD her_PRP mightily_RB ._.
I_PRP have_VBP three_CD aunts_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT girl_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN very_RB kind_RB to_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP should_MD not_RB like_VB to_TO forget_VB them_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ good_JJ fortune_NN ,_, allow_VB me_PRP to_TO invite_VB them_PRP to_IN the_DT wedding_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB them_PRP sit_VB with_IN us_PRP at_IN table_NN ._.
The_DT queen_NN and_CC the_DT bridegroom_NN said_VBD ,_, why_WRB should_MD we_PRP not_RB allow_VB that_DT ._.
Therefore_RB when_WRB the_DT feast_NN began_VBD ,_, the_DT three_CD women_NNS entered_VBD in_IN strange_JJ apparel_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bride_NN said_VBD ,_, welcome_JJ ,_, dear_JJ aunts_NNS ._.

On_IN this_DT the_DT kings_NNS son_NN was_VBD alarmed_VBN and_CC said_VBD ,_, neither_CC now_RB nor_CC ever_RB shall_MD my_PRP$ beautiful_JJ bride_NN touch_VB a_DT spinning-wheel_NN ._.
And_CC thus_RB she_PRP got_VBD rid_VBN of_IN the_DT hateful_JJ flax-spinning_NN ._.
Hard_RB by_IN a_DT great_JJ forest_NN dwelt_NN a_DT poor_JJ wood-cutter_NN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC his_PRP$ two_CD children_NNS ._.
The_DT boy_NN was_VBD called_VBN Hansel_NNP and_CC the_DT girl_NN Gretel_NNP ._.
He_PRP had_VBD little_JJ to_TO bite_VB and_CC to_TO break_VB ,_, and_CC once_RB when_WRB great_JJ dearth_NN fell_VBD on_IN the_DT land_NN ,_, he_PRP could_MD no_RB longer_RBR procure_VB even_RB daily_JJ bread_NN ._.
Now_RB when_WRB he_PRP thought_VBD over_IN this_DT by_IN night_NN in_IN his_PRP$ bed_NN ,_, and_CC tossed_VBD about_RB in_IN his_PRP$ anxiety_NN ,_, he_PRP groaned_VBD and_CC said_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, what_WP is_VBZ to_TO become_VB of_IN us_PRP ._.
How_WRB are_VBP we_PRP to_TO feed_VB our_PRP$ poor_JJ children_NNS ,_, when_WRB we_PRP no_RB longer_RBR have_VBP anything_NN even_RB for_IN ourselves_PRP ._.
Ill_NNP tell_VBP you_PRP what_WP ,_, husband_NN ,_, answered_VBD the_DT woman_NN ,_, early_RB to-morrow_JJ morning_NN we_PRP will_MD take_VB the_DT children_NNS out_RP into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_IN where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT thickest_JJS ._.
There_RB we_PRP will_MD light_VB a_DT fire_NN for_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC give_VB each_DT of_IN them_PRP one_CD more_JJR piece_NN of_IN bread_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB we_PRP will_MD go_VB to_IN our_PRP$ work_NN and_CC leave_VB them_PRP alone_RB ._.
They_PRP will_MD not_RB find_VB the_DT way_NN home_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC we_PRP shall_MD be_VB rid_VBN of_IN them_PRP ._.
No_UH ,_, wife_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT man_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD not_RB do_VB that_DT ._.
How_WRB can_MD I_PRP bear_VB to_TO leave_VB my_PRP$ children_NNS alone_RB in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
The_DT wild_JJ animals_NNS would_MD soon_RB come_VB and_CC tear_VB them_PRP to_IN pieces_NNS ._.
O_CC you_PRP fool_VBP ,_, said_VBD she_PRP ,_, then_RB we_PRP must_MD all_DT four_CD die_NN of_IN hunger_NN ,_, you_PRP may_MD as_RB well_RB plane_VB the_DT planks_NNS for_IN our_PRP$ coffins_NNS ,_, and_CC she_PRP left_VBD him_PRP no_DT peace_NN until_IN he_PRP consented_VBD ._.
But_CC I_PRP feel_VBP very_RB sorry_JJ for_IN the_DT poor_JJ children_NNS ,_, all_PDT the_DT same_JJ ,_, said_VBD the_DT man_NN ._.
The_DT two_CD children_NNS had_VBD also_RB not_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO sleep_VB for_IN hunger_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD heard_VBN what_WP their_PRP$ step-mother_NN had_VBD said_VBN to_IN their_PRP$ father_NN ._.
Gretel_NNP wept_VBD bitter_JJ tears_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN Hansel_NNP ,_, now_RB all_RB is_VBZ over_RB with_IN us_PRP ._.
Be_VB quiet_JJ ,_, Gretel_NNP ,_, said_VBD Hansel_NNP ,_, do_VBP not_RB distress_VB yourself_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD soon_RB find_VB a_DT way_NN to_TO help_VB us_PRP ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT old_JJ folks_NNS had_VBD fallen_VBN asleep_JJ ,_, he_PRP got_VBD up_RP ,_, put_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ little_JJ coat_NN ,_, opened_VBD the_DT door_NN below_RB ,_, and_CC crept_VBD outside_RB ._.
The_DT moon_NN shone_VBD brightly_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT white_JJ pebbles_NNS which_WDT lay_VBD in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN glittered_VBD like_IN real_JJ silver_NN pennies_NNS ._.
Hansel_NNP stooped_VBD and_CC stuffed_VBD the_DT little_JJ pocket_NN of_IN his_PRP$ coat_NN with_IN as_RB many_JJ as_IN he_PRP could_MD get_VB in_RP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP went_VBD back_RB and_CC said_VBD to_IN Gretel_NNP ,_, be_VB comforted_VBN ,_, dear_JJ little_JJ sister_NN ,_, and_CC sleep_NN in_IN peace_NN ,_, God_NNP will_MD not_RB forsake_VB us_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP lay_VBD down_RP again_RB in_IN his_PRP$ bed_NN ._.
When_WRB day_NN dawned_VBD ,_, but_CC before_IN the_DT sun_NN had_VBD risen_VBN ,_, the_DT woman_NN came_VBD and_CC awoke_VBD the_DT two_CD children_NNS ,_, saying_VBG get_VB up_RP ,_, you_PRP sluggards_NNS ._.
We_PRP are_VBP going_VBG into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_TO fetch_VB wood_NN ._.
She_PRP gave_VBD each_DT a_DT little_JJ piece_NN of_IN bread_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, there_EX is_VBZ something_NN for_IN your_PRP$ dinner_NN ,_, but_CC do_VBP not_RB eat_VB it_PRP up_RP before_IN then_RB ,_, for_IN you_PRP will_MD get_VB nothing_NN else_RB ._.
Gretel_NNP took_VBD the_DT bread_NN under_IN her_PRP$ apron_NN ,_, as_IN Hansel_NNP had_VBD the_DT pebbles_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP all_DT set_VBD out_RP together_RB on_IN the_DT way_NN to_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD walked_VBN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ,_, Hansel_NNP stood_VBD still_RB and_CC peeped_VBD back_RB at_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD so_RB again_RB and_CC again_RB ._.
His_PRP$ father_NN said_VBD ,_, Hansel_NNP ,_, what_WP are_VBP you_PRP looking_VBG at_IN there_RB and_CC staying_VBG behind_RB for_IN ._.
Pay_VB attention_NN ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB forget_VB how_WRB to_TO use_VB your_PRP$ legs_NNS ._.
Ah_UH ,_, father_NN ,_, said_VBD Hansel_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP looking_VBG at_IN my_PRP$ little_JJ white_JJ cat_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ sitting_VBG up_RP on_IN the_DT roof_NN ,_, and_CC wants_VBZ to_TO say_VB good-bye_UH to_IN me_PRP ._.
The_DT wife_NN said_VBD ,_, fool_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ not_RB your_PRP$ little_JJ cat_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ the_DT morning_NN sun_NN which_WDT is_VBZ shining_VBG on_IN the_DT chimneys_NNS ._.
Hansel_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD not_RB been_VBN looking_VBG back_RB at_IN the_DT cat_NN ,_, but_CC had_VBD been_VBN constantly_RB throwing_VBG one_CD of_IN the_DT white_JJ pebble-stones_NNS out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN on_IN the_DT road_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD reached_VBN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, the_DT father_NN said_VBD ,_, now_RB ,_, children_NNS ,_, pile_VB up_RP some_DT wood_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD light_VB a_DT fire_NN that_WDT you_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB cold_JJ ._.
Hansel_NNP and_CC Gretel_NNP gathered_VBD brushwood_NN together_RB ,_, as_RB high_JJ as_IN a_DT little_JJ hill_NN ._.

But_CC now_RB we_PRP must_MD be_VB off_RB ,_, said_VBD Hansel_NNP ,_, that_IN we_PRP may_MD get_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT witchs_NNS forest_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD walked_VBN for_IN two_CD hours_NNS ,_, they_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT great_JJ stretch_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
We_PRP can_MD not_RB cross_VB ,_, said_VBD Hansel_NNP ,_, I_PRP see_VBP no_DT foot-plank_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT bridge_NN ._.
And_CC there_EX is_VBZ also_RB no_DT ferry_NN ,_, answered_VBD Gretel_NNP ,_, but_CC a_DT white_JJ duck_NN is_VBZ swimming_VBG there_RB ._.
If_IN I_PRP ask_VBP her_PRP ,_, she_PRP will_MD help_VB us_PRP over_RP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP cried_VBD -_HYPH little_JJ duck_NN ,_, little_JJ duck_NN ,_, dost_NNS thou_PRP see_VB ,_, Hansel_NNP and_CC Gretel_NNP are_VBP waiting_VBG for_IN thee_PRP ._.
Theres_NNS never_RB a_DT plank_NN ,_, or_CC bridge_NN in_IN sight_NN ,_, take_VB us_PRP across_RB on_IN thy_DT back_NN so_RB white_JJ ._.
The_DT duck_NN came_VBD to_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC Hansel_NNP seated_VBD himself_PRP on_IN its_PRP$ back_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD his_PRP$ sister_NN to_TO sit_VB by_IN him_PRP ._.

The_DT good_JJ little_JJ duck_NN did_VBD so_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD once_RB safely_RB across_IN and_CC had_VBD walked_VBN for_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT forest_NN seemed_VBD to_TO be_VB more_JJR and_CC more_RBR familiar_JJ to_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC at_IN length_NN they_PRP saw_VBD from_IN afar_RB their_PRP$ fathers_NNS house_NN ._.

Then_RB all_DT anxiety_NN was_VBD at_IN an_DT end_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP lived_VBD together_RB in_IN perfect_JJ happiness_NN ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB on_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT poor_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP could_MD no_RB longer_RBR support_VB his_PRP$ only_JJ son_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT son_NN ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, things_NNS go_VBP so_RB badly_RB with_IN us_PRP that_IN I_PRP am_VBP a_DT burden_NN to_IN you_PRP ._.

And_CC as_IN she_PRP lay_VBD there_RB dead_JJ ,_, the_DT young_JJ king_NN remembered_VBD what_WP he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN obliged_VBN to_TO promise_VB ,_, and_CC was_VBD horrified_VBN at_IN having_VBG to_TO lie_VB down_RP alive_JJ in_IN the_DT grave_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX was_VBD no_DT escape_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN had_VBD placed_VBN sentries_NNS at_RB all_PDT the_DT gates_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB possible_JJ to_TO avoid_VB his_PRP$ fate_NN ._.

Then_RB it_PRP took_VBD the_DT three_CD pieces_NNS of_IN the_DT snake_NN ,_, laid_VBD them_PRP together_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP fitted_VBD ,_, and_CC placed_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT leaves_NNS on_IN each_DT wound_NN ._.

A_DT long_JJ time_NN ago_RB there_EX lived_VBD a_DT king_NN who_WP was_VBD famed_VBN for_IN his_PRP$ wisdom_NN through_IN all_PDT the_DT land_NN ._.
Nothing_NN was_VBD hidden_VBN from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC it_PRP seemed_VBD as_IN if_IN news_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS secret_JJ things_NNS was_VBD brought_VBN to_IN him_PRP through_IN the_DT air_NN ._.

No_RB sooner_RBR had_VBD it_PRP touched_VBD his_PRP$ tongue_NN than_IN he_PRP heard_VBD a_DT strange_JJ whispering_NN of_IN little_JJ voices_NNS outside_IN his_PRP$ window_NN ._.
He_PRP went_VBD and_CC listened_VBD ,_, and_CC then_RB noticed_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD the_DT sparrows_NNS who_WP were_VBD chattering_VBG together_RB ,_, and_CC telling_VBG one_CD another_DT of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN things_NNS which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN in_IN the_DT fields_NNS and_CC woods_NNS ._.

Now_RB it_PRP so_RB happened_VBD that_IN on_IN this_DT very_JJ day_NN the_DT queen_NN lost_VBD her_PRP most_RBS beautiful_JJ ring_NN ,_, and_CC suspicion_NN of_IN having_VBG stolen_VBN it_PRP fell_VBD upon_IN this_DT trusty_JJ servant_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB everywhere_RB ._.
The_DT king_NN ordered_VBD the_DT man_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC threatened_VBD with_IN angry_JJ words_NNS that_IN unless_IN he_PRP could_MD before_IN the_DT morrow_NN point_NN out_RP the_DT thief_NN ,_, he_PRP himself_PRP should_MD be_VB looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN guilty_JJ and_CC executed_VBN ._.
In_IN vain_NN he_PRP declared_VBD his_PRP$ innocence_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD dismissed_VBN with_IN no_DT better_JJR answer_NN ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ trouble_NN and_CC fear_NN he_PRP went_VBD down_RB into_IN the_DT courtyard_NN and_CC took_VBD thought_NN how_WRB to_TO help_VB himself_PRP out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ trouble_NN ._.
Now_RB some_DT ducks_NNS were_VBD sitting_VBG together_RB quietly_RB by_IN a_DT brook_NN and_CC taking_VBG their_PRP$ rest_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, whilst_IN they_PRP were_VBD making_VBG their_PRP$ feathers_NNS smooth_JJ with_IN their_PRP$ bills_NNS ,_, they_PRP were_VBD having_VBG a_DT confidential_JJ conversation_NN together_RB ._.
The_DT servant_NN stood_VBD by_RB and_CC listened_VBD ._.

The_DT servant_NN at_IN once_RB seized_VBD her_PRP by_IN the_DT neck_NN ,_, carried_VBD her_PRP to_IN the_DT kitchen_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT cook_NN ,_, here_RB is_VBZ a_DT fine_JJ duck_NN ,_, pray_NN ,_, kill_VB her_PRP ._.

Now_RB ,_, little_JJ mite_NN of_IN a_DT man_NN ,_, do_VBP that_DT likewise_RB ._.

The_DT bird_NN ,_, delighted_VBD with_IN its_PRP$ liberty_NN ,_, rose_VBD ,_, flew_VBD away_RB and_CC did_VBD not_RB come_VB back_RB ._.
How_WRB does_VBZ that_DT shot_VBN please_UH you_PRP ,_, comrade_NN ,_, asked_VBD the_DT tailor_NN ._.

The_DT hero_NN ,_, however_RB went_VBD to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD now_RB ,_, whether_IN he_PRP liked_VBD it_PRP or_CC not_RB ,_, obliged_VBN to_TO keep_VB his_PRP$ promise_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP his_PRP$ daughter_NN and_CC the_DT half_NN of_IN his_PRP$ kingdom_NN ._.

Then_RB he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT girl_NN who_WP was_VBD going_VBG towards_IN a_DT small_JJ house_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD nearer_RB ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD that_IN the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD young_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ ._.

Do_VB not_RB go_VB in_RB ._.

The_DT old_JJ woman_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG in_IN an_DT armchair_NN by_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC looked_VBD at_IN the_DT stranger_NN with_IN her_PRP$ red_JJ eyes_NNS ._.

She_PRP had_VBD three_CD days_NNS to_TO guess_VB it_PRP in_RP ,_, but_CC was_VBD so_RB clever_JJ that_IN she_PRP always_RB found_VBD the_DT answer_NN to_IN the_DT riddle_NN given_VBN her_PRP before_IN the_DT appointed_JJ time_NN ._.

One_CD slew_NN none_NN ,_, and_CC yet_RB slew_VB twelve_CD ._.

As_IN she_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO help_VB herself_PRP ,_, she_PRP ordered_VBD her_PRP$ maid_NN to_TO creep_VB into_IN the_DT lords_NNS sleeping-chamber_NN ,_, and_CC listen_VB to_IN his_PRP$ dreams_NNS ,_, and_CC thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP would_MD perhaps_RB speak_VB in_IN his_PRP$ sleep_NN and_CC reveal_VB the_DT riddle_NN ._.

Now_RB the_DT master_NN believed_VBD himself_PRP safe_JJ for_IN the_DT third_JJ night_NN ,_, and_CC lay_VBD down_RP in_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ bed_NN ._.
Then_RB came_VBD the_DT princess_NN herself_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP had_VBD put_VBN on_RP a_DT misty-grey_NN mantle_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP seated_VBD herself_PRP near_IN him_PRP ._.

Next_JJ morning_NN ,_, the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN announced_VBD that_IN she_PRP had_VBD guessed_VBN the_DT riddle_NN ,_, and_CC sent_VBN for_IN the_DT twelve_CD judges_NNS and_CC expounded_VBD it_PRP before_IN them_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT youth_NN begged_VBD for_IN a_DT hearing_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, she_PRP stole_VBD into_IN my_PRP$ room_NN in_IN the_DT night_NN and_CC questioned_VBD me_PRP ,_, otherwise_RB she_PRP could_MD not_RB have_VB discovered_VBN it_PRP ._.
The_DT judges_NNS said_VBD ,_, bring_VB us_PRP a_DT proof_NN of_IN this_DT ._.
Then_RB were_VBD the_DT three_CD mantles_NNS brought_VBN thither_NN by_IN the_DT servant_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT judges_NNS saw_VBD the_DT misty-grey_NNP one_CD which_WDT the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN usually_RB wore_VBD ,_, they_PRP said_VBD ,_, let_VB the_DT mantle_NN be_VB embroidered_VBN with_IN gold_NN and_CC silver_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB it_PRP will_MD be_VB your_PRP$ wedding-mantle_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT widow_NN who_WP had_VBD two_CD daughters_NNS -_HYPH one_NN of_IN whom_WP was_VBD pretty_JJ and_CC industrious_JJ ,_, whilst_IN the_DT other_JJ was_VBD ugly_JJ and_CC idle_JJ ._.
But_CC she_PRP was_VBD much_RB fonder_NN of_IN the_DT ugly_JJ and_CC idle_NN one_CD ,_, because_IN she_PRP was_VBD her_PRP$ own_JJ daughter_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT other_JJ ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT step-daughter_NN ,_, was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO do_VB all_PDT the_DT work_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB the_DT cinderella_NN of_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
Every_DT day_NN the_DT poor_JJ girl_NN had_VBD to_TO sit_VB by_IN a_DT well_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT highway_NN ,_, and_CC spin_NN and_CC spin_NN till_IN her_PRP$ fingers_NNS bled_VBN ._.
Now_RB it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN one_CD day_NN the_DT shuttle_NN was_VBD marked_VBN with_IN her_PRP$ blood_NN ,_, so_IN she_PRP dipped_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT well_RB ,_, to_TO wash_VB the_DT mark_NN off_RP ,_, but_CC it_PRP dropped_VBD out_IN of_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN and_CC fell_VBD to_IN the_DT bottom_NN ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT dear_JJ little_JJ girl_NN who_WP was_VBD loved_VBN by_IN every_DT one_NN who_WP looked_VBD at_IN her_PRP ,_, but_CC most_JJS of_IN all_DT by_IN her_PRP$ grandmother_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN that_IN she_PRP would_MD not_RB have_VB given_VBN to_IN the_DT child_NN ._.

One_CD day_NN her_PRP$ mother_NN said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, come_VB ,_, little_JJ red-cap_NN ,_, here_RB is_VBZ a_DT piece_NN of_IN cake_NN and_CC a_DT bottle_NN of_IN wine_NN ._.

It_PRP happened_VBD that_IN soon_RB afterwards_RB the_DT king_NN came_VBD into_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT one_NN knew_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP asked_VBD the_DT people_NNS what_WP news_NN there_EX was_VBD ,_, they_PRP answered_VBD ,_, a_DT child_NN has_VBZ just_RB been_VBN born_VBN with_IN a_DT caul_NN on_IN ,_, whatever_WDT anyone_NN so_RB born_VBN undertakes_NNS turns_VBZ out_RP well_RB ._.

He_PRP thanked_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN for_IN helping_VBG him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ need_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD hell_NN well_RB content_NN that_IN everything_NN had_VBD turned_VBN out_RP so_RB fortunately_RB ._.

Ferry_VB me_PRP across_IN first_RB ,_, said_VBD the_DT child_NN of_IN good_JJ fortune_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB I_PRP will_MD tell_VB you_PRP how_WRB you_PRP can_MD be_VB set_VBN free_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP reached_VBD the_DT opposite_JJ shore_NN he_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT devils_NNS advice_NN ._.
Next_JJ time_NN anyone_NN comes_VBZ ,_, who_WP wants_VBZ to_TO be_VB ferried_VBN over_RB ,_, just_RB put_VB the_DT oar_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ._.
He_PRP went_VBD on_RB and_CC came_VBD to_IN the_DT town_NN wherein_WRB stood_VBD the_DT unfruitful_JJ tree_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX too_RB the_DT watchman_NN wanted_VBD an_DT answer_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT watchman_NN thanked_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP as_IN a_DT reward_NN two_CD asses_NNS laden_JJ with_IN gold_NN ,_, which_WDT followed_VBD him_PRP ._.
Finally_RB ,_, he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT town_NN whose_WP$ well_NN was_VBD dry_JJ ._.
He_PRP told_VBD the_DT watchman_NN what_WP the_DT devil_NN had_VBD said_VBN ,_, a_DT toad_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT well_NN beneath_IN a_DT stone_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD find_VB it_PRP and_CC kill_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT well_NN will_MD again_RB give_VB wine_NN in_IN plenty_NN ._.
The_DT watchman_NN thanked_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC also_RB gave_VBD him_PRP two_CD asses_NNS laden_JJ with_IN gold_NN ._.
At_IN last_JJ the_DT child_NN of_IN good_JJ fortune_NN got_VBD home_RB to_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD heartily_RB glad_JJ to_TO see_VB him_PRP again_RB ,_, and_CC to_TO hear_VB how_WRB well_RB he_PRP had_VBD prospered_VBN in_IN everything_NN ._.

But_CC tell_VB me_PRP ,_, dear_JJ son-in-law_NN ,_, where_WRB did_VBD all_PDT that_DT gold_NN come_VB from_IN -_: this_DT is_VBZ tremendous_JJ wealth_NN ._.
I_PRP was_VBD rowed_VBN across_IN a_DT river_NN ,_, answered_VBD he_PRP ,_, and_CC got_VBD it_PRP there_RB ,_, it_PRP lies_VBZ on_IN the_DT shore_NN instead_RB of_IN sand_NN ._.

There_EX is_VBZ a_DT ferryman_NN on_IN the_DT river_NN ,_, let_VB him_PRP ferry_VB you_PRP over_RB ,_, and_CC you_PRP can_MD fill_VB your_PRP$ sacks_NNS on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN ._.
The_DT greedy_JJ king_NN set_VBD out_RP in_IN all_DT haste_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT river_NN he_PRP beckoned_VBD to_IN the_DT ferryman_NN to_TO put_VB him_PRP across_RB ._.
The_DT ferryman_NN came_VBD and_CC bade_VB him_PRP get_VB in_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP got_VBD to_IN the_DT other_JJ shore_NN he_PRP put_VBD the_DT oar_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN and_CC sprang_VBD over_RP ._.
But_CC from_IN this_DT time_NN forth_IN the_DT king_NN had_VBD to_TO ferry_VB ,_, as_IN a_DT punishment_NN for_IN his_PRP$ sins_NNS ._.
Perhaps_RB he_PRP is_VBZ ferrying_VBG still_RB ._.
If_IN he_PRP is_VBZ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ because_IN no_DT one_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN the_DT oar_NN from_IN him_PRP ._.
A_DT certain_JJ miller_NN had_VBD little_JJ by_IN little_JJ fallen_VBN into_IN poverty_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD nothing_NN left_VBN but_CC his_PRP$ mill_NN and_CC a_DT large_JJ apple-tree_NN behind_IN it_PRP ._.
Once_RB when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD gone_VBN into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_TO fetch_VB wood_NN ,_, an_DT old_JJ man_NN stepped_VBD up_RP to_IN him_PRP whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD never_RB seen_VBN before_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, why_WRB do_VBP you_PRP plague_VB yourself_PRP with_IN cutting_VBG wood_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD make_VB you_PRP rich_JJ ,_, if_IN you_PRP will_MD promise_VB me_PRP what_WP is_VBZ standing_VBG behind_IN your_PRP$ mill_NN ._.
What_WP can_MD that_DT be_VB but_CC my_PRP$ apple-tree_NN ,_, thought_VBD the_DT miller_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, and_CC gave_VBD a_DT written_VBN promise_NN to_IN the_DT stranger_NN ._.
He_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, laughed_VBD mockingly_RB and_CC said_VBD ,_, when_WRB three_CD years_NNS have_VBP passed_VBN ,_, I_PRP will_MD come_VB and_CC carry_VB away_RP what_WP belongs_VBZ to_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP went_VBD ._.

All_DT at_IN once_RB every_DT box_NN and_CC chest_NN was_VBD filled_VBN ,_, no_DT one_NN brought_VBD it_PRP in_RP ,_, and_CC I_PRP know_VBP not_RB how_WRB it_PRP happened_VBD ._.

He_PRP did_VBD not_RB mean_VB the_DT apple-tree_NN ,_, but_CC our_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD standing_VBG behind_IN the_DT mill_NN sweeping_VBG the_DT yard_NN ._.
The_DT millers_NNS daughter_NN was_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ ,_, pious_JJ girl_NN ,_, and_CC lived_VBD through_IN the_DT three_CD years_NNS in_IN the_DT fear_NN of_IN God_NNP and_CC without_IN sin_NN ._.
When_WRB therefore_RB the_DT time_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT day_NN came_VBD when_WRB the_DT evil_JJ one_NN was_VBD to_TO fetch_VB her_PRP ,_, she_PRP washed_VBD herself_PRP clean_JJ ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT circle_NN round_RB herself_PRP with_IN chalk_NN ._.

The_DT miller_NN was_VBD afraid_JJ ,_, and_CC did_VBD so_RB ._.

Again_RB he_PRP could_MD not_RB get_VB near_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC furiously_RB said_VBD to_IN the_DT miller_NN ,_, cut_VB her_PRP$ hands_NNS off_RP ,_, or_CC else_RB I_PRP have_VBP no_DT power_NN over_IN her_PRP ._.
The_DT miller_NN was_VBD shocked_JJ and_CC answered_VBN ,_, how_WRB could_MD I_PRP cut_VB off_RP my_PRP$ own_JJ childs_NNS hands_NNS ._.

The_DT father_NN became_VBD alarmed_JJ ,_, and_CC promised_VBD to_TO obey_VB him_PRP ._.

She_PRP replied_VBD ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, do_VBP with_IN me_PRP what_WP you_PRP will_MD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP your_PRP$ child_NN ._.

Then_RB he_PRP had_VBD to_TO give_VB in_RP ,_, and_CC had_VBD lost_VBN all_DT right_RB over_IN her_PRP ._.
The_DT miller_NN said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP by_IN means_NNS of_IN you_PRP received_VBD such_JJ great_JJ wealth_NN that_IN I_PRP will_MD keep_VB you_PRP most_RBS handsomely_RB as_RB long_RB as_IN you_PRP live_VBP ._.
But_CC she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, here_RB I_PRP can_MD not_RB stay_VB ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB forth_RB ,_, compassionate_JJ people_NNS will_MD give_VB me_PRP as_RB much_JJ as_IN I_PRP require_VBP ._.
Thereupon_RB she_PRP caused_VBD her_PRP$ maimed_JJ arms_NNS to_TO be_VB bound_VBN to_IN her_PRP$ back_RB ,_, and_CC by_IN sunrise_NN she_PRP set_VBD out_RP on_IN her_PRP$ way_NN ,_, and_CC walked_VBD the_DT whole_JJ day_NN until_IN night_NN fell_VBD ._.
Then_RB she_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT royal_JJ garden_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT shimmering_NN of_IN the_DT moon_NN she_PRP saw_VBD that_IN trees_NNS covered_VBN with_IN beautiful_JJ fruits_NNS grew_VBD in_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC she_PRP could_MD not_RB enter_VB ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD surrounded_VBN by_IN water_NN ._.
And_CC as_IN she_PRP had_VBD walked_VBN the_DT whole_JJ day_NN and_CC not_RB eaten_VBN one_CD mouthful_NN ,_, and_CC hunger_NN tormented_VBD her_PRP ,_, she_PRP thought_VBD ,_, ah_UH ,_, if_IN I_PRP were_VBD but_IN inside_RB ,_, that_IN I_PRP might_MD eat_VB of_IN the_DT fruit_NN ,_, else_RB must_MD I_PRP die_VB of_IN hunger_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP knelt_VBD down_RB ,_, called_VBN on_IN God_NNP the_DT Lord_NNP ,_, and_CC prayed_VBD ._.
And_CC suddenly_RB an_DT angel_NN came_VBD towards_IN her_PRP ,_, who_WP made_VBD a_DT dam_NN in_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT moat_NN became_VBD dry_JJ and_CC she_PRP could_MD walk_VB through_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC now_RB she_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT garden_NN and_CC the_DT angel_NN went_VBD with_IN her_PRP ._.

The_DT gardener_NN was_VBD watching_VBG ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT angel_NN was_VBD standing_VBG by_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD afraid_JJ and_CC thought_VBD the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD a_DT spirit_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD silent_JJ ,_, neither_CC did_VBD he_PRP dare_VB to_TO cry_VB out_RP ,_, or_CC to_TO speak_VB to_IN the_DT spirit_NN ._.
When_WRB she_PRP had_VBD eaten_VBN the_DT pear_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD satisfied_JJ ,_, and_CC went_VBD and_CC concealed_VBD herself_PRP among_IN the_DT bushes_NNS ._.
The_DT king_NN to_TO whom_WP the_DT garden_NN belonged_VBD ,_, came_VBD down_RB to_IN it_PRP next_JJ morning_NN ,_, and_CC counted_VBN ,_, and_CC saw_VBD that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT pears_NNS was_VBD missing_VBG ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT gardener_NN what_WP had_VBD become_VBN of_IN it_PRP ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD not_RB lying_VBG beneath_IN the_DT tree_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD gone_VBN ._.

And_CC as_IN it_PRP must_MD have_VB been_VBN an_DT angel_NN ,_, I_PRP was_VBD afraid_JJ ,_, and_CC asked_VBD no_DT questions_NNS ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB cry_VB out_RP ._.

When_WRB it_PRP grew_VBD dark_IN the_DT king_NN came_VBD into_IN the_DT garden_NN and_CC brought_VBD a_DT priest_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, who_WP was_VBD to_TO speak_VB to_IN the_DT spirit_NN ._.

He_PRP took_VBD her_PRP with_IN him_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ royal_JJ palace_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN she_PRP was_VBD so_RB beautiful_JJ and_CC good_JJ ,_, he_PRP loved_VBD her_PRP with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, had_VBD silver_JJ hands_NNS made_VBN for_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC took_VBD her_PRP to_IN wife_NN ._.
After_IN a_DT year_NN the_DT king_NN had_VBD to_TO go_VB on_IN a_DT journey_NN ,_, so_CC he_PRP commended_VBD his_PRP$ young_JJ queen_NN to_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, if_IN she_PRP is_VBZ brought_VBN to_TO child-bed_VBN take_VB care_NN of_IN her_PRP ,_, nurse_VB her_PRP well_RB ,_, and_CC tell_VB me_PRP of_IN it_PRP at_IN once_RB in_IN a_DT letter_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP gave_VBD birth_NN to_IN a_DT fine_JJ boy_NN ._.

But_CC the_DT messenger_NN rested_VBN by_IN a_DT brook_NN on_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD fatigued_VBN by_IN the_DT great_JJ distance_NN ,_, he_PRP fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
Then_RB came_VBD the_DT devil_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD always_RB seeking_VBG to_TO injure_VB the_DT good_JJ queen_NN ,_, and_CC exchanged_VBD the_DT letter_NN for_IN another_DT ,_, in_IN which_WDT was_VBD written_VBN that_IN the_DT queen_NN had_VBD brought_VBN a_DT monster_NN into_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT king_NN read_VBD the_DT letter_NN he_PRP was_VBD shocked_JJ and_CC much_RB troubled_JJ ,_, but_CC he_PRP wrote_VBD in_IN answer_NN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO take_VB great_JJ care_NN of_IN the_DT queen_NN and_CC nurse_VB her_PRP well_RB until_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN ._.
The_DT messenger_NN went_VBD back_RB with_IN the_DT letter_NN ,_, but_CC rested_VBD at_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN and_CC again_RB fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
Then_RB came_VBD the_DT devil_NN once_RB more_JJR ,_, and_CC put_VB a_DT different_JJ letter_NN in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD written_VBN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO put_VB the_DT queen_NN and_CC her_PRP$ child_NN to_IN death_NN ._.
The_DT old_JJ mother_NN was_VBD terribly_RB shocked_JJ when_WRB she_PRP received_VBD the_DT letter_NN ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB believe_VB it_PRP ._.
She_PRP wrote_VBD back_RB again_RB to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, but_CC received_VBD no_DT other_JJ answer_NN ,_, because_IN each_DT time_NN the_DT devil_NN substituted_VBD a_DT false_JJ letter_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT last_JJ letter_NN it_PRP was_VBD also_RB written_VBN that_IN she_PRP was_VBD to_TO preserve_VB the_DT queens_NNS tongue_NN and_CC eyes_NNS as_IN a_DT token_NN that_IN she_PRP had_VBD obeyed_VBN ._.
But_CC the_DT old_JJ mother_NN wept_VBD to_TO think_VB such_JJ innocent_JJ blood_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB shed_VBN ,_, and_CC had_VBD a_DT hind_NN brought_VBN by_IN night_NN and_CC cut_VB out_RP her_PRP$ tongue_NN and_CC eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC kept_VBD them_PRP ._.
Then_RB said_VBD she_PRP to_IN the_DT queen_NN ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB have_VB you_PRP killed_VBN as_IN the_DT king_NN commands_NNS ,_, but_CC here_RB you_PRP may_MD stay_VB no_RB longer_RBR ._.
Go_VB forth_RB into_IN the_DT wide_JJ world_NN with_IN your_PRP$ child_NN ,_, and_CC never_RB come_VBP here_RB again_RB ._.
The_DT poor_JJ woman_NN tied_VBD her_PRP$ child_NN on_IN her_PRP$ back_RB ,_, and_CC went_VBD away_RB with_IN eyes_NNS full_JJ of_IN tears_NNS ._.
She_PRP came_VBD into_IN a_DT great_JJ wild_JJ forest_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP fell_VBD on_IN her_PRP$ knees_NNS and_CC prayed_VBD to_IN God_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT angel_NN of_IN the_DT Lord_NNP appeared_VBD to_IN her_PRP and_CC led_VBD her_PRP to_IN a_DT little_JJ house_NN on_IN which_WDT was_VBD a_DT sign_NN with_IN the_DT words_NNS ,_, here_RB all_DT dwell_RB free_JJ ._.
A_DT snow-white_JJ maiden_NN came_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT little_JJ house_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, welcome_JJ ,_, lady_NN queen_NN ,_, and_CC conducted_VBD her_PRP$ inside_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP unbound_VBD the_DT little_JJ boy_NN from_IN her_PRP$ back_RB ,_, and_CC held_VBD him_PRP to_IN her_PRP$ breast_NN that_IN he_PRP might_MD feed_VB ,_, and_CC laid_VBD him_PRP in_IN a_DT beautifully-made_JJ little_JJ bed_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT poor_JJ woman_NN ,_, From_IN whence_NN do_VBP you_PRP know_VB that_IN I_PRP was_VBD a_DT queen_NN ?_.
The_DT white_JJ maiden_NN answered_VBN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP an_DT angel_NN sent_VBN by_IN God_NNP ,_, to_TO watch_VB over_RP you_PRP and_CC your_PRP$ child_NN ._.
The_DT queen_NN stayed_VBD seven_CD years_NNS in_IN the_DT little_JJ house_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD well_RB cared_VBN for_IN ,_, and_CC by_IN Gods_NNPS grace_NN ,_, because_IN of_IN her_PRP$ piety_NN ,_, her_PRP$ hands_NNS which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN cut_VBN off_RP ,_, grew_VBD once_RB more_JJR ._.
At_IN last_JJ the_DT king_NN came_VBD home_RB again_RB from_IN his_PRP$ journey_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ first_JJ wish_NN was_VBD to_TO see_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC the_DT child_NN ._.
Then_RB his_PRP$ aged_JJ mother_NN began_VBD to_TO weep_VB and_CC said_VBN ,_, You_PRP wicked_VBD man_NN ,_, why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP write_VB to_IN me_PRP that_IN I_PRP was_VBD to_TO take_VB those_DT two_CD innocent_JJ lives_NNS ,_, and_CC she_PRP showed_VBD him_PRP the_DT two_CD letters_NNS which_WDT the_DT evil_JJ one_CD had_VBD forged_VBN ,_, and_CC then_RB continued_VBD ,_, I_PRP did_VBD as_IN you_PRP bade_VB me_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP showed_VBD the_DT tokens_NNS ,_, the_DT tongue_NN and_CC eyes_NNS ._.

He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP this_DT year_NN learnt_VBD what_WP the_DT frogs_NNS croak_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT father_NN fell_VBD into_IN the_DT most_RBS furious_JJ anger_NN ,_, sprang_VBD up_RP ,_, called_VBD his_PRP$ people_NNS thither_NNP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, this_DT man_NN is_VBZ no_RB longer_RBR my_PRP$ son_NN ,_, I_PRP drive_VBP him_PRP forth_RB ,_, and_CC command_VB you_PRP to_TO take_VB him_PRP out_RP into_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC kill_VB him_PRP ._.
They_PRP took_VBD him_PRP forth_RB ,_, but_CC when_WRB they_PRP should_MD have_VB killed_VBN him_PRP ,_, they_PRP could_MD not_RB do_VB it_PRP for_IN pity_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB him_PRP go_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP cut_VBD the_DT eyes_NNS and_CC the_DT tongue_NN out_IN of_IN a_DT deer_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD carry_VB them_PRP to_IN the_DT old_JJ man_NN as_IN a_DT token_NN ._.
The_DT youth_NN wandered_VBD on_IN ,_, and_CC after_IN some_DT time_NN came_VBD to_IN a_DT fortress_NN where_WRB he_PRP begged_VBD for_IN a_DT nights_NNS lodging_NN ._.
Yes_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT lord_NN of_IN the_DT castle_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP will_MD pass_VB the_DT night_NN down_RB there_RB in_IN the_DT old_JJ tower_NN ,_, go_VB thither_RB ,_, but_CC I_PRP warn_VBP you_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ at_IN the_DT peril_NN of_IN your_PRP$ life_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ full_JJ of_IN wild_JJ dogs_NNS ,_, which_WDT bark_VBP and_CC howl_NN without_IN stopping_VBG ,_, and_CC at_IN certain_JJ hours_NNS a_DT man_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_IN them_PRP ,_, whom_WP they_PRP at_IN once_RB devour_NNP ._.
The_DT whole_JJ district_NN was_VBD in_IN sorrow_NN and_CC dismay_NN because_IN of_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC yet_RB no_DT one_NN could_MD do_VB anything_NN to_TO stop_VB this_DT ._.
The_DT youth_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD without_IN fear_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, just_RB let_VB me_PRP go_VB down_RB to_IN the_DT barking_NN dogs_NNS ,_, and_CC give_VB me_PRP something_NN that_WDT I_PRP can_MD throw_VB to_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP will_MD do_VB nothing_NN to_TO harm_VB me_PRP ._.
As_IN he_PRP himself_PRP would_MD have_VB it_PRP so_RB ,_, they_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP some_DT food_NN for_IN the_DT wild_JJ animals_NNS ,_, and_CC led_VBD him_PRP down_RP to_IN the_DT tower_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP went_VBD inside_RB ,_, the_DT dogs_NNS did_VBD not_RB bark_VB at_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC wagged_VBD their_PRP$ tails_NNS quite_RB amicably_RB around_IN him_PRP ,_, ate_VBD what_WP he_PRP set_VBD before_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB hurt_VB one_CD hair_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN ,_, to_IN the_DT astonishment_NN of_IN everyone_NN ,_, he_PRP came_VBD out_RP again_RB safe_JJ and_CC unharmed_JJ ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT lord_NN of_IN the_DT castle_NN ,_, the_DT dogs_NNS have_VBP revealed_VBN to_IN me_PRP ,_, in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ language_NN ,_, why_WRB they_PRP dwell_VBP there_RB ,_, and_CC bring_VB evil_NN on_IN the_DT land_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP bewitched_VBN ,_, and_CC are_VBP obliged_VBN to_TO watch_VB over_IN a_DT great_JJ treasure_NN which_WDT is_VBZ below_RB in_IN the_DT tower_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP can_MD have_VB no_DT rest_NN until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ taken_VBN away_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP likewise_RB learnt_VBN ,_, from_IN their_PRP$ discourse_NN ,_, how_WRB that_DT is_VBZ to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
Then_RB all_DT who_WP heard_VBD this_DT rejoiced_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT lord_NN of_IN the_DT castle_NN said_VBD he_PRP would_MD adopt_VB him_PRP as_IN a_DT son_NN if_IN he_PRP accomplished_VBD it_PRP successfully_RB ._.
He_PRP went_VBD down_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP knew_VBD what_WP he_PRP had_VBD to_TO do_VB ,_, he_PRP did_VBD it_PRP thoroughly_RB ,_, and_CC brought_VBD a_DT chest_NN full_JJ of_IN gold_NN out_RP with_IN him_PRP ._.
The_DT howling_NN of_IN the_DT wild_JJ dogs_NNS was_VBD henceforth_RB heard_VBN no_RB more_RBR ,_, they_PRP had_VBD disappeared_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT country_NN was_VBD freed_VBN from_IN the_DT trouble_NN ._.
After_IN some_DT time_NN he_PRP took_VBD it_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ head_NN that_IN he_PRP would_MD travel_VB to_IN Rome_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT way_NN he_PRP passed_VBD by_IN a_DT marsh_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT a_DT number_NN of_IN frogs_NNS were_VBD sitting_VBG croaking_VBG ._.
He_PRP listened_VBD to_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP became_VBD aware_JJ of_IN what_WP they_PRP were_VBD saying_VBG ,_, he_PRP grew_VBD very_RB thoughtful_JJ and_CC sad_JJ ._.
At_IN last_JJ he_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN Rome_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT Pope_NNP had_VBD just_RB died_VBN ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD great_JJ doubt_NN among_IN the_DT cardinals_NNS as_IN to_IN whom_WP they_PRP should_MD appoint_VB as_IN his_PRP$ successor_NN ._.
They_PRP at_IN length_NN agreed_VBD that_IN the_DT person_NN should_MD be_VB chosen_VBN as_IN Pope_NNP who_WP should_MD be_VB distinguished_VBN by_IN some_DT divine_JJ and_CC miraculous_JJ token_NN ._.
And_CC just_RB as_IN that_DT was_VBD decided_VBN on_IN ,_, the_DT young_JJ count_NN entered_VBN into_IN the_DT church_NN ,_, and_CC suddenly_RB two_CD snow-white_JJ doves_NNS flew_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS and_CC remained_VBD sitting_VBG there_RB ._.
The_DT ecclesiastics_NNS recognized_VBD therein_IN the_DT token_NN from_IN above_RB ,_, and_CC asked_VBD him_PRP on_IN the_DT spot_NN if_IN he_PRP would_MD be_VB Pope_NNP ._.
He_PRP was_VBD undecided_JJ ,_, and_CC knew_VBD not_RB if_IN he_PRP were_VBD worthy_JJ of_IN this_DT ,_, but_CC the_DT doves_NNS counselled_VBD him_PRP to_TO do_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC at_IN length_NN he_PRP said_VBD yes_UH ._.
Then_RB was_VBD he_PRP anointed_VBN and_CC consecrated_VBN ,_, and_CC thus_RB was_VBD fulfilled_VBN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN from_IN the_DT frogs_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD so_RB affected_VBN him_PRP ,_, that_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB his_PRP$ holiness_NN the_DT Pope_NNP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP had_VBD to_TO sing_VB a_DT mass_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB know_VB one_CD word_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT two_CD doves_NNS sat_VBD continually_RB on_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD it_PRP all_DT in_IN his_PRP$ ear_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT daughter_NN who_WP was_VBD called_VBN clever_JJ elsie_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB she_PRP had_VBD grown_VBN up_RP her_PRP$ father_NN said_VBD ,_, we_PRP will_MD get_VB her_PRP$ married_JJ ._.
Yes_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT mother_NN ,_, if_IN only_RB someone_NN would_MD come_VB who_WP would_MD have_VB her_PRP ._.
At_IN length_NN a_DT man_NN came_VBD from_IN a_DT distance_NN and_CC wooed_VBD her_PRP ,_, who_WP was_VBD called_VBN Hans_NNPS ,_, but_CC he_PRP stipulated_VBD that_IN clever_JJ elsie_NN should_MD be_VB really_RB smart_JJ ._.
Oh_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT father_NN ,_, she_PRP has_VBZ plenty_NN of_IN good_JJ sense_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT mother_NN said_VBD ,_, oh_UH ,_, she_PRP can_MD see_VB the_DT wind_NN coming_VBG up_IN the_DT street_NN ,_, and_CC hear_VB the_DT flies_NNS coughing_VBG ._.
Well_UH ,_, said_VBD Hans_NNP ,_, if_IN she_PRP is_VBZ not_RB really_RB smart_JJ ,_, I_PRP wo_MD nt_RB have_VB her_PRP ._.
When_WRB they_PRP were_VBD sitting_VBG at_IN dinner_NN and_CC had_VBD eaten_VBN ,_, the_DT mother_NN said_VBD ,_, elsie_UH ,_, go_VB into_IN the_DT cellar_NN and_CC fetch_VB some_DT beer_NN ._.
Then_RB clever_JJ elsie_NN took_VBD the_DT pitcher_NN from_IN the_DT wall_NN ,_, went_VBD into_IN the_DT cellar_NN ,_, and_CC tapped_VBD the_DT lid_NN briskly_RB as_IN she_PRP went_VBD ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT time_NN might_MD not_RB appear_VB long_RB ._.
When_WRB she_PRP was_VBD below_IN she_PRP fetched_VBD herself_PRP a_DT chair_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD it_PRP before_IN the_DT barrel_NN so_IN that_IN she_PRP had_VBD no_DT need_NN to_TO stoop_VB ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB hurt_VB her_PRP$ back_RB or_CC do_VBP herself_PRP any_DT unexpected_JJ injury_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP placed_VBD the_DT can_NN before_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC turned_VBD the_DT tap_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN the_DT beer_NN was_VBD running_VBG she_PRP would_MD not_RB let_VB her_PRP$ eyes_NNS be_VB idle_JJ ,_, but_CC looked_VBD up_RP at_IN the_DT wall_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN much_RB peering_NN here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, saw_VBD a_DT pick-axe_NN exactly_RB above_IN her_PRP ,_, which_WDT the_DT masons_NNS had_VBD accidentally_RB left_VBN there_RB ._.
Then_RB clever_JJ elsie_NNP began_VBD to_TO weep_VB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, if_IN I_PRP get_VBP Hans_NNPS ,_, and_CC we_PRP have_VBP a_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP grows_VBZ big_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP send_VBP him_PRP into_IN the_DT cellar_NN here_RB to_TO draw_VB beer_NN ,_, then_RB the_DT pick-axe_NN will_MD fall_VB on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC kill_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP sat_VBD and_CC wept_JJ and_CC screamed_VBN with_IN all_PDT the_DT strength_NN of_IN her_PRP$ body_NN ,_, over_IN the_DT misfortune_NN which_WDT lay_VBD before_IN her_PRP ._.
Those_DT upstairs_NNS waited_VBD for_IN the_DT drink_NN ,_, but_CC clever_JJ elsie_NN still_RB did_VBD not_RB come_VB ._.
Then_RB the_DT woman_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT servant_NN ,_, just_RB go_VB down_RB into_IN the_DT cellar_NN and_CC see_VB where_WRB elsie_NN is_VBZ ._.
The_DT maid_NN went_VBD and_CC found_VBD her_PRP sitting_VBG in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT barrel_NN ,_, screaming_VBG loudly_RB ._.
Elsie_NNP ,_, why_WRB do_VBP you_PRP weep_VB ,_, asked_VBD the_DT maid_NN ._.
Ah_UH ,_, she_PRP answered_VBD ,_, have_VBP I_PRP not_RB reason_NN to_TO weep_VB ._.
If_IN I_PRP get_VBP Hans_NNPS ,_, and_CC we_PRP have_VBP a_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP grows_VBZ big_JJ ,_, and_CC has_VBZ to_TO draw_VB beer_NN here_RB ,_, the_DT pick-axe_NN will_MD perhaps_RB fall_VB on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC kill_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT maid_NN ,_, what_WP a_DT clever_JJ elsie_NN we_PRP have_VBP ._.
And_CC sat_VBD down_RP beside_IN her_PRP and_CC began_VBD loudly_RB to_TO weep_VB over_IN the_DT misfortune_NN ._.
After_IN a_DT while_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT maid_NN did_VBD not_RB come_VB back_RB ,_, those_DT upstairs_NNS were_VBD thirsty_JJ for_IN the_DT beer_NN ,_, the_DT man_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT boy_NN ,_, just_RB go_VB down_RB into_IN the_DT cellar_NN and_CC see_VB where_WRB elsie_NN and_CC the_DT girl_NN are_VBP ._.
The_DT boy_NN went_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC there_EX sat_VBD clever_JJ elsie_NN and_CC the_DT girl_NN both_DT weeping_VBG together_RB ._.
Then_RB he_PRP asked_VBD ,_, why_WRB are_VBP you_PRP weeping_VBG ,_, ah_UH ,_, said_VBD elsie_RB ,_, have_VBP I_PRP not_RB reason_NN to_TO weep_VB ._.
If_IN I_PRP get_VBP Hans_NNPS ,_, and_CC we_PRP have_VBP a_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP grows_VBZ big_JJ ,_, and_CC has_VBZ to_TO draw_VB beer_NN here_RB ,_, the_DT pick-axe_NN will_MD fall_VB on_IN his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC kill_VB him_PRP ._.

And_CC sat_VBD down_RP by_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC likewise_RB began_VBD to_TO howl_VB loudly_RB ._.
Upstairs_NNS they_PRP waited_VBD for_IN the_DT boy_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN he_PRP still_RB did_VBD not_RB return_VB ,_, the_DT man_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT woman_NN ,_, just_RB go_VB down_RB into_IN the_DT cellar_NN and_CC see_VB where_WRB elsie_NN is_VBZ ._.
The_DT woman_NN went_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC found_VBD all_DT three_CD in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN their_PRP$ lamentations_NNS ,_, and_CC inquired_VBD what_WP was_VBD the_DT cause_NN ,_, then_RB elsie_NNP told_VBD her_PRP also_RB that_IN her_PRP$ future_JJ child_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB killed_VBN by_IN the_DT pick-axe_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP grew_VBD big_JJ and_CC had_VBD to_TO draw_VB beer_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pick-axe_NN fell_VBD down_RB ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT mother_NN likewise_RB ,_, what_WP a_DT clever_JJ elsie_NN we_PRP have_VBP ._.
And_CC sat_VBD down_RB and_CC wept_VBN with_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT man_NN upstairs_RB waited_VBD a_DT short_JJ time_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN did_VBD not_RB come_VB back_RB and_CC his_PRP$ thirst_NN grew_VBD ever_RB greater_JJR ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, I_PRP must_MD go_VB into_IN the_DT cellar_NN myself_PRP and_CC see_VB where_WRB elsie_NN is_VBZ ._.
But_CC when_WRB he_PRP got_VBD into_IN the_DT cellar_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD all_RB sitting_VBG together_RB crying_VBG ,_, and_CC he_PRP heard_VBD the_DT reason_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN elsies_NNS child_NN was_VBD the_DT cause_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN elsie_NN might_MD perhaps_RB bring_VB one_CD into_IN the_DT world_NN some_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP might_MD be_VB killed_VBN by_IN the_DT pick-axe_NN ,_, if_IN he_PRP should_MD happen_VB to_TO be_VB sitting_VBG beneath_IN it_PRP ,_, drawing_VBG beer_NN just_RB at_IN the_DT very_JJ time_NN when_WRB it_PRP fell_VBD down_RB ,_, he_PRP cried_VBD ,_, oh_UH ,_, what_WP a_DT clever_JJ elsie_NN ._.
And_CC sat_VBD down_RP ,_, and_CC likewise_RB wept_VBN with_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT bridegroom_NN stayed_VBD upstairs_RB alone_RB for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, then_RB as_IN no_DT one_NN would_MD come_VB back_RB he_PRP thought_VBD ,_, they_PRP must_MD be_VB waiting_VBG for_IN me_PRP below_RB ,_, I_PRP too_RB must_MD go_VB there_RB and_CC see_VB what_WP they_PRP are_VBP about_RB ._.
When_WRB he_PRP got_VBD down_RP ,_, the_DT five_CD of_IN them_PRP were_VBD sitting_VBG screaming_VBG and_CC lamenting_VBG quite_RB piteously_RB ,_, each_DT out-doing_VBG the_DT other_JJ ._.
What_WDT misfortune_NN has_VBZ happened_VBN then_RB ,_, he_PRP asked_VBD ._.
Ah_UH ,_, dear_JJ Hans_NNP ,_, said_VBD elsie_UH ,_, if_IN we_PRP marry_VBP each_DT other_JJ and_CC have_VBP a_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ big_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP perhaps_RB send_VB him_PRP here_RB to_TO draw_VB something_NN to_TO drink_VB ,_, then_RB the_DT pick-axe_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN left_VBN up_RP there_RB might_MD dash_VB his_PRP$ brains_NNS out_RP if_IN it_PRP were_VBD to_TO fall_VB down_RP ,_, so_RB have_VBP we_PRP not_RB reason_NN to_TO weep_VB ._.
Come_VB ,_, said_VBD Hans_NNP ,_, more_JJR understanding_NN than_IN that_DT is_VBZ not_RB needed_VBN for_IN my_PRP$ household_NN ,_, as_IN you_PRP are_VBP such_JJ a_DT clever_JJ elsie_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD have_VB you_PRP ._.
And_CC he_PRP seized_VBD her_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, took_VBD her_PRP$ upstairs_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC married_VBD her_PRP ._.
After_IN Hans_NNP had_VBD had_VBN her_PRP some_DT time_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, wife_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP going_VBG out_RP to_TO work_VB and_CC earn_VB some_DT money_NN for_IN us_PRP ,_, go_VB into_IN the_DT field_NN and_CC cut_VB the_DT corn_NN that_WDT we_PRP may_MD have_VB some_DT bread_NN ._.
Yes_UH ,_, dear_JJ Hans_NNP ,_, I_PRP will_MD do_VB that_DT ._.
After_IN Hans_NNP had_VBD gone_VBN away_RB ,_, she_PRP cooked_VBD herself_PRP some_DT good_JJ broth_NN and_CC took_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT field_NN with_IN her_PRP ._.
When_WRB she_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT field_NN she_PRP said_VBD to_IN herself_PRP ,_, what_WP shall_MD I_PRP do_VBP ,_, shall_MD I_PRP cut_VB first_RB ,_, or_CC shall_MD I_PRP eat_VB first_RB ._.
Oh_UH ,_, I_PRP will_MD eat_VB first_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP drank_VBP her_PRP$ cup_NN of_IN broth_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD fully_RB satisfied_JJ ,_, she_PRP once_IN more_RBR said_VBD ,_, what_WP shall_MD I_PRP do_VBP ._.
Shall_VB I_PRP cut_VBD first_RB ,_, or_CC shall_MD I_PRP sleep_VBP first_RB ._.
I_PRP will_MD sleep_VB first_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP lay_VBD down_RP among_IN the_DT corn_NN and_CC fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
Hans_NNS had_VBD been_VBN at_IN home_NN for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, but_CC elsie_NN did_VBD not_RB come_VB ,_, then_RB said_VBD he_PRP ,_, what_WP a_DT clever_JJ elsie_NN I_PRP have_VBP ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ so_RB industrious_JJ that_IN she_PRP does_VBZ not_RB even_RB come_VB home_RB to_TO eat_VB ._.
But_CC when_WRB evening_NN came_VBD and_CC she_PRP still_RB stayed_VBD away_RB ,_, Hans_NNP went_VBD out_RP to_TO see_VB what_WP she_PRP had_VBD cut_VBN ,_, but_CC nothing_NN was_VBD cut_VBN ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD lying_VBG among_IN the_DT corn_NN asleep_JJ ._.
Then_RB Hans_NNPS hastened_VBD home_RB and_CC brought_VBD a_DT fowlers_NNS net_NN with_IN little_JJ bells_NNS and_CC hung_VBD it_PRP round_RB about_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP still_RB went_VBD on_IN sleeping_VBG ._.
Then_RB he_PRP ran_VBD home_RB ,_, shut_VBD the_DT house-door_NN ,_, and_CC sat_VBD down_RP in_IN his_PRP$ chair_NN and_CC worked_VBD ._.
At_IN length_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD quite_RB dark_JJ ,_, clever_JJ elsie_NN awoke_NN and_CC when_WRB she_PRP got_VBD up_RP there_EX was_VBD a_DT jingling_NN all_DT round_JJ about_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT bells_NNS rang_VBP at_IN each_DT step_NN which_WDT she_PRP took_VBD ._.
Then_RB she_PRP was_VBD alarmed_VBN ,_, and_CC became_VBD uncertain_JJ whether_IN she_PRP really_RB was_VBD clever_JJ elsie_NN or_CC not_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, is_VBZ it_PRP I_PRP ,_, or_CC is_VBZ it_PRP not_RB I_PRP ._.
But_CC she_PRP knew_VBD not_RB what_WDT answer_NN to_TO make_VB to_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC stood_VBD for_IN a_DT time_NN in_IN doubt_NN ,_, at_IN length_NN she_PRP thought_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB home_RB and_CC ask_VB if_IN it_PRP be_VB I_PRP ,_, or_CC if_IN it_PRP be_VB not_RB I_PRP ,_, they_PRP will_MD be_VB sure_JJ to_TO know_VB ._.
She_PRP ran_VBD to_IN the_DT door_NN of_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ house_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD shut_VBN ,_, then_RB she_PRP knocked_VBD at_IN the_DT window_NN and_CC cried_VBD ,_, Hans_NNPS ,_, is_VBZ elsie_JJ within_IN ._.
Yes_UH ,_, answered_VBD Hans_NNP ,_, she_PRP is_VBZ within_IN ._.
Hereupon_UH she_PRP was_VBD terrified_VBN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, ah_UH ,_, heavens_NNS ._.
Then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB I_PRP ._.
And_CC went_VBD to_IN another_DT door_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT people_NNS heard_VBD the_DT jingling_NN of_IN the_DT bells_NNS they_PRP would_MD not_RB open_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP could_MD get_VB in_IN nowhere_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP ran_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT one_NN has_VBZ seen_VBN her_PRP since_IN ._.
+++_NFP $_$ +++_NFP
There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT tailor_NN who_WP had_VBD three_CD sons_NNS ,_, and_CC only_RB one_CD goat_NN ._.
But_CC as_IN the_DT goat_NN supported_VBD all_DT of_IN them_PRP with_IN her_PRP$ milk_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO have_VB good_JJ food_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB taken_VBN every_DT day_NN to_TO pasture_NN ._.
The_DT sons_NNS did_VBD this_DT ,_, in_IN turn_NN ._.
Once_IN the_DT eldest_JJS took_VBD her_PRP to_IN the_DT churchyard_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT finest_JJS herbs_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN ,_, and_CC let_VB her_PRP eat_VB and_CC run_VB about_IN there_RB ._.
At_IN night_NN when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD time_NN to_TO go_VB home_RB he_PRP asked_VBD ,_, goat_NN ,_, have_VBP you_PRP had_VBN enough_RB ._.
The_DT goat_NN answered_VBD ._.

This_DT struck_VBD the_DT host_NN as_IN odd_JJ ,_, and_CC he_PRP thought_VBD that_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO look_VB after_IN his_PRP$ ass_NN himself_PRP ,_, could_MD not_RB have_VB much_JJ to_TO spend_VB ._.

The_DT stranger_NN spread_VBD out_RP the_DT cloth_NN under_IN the_DT animal_NN and_CC cried_VBN ,_, bricklebrit_NN ,_, and_CC immediately_RB the_DT beast_NN began_VBD to_TO let_VB gold_NN pieces_NNS fall_VB from_IN back_RB and_CC front_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP fairly_RB rained_VBD down_RP money_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
Eh_UH ,_, my_PRP$ word_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT host_NN ,_, ducats_NNS are_VBP quickly_RB coined_VBN there_RB ._.
A_DT purse_NN like_IN that_DT is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB sniffed_VBN at_IN ._.
The_DT guest_NN paid_VBD his_PRP$ score_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_IN bed_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT night_NN the_DT host_NN stole_VBD down_RP into_IN the_DT stable_JJ ,_, led_VBD away_RP the_DT master_NN of_IN the_DT mint_NN ,_, and_CC tied_VBN up_RP another_DT ass_NN in_IN his_PRP$ place_NN ._.
Early_RB next_JJ morning_NN the_DT apprentice_NN traveled_VBD away_RP with_IN his_PRP$ ass_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD his_PRP$ gold-ass_NN ._.
At_IN mid-day_NN he_PRP reached_VBD his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, who_WP rejoiced_VBD to_TO see_VB him_PRP again_RB ,_, and_CC gladly_RB took_VBD him_PRP in_RP ._.
What_WP have_VBP you_PRP made_VBN of_IN yourself_PRP ,_, my_PRP$ son_NN ._.

A_DT miller_NN ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, he_PRP answered_VBD ._.
What_WP have_VBP you_PRP brought_VBN back_RP with_IN you_PRP from_IN your_PRP$ travels_NNS ._.

A_DT certain_JJ mother_NN had_VBD her_PRP$ child_NN taken_VBN out_IN of_IN its_PRP$ cradle_NN by_IN the_DT elves_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT changeling_NN with_IN a_DT large_JJ head_NN and_CC staring_VBG eyes_NNS ,_, which_WDT would_MD do_VB nothing_NN but_IN eat_VB and_CC drink_NN ,_, lay_VB in_IN its_PRP$ place_NN ._.
In_IN her_PRP$ trouble_NN she_PRP went_VBD to_IN her_PRP$ neighbor_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD her_PRP$ advice_NN ._.
The_DT neighbour_NN said_VBD that_IN she_PRP was_VBD to_TO carry_VB the_DT changeling_NN into_IN the_DT kitchen_NN ,_, set_VBD it_PRP down_RP on_IN the_DT hearth_NN ,_, light_VB a_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC boil_VB some_DT water_NN in_IN two_CD egg-shells_NNS ,_, which_WDT would_MD make_VB the_DT changeling_NN laugh_VB ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP laughed_VBD ,_, all_DT would_MD be_VB over_RB with_IN him_PRP ._.
The_DT woman_NN did_VBD everything_NN that_IN her_PRP$ neighbor_NN bade_VBD her_PRP ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT miller_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN she_PRP was_VBD grown_VBN up_RP ,_, he_PRP wished_VBD that_IN she_PRP was_VBD provided_VBN for_IN ,_, and_CC well_RB married_VBN ._.

Oh_UH ,_, that_DT is_VBZ not_RB true_JJ ._.
The_DT man_NN became_VBD alarmed_JJ ,_, and_CC ran_VBD out_RP ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP had_VBD not_RB ,_, who_WP knows_VBZ what_WP the_DT godfather_NN would_MD have_VB done_VBN to_IN him_PRP ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT little_JJ girl_NN who_WP was_VBD obstinate_JJ and_CC inquisitive_JJ ,_, and_CC when_WRB her_PRP$ parents_NNS told_VBD her_PRP to_TO do_VB anything_NN ,_, she_PRP did_VBD not_RB obey_VB them_PRP ,_, so_IN how_WRB could_MD she_PRP fare_VB well_RB ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, a_DT certain_JJ king_NN was_VBD hunting_VBG in_IN a_DT great_JJ forest_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP chased_VBD a_DT wild_JJ beast_NN so_RB eagerly_RB that_IN none_NN of_IN his_PRP$ attendants_NNS could_MD follow_VB him_PRP ._.

The_DT king_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, went_VBD so_RB frequently_RB away_RB to_IN his_PRP$ dear_JJ children_NNS that_IN the_DT queen_NN observed_VBD his_PRP$ absence_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD curious_JJ and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO know_VB what_WP he_PRP did_VBD when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD quite_RB alone_RB in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.

Then_RB she_PRP saw_VBD a_DT forest-hut_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD into_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC found_VBD a_DT room_NN with_IN six_CD little_JJ beds_NNS ,_, but_CC she_PRP did_VBD not_RB venture_VB to_TO get_VB into_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC crept_VBD under_IN one_CD ,_, and_CC lay_VB down_RP on_IN the_DT hard_JJ ground_NN ,_, intending_VBG to_TO pass_VB the_DT night_NN there_RB ._.
Just_RB before_IN sunset_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, she_PRP heard_VBD a_DT rustling_NN ,_, and_CC saw_VBD six_CD swans_NNS come_VBP flying_VBG in_RB at_IN the_DT window_NN ._.
They_PRP alighted_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC blew_VBD at_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC blew_VBD all_PDT the_DT feathers_NNS off_RP ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ swans_NNS ,_, skins_NNS stripped_VBD off_RP like_IN a_DT shirt_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT maiden_NN looked_VBD at_IN them_PRP and_CC recognized_VBD her_PRP$ brothers_NNS ,_, was_VBD glad_JJ and_CC crept_VBN forth_RB from_IN beneath_IN the_DT bed_NN ._.
The_DT brothers_NNS were_VBD not_RB less_RBR delighted_JJ to_TO see_VB their_PRP$ little_JJ sister_NN ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ joy_NN was_VBD of_IN short_JJ duration_NN ._.
Here_RB you_PRP can_MD not_RB abide_VB ,_, they_PRP said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT shelter_NN for_IN robbers_NNS ,_, if_IN they_PRP come_VBP home_RB and_CC find_VBP you_PRP ,_, they_PRP will_MD kill_VB you_PRP ._.
But_CC can_MD you_PRP not_RB protect_VB me_PRP ,_, asked_VBD the_DT little_JJ sister_NN ._.

The_DT little_JJ sister_NN wept_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, can_MD you_PRP not_RB be_VB set_VBN free_JJ ._.
Alas_UH ,_, no_UH ,_, they_PRP answered_VBD ,_, the_DT conditions_NNS are_VBP too_RB hard_JJ ._.
For_IN six_CD years_NNS you_PRP may_MD neither_CC speak_VB nor_CC laugh_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT time_NN you_PRP must_MD sew_VB together_RB six_CD little_JJ shirts_NNS of_IN starwort_NN for_IN us_PRP ._.
And_CC if_IN one_CD single_JJ word_NN falls_VBZ from_IN your_PRP$ lips_NNS ,_, all_PDT your_PRP$ work_NN will_MD be_VB lost_VBN ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT brothers_NNS had_VBD said_VBN this_DT ,_, the_DT quarter_NN of_IN an_DT hour_NN was_VBD over_IN ,_, and_CC they_PRP flew_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT window_NN again_RB as_IN swans_NNS ._.
The_DT maiden_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, firmly_RB resolved_VBD to_TO deliver_VB her_PRP$ brothers_NNS ,_, even_RB if_IN it_PRP should_MD cost_VB her_PRP$ her_PRP$ life_NN ._.
She_PRP left_VBD the_DT hut_NN ,_, went_VBD into_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, seated_VBD herself_PRP on_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX passed_VBD the_DT night_NN ._.

When_WRB she_PRP had_VBD already_RB spent_VBN a_DT long_JJ time_NN there_RB it_PRP came_VBD to_TO pass_VB that_IN the_DT king_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN was_VBD hunting_VBG in_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ huntsmen_NNS came_VBD to_IN the_DT tree_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG ._.
They_PRP called_VBD to_IN her_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, who_WP are_VBP you_PRP ._.

But_CC the_DT king_NN and_CC the_DT queen_NN with_IN her_PRP$ six_CD brothers_NNS lived_VBD many_JJ years_NNS in_IN happiness_NN and_CC peace_NN ._.

When_WRB eleven_CD of_IN them_PRP had_VBD made_VBN their_PRP$ promises_NNS ,_, suddenly_RB the_DT thirteenth_NN came_VBD in_RB ._.

She_PRP climbed_VBD up_RP the_DT narrow_JJ winding-staircase_NN ,_, and_CC reached_VBD a_DT little_JJ door_NN ._.

But_CC scarcely_RB had_VBD she_PRP touched_VBD the_DT spindle_NN when_WRB the_DT magic_JJ decree_NN was_VBD fulfilled_VBN ,_, and_CC she_PRP pricked_VBD her_PRP$ finger_NN with_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT very_JJ moment_NN when_WRB she_PRP felt_VBD the_DT prick_NN ,_, she_PRP fell_VBD down_RB upon_IN the_DT bed_NN that_WDT stood_VBD there_RB ,_, and_CC lay_VBD in_IN a_DT deep_JJ sleep_NN ._.
And_CC this_DT sleep_NN extended_VBN over_IN the_DT whole_JJ palace_NN ,_, the_DT king_NN and_CC queen_NN who_WP had_VBD just_RB come_VBN home_RB ,_, and_CC had_VBD entered_VBN the_DT great_JJ hall_NN ,_, began_VBD to_TO go_VB to_IN sleep_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT court_NN with_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT horses_NNS ,_, too_RB ,_, went_VBD to_TO sleep_VB in_IN the_DT stable_JJ ,_, the_DT dogs_NNS in_IN the_DT yard_NN ,_, the_DT pigeons_NNS upon_IN the_DT roof_NN ,_, the_DT flies_NNS on_IN the_DT wall_NN ,_, even_RB the_DT fire_NN that_WDT was_VBD flaming_VBG on_IN the_DT hearth_NN became_VBD quiet_JJ and_CC slept_VBD ,_, the_DT roast_NN meat_NN left_VBD off_RP frizzling_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cook_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD just_RB going_VBG to_TO pull_VB the_DT hair_NN of_IN the_DT scullery_NN boy_NN ,_, because_IN he_PRP had_VBD forgotten_VBN something_NN ,_, let_VB him_PRP go_VB ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_IN sleep_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT wind_NN fell_VBD ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT trees_NNS before_IN the_DT castle_NN not_RB a_DT leaf_NN moved_VBD again_RB ._.
But_CC round_JJ about_IN the_DT castle_NN there_EX began_VBD to_TO grow_VB a_DT hedge_NN of_IN thorns_NNS ,_, which_WDT every_DT year_NN became_VBD higher_JJR ,_, and_CC at_IN last_RB grew_VBD close_VB up_RP round_RB the_DT castle_NN and_CC all_RB over_IN it_PRP ,_, so_IN that_IN there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN of_IN it_PRP to_TO be_VB seen_VBN ,_, not_RB even_RB the_DT flag_NN upon_IN the_DT roof_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT story_NN of_IN the_DT beautiful_JJ sleeping_NN briar-rose_NN ,_, for_IN so_RB the_DT princess_NN was_VBD named_VBN ,_, went_VBD about_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN from_IN time_NN to_IN time_NN kings_NNS sons_NNS came_VBD and_CC tried_VBD to_TO get_VB through_IN the_DT thorny_JJ hedge_NN into_IN the_DT castle_NN ._.
But_CC they_PRP found_VBD it_PRP impossible_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT thorns_NNS held_VBN fast_RB together_RB ,_, as_IN if_IN they_PRP had_VBD hands_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT youths_NNS were_VBD caught_VBN in_IN them_PRP ,_, could_MD not_RB get_VB loose_JJ again_RB ,_, and_CC died_VBD a_DT miserable_JJ death_NN ._.
After_IN long_RB ,_, long_JJ years_NNS a_DT kings_NNS son_NN came_VBD again_RB to_IN that_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC heard_VBD an_DT old_JJ man_NN talking_VBG about_IN the_DT thorn-hedge_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT castle_NN was_VBD said_VBN to_TO stand_VB behind_IN it_PRP in_IN which_WDT a_DT wonderfully_RB beautiful_JJ princess_NN ,_, named_VBN briar-rose_NN ,_, had_VBD been_VBN asleep_JJ for_IN a_DT hundred_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT king_NN and_CC queen_NN and_CC the_DT whole_JJ court_NN were_VBD asleep_JJ likewise_RB ._.
He_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN ,_, too_RB ,_, from_IN his_PRP$ grandfather_NN ,_, that_IN many_JJ kings_NNS ,_, sons_NNS had_VBD already_RB come_VBN ,_, and_CC had_VBD tried_VBN to_TO get_VB through_IN the_DT thorny_JJ hedge_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP had_VBD remained_VBN sticking_VBG fast_RB in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC had_VBD died_VBN a_DT pitiful_JJ death_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT youth_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP not_RB afraid_JJ ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB and_CC see_VB the_DT beautiful_JJ briar-rose_NN ._.
The_DT good_JJ old_JJ man_NN might_MD dissuade_VB him_PRP as_IN he_PRP would_MD ,_, he_PRP did_VBD not_RB listen_VB to_IN his_PRP$ words_NNS ._.
But_CC by_IN this_DT time_NN the_DT hundred_CD years_NNS had_VBD just_RB passed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT day_NN had_VBD come_VBN when_WRB briar-rose_NN was_VBD to_TO awake_VB again_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT kings_NNS son_NN came_VBD near_RB to_IN the_DT thorn-hedge_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD nothing_NN but_IN large_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ flowers_NNS ,_, which_WDT parted_VBD from_IN each_DT other_JJ of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ accord_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB him_PRP pass_VB unhurt_NN ,_, then_RB they_PRP closed_VBD again_RB behind_IN him_PRP like_IN a_DT hedge_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT castle_NN yard_NN he_PRP saw_VBD the_DT horses_NNS and_CC the_DT spotted_JJ hounds_NNS lying_VBG asleep_RB ,_, on_IN the_DT roof_NN sat_VBD the_DT pigeons_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ heads_NNS under_IN their_PRP$ wings_NNS ._.
And_CC when_WRB he_PRP entered_VBD the_DT house_NN ,_, the_DT flies_NNS were_VBD asleep_JJ upon_IN the_DT wall_NN ,_, the_DT cook_NN in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN was_VBD still_RB holding_VBG out_RP his_PRP$ hand_NN to_TO seize_VB the_DT boy_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT maid_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG by_IN the_DT black_JJ hen_NN which_WDT she_PRP was_VBD going_VBG to_TO pluck_VB ._.
He_PRP went_VBD on_RB farther_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT great_JJ hall_NN he_PRP saw_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT court_NN lying_VBG asleep_RB ,_, and_CC up_RP by_IN the_DT throne_NN lay_VBD the_DT king_NN and_CC queen_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP went_VBD on_RB still_RB farther_RB ,_, and_CC all_DT was_VBD so_RB quiet_JJ that_IN a_DT breath_NN could_MD be_VB heard_VBN ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT tower_NN ,_, and_CC opened_VBD the_DT door_NN into_IN the_DT little_JJ room_NN where_WRB briar-rose_NN was_VBD sleeping_VBG ._.
There_RB she_PRP lay_VBD ,_, so_RB beautiful_JJ that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB turn_VB his_PRP$ eyes_NNS away_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP stooped_VBD down_RP and_CC gave_VBD her_PRP a_DT kiss_NN ._.
But_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP kissed_VBD her_PRP ,_, briar-rose_NN opened_VBD her_PRP$ eyes_NNS and_CC awoke_NN ,_, and_CC looked_VBD at_IN him_PRP quite_RB sweetly_RB ._.
Then_RB they_PRP went_VBD down_RB together_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN awoke_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT queen_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT whole_JJ court_NN ,_, and_CC looked_VBD at_IN each_DT other_JJ in_IN great_JJ astonishment_NN ._.
And_CC the_DT horses_NNS in_IN the_DT courtyard_NN stood_VBD up_RP and_CC shook_VBD themselves_PRP ,_, the_DT hounds_NNS jumped_VBD up_RP and_CC wagged_VBD their_PRP$ tails_NNS ,_, the_DT pigeons_NNS upon_IN the_DT roof_NN pulled_VBD out_RP their_PRP$ heads_NNS from_IN under_IN their_PRP$ wings_NNS ,_, looked_VBN round_RB ,_, and_CC flew_VBD into_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN ,_, the_DT flies_NNS on_IN the_DT wall_NN crept_VBD again_RB ,_, the_DT fire_NN in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN burned_VBD up_RP and_CC flickered_VBN and_CC cooked_VBD the_DT meat_NN ,_, the_DT joint_NN began_VBD to_TO turn_VB and_CC sizzle_VB again_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT cook_NN gave_VBD the_DT boy_NN such_PDT a_DT box_NN on_IN the_DT ear_NN that_IN he_PRP screamed_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT maid_NN finished_VBD plucking_VBG the_DT fowl_NN ._.
And_CC then_RB the_DT marriage_NN of_IN the_DT kings_NNS son_NN with_IN briar-rose_NN was_VBD celebrated_VBN with_IN all_DT splendor_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP lived_VBD contented_VBN to_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN their_PRP$ days_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT forester_NN who_WP went_VBD into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_TO hunt_VB ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP entered_VBD it_PRP he_PRP heard_VBD a_DT sound_NN of_IN screaming_VBG as_IN if_IN a_DT little_JJ child_NN were_VBD there_RB ._.
He_PRP followed_VBD the_DT sound_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN last_RB came_VBD to_IN a_DT high_JJ tree_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN this_DT a_DT little_JJ child_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG ,_, for_IN the_DT mother_NN had_VBD fallen_VBN asleep_JJ under_IN the_DT tree_NN with_IN the_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT bird_NN of_IN prey_NN had_VBD seen_VBN it_PRP in_IN her_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, had_VBD flown_VBN down_RB ,_, snatched_VBD it_PRP away_RB ,_, and_CC set_VBD it_PRP on_IN the_DT high_JJ tree_NN ._.
The_DT forester_NN climbed_VBD up_RP ,_, brought_VBD the_DT child_NN down_RP ,_, and_CC thought_VBD to_IN himself_PRP ,_, you_PRP will_MD take_VB him_PRP home_RB with_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC bring_VB him_PRP up_RP with_IN your_PRP$ lina_NN ._.
He_PRP took_VBD it_PRP home_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD children_NNS grew_VBD up_RP together_RB ._.
And_CC the_DT one_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD found_VBN on_IN a_DT tree_NN was_VBD called_VBN fundevogel_NN ,_, because_IN a_DT bird_NN had_VBD carried_VBN it_PRP away_RB ._.
Fundevogel_NNP and_CC lina_NN loved_VBD each_DT other_JJ so_RB dearly_RB that_IN when_WRB they_PRP did_VBD not_RB see_VB each_DT other_JJ they_PRP were_VBD sad_JJ ._.
Now_RB the_DT forester_NN had_VBD an_DT old_JJ cook_NN ,_, who_WP one_CD evening_NN took_VBD two_CD pails_NNS and_CC began_VBD to_TO fetch_VB water_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB go_VB once_RB only_RB ,_, but_CC many_JJ times_NNS ,_, out_IN to_IN the_DT spring_NN ._.

Last_JJ night_NN ,_, old_JJ sanna_NN carried_VBD so_RB many_JJ buckets_NNS of_IN water_NN into_IN the_DT house_NN that_WDT I_PRP asked_VBD her_PRP why_WRB she_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG that_DT ,_, and_CC she_PRP said_VBD that_IN if_IN I_PRP would_MD promise_VB not_RB to_TO tell_VB anyone_NN she_PRP would_MD tell_VB me_PRP ,_, and_CC I_PRP said_VBD I_PRP would_MD be_VB sure_JJ not_RB to_TO tell_VB anyone_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP said_VBD that_IN early_JJ to-morrow_JJ morning_NN when_WRB father_NN was_VBD out_IN hunting_VBG ,_, she_PRP would_MD set_VB the_DT kettle_NN full_JJ of_IN water_NN ,_, throw_VBP you_PRP into_IN it_PRP and_CC boil_VB you_PRP ,_, but_CC we_PRP will_MD get_VB up_RP quickly_RB ,_, dress_VB ourselves_PRP ,_, and_CC go_VB away_RB together_RB ._.

Then_RB said_VBD they_PRP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN here_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP went_VBD home_RB and_CC told_VBD the_DT cook_NN that_IN they_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN nothing_NN in_IN the_DT forest_NN but_CC a_DT little_JJ rose-bush_NN with_IN one_CD rose_VBD on_IN it_PRP ._.

So_RB when_WRB the_DT three_CD servants_NNS came_VBD ,_, nothing_NN was_VBD there_RB but_IN a_DT church_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT chandelier_NN in_IN it_PRP ._.

When_WRB they_PRP got_VBD home_RB ,_, the_DT cook_NN asked_VBD if_IN they_PRP had_VBD not_RB found_VBN them_PRP ,_, so_IN they_PRP said_VBD no_UH ,_, they_PRP had_VBD found_VBN nothing_NN but_IN a_DT church_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT chandelier_NN in_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC the_DT cook_NN scolded_VBD them_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, you_PRP fools_NNS ,_, why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP not_RB pull_VB the_DT church_NN to_IN pieces_NNS ,_, and_CC bring_VB the_DT chandelier_NN home_NN with_IN you_PRP ._.

The_DT children_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, saw_VBD from_IN afar_RB that_IN the_DT three_CD servants_NNS were_VBD coming_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT cook_NN waddling_VBG after_IN them_PRP ._.

A_DT king_NN had_VBD a_DT daughter_NN who_WP was_VBD beautiful_JJ beyond_IN all_DT measure_NN ,_, but_CC so_RB proud_JJ and_CC haughty_JJ withal_NN that_IN no_DT suitor_NN was_VBD good_JJ enough_RB for_IN her_PRP ._.
