They_PRP were_VBD all_RB marshalled_VBN in_IN a_DT row_NN according_VBG to_IN their_PRP$ rank_NN and_CC standing_VBG ._.

One_PRP was_VBD too_RB fat_JJ ,_, the_DT wine-barrel_NN ,_, she_PRP said_VBD ._.
Another_DT was_VBD too_RB tall_JJ ,_, long_JJ and_CC thin_JJ has_VBZ little_JJ in_RP ._.
The_DT third_NN was_VBD too_RB short_JJ ,_, short_JJ and_CC thick_JJ is_VBZ never_RB quick_JJ ._.
The_DT fourth_JJ was_VBD too_RB pale_JJ ,_, as_RB pale_JJ as_IN death_NN ._.
The_DT fifth_JJ too_RB red_JJ ,_, a_DT fighting_NN cock_NN ._.

So_RB she_PRP had_VBD something_NN to_TO say_VB against_IN each_DT one_CD ,_, but_CC she_PRP made_VBD herself_PRP especially_RB merry_JJ over_IN a_DT good_JJ king_NN who_WP stood_VBD quite_RB high_JJ up_RP in_IN the_DT row_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ chin_NN had_VBD grown_VBN a_DT little_JJ crooked_JJ ._.

A_DT few_JJ days_NNS afterwards_RB a_DT fiddler_NN came_VBD and_CC sang_VBD beneath_IN the_DT windows_NNS ,_, trying_VBG to_TO earn_VB a_DT few_JJ pennies_NNS ._.

The_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, your_PRP$ song_NN has_VBZ pleased_VBN me_PRP so_RB well_RB that_IN I_PRP will_MD give_VB you_PRP my_PRP$ daughter_NN there_RB ,_, to_IN wife_NN ._.
The_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN shuddered_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP taken_VBN an_DT oath_NN to_TO give_VB you_PRP to_IN the_DT very_RB first_JJ beggar-man_NN and_CC I_PRP will_MD keep_VB it_PRP ._.
All_DT she_PRP could_MD say_VB was_VBD in_IN vain_JJ ._.

When_WRB that_DT was_VBD done_VBN the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB proper_JJ for_IN you_PRP ,_, a_DT beggar-woman_NN ,_, to_TO stay_VB any_RB longer_RBR in_IN my_PRP$ palace_NN ,_, you_PRP may_MD just_RB go_VB away_RB with_IN your_PRP$ husband_NN ._.

At_IN last_JJ they_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT very_RB little_JJ hut_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP said_VBD ,_, oh_UH goodness_RB ._.

Just_RB make_VB a_DT fire_NN at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC set_VBN on_RP water_NN to_TO cook_VB my_PRP$ supper_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP quite_RB tired_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN knew_VBD nothing_NN about_IN lighting_NN fires_NNS or_CC cooking_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT beggar-man_NN had_VBD to_TO lend_VB a_DT hand_NN himself_PRP to_TO get_VB anything_NN fairly_RB done_VBN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD finished_VBN their_PRP$ scanty_NN meal_NN they_PRP went_VBD to_IN bed_NN ._.
But_CC he_PRP forced_VBD her_PRP to_TO get_VB up_RP quite_RB early_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO look_VB after_IN the_DT house_NN ._.
For_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS they_PRP lived_VBD in_IN this_DT way_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN might_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN all_PDT their_PRP$ provisions_NNS ._.
Then_RB the_DT man_NN said_VBD ,_, wife_NN ,_, we_PRP can_MD not_RB go_VB on_IN any_RB longer_RBR eating_VBG and_CC drinking_VBG here_RB and_CC earning_VBG nothing_NN ._.
You_PRP must_MD make_VB baskets_NNS ._.
He_PRP went_VBD out_RB ,_, cut_VBD some_DT willows_NNS ,_, and_CC brought_VBD them_PRP home_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP began_VBD to_TO make_VB baskets_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT tough_JJ willows_NNS wounded_VBD her_PRP$ delicate_JJ hands_NNS ._.
I_PRP see_VBP that_IN this_DT will_MD not_RB do_VB ,_, said_VBD the_DT man_NN ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN winter_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT flakes_NNS of_IN snow_NN were_VBD falling_VBG like_IN feathers_NNS from_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, a_DT queen_NN sat_VBD at_IN a_DT window_NN sewing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT frame_NN of_IN the_DT window_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN black_JJ ebony_NN ._.

When_WRB she_PRP knew_VBD the_DT secret_NN ,_, she_PRP waited_VBD until_IN he_PRP was_VBD asleep_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP took_VBD the_DT hat_NN away_RB from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC had_VBD it_PRP thrown_VBN out_RP into_IN the_DT street_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT horn_NN still_RB remained_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC in_IN great_JJ anger_NN he_PRP blew_VBD it_PRP with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ strength_NN ._.
Instantly_RB all_DT walls_NNS ,_, fortifications_NNS ,_, towns_NNS ,_, and_CC villages_NNS ,_, toppled_VBN down_RB ,_, and_CC crushed_VBD the_DT king_NN and_CC his_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN death_NN ._.
And_CC had_VBD he_PRP not_RB put_VBN down_RP the_DT horn_NN and_CC had_VBD blown_VBN just_RB a_DT little_RB longer_RBR ,_, everything_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN in_IN ruins_NNS ,_, and_CC not_RB one_CD stone_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN left_VBN standing_VBG on_IN another_DT ._.
Then_RB no_DT one_NN opposed_VBD him_PRP any_RB longer_RBR ,_, and_CC he_PRP made_VBD himself_PRP king_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ country_NN ._.
Once_RB there_EX was_VBD a_DT miller_NN who_WP was_VBD poor_JJ ,_, but_CC who_WP had_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ daughter_NN ._.
Now_RB it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD to_TO go_VB and_CC speak_VB to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB himself_PRP appear_VB important_JJ he_PRP said_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP a_DT daughter_NN who_WP can_MD spin_VB straw_VB into_IN gold_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT miller_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ an_DT art_NN which_WDT pleases_VBZ me_PRP well_RB ,_, if_IN your_PRP$ daughter_NN is_VBZ as_RB clever_JJ as_IN you_PRP say_VBP ,_, bring_VB her_PRP to-morrow_NN to_IN my_PRP$ palace_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD put_VB her_PRP to_IN the_DT test_NN ._.

No_UH ._.

The_DT devil_NN has_VBZ told_VBN you_PRP that_IN !_.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT woman_NN who_WP was_VBD a_DT real_JJ witch_NN and_CC had_VBD two_CD daughters_NNS ,_, one_CD ugly_JJ and_CC wicked_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT one_NN she_PRP loved_VBD because_IN she_PRP was_VBD her_PRP$ own_JJ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD beautiful_JJ and_CC good_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT one_NN she_PRP hated_VBD ,_, because_IN she_PRP was_VBD her_PRP$ step-daughter_NN ._.
The_DT step-daughter_NN once_RB had_VBD a_DT pretty_RB apron_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT other_JJ fancied_VBD so_RB much_RB that_IN she_PRP became_VBD envious_JJ ,_, and_CC told_VBD her_PRP$ mother_NN that_IN she_PRP must_MD and_CC would_MD have_VB that_DT apron_NN ._.
Be_VB quiet_JJ ,_, my_PRP$ child_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, and_CC you_PRP shall_MD have_VB it_PRP ._.
Your_PRP$ step-sister_NN has_VBZ long_RB deserved_VBN death_NN ,_, to-night_UH when_WRB she_PRP is_VBZ asleep_JJ I_PRP will_MD come_VB and_CC cut_VB her_PRP$ head_NN off_RP ._.

When_WRB daylight_NN comes_VBZ ,_, and_CC she_PRP sees_VBZ what_WP she_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN ,_, we_PRP shall_MD be_VB lost_VBN ._.
But_CC ,_, said_VBD roland_NN ,_, I_PRP counsel_VBP you_PRP first_RB to_TO take_VB away_RP her_PRP$ magic_NN wand_NN ,_, or_CC we_PRP can_MD not_RB escape_VB if_IN she_PRP pursues_VBZ us_PRP ._.

The_DT witch_NN placed_VBD herself_PRP on_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, threw_VBD bread-crumbs_NNS in_IN ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_IN endless_JJ trouble_NN to_TO entice_VB the_DT duck_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT duck_NN did_VBD not_RB let_VB herself_PRP be_VB enticed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ woman_NN had_VBD to_TO go_VB home_RB at_IN night_NN as_IN she_PRP had_VBD come_VBN ._.

Then_RB the_DT maiden_NN changed_VBD herself_PRP into_IN a_DT beautiful_JJ flower_NN which_WDT stood_VBD in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN a_DT briar_JJ hedge_NN ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ sweetheart_NN roland_NN into_IN a_DT fiddler_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB long_JJ before_IN the_DT witch_NN came_VBD striding_VBG up_RP towards_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT musician_NN ,_, dear_JJ musician_NN ,_, may_MD I_PRP pluck_VB that_IN beautiful_JJ flower_NN for_IN myself_PRP ._.

As_IN she_PRP was_VBD hastily_RB creeping_VBG into_IN the_DT hedge_NN and_CC was_VBD just_RB going_VBG to_TO pluck_VB the_DT flower_NN ,_, knowing_VBG perfectly_RB well_RB who_WP the_DT flower_NN was_VBD ,_, he_PRP began_VBD to_TO play_VB ,_, and_CC whether_IN she_PRP would_MD or_CC not_RB ,_, she_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO dance_VB ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT magical_JJ dance_NN ._.

As_IN they_PRP were_VBD now_RB set_VBN free_JJ ,_, roland_NN said_VBD ,_, now_RB I_PRP will_MD go_VB to_IN my_PRP$ father_NN and_CC arrange_VB for_IN the_DT wedding_NN ._.
Then_RB in_IN the_DT meantime_NN I_PRP will_MD stay_VB here_RB and_CC wait_VB for_IN you_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT girl_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT one_NN may_MD recognize_VB me_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD change_VB myself_PRP into_IN a_DT red_JJ stone_NN land-mark_NN ._.
Then_RB roland_NN went_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT girl_NN stood_VBD like_IN a_DT red_JJ land-mark_NN in_IN the_DT field_NN and_CC waited_VBD for_IN her_PRP$ beloved_JJ ._.
But_CC when_WRB roland_NN got_VBD home_RB ,_, he_PRP fell_VBD into_IN the_DT snares_NNS of_IN another_DT ,_, who_WP so_RB fascinated_VBD him_PRP that_IN he_PRP forgot_VBD the_DT maiden_NN ._.
The_DT poor_JJ girl_NN remained_VBD there_EX a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, but_CC at_IN length_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB return_VB at_RB all_RB ,_, she_PRP was_VBD sad_JJ ,_, and_CC changed_VBD herself_PRP into_IN a_DT flower_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, someone_NN will_MD surely_RB come_VB this_DT way_NN ,_, and_CC trample_VB me_PRP down_RP ._.

When_WRB she_PRP enters_VBZ it_PRP ,_, run_VB up_RP to_IN her_PRP and_CC give_VB her_PRP a_DT kiss_NN ,_, then_RB she_PRP will_MD follow_VB you_PRP ,_, and_CC you_PRP can_MD take_VB her_PRP away_RB with_IN you_PRP ,_, only_RB do_VBP not_RB allow_VB her_PRP to_TO take_VB leave_NN of_IN her_PRP$ parents_NNS first_RB ,_, or_CC it_PRP will_MD go_VB ill_RB with_IN you_PRP ._.

When_WRB he_PRP reached_VBD the_DT golden_JJ castle_NN it_PRP was_VBD just_RB as_IN the_DT fox_NN had_VBD said_VBN ._.

There_EX were_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN two_CD brothers_NNS ,_, one_CD rich_JJ and_CC the_DT other_JJ poor_JJ ._.
The_DT rich_JJ one_NN was_VBD a_DT goldsmith_NN and_CC evil-hearted_VBN ._.
The_DT poor_JJ one_CD supported_VBD himself_PRP by_IN making_VBG brooms_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD good_JJ and_CC honorable_JJ ._.
He_PRP had_VBD two_CD children_NNS ,_, who_WP were_VBD twin_JJ brothers_NNS and_CC as_IN like_IN each_DT other_JJ as_IN two_CD drops_NNS of_IN water_NN ._.
The_DT two_CD boys_NNS went_VBD in_RB and_CC out_IN of_IN the_DT rich_JJ house_NN ,_, and_CC often_RB got_VBD some_DT of_IN the_DT scraps_NNS to_TO eat_VB ._.
It_PRP happened_VBD once_RB when_WRB the_DT poor_JJ man_NN was_VBD going_VBG into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_TO fetch_VB brush-wood_NNP ,_, that_IN he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT bird_NN which_WDT was_VBD quite_RB golden_JJ and_CC more_RBR beautiful_JJ than_IN any_DT he_PRP had_VBD ever_RB chanced_VBN to_TO meet_VB with_IN ._.
He_PRP picked_VBD up_RP a_DT small_JJ stone_NN ,_, threw_VBD it_PRP at_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC was_VBD lucky_JJ enough_RB to_TO hit_VB it_PRP ,_, but_CC one_CD golden_JJ feather_NN only_RB fell_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT bird_NN flew_VBD away_RB ._.
The_DT man_NN took_VBD the_DT feather_NN and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP to_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN ,_, who_WP looked_VBD at_IN it_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ pure_JJ gold_NN ._.
And_CC gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN money_NN for_IN it_PRP ._.
Next_JJ day_NN the_DT man_NN climbed_VBD into_IN a_DT birch-tree_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD about_JJ to_TO cut_VB off_RP a_DT couple_NN of_IN branches_NNS when_WRB the_DT same_JJ bird_NN flew_VBD out_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT man_NN searched_VBD he_PRP found_VBD a_DT nest_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT egg_NN lay_JJ inside_IN it_PRP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD of_IN gold_NN ._.

Now_RB I_PRP can_MD get_VB on_RB ,_, thought_VBN he_PRP ,_, and_CC went_VBD contentedly_RB home_RB ._.
The_DT goldsmith_NN was_VBD crafty_JJ and_CC cunning_NN ,_, and_CC knew_VBD very_RB well_RB what_WP kind_NN of_IN a_DT bird_NN it_PRP was_VBD ._.
He_PRP called_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, roast_VBD me_PRP the_DT gold_NN bird_NN ,_, and_CC take_VB care_NN that_IN none_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ lost_VBN ._.

The_DT bird_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD no_DT common_JJ one_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN so_RB wondrous_JJ a_DT kind_NN that_WDT whosoever_RB ate_VBD its_PRP$ heart_NN and_CC liver_NN found_VBD every_DT morning_NN a_DT piece_NN of_IN gold_NN beneath_IN his_PRP$ pillow_NN ._.

That_DT must_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT heart_NN and_CC the_DT liver_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT woman_NN ,_, quite_RB frightened_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN order_NN that_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN might_MD not_RB miss_VB them_PRP and_CC be_VB angry_JJ ,_, she_PRP quickly_RB killed_VBD a_DT young_JJ cock_NN ,_, took_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ heart_NN and_CC liver_NN ,_, and_CC put_VB them_PRP beside_IN the_DT golden_JJ bird_NN ._.
When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ready_JJ ,_, she_PRP carried_VBD it_PRP to_IN the_DT goldsmith_NN ,_, who_WP consumed_VBD it_PRP all_DT alone_RB ,_, and_CC left_VBD none_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, when_WRB he_PRP felt_VBD beneath_IN his_PRP$ pillow_NN ,_, and_CC expected_VBD to_TO bring_VB out_RP the_DT piece_NN of_IN gold_NN ,_, no_DT more_JJR gold_NN pieces_NNS were_VBD there_RB than_IN there_EX had_VBD always_RB been_VBN ._.
The_DT two_CD children_NNS did_VBD not_RB know_VB what_WP a_DT piece_NN of_IN good-fortune_NNP had_VBD fallen_VBN to_IN their_PRP$ lot_NN ._.

He_PRP carried_VBD her_PRP out_RP ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP came_VBD to_IN herself_PRP once_RB more_RBR ,_, and_CC opened_VBD her_PRP$ eyes_NNS ,_, he_PRP showed_VBD her_PRP the_DT dragon_NN all_DT cut_VBN to_IN pieces_NNS ,_, and_CC told_VBD her_PRP that_IN she_PRP was_VBD now_RB set_VBN free_JJ ._.
She_PRP rejoiced_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, now_RB you_PRP will_MD be_VB my_PRP$ dearest_JJS husband_NN ,_, for_IN my_PRP$ father_NN has_VBZ promised_VBN me_PRP to_IN him_PRP who_WP kills_VBZ the_DT dragon_NN ._.
Thereupon_RB she_PRP took_VBD off_RP her_PRP$ necklace_NN of_IN coral_NN ,_, and_CC divided_VBD it_PRP amongst_IN the_DT animals_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO reward_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT lion_NN received_VBD the_DT golden_JJ clasp_NN ._.
Her_PRP$ pocket-handkerchief_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, on_IN which_WDT was_VBD her_PRP$ name_NN ,_, she_PRP gave_VBD to_IN the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, who_WP went_VBD and_CC cut_VBD the_DT tongues_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT dragons_NNS ,_, seven_CD heads_NNS ,_, wrapped_VBD them_PRP in_IN the_DT handkerchief_NN ,_, and_CC preserved_VBD them_PRP carefully_RB ._.
That_DT done_VBN ,_, as_IN he_PRP was_VBD so_RB faint_JJ and_CC weary_JJ with_IN the_DT fire_NN and_CC the_DT battle_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT maiden_NN ,_, we_PRP are_VBP both_DT faint_JJ and_CC weary_JJ ,_, we_PRP will_MD sleep_VB awhile_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, and_CC they_PRP lay_VBP down_RP on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT huntsman_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT lion_NN ,_, you_PRP shall_MD keep_VB watch_NN ,_, that_IN no_DT one_NN surprises_VBZ us_PRP in_IN our_PRP$ sleep_NN ,_, and_CC both_DT fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
The_DT lion_NN lay_VBD down_RP beside_IN them_PRP to_TO watch_VB ,_, but_CC he_PRP also_RB was_VBD so_RB weary_JJ with_IN the_DT fight_NN ,_, that_IN he_PRP called_VBD to_IN the_DT bear_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, lie_VBP down_RB near_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP must_MD sleep_VB a_DT little_JJ ._.
If_IN anything_NN comes_VBZ ,_, waken_VBD me_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT bear_NN lay_VBD down_RP beside_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP also_RB was_VBD tired_JJ ,_, and_CC called_VBD the_DT wolf_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, lie_VB down_RB by_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP must_MD sleep_VB a_DT little_JJ ,_, but_CC if_IN anything_NN comes_VBZ ,_, waken_VBD me_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT wolf_NN lay_VBD down_RP by_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP was_VBD tired_JJ likewise_RB ,_, and_CC called_VBD the_DT fox_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, lie_VB down_RB by_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP must_MD sleep_VB a_DT little_JJ ,_, if_IN anything_NN comes_VBZ waken_VBD me_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT fox_NN lay_VBD down_RP beside_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP too_RB was_VBD weary_JJ ,_, and_CC called_VBD the_DT hare_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, lie_VBP down_RB near_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP must_MD sleep_VB a_DT little_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN anything_NN should_MD come_VB ,_, waken_VB me_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT hare_NN sat_VBD down_RP by_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT poor_JJ hare_NN was_VBD tired_JJ too_RB ,_, and_CC had_VBD no_DT one_NN whom_WP he_PRP could_MD call_VB there_RB to_TO keep_VB watch_NN ,_, and_CC fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
And_CC now_RB the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN ,_, the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, the_DT lion_NN ,_, the_DT bear_NN ,_, the_DT wolf_NN ,_, the_DT fox_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT hare_NN ,_, were_VBD all_DT sleeping_VBG a_DT sound_JJ sleep_NN ._.
The_DT marshal_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, who_WP was_VBD to_TO look_VB on_IN from_IN a_DT distance_NN ,_, took_VBD courage_NN when_WRB he_PRP did_VBD not_RB see_VB the_DT dragon_NN flying_VBG away_RB with_IN the_DT maiden_NN ,_, and_CC finding_VBG that_IN all_PDT the_DT hill_NN had_VBD become_VBN quiet_JJ ,_, ascended_VBD it_PRP ._.
There_EX lay_VBD the_DT dragon_NN hacked_VBN and_CC hewn_VBN to_IN pieces_NNS on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB far_RB from_IN it_PRP were_VBD the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN and_CC a_DT huntsman_NN with_IN his_PRP$ animals_NNS ,_, and_CC all_DT of_IN them_PRP were_VBD sunk_VBN in_IN a_DT sound_JJ sleep_NN ._.
And_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD wicked_JJ and_CC godless_NN he_PRP took_VBD his_PRP$ sword_NN ,_, cut_VBD off_RP the_DT huntsmans_NNS head_NN ,_, and_CC seized_VBD the_DT maiden_NN in_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, and_CC carried_VBD her_PRP down_IN the_DT hill_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP awoke_VBD and_CC was_VBD terrified_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT marshal_NN said_VBD ,_, you_PRP are_VBP in_IN my_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, you_PRP shall_MD say_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD I_PRP who_WP killed_VBD the_DT dragon_NN ._.
I_PRP can_MD not_RB do_VB that_DT ,_, she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT huntsman_NN with_IN his_PRP$ animals_NNS who_WP did_VBD it_PRP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP drew_VBD his_PRP$ sword_NN ,_, and_CC threatened_VBD to_TO kill_VB her_PRP if_IN she_PRP did_VBD not_RB obey_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC so_RB compelled_VBD her_PRP that_IN she_PRP promised_VBD it_PRP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP took_VBD her_PRP to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO contain_VB himself_PRP for_IN joy_NN when_WRB he_PRP once_RB more_RBR looked_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ dear_JJ child_NN in_IN life_NN ,_, whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD believed_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN torn_VBN to_IN pieces_NNS by_IN the_DT monster_NN ._.
The_DT marshal_NN said_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP killed_VBN the_DT dragon_NN ,_, and_CC delivered_VBD the_DT maiden_NN and_CC the_DT whole_JJ kingdom_NN as_RB well_RB ,_, therefore_RB I_PRP demand_VBP her_PRP as_IN my_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, as_IN was_VBD promised_VBN ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT maiden_NN ,_, is_VBZ what_WP he_PRP says_VBZ true_JJ ._.

The_DT animals_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, were_VBD still_RB lying_VBG sleeping_VBG beside_IN their_PRP$ dead_JJ master_NN on_IN the_DT dragons_NNS hill_RB ,_, and_CC there_EX came_VBD a_DT great_JJ bumble-bee_NN and_CC lighted_VBN on_IN the_DT hares_NNS nose_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT hare_NN wiped_VBD it_PRP off_RP with_IN his_PRP$ paw_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD on_IN sleeping_VBG ._.
The_DT bumble-bee_NN came_VBD a_DT second_JJ time_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT hare_NN again_RB rubbed_VBD it_PRP off_RP and_CC slept_VBD on_RP ._.
Then_RB it_PRP came_VBD for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC stung_VBD his_PRP$ nose_NN so_IN that_IN he_PRP awoke_VBD ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT hare_NN was_VBD awake_JJ ,_, he_PRP roused_VBD the_DT fox_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT fox_NN ,_, the_DT wolf_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT wolf_NN the_DT bear_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bear_NN the_DT lion_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT lion_NN awoke_NN and_CC saw_VBD that_IN the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD gone_VBN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ master_NN was_VBD dead_JJ ,_, he_PRP began_VBD to_TO roar_VB frightfully_RB and_CC cried_VBN ,_, who_WP has_VBZ done_VBN that_DT ._.
Bear_NNP ,_, why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP not_RB waken_VB me_PRP ._.
The_DT bear_NN asked_VBD the_DT wolf_NN ,_, why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP not_RB waken_VB me_PRP ._.
And_CC the_DT wolf_NN the_DT fox_NN ,_, why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP not_RB waken_VB me_PRP ._.
And_CC the_DT fox_NN the_DT hare_NN ,_, why_WRB did_VBD you_PRP not_RB waken_VB me_PRP ._.
The_DT poor_JJ hare_NN alone_RB did_VBD not_RB know_VB what_WDT answer_NN to_TO make_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT blame_NN rested_VBN with_IN him_PRP ._.
Then_RB they_PRP were_VBD just_RB going_VBG to_TO fall_VB upon_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP entreated_VBD them_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, kill_VB me_PRP not_RB ,_, I_PRP will_MD bring_VB our_PRP$ master_NN to_IN life_NN again_RB ._.
I_PRP know_VBP a_DT mountain_NN on_IN which_WDT a_DT root_NN grows_VBZ which_WDT ,_, when_WRB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN anyone_NN ,_, cures_VBZ him_PRP of_IN all_DT illness_NN and_CC every_DT wound_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT mountain_NN lies_VBZ two_CD hundred_CD hours_NNS ,_, journey_NN from_IN here_RB ._.
The_DT lion_NN said_VBD ,_, in_IN four-and-twenty_JJ hours_NNS must_MD you_PRP have_VB run_VBN thither_PRP and_CC have_VBP come_VBN back_RB ,_, and_CC have_VBP brought_VBN the_DT root_NN with_IN you_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT hare_NN sprang_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN four-and-twenty_JJ hours_NNS he_PRP was_VBD back_RB ,_, and_CC brought_VBD the_DT root_NN with_IN him_PRP ._.
The_DT lion_NN put_VBD the_DT huntsmans_NNS head_NN on_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT hare_NN placed_VBD the_DT root_NN in_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ,_, and_CC immediately_RB everything_NN united_VBD together_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ heart_NN beat_VBD ,_, and_CC life_NN came_VBD back_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT huntsman_NN awoke_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD alarmed_VBN when_WRB he_PRP did_VBD not_RB see_VB the_DT maiden_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, she_PRP must_MD have_VB gone_VBN away_RP whilst_IN I_PRP was_VBD sleeping_VBG ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO get_VB rid_VBN of_IN me_PRP ._.
The_DT lion_NN in_IN his_PRP$ great_JJ haste_NN had_VBD put_VBN his_PRP$ masters_NNS head_NN on_IN the_DT wrong_JJ way_NN round_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT huntsman_NN did_VBD not_RB observe_VB it_PRP because_IN of_IN his_PRP$ melancholy_JJ thoughts_NNS about_IN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN ._.
But_CC at_IN noon_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD going_VBG to_TO eat_VB something_NN ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ head_NN was_VBD turned_VBN backwards_RB and_CC could_MD not_RB understand_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT animals_NNS what_WP had_VBD happened_VBN to_IN him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ sleep_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT lion_NN told_VBD him_PRP that_IN they_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, had_VBD all_DT fallen_VBN asleep_JJ from_IN weariness_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN awaking_VBG ,_, had_VBD found_VBN him_PRP dead_JJ with_IN his_PRP$ head_NN cut_VBN off_RP ,_, that_IN the_DT hare_NN had_VBD brought_VBN the_DT life-giving_JJ root_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP ,_, in_IN his_PRP$ haste_NN ,_, had_VBD laid_VBN hold_NN of_IN the_DT head_NN the_DT wrong_JJ way_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN he_PRP would_MD repair_VB his_PRP$ mistake_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP tore_VBD the_DT huntsmans_NNS head_VBP off_RP again_RB ,_, turned_VBD it_PRP round_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT hare_NN healed_VBD it_PRP with_IN the_DT root_NN ._.
The_DT huntsman_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD sad_JJ at_IN heart_NN ,_, and_CC traveled_VBD about_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD his_PRP$ animals_NNS dance_NN before_IN people_NNS ._.
It_PRP came_VBD to_TO pass_VB that_IN precisely_RB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN one_CD year_NN he_PRP came_VBD back_RB to_IN the_DT same_JJ town_NN where_WRB he_PRP had_VBD rescued_VBN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN from_IN the_DT dragon_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT time_NN the_DT town_NN was_VBD gaily_RB hung_VBN with_IN red_JJ cloth_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT host_NN ,_, what_WP does_VBZ this_DT mean_VB ._.

Next_JJ day_NN when_WRB the_DT wedding_NN was_VBD to_TO take_VB place_NN ,_, the_DT huntsman_NN said_VBD at_IN mid-day_NN to_IN the_DT inn-keeper_NN ,_, do_VBP you_PRP believe_VB ,_, sir_NN host_NN ,_, that_IN I_PRP while_VBP with_IN you_PRP here_RB to-day_, shall_MD eat_VB bread_NN from_IN the_DT kings_NNS own_JJ table_NN ._.
Nay_NNP ,_, said_VBD the_DT host_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD bet_VB a_DT hundred_CD pieces_NNS of_IN gold_NN that_IN that_WDT will_MD not_RB come_VB true_JJ ._.
The_DT huntsman_NN accepted_VBD the_DT wager_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBN against_IN it_PRP a_DT purse_NN with_IN just_RB the_DT same_JJ number_NN of_IN gold_NN pieces_NNS ._.

Now_RB the_DT little_JJ hare_NN was_VBD the_DT lowest_JJS of_IN the_DT animals_NNS ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB transfer_VB this_DT order_NN to_IN any_DT the_DT others_NNS ,_, but_CC had_VBD to_TO get_VB on_IN his_PRP$ legs_NNS himself_PRP ._.
Alas_UH ._.
Thought_VBD he_PRP ,_, if_IN I_PRP bound_VBD through_IN the_DT streets_NNS thus_RB alone_RB ,_, the_DT butchers_NNS ,_, dogs_NNS will_MD all_DT be_VB after_IN me_PRP ._.
It_PRP happened_VBD as_IN he_PRP expected_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT dogs_NNS came_VBD after_IN him_PRP and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO make_VB holes_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ good_JJ skin_NN ._.
But_CC he_PRP sprang_VBD away_RB ,_, you_PRP have_VBP never_RB seen_VBN the_DT like_JJ ,_, and_CC sheltered_VBD himself_PRP in_IN a_DT sentry-box_NN without_IN the_DT soldier_NN being_VBG aware_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT dogs_NNS came_VBD and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO have_VB him_PRP out_RP ,_, but_CC the_DT soldier_NN did_VBD not_RB understand_VB a_DT jest_JJS ,_, and_CC struck_VBD them_PRP with_IN the_DT butt-end_NN of_IN his_PRP$ gun_NN ,_, till_IN they_PRP ran_VBD away_RB yelling_VBG and_CC howling_VBG ._.

But_CC the_DT hare_NN did_VBD not_RB let_VB itself_PRP be_VB turned_VBN from_IN its_PRP$ purpose_NN ,_, and_CC scratched_VBD her_PRP for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP peeped_VBD down_RP ,_, and_CC knew_VBD the_DT hare_NN by_IN its_PRP$ collar_NN ._.

He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, my_PRP$ master_NN ,_, who_WP killed_VBD the_DT dragon_NN ,_, is_VBZ here_RB ,_, and_CC has_VBZ sent_VBN me_PRP to_TO ask_VB for_IN a_DT loaf_NN of_IN bread_NN like_IN that_DT which_WDT the_DT king_NN eats_VBZ ._.
Then_RB she_PRP was_VBD full_JJ of_IN joy_NN and_CC had_VBD the_DT baker_NN summoned_VBN ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD him_PRP to_TO bring_VB a_DT loaf_NN such_JJ as_IN was_VBD eaten_VBN by_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
The_DT little_JJ hare_NN said_VBD ,_, but_CC the_DT baker_NN must_MD likewise_RB carry_VB it_PRP thither_NN for_IN me_PRP ,_, that_IN the_DT butchers_NNS ,_, dogs_NNS may_MD do_VB no_DT harm_NN to_IN me_PRP ._.

The_DT host_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP should_MD indeed_RB like_VB to_TO see_VB that_IN ,_, but_CC he_PRP would_MD make_VB no_DT more_RBR wagers_NNS ._.
The_DT huntsman_NN called_VBD the_DT fox_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, my_PRP$ little_JJ fox_NN ,_, go_VB and_CC fetch_VB me_PRP some_DT roast_NN meat_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT king_NN eats_VBZ ._.

Then_RB the_DT fox_NN took_VBD the_DT dish_NN ,_, waved_VBD away_RP with_IN his_PRP$ tail_NN the_DT flies_NNS which_WDT had_VBD settled_VBN on_IN the_DT meat_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB carried_VBD it_PRP to_IN his_PRP$ master_NN ._.
Behold_NNP ,_, sir_NNP host_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, bread_NN and_CC meat_NN are_VBP here_RB but_CC now_RB I_PRP will_MD also_RB have_VB proper_JJ vegetables_NNS with_IN it_PRP ,_, such_JJ as_IN are_VBP eaten_VBN by_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP called_VBD the_DT wolf_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ wolf_NN ,_, go_VB thither_RB and_CC fetch_VB me_PRP vegetables_NNS such_JJ as_IN the_DT king_NN eats_VBZ ._.
Then_RB the_DT wolf_NN went_VBD straight_RB to_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP feared_VBD no_DT one_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP got_VBD to_IN the_DT kings_NNS daughters_NNS parlor_NN ,_, he_PRP tugged_VBD at_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN her_PRP$ dress_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN she_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO look_VB round_RB ._.
She_PRP recognized_VBD him_PRP by_IN his_PRP$ collar_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD him_PRP into_IN her_PRP$ chamber_NN with_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ wolf_NN ,_, what_WP do_VBP you_PRP want_VB ._.
He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, my_PRP$ master_NN ,_, who_WP killed_VBD the_DT dragon_NN ,_, is_VBZ here_RB ,_, I_PRP am_VBP to_TO ask_VB for_IN some_DT vegetables_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT king_NN eats_VBZ ._.
Then_RB she_PRP made_VBD the_DT cook_NN come_VB ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD to_TO make_VB ready_JJ a_DT dish_NN of_IN vegetables_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT king_NN ate_VBN ,_, and_CC had_VBD to_TO carry_VB it_PRP for_IN the_DT wolf_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT wolf_NN took_VBD the_DT dish_NN from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP to_IN his_PRP$ master_NN ._.
Behold_NNP ,_, sir_NNP host_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, now_RB I_PRP have_VBP bread_NN and_CC meat_NN and_CC vegetables_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP will_MD also_RB have_VB some_DT pastry_NN to_TO eat_VB like_IN that_DT which_WDT the_DT king_NN eats_VBZ ._.
He_PRP called_VBD the_DT bear_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ bear_NN ,_, you_PRP are_VBP fond_JJ of_IN licking_VBG anything_NN sweet_JJ ,_, go_VB and_CC bring_VB me_PRP some_DT confectionery_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT king_NN eats_VBZ ._.
The_DT the_DT bear_NN trotted_VBD to_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, and_CC everyone_NN got_VBD out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ way_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB he_PRP went_VBD to_IN the_DT guard_NN ,_, they_PRP presented_VBD their_PRP$ muskets_NNS ,_, and_CC would_MD not_RB let_VB him_PRP go_VB into_IN the_DT royal_JJ palace_NN ._.
But_CC he_PRP got_VBD up_RP on_IN his_PRP$ hind_JJ legs_NNS ,_, and_CC gave_VBD them_PRP a_DT few_JJ boxes_NNS on_IN the_DT ears_NNS ,_, right_JJ and_CC left_VBD ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ paws_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT whole_JJ watch_NN broke_VBD up_RP ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP went_VBD straight_RB to_IN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN ,_, placed_VBD himself_PRP behind_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC growled_VBD a_DT little_JJ ._.
Then_RB she_PRP looked_VBD behind_IN her_PRP ,_, knew_VBD the_DT bear_NN ,_, and_CC bade_VB him_PRP go_VB into_IN her_PRP$ room_NN with_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ bear_NN ,_, what_WP do_VBP you_PRP want_VB ._.

Then_RB the_DT bear_NN first_RB licked_VBD up_RP the_DT comfits_NNS which_WDT had_VBD rolled_VBN down_RP ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP stood_VBD upright_RB ,_, took_VBD the_DT dish_NN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP to_IN his_PRP$ master_NN ._.
Behold_NNP ,_, sir_NNP host_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, now_RB I_PRP have_VBP bread_NN ,_, meat_NN ,_, vegetables_NNS and_CC confectionery_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP will_MD drink_VB wine_NN also_RB ,_, and_CC such_JJ as_IN the_DT king_NN drinks_NNS ._.
He_PRP called_VBD his_PRP$ lion_NN to_IN him_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ lion_NN ,_, you_PRP yourself_PRP like_VBP to_TO drink_VB till_IN you_PRP are_VBP tipsy_JJ ,_, go_VB and_CC fetch_VB me_PRP some_DT wine_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ drunk_JJ by_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT lion_NN strode_NN through_IN the_DT streets_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS fled_VBD from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT watch_NN ,_, they_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO bar_VB the_DT way_NN against_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD but_CC roar_NN once_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP all_DT ran_VBD away_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT lion_NN went_VBD to_IN the_DT royal_JJ apartment_NN ,_, and_CC knocked_VBD at_IN the_DT door_NN with_IN his_PRP$ tail_NN ._.

The_DT lion_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC see_VB that_IN I_PRP get_VBP the_DT right_JJ wine_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP went_VBD down_RB with_IN the_DT cup-bearer_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD below_RB ,_, the_DT cup-bearer_NN wanted_VBD to_TO draw_VB him_PRP some_DT of_IN the_DT common_JJ wine_NN that_WDT was_VBD drunk_VBN by_IN the_DT kings_NNS servants_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT lion_NN said_VBD ,_, stop_VB ,_, I_PRP will_MD taste_VB the_DT wine_NN first_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP drew_VBD half_PDT a_DT measure_NN ,_, and_CC swallowed_VBD it_PRP down_RP at_IN one_CD draught_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT innkeeper_NN looked_VBD at_IN the_DT handkerchief_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, whatever_WP I_PRP believe_VBP ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB that_IN ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP willing_JJ to_TO stake_VB my_PRP$ house_NN and_CC courtyard_VB on_IN it_PRP ._.

The_DT huntsman_NN said_VBD ,_, liars_NNS ought_MD to_TO have_VB none_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT dragons_NNS tongues_NNS are_VBP the_DT tokens_NNS of_IN the_DT victor_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP unfolded_VBD the_DT handerchief_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX lay_VBD all_DT seven_CD inside_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC he_PRP put_VBD each_DT tongue_NN in_IN the_DT mouth_NN to_TO which_WDT it_PRP belonged_VBD ,_, and_CC it_PRP fitted_VBD exactly_RB ._.
Then_RB he_PRP took_VBD the_DT handkerchief_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT princess_NN was_VBD embroidered_VBN ,_, and_CC showed_VBD it_PRP to_IN the_DT maiden_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD to_TO whom_WP she_PRP had_VBD given_VBN it_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, to_IN him_PRP who_WP killed_VBD the_DT dragon_NN ._.

Then_RB spoke_VBD the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, when_WRB I_PRP ,_, tired_JJ of_IN the_DT fight_NN ,_, was_VBD resting_VBG and_CC sleeping_NN ,_, the_DT marshal_NN came_VBD and_CC cut_VB off_RP my_PRP$ head_NN ._.

And_CC then_RB he_PRP related_VBD how_WRB his_PRP$ animals_NNS had_VBD healed_VBN him_PRP by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT wonderful_JJ root_NN ,_, and_CC how_WRB he_PRP had_VBD traveled_VBN about_RP with_IN them_PRP for_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD at_IN length_NN come_VB there_RB and_CC had_VBD learnt_VBN the_DT treachery_NN of_IN the_DT marshal_NN by_IN the_DT inn-keepers_NNS story_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT king_NN asked_VBD his_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, is_VBZ it_PRP true_JJ that_IN this_DT man_NN killed_VBD the_DT dragon_NN ._.
And_CC she_PRP answered_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ._.
Now_RB can_MD I_PRP reveal_VB the_DT wicked_JJ deed_NN of_IN the_DT marshal_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN to_IN light_NN without_IN my_PRP$ connivance_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP wrung_VBD from_IN me_PRP a_DT promise_NN to_TO be_VB silent_JJ ._.
For_IN this_DT reason_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD I_PRP make_VB the_DT condition_NN that_IN the_DT marriage_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB solemnized_VBN for_IN a_DT year_NN and_CC a_DT day_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT king_NN bade_NN twelve_CD councillors_NNS be_VB summoned_VBN who_WP were_VBD to_TO pronounce_VB judgment_NN on_IN the_DT marshal_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP sentenced_VBD him_PRP to_TO be_VB torn_VBN to_IN pieces_NNS by_IN four_CD bulls_NNS ._.
The_DT marshal_NN was_VBD therefore_RB executed_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT king_NN gave_VBD his_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, and_CC named_VBD him_PRP his_PRP$ viceroy_NN over_IN the_DT whole_JJ kingdom_NN ._.
The_DT wedding_NN was_VBD celebrated_VBN with_IN great_JJ joy_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT young_JJ king_NN caused_VBD his_PRP$ father_NN and_CC his_PRP$ foster-father_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN ,_, and_CC loaded_VBD them_PRP with_IN treasures_NNS ._.
Neither_CC did_VBD he_PRP forget_VB the_DT inn-keeper_NN ,_, but_CC sent_VBD for_IN him_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, behold_JJ ,_, sir_JJ host_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP married_VBN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN ,_, and_CC your_PRP$ house_NN and_CC yard_NN are_VBP mine_PRP ._.
The_DT host_NN said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, according_VBG to_IN justice_NN it_PRP is_VBZ so_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT young_JJ king_NN said_VBD ,_, it_PRP shall_MD be_VB done_VBN according_VBG to_IN mercy_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD him_PRP that_IN he_PRP should_MD keep_VB his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC yard_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT thousand_CD pieces_NNS of_IN gold_NN as_RB well_RB ._.
And_CC now_RB the_DT young_JJ king_NN and_CC queen_NN were_VBD thoroughly_RB happy_JJ ,_, and_CC lived_VBD in_IN gladness_NN together_RB ._.
He_PRP often_RB went_VBD out_RP hunting_NN because_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT delight_NN to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT faithful_JJ animals_NNS had_VBD to_TO accompany_VB him_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT neighborhood_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT forest_NN of_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD haunted_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN whosoever_RB did_VBD but_CC enter_VB it_PRP did_VBD not_RB easily_RB get_VB out_RP again_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT young_JJ king_NN had_VBD a_DT great_JJ inclination_NN to_TO hunt_VB in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC let_VB the_DT old_JJ king_NN have_VB no_DT peace_NN until_IN he_PRP allowed_VBD him_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ._.
So_CC he_PRP rode_VBD forth_RB with_IN a_DT great_JJ following_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT snow-white_NN hind_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ men_NNS ,_, wait_VB here_RB until_IN I_PRP return_VBP ,_, I_PRP want_VBP to_TO hunt_VB that_IN beautiful_JJ creature_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP rode_VBD into_IN the_DT forest_NN after_IN it_PRP ,_, followed_VBD only_RB by_IN his_PRP$ animals_NNS ._.
The_DT attendants_NNS halted_VBD and_CC waited_VBD until_IN evening_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB return_VB ,_, so_CC they_PRP rode_VBD home_RB ,_, and_CC told_VBD the_DT young_JJ queen_NN that_IN the_DT young_JJ king_NN had_VBD followed_VBN a_DT white_JJ hind_NN into_IN the_DT enchanted_VBN forest_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD not_RB come_VBN back_RB again_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP was_VBD in_IN the_DT greatest_JJS concern_NN about_IN him_PRP ._.
He_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD still_RB continued_VBN to_TO ride_VB on_RB and_CC on_IN after_IN the_DT beautiful_JJ wild_JJ animal_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD never_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO overtake_VB it_PRP ,_, when_WRB he_PRP thought_VBD he_PRP was_VBD near_RB enough_JJ to_TO aim_VB ,_, he_PRP instantly_RB saw_VBD it_PRP bound_VBD away_RB into_IN the_DT far_JJ distance_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN length_NN it_PRP vanished_VBD altogether_RB ._.
And_CC now_RB he_PRP perceived_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD penetrated_VBN deep_JJ into_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC blew_VBD his_PRP$ horn_NN but_CC he_PRP received_VBD no_DT answer_NN ,_, for_IN his_PRP$ attendants_NNS could_MD not_RB hear_VB it_PRP ._.

The_DT first_JJ was_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, beneath_IN the_DT moss_NN ,_, lay_VBD the_DT princesss_NN pearls_NNS ,_, a_DT thousand_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD be_VB picked_VBN up_RP ,_, and_CC if_IN by_IN sunset_NN one_CD single_JJ pearl_NN was_VBD missing_VBG ,_, he_PRP who_WP had_VBD looked_VBN for_IN them_PRP would_MD be_VB turned_VBN into_IN stone_NN ._.

At_IN last_JJ the_DT third_NN also_RB came_VBD with_IN the_DT like_JJ intent_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT others_NNS screamed_VBD out_RP ,_, keep_VB away_RB ,_, for_IN goodness_NN ,_, sake_NN keep_VB away_RB ._.
But_CC she_PRP did_VBD not_RB understand_VB why_WRB she_PRP was_VBD to_TO keep_VB away_RB ._.
The_DT others_NNS are_VBP there_RB ,_, she_PRP thought_VBD ,_, I_PRP may_MD as_RB well_RB be_VB there_RB too_RB ,_, and_CC ran_VBD to_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN she_PRP had_VBD touched_VBN her_PRP$ sister_NN ,_, she_PRP remained_VBD sticking_VBG fast_RB to_IN her_PRP ._.
So_RB they_PRP had_VBD to_TO spend_VB the_DT night_NN with_IN the_DT goose_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ morning_NN Dummling_NNP took_VBD the_DT goose_NN under_IN his_PRP$ arm_NN and_CC set_VB out_RP ,_, without_IN troubling_VBG himself_PRP about_IN the_DT three_CD girls_NNS who_WP were_VBD hanging_VBG on_RP to_IN it_PRP ._.

And_CC now_RB when_WRB she_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT kitchen_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD about_JJ to_TO get_VB to_IN her_PRP$ work_NN and_CC sweep_VB up_RP the_DT ashes_NNS ,_, the_DT cook_NN said_VBD ,_, leave_VB that_IN alone_RB till_IN morning_NN ,_, and_CC make_VB me_PRP the_DT soup_NN for_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, I_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, will_MD go_VB upstairs_RB awhile_RB ,_, and_CC take_VB a_DT look_NN ,_, but_CC let_VB no_DT hairs_NNS fall_VB in_RB ,_, or_CC in_IN future_NN you_PRP shall_MD have_VB nothing_NN to_TO eat_VB ._.
So_RB the_DT cook_NN went_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC Allerleirauh_NNP made_VBD the_DT soup_NN for_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD bread_NN soup_NN and_CC the_DT best_JJS she_PRP could_MD ,_, and_CC when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ready_JJ she_PRP fetched_VBD her_PRP$ golden_JJ ring_NN from_IN her_PRP$ little_JJ den_NN ,_, and_CC put_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT bowl_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT soup_NN was_VBD served_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT dancing_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, the_DT king_NN had_VBD his_PRP$ soup_NN brought_VBN and_CC ate_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP liked_VBD it_PRP so_RB much_RB that_IN it_PRP seemed_VBD to_IN him_PRP he_PRP had_VBD never_RB tasted_VBN better_RBR ._.
But_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT bowl_NN ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT golden_JJ ring_NN lying_VBG ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB conceive_VB how_WRB it_PRP could_MD have_VB got_VBN there_RB ._.
Then_RB he_PRP ordered_VBD the_DT cook_NN to_TO appear_VB before_IN him_PRP ._.
The_DT cook_NN was_VBD terrified_VBN when_WRB he_PRP heard_VBD the_DT order_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN Allerleirauh_NNP ,_, you_PRP have_VBP certainly_RB let_VB a_DT hair_NN fall_VB into_IN the_DT soup_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP have_VBP ,_, you_PRP shall_MD be_VB beaten_VBN for_IN it_PRP ._.
When_WRB he_PRP came_VBD before_IN the_DT king_NN the_DT latter_JJ asked_VBD who_WP had_VBD made_VBN the_DT soup_NN ._.

But_CC the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, that_DT is_VBZ not_RB true_JJ ,_, for_IN it_PRP was_VBD much_RB better_JJR than_IN usual_JJ ,_, and_CC cooked_VBD differently_RB ._.
He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP must_MD acknowledge_VB that_IN I_PRP did_VBD not_RB make_VB it_PRP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT hairy_JJ animal_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, go_VB and_CC bid_VB it_PRP come_VB up_RP here_RB ._.
When_WRB Allerleirauh_NNP came_VBD ,_, the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, who_WP are_VBP you_PRP ._.

After_IN a_DT while_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD another_DT festival_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB ,_, as_IN before_RB ,_, Allerleirauh_NNP begged_VBD the_DT cook_NN for_IN leave_NN to_TO go_VB and_CC look_VB on_RB ._.
He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, but_CC come_VBP back_RB again_RB in_IN half-an-hour_NN ,_, and_CC make_VB the_DT king_NN the_DT bread_NN soup_NN which_WDT he_PRP so_RB much_RB likes_NNS ._.

Then_RB she_PRP went_VBD up_RB and_CC was_VBD like_IN a_DT princess_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN stepped_VBD forward_RB to_TO meet_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC rejoiced_VBD to_TO see_VB her_PRP once_RB more_RBR ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT dance_NN was_VBD just_RB beginning_VBG they_PRP danced_VBD it_PRP together_RB ._.

The_DT cook_NN said_VBD ,_, fur-skin_UH ,_, you_PRP are_VBP a_DT witch_NN ,_, and_CC always_RB put_VB something_NN in_IN the_DT soup_NN which_WDT makes_VBZ it_PRP so_RB good_JJ that_IN the_DT king_NN likes_VBZ it_PRP better_RBR than_IN that_DT which_WDT I_PRP cook_VBP ,_, but_CC as_IN she_PRP begged_VBD so_RB hard_RB ,_, he_PRP let_VBD her_PRP go_VB up_RB at_IN the_DT appointed_JJ time_NN ._.
And_CC now_RB she_PRP put_VBD on_RP the_DT dress_NN which_WDT shone_VBD like_IN the_DT stars_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB entered_VBD the_DT hall_NN ._.

But_CC the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, you_PRP are_VBP my_PRP$ dear_JJ bride_NN ,_, and_CC we_PRP will_MD never_RB more_JJR part_NN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT woman_NN and_CC her_PRP$ daughter_NN who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT pretty_JJ garden_NN with_IN cabbages_NNS ._.
And_CC a_DT little_JJ hare_NN came_VBD into_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT winter_NN time_NN ate_VBD all_PDT the_DT cabbages_NNS ._.
Then_RB says_VBZ the_DT mother_NN to_IN the_DT daughter_NN ,_, go_VB into_IN the_DT garden_NN ,_, and_CC chase_VB the_DT hare_NN away_RB ._.

The_DT maiden_NN refuses_VBZ ._.

Then_RB all_PDT the_DT wedding-guests_NNS assembled_VBD ._.

That_IN I_PRP can_MD tell_VB you_PRP as_IN another_DT told_VBD it_PRP to_IN me_PRP ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT kings_NNS son_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT bride_NN whom_WP he_PRP loved_VBD very_RB much_RB ._.
And_CC when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD sitting_VBG beside_IN her_PRP and_CC very_RB happy_JJ ,_, news_NN came_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ father_NN lay_VBD sick_JJ unto_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC desired_VBD to_TO see_VB him_PRP once_RB again_RB before_IN his_PRP$ end_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP said_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ beloved_JJ ,_, I_PRP must_MD now_RB go_VB and_CC leave_VB you_PRP ,_, I_PRP give_VBP you_PRP a_DT ring_NN as_IN a_DT remembrance_NN of_IN me_PRP ._.

So_CC he_PRP rode_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP reached_VBD his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, the_DT latter_JJ was_VBD dangerously_RB ill_JJ ,_, and_CC near_IN his_PRP$ death_NN ._.
He_PRP said_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, dear_JJ son_NN ,_, I_PRP wished_VBD to_TO see_VB you_PRP once_RB again_RB before_IN my_PRP$ end_NN ,_, promise_VBP me_PRP to_TO marry_VB as_IN I_PRP wish_VBP ,_, and_CC he_PRP named_VBD a_DT certain_JJ kings_NNS daughter_NN who_WP was_VBD to_TO be_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN ._.
The_DT son_NN was_VBD in_IN such_JJ trouble_NN that_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB think_VB what_WP he_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, your_PRP$ will_MD shall_MD be_VB done_VBN ,_, and_CC thereupon_VB the_DT king_NN shut_VBD his_PRP$ eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC died_VBD ._.
When_WRB therefore_RB the_DT son_NN had_VBD been_VBN proclaimed_VBN king_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT time_NN of_IN mourning_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT promise_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD given_VBN his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, and_CC caused_VBD the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN to_TO be_VB asked_VBN in_IN marriage_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD promised_VBN to_IN him_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ first_JJ betrothed_VBD heard_VBN of_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC fretted_VBD so_RB much_JJ about_IN his_PRP$ faithlessness_NN that_IN she_PRP nearly_RB died_VBD ._.
Then_RB her_PRP$ father_NN said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, dearest_JJS child_NN ,_, why_WRB are_VBP you_PRP so_RB sad_JJ ._.
You_PRP shall_MD have_VB whatsoever_RB you_PRP will_MD ._.
She_PRP thought_VBD for_IN a_DT moment_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, I_PRP wish_VBP for_IN eleven_CD girls_NNS exactly_RB like_IN myself_PRP in_IN face_NN ,_, figure_NN ,_, and_CC size_NN ._.
The_DT father_NN said_VBD ,_, if_IN it_PRP be_VB possible_JJ ,_, your_PRP$ desire_NN shall_MD be_VB fulfilled_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP caused_VBD a_DT search_NN to_TO be_VB made_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ whole_JJ kingdom_NN ,_, until_IN eleven_CD young_JJ maidens_NNS were_VBD found_VBN who_WP exactly_RB resembled_VBD his_PRP$ daughter_NN in_IN face_NN ,_, figure_NN ,_, and_CC size_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN ,_, she_PRP had_VBD twelve_CD suits_NNS of_IN huntsmens_NNS clothes_NNS made_VBN ,_, all_DT alike_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT eleven_CD maidens_NNS had_VBD to_TO put_VB on_RP the_DT huntsmens_NNS clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC she_PRP herself_PRP put_VBD on_IN the_DT twelfth_NN suit_NN ._.
Thereupon_RB she_PRP took_VBD leave_NN of_IN her_PRP$ father_NN ,_, and_CC rode_VBD away_RP with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC rode_VBD to_IN the_DT court_NN of_IN her_PRP$ former_JJ betrothed_VBD ,_, whom_WP she_PRP loved_VBD so_RB dearly_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP asked_VBD if_IN he_PRP required_VBD any_DT huntsmen_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP would_MD take_VB all_DT of_IN them_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ service_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN looked_VBD at_IN her_PRP and_CC did_VBD not_RB know_VB her_PRP ,_, but_CC as_IN they_PRP were_VBD such_JJ handsome_JJ fellows_NNS ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP would_MD willingly_RB take_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC now_RB they_PRP were_VBD the_DT kings_NNS twelve_CD huntsmen_NNS ._.
The_DT king_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD a_DT lion_NN which_WDT was_VBD a_DT wondrous_JJ animal_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP knew_VBD all_DT concealed_VBN and_CC secret_JJ things_NNS ._.
It_PRP came_VBD to_TO pass_VB that_DT one_CD evening_NN he_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, you_PRP think_VBP you_PRP have_VBP twelve_CD huntsmen_NNS ._.
Yes_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP twelve_CD huntsmen_NNS ._.
The_DT lion_NN continued_VBD ,_, you_PRP are_VBP mistaken_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP twelve_CD girls_NNS ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, that_DT can_MD not_RB be_VB true_JJ ._.
How_WRB will_MD you_PRP prove_VB that_DT to_IN me_PRP ._.
Oh_UH ,_, just_RB let_VB some_DT peas_NNS be_VB strewn_VBN in_IN the_DT ante-chamber_NN ,_, answered_VBN swered_VBD the_DT lion_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP will_MD soon_RB see_VB ._.
Men_NNS have_VBP a_DT firm_JJ step_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP walk_VBP over_IN the_DT peas_NNS none_NN of_IN them_PRP stir_VBP ,_, but_CC girls_NNS trip_NN and_CC skip_NN ,_, and_CC drag_VB their_PRP$ feet_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT peas_NNS roll_NN about_RB ._.
The_DT king_NN was_VBD well_RB pleased_JJ with_IN the_DT counsel_NN ,_, and_CC caused_VBD the_DT peas_NNS to_TO be_VB strewn_VBN ._.

Mew_NNP ._.

Most_JJS certainly_RB not_RB ._.

But_CC he_PRP had_VBD made_VBN a_DT pillow_NN of_IN a_DT horses_NNS skull_NN which_WDT was_VBD lying_VBG on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP might_MD lie_VB uncomfortably_RB ,_, and_CC soon_RB wake_VBP up_RP again_RB ._.

This_DT the_DT cook_NN did_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT six_CD who_WP were_VBD sitting_VBG at_IN table_NN began_VBD to_TO feel_VB quite_RB warm_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP thought_VBD the_DT heat_NN was_VBD caused_VBN by_IN the_DT food_NN ._.

He_PRP shall_MD not_RB succeed_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, said_VBD the_DT one_NN with_IN the_DT cap_NN ._.

Then_RB ,_, full_JJ of_IN anger_NN ,_, the_DT king_NN went_VBD down_RB to_IN the_DT cook_NN ,_, scolded_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD why_WRB he_PRP had_VBD not_RB done_VBN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN ordered_VBN to_TO do_VB ._.

Oh_UH ,_, yes_UH ,_, lord_VB king_NN ,_, he_PRP answered_VBD ,_, give_VB me_PRP as_RB much_RB as_IN my_PRP$ servant_NN can_MD carry_VB ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD not_RB ask_VB for_IN your_PRP$ daughter_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT the_DT king_NN was_VBD satisfied_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ continued_VBN ,_, in_IN fourteen_CD days_NNS ,_, I_PRP will_MD come_VB and_CC fetch_VB it_PRP ._.
Thereupon_RB he_PRP summoned_VBD together_RB all_PDT the_DT tailors_NNS in_IN the_DT whole_JJ kingdom_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD to_TO sit_VB for_IN fourteen_CD days_NNS and_CC sew_VB a_DT sack_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ready_JJ ,_, the_DT strong_JJ one_NN who_WP could_MD tear_VB up_RP trees_NNS had_VBD to_TO take_VB it_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, and_CC go_VB with_IN it_PRP to_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP can_MD that_DT strong_JJ fellow_NN be_VB who_WP is_VBZ carrying_VBG a_DT bundle_NN of_IN linen_NN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN that_WDT is_VBZ as_RB big_JJ as_IN a_DT house_NN ._.

Then_RB he_PRP commanded_VBD a_DT ton_NN of_IN gold_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN ,_, which_WDT took_VBD sixteen_CD of_IN his_PRP$ strongest_JJS men_NNS to_TO carry_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT strong_JJ one_CD snatched_VBD it_PRP up_RP in_IN one_CD hand_NN ,_, put_VB it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ sack_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, why_WRB do_VBP nt_RB you_PRP bring_VB more_JJR at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._.
That_DT hardly_RB covers_VBZ the_DT bottom_NN ._.
Then_RB ,_, little_JJ by_IN little_JJ ,_, the_DT king_NN caused_VBD all_PDT his_PRP$ treasure_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN thither_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT strong_JJ one_CD pushed_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT sack_NN ,_, and_CC still_RB the_DT sack_NN was_VBD not_RB half_RB full_JJ with_IN it_PRP ._.

When_WRB all_PDT that_DT was_VBD inside_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD still_RB room_NN for_IN a_DT great_JJ deal_NN more_JJR ._.

So_RB he_PRP took_VBD it_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD away_RB with_IN his_PRP$ comrades_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT king_NN now_RB saw_VBD how_WRB one_CD single_JJ man_NN was_VBD carrying_VBG away_RP the_DT entire_JJ wealth_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, he_PRP became_VBD enraged_JJ ,_, and_CC bade_VB his_PRP$ horsemen_NNS mount_VBP and_CC pursue_VB the_DT six_CD ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD them_PRP to_TO take_VB the_DT sack_NN away_RB from_IN the_DT strong_JJ one_NN ._.
Two_CD regiments_NNS speedily_RB overtook_VB the_DT six_CD ,_, and_CC called_VBD out_RP ,_, you_PRP are_VBP prisoners_NNS ,_, put_VBN down_RP the_DT sack_NN with_IN the_DT gold_NN ,_, or_CC you_PRP will_MD be_VB cut_VBN to_IN pieces_NNS ._.
What_WP say_VBP you_PRP ,_, cried_VBD the_DT blower_NN ,_, that_IN we_PRP are_VBP prisoners_NNS ._.
Rather_RB than_IN that_DT should_MD happen_VB ,_, all_DT of_IN you_PRP shall_MD dance_VB about_IN in_IN the_DT air_NN ._.
And_CC he_PRP closed_VBD one_CD nostril_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT other_JJ blew_VBD on_IN the_DT two_CD regiments_NNS ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT queen_NN to_TO whom_WP God_NNP had_VBD given_VBN no_DT children_NNS ._.

Then_RB the_DT huntsman_NN spoke_VBD further_RB and_CC said_VBD ,_, father_NN ,_, will_MD you_PRP see_VB the_DT maiden_NN who_WP brought_VBD me_PRP up_RP so_RB tenderly_RB and_CC who_WP was_VBD afterwards_RB to_TO murder_VB me_PRP ,_, but_CC did_VBD not_RB do_VB it_PRP ,_, though_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ life_NN depended_VBD on_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT king_NN replied_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, I_PRP would_MD like_VB to_TO see_VB her_PRP ._.
The_DT son_NN said_VBD ,_, most_RBS gracious_JJ father_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD show_VB her_PRP to_IN you_PRP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT beautiful_JJ flower_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP thrust_VBD his_PRP$ hand_NN into_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN and_CC brought_VBD forth_RP the_DT pink_NN ,_, and_CC placed_VBD it_PRP on_IN the_DT royal_NN table_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD so_RB beautiful_JJ that_IN the_DT king_NN had_VBD never_RB seen_VBN one_CD to_TO equal_VB it_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT son_NN said_VBD ,_, now_RB will_MD I_PRP show_VB her_PRP to_IN you_PRP in_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC wished_VBD that_IN she_PRP might_MD become_VB a_DT maiden_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP stood_VBD there_RB looking_VBG so_RB beautiful_JJ that_IN no_DT painter_NN could_MD have_VB made_VBN her_PRP$ look_VB more_RBR so_RB ._.
And_CC the_DT king_NN sent_VBD two_CD waiting-maids_NNS and_CC two_CD attendants_NNS into_IN the_DT tower_NN ,_, to_TO fetch_VB the_DT queen_NN and_CC bring_VB her_PRP to_IN the_DT royal_JJ table_NN ._.
But_CC when_WRB whe_NNP was_VBD led_VBN in_IN she_PRP ate_VBD nothing_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, the_DT gracious_JJ and_CC merciful_JJ God_NNP who_WP has_VBZ supported_VBN me_PRP in_IN the_DT tower_NN ,_, will_MD soon_RB set_VB me_PRP free_JJ ._.
She_PRP lived_VBD three_CD days_NNS more_RBR ,_, and_CC then_RB died_VBD happily_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD buried_VBN ,_, the_DT two_CD white_JJ doves_NNS which_WDT had_VBD brought_VBN her_PRP$ food_NN to_IN the_DT tower_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD angels_NNS of_IN heaven_NN ,_, followed_VBD her_PRP$ body_NN and_CC seated_VBD themselves_PRP on_IN her_PRP$ grave_NN ._.
The_DT aged_JJ king_NN ordered_VBD the_DT cook_NN to_TO be_VB torn_VBN in_IN four_CD pieces_NNS ,_, but_CC grief_NN consumed_VBD the_DT kings_NNS own_JJ heart_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP soon_RB died_VBD ._.
His_PRP$ son_NN married_VBD the_DT beautiful_JJ maiden_NN whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD brought_VBN with_IN him_PRP as_IN a_DT flower_NN in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN they_PRP are_VBP still_RB alive_JJ or_CC not_RB ,_, is_VBZ known_VBN to_IN God_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT very_RB old_JJ man_NN ,_, whose_WP$ eyes_NNS had_VBD become_VBN dim_JJ ,_, his_PRP$ ears_NNS dull_JJ of_IN hearing_NN ,_, his_PRP$ knees_NNS trembled_VBN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP sat_VBD at_IN table_NN he_PRP could_MD hardly_RB hold_VB the_DT spoon_NN ,_, and_CC spilt_VBD the_DT broth_NN upon_IN the_DT table-cloth_NN or_CC let_VB it_PRP run_VB out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ._.
His_PRP$ son_NN and_CC his_PRP$ sons_NNS wife_NN were_VBD disgusted_VBN at_IN this_DT ,_, so_IN the_DT old_JJ grandfather_NN at_IN last_RB had_VBD to_TO sit_VB in_IN the_DT corner_NN behind_IN the_DT stove_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP his_PRP$ food_NN in_IN an_DT earthenware_NN bowl_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB even_RB enough_RB of_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC he_PRP used_VBD to_TO look_VB towards_IN the_DT table_NN with_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS full_JJ of_IN tears_NNS ._.
Once_RB ,_, too_RB ,_, his_PRP$ trembling_VBG hands_NNS could_MD not_RB hold_VB the_DT bowl_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP fell_VBD to_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC broke_VBD ._.
The_DT young_JJ wife_NN scolded_VBD him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP said_VBD nothing_NN and_CC only_RB sighed_VBD ._.
Then_RB they_PRP bought_VBD him_PRP a_DT wooden_JJ bowl_NN for_IN a_DT few_JJ half-pence_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD to_TO eat_VB ._.
They_PRP were_VBD once_RB sitting_VBG thus_RB when_WRB the_DT little_JJ grandson_NN of_IN four_CD years_NNS old_JJ began_VBD to_TO gather_VB together_RB some_DT bits_NNS of_IN wood_NN upon_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
What_WP are_VBP you_PRP doing_VBG there_RB ,_, asked_VBD the_DT father_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP making_VBG a_DT little_JJ trough_NN ,_, answered_VBD the_DT child_NN ,_, for_IN father_NN and_CC mother_NN to_TO eat_VB out_IN of_IN when_WRB I_PRP am_VBP big_JJ ._.
The_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN looked_VBD at_IN each_DT other_JJ for_IN a_DT while_NN ,_, and_CC presently_RB began_VBD to_TO cry_VB ._.
Then_RB they_PRP took_VBD the_DT old_JJ grandfather_NN to_IN the_DT table_NN ,_, and_CC henceforth_RB always_RB let_VB him_PRP eat_VB with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC likewise_RB said_VBD nothing_NN if_IN he_PRP did_VBD spill_VB a_DT little_JJ of_IN anything_NN ._.
A_DT little_JJ brother_NN and_CC sister_NN were_VBD once_RB playing_VBG by_IN a_DT well_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN they_PRP were_VBD thus_RB playing_VBG ,_, they_PRP both_DT fell_VBD in_RB ._.
A_DT water-nixie_NN lived_VBD down_RB below_RB ,_, who_WP said_VBD ,_, now_RB I_PRP have_VBP got_VBN you_PRP ,_, now_RB you_PRP shall_MD work_VB hard_RB for_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC carried_VBD them_PRP off_RP with_IN her_PRP ._.
She_PRP gave_VBD the_DT girl_NN dirty_JJ tangled_VBN flax_NN to_TO spin_VB ,_, and_CC she_PRP had_VBD to_TO fetch_VB water_NN in_IN a_DT bucket_NN with_IN a_DT hole_NN in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT boy_NN had_VBD to_TO hew_VB down_RP a_DT tree_NN with_IN a_DT blunt_JJ axe_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP got_VBD nothing_NN to_TO eat_VB but_CC dumplings_NNS as_RB hard_JJ as_IN stones_NNS ._.
Then_RB at_IN last_JJ the_DT children_NNS became_VBD so_RB impatient_JJ ,_, that_IN they_PRP waited_VBD until_IN one_CD sunday_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT nixie_NN was_VBD at_IN church_NN ,_, and_CC ran_VBD away_RB ._.
But_CC when_WRB church_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, the_DT nixie_NN saw_VBD that_IN the_DT birds_NNS were_VBD flown_VBN ,_, and_CC followed_VBD them_PRP with_IN great_JJ strides_NNS ._.
The_DT children_NNS saw_VBD her_PRP from_IN afar_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT girl_NN threw_VBD a_DT brush_NN behind_IN her_PRP which_WDT formed_VBD an_DT immense_JJ hill_NN of_IN bristles_NNS ,_, with_IN thousands_NNS and_CC thousands_NNS of_IN spikes_NNS ,_, over_IN which_WDT the_DT nixie_NN was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO scramble_VB with_IN great_JJ difficulty_NN ,_, at_IN last_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, she_PRP got_VBD over_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT children_NNS saw_VBD this_DT ,_, the_DT boy_NN threw_VBD behind_IN him_PRP a_DT comb_NN which_WDT made_VBD a_DT great_JJ ridge_NN with_IN a_DT thousand_CD times_NNS a_DT thousand_CD teeth_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT nixie_NN managed_VBD to_TO keep_VB herself_PRP steady_JJ on_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ crossed_VBN over_RP ._.
Then_RB the_DT girl_NN threw_VBD behind_IN her_PRP$ a_DT looking-glass_NN which_WDT formed_VBD a_DT hill_NN of_IN mirrors_NNS ,_, and_CC was_VBD so_RB slippery_JJ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT nixie_NN to_TO cross_VB it_PRP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP thought_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB home_RB quickly_RB and_CC fetch_VB my_PRP$ axe_NN ,_, and_CC cut_VB the_DT hill_NN of_IN glass_NN in_IN half_NN ._.
Long_RB before_IN she_PRP returned_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, and_CC had_VBD hewn_VBN through_IN the_DT glass_NN ,_, the_DT children_NNS had_VBD escaped_VBN to_IN a_DT great_JJ distance_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT water-nixie_NN was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO trundle_VB back_RB to_IN her_PRP well_RB again_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD one_CD upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT great_JJ war_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB it_PRP came_VBD to_IN an_DT end_NN ,_, many_JJ soldiers_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN ._.
Then_RB brother_NN lustig_NNP also_RB received_VBD his_PRP$ dismissal_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN it_PRP nothing_NN but_IN a_DT small_JJ loaf_NN of_IN ammunition-bread_NN ,_, and_CC four_CD kreuzers_NNS in_IN money_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT he_PRP departed_VBD ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD placed_VBN himself_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ way_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT poor_JJ beggar_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB brother_NN lustig_NN came_VBD up_RP ,_, he_PRP begged_VBD alms_NNS of_IN him_PRP ._.
Brother_NN lustig_NN replied_VBD ,_, dear_JJ beggar-man_NN ,_, what_WP am_VBP I_PRP to_TO give_VB you_PRP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN a_DT soldier_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP received_VBN my_PRP$ dismissal_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP nothing_NN but_IN this_DT little_JJ loaf_NN of_IN ammunition-bread_NN ,_, and_CC four_CD kreuzers_NNS of_IN money_NN ._.
When_WRB that_DT is_VBZ gone_VBN ,_, I_PRP shall_MD have_VB to_TO beg_VB as_RB well_RB as_IN you_PRP ._.
Still_RB I_PRP will_MD give_VB you_PRP something_NN ._.
Thereupon_RB he_PRP divided_VBD the_DT loaf_NN into_IN four_CD parts_NNS ,_, and_CC gave_VBD the_DT apostle_JJ one_CD of_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT kreuzer_NN likewise_RB ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP thanked_VBD him_PRP ,_, went_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC threw_VBD himself_PRP again_RB in_IN the_DT soldiers_NNS way_NN as_IN a_DT beggar_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN another_DT shape_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD up_RP begged_VBD a_DT gift_NN of_IN him_PRP as_IN before_RB ._.
Brother_NN lustig_NN spoke_VBD as_IN he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN before_RB ,_, and_CC again_RB gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT quarter_NN of_IN the_DT loaf_NN and_CC one_CD kreuzer_NN ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP thanked_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC went_VBD onwards_RB ,_, but_CC for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN placed_VBD himself_PRP in_IN another_DT shape_NN as_IN a_DT beggar_NN in_IN the_DT road_NN ,_, and_CC spoke_VBD to_IN brother_NN lustig_NN ._.
Brother_NN lustig_NN gave_VBD him_PRP also_RB the_DT third_JJ quarter_NN of_IN bread_NN and_CC the_DT third_JJ kreuzer_NN ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP thanked_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC brother_NN lustig_NN went_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC had_VBD but_CC a_DT quarter_NN of_IN the_DT loaf_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD kreuzer_NN ._.
With_IN that_DT he_PRP went_VBD into_IN an_DT inn_NN ,_, ate_VBD the_DT bread_NN ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD one_CD kreuzers_NNS worth_NN of_IN beer_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP had_VBD had_VBN it_PRP ,_, he_PRP journeyed_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD assumed_VBN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN a_DT discharged_VBN soldier_NN ,_, met_VBD and_CC spoke_VBD to_IN him_PRP thus_RB ._.
Good_JJ day_NN ,_, comrade_NN ,_, can_MD you_PRP not_RB give_VB me_PRP a_DT bit_NN of_IN bread_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT kreuzer_NN to_TO get_VB a_DT drink_NN ._.
Where_WRB am_VBP I_PRP to_TO procure_VB it_PRP ,_, answered_VBN brother_NN lustig_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN discharged_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP got_VBD nothing_NN but_IN a_DT loaf_NN of_IN ammunition-bread_NN and_CC four_CD kreuzers_NNS in_IN money_NN ._.
I_PRP met_VBD three_CD beggars_NNS on_IN the_DT road_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP gave_VBD each_DT of_IN them_PRP a_DT quarter_NN of_IN my_PRP$ bread_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD kreuzer_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ quarter_NN I_PRP ate_VBD in_IN the_DT inn_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD a_DT drink_NN with_IN the_DT last_JJ kreuzer_NN ._.
Now_RB my_PRP$ pockets_NNS are_VBP empty_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP also_RB have_VBP nothing_NN we_PRP can_MD go_VB a-begging_JJ together_RB ._.
No_UH ,_, answered_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, we_PRP need_VBP not_RB quite_RB do_VB that_DT ._.
I_PRP know_VBP a_DT little_JJ about_IN medicine_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD soon_RB earn_VB as_RB much_JJ as_IN I_PRP require_VBP by_IN that_DT ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, said_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, I_PRP know_VBP nothing_NN of_IN that_DT ,_, so_CC I_PRP must_MD go_VB and_CC beg_VB alone_RB ._.
Just_RB come_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_, said_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, and_CC if_IN I_PRP earn_VBP anything_NN ,_, you_PRP shall_MD have_VB half_DT of_IN it_PRP ._.
All_DT right_JJ ,_, said_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP went_VBD away_RB together_RB ._.
Then_RB they_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT peasants_NNS house_NN inside_IN which_WDT they_PRP heard_VBD loud_JJ lamentations_NNS and_CC cries_VBZ ._.
So_RB they_PRP went_VBD in_RB ,_, and_CC there_EX the_DT husband_NN was_VBD lying_VBG sick_JJ unto_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC very_RB near_IN his_PRP$ end_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN was_VBD crying_VBG and_CC weeping_VBG quite_RB loudly_RB ._.
Stop_VB that_IN howling_VBG and_CC crying_NN ,_, said_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, I_PRP will_MD make_VB the_DT man_NN well_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP took_VBD a_DT salve_NN out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, and_CC healed_VBD the_DT sick_JJ man_NN in_IN a_DT moment_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN he_PRP could_MD get_VB up_RP ,_, and_CC was_VBD in_IN perfect_JJ health_NN ._.
In_IN great_JJ delight_NN the_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN said_VBD ,_, how_WRB can_MD we_PRP reward_VB you_PRP ._.
What_WP shall_MD we_PRP give_VB you_PRP ._.
But_CC St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP would_MD take_VB nothing_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT more_JJR the_DT peasant_NN folks_NNS offered_VBD him_PRP ,_, the_DT more_JJR he_PRP refused_VBD ._.
Brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, nudged_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, take_VB something_NN ._.
Sure_UH enough_RB we_PRP are_VBP in_IN need_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
At_IN length_NN the_DT woman_NN brought_VBD a_DT lamb_NN and_CC said_VBD to_IN St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP that_IN he_PRP really_RB must_MD take_VB that_DT ,_, but_CC he_PRP would_MD not_RB ._.
Then_RB brother_NN lustig_NNP gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT poke_NN in_IN the_DT side_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, do_VBP take_VB it_PRP ,_, you_PRP stupid_JJ fool_NN ._.
We_PRP are_VBP in_IN great_JJ want_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP said_VBD at_IN last_JJ ,_, well_UH ,_, I_PRP will_MD take_VB the_DT lamb_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP wo_MD nt_RB carry_VB it_PRP ._.
If_IN you_PRP insist_VBP on_IN having_VBG it_PRP ,_, you_PRP must_MD carry_VB it_PRP ._.
That_DT is_VBZ nothing_NN ,_, said_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ._.
I_PRP will_MD easily_RB carry_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC took_VBD it_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ shoulder_NN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP departed_VBD and_CC came_VBD to_IN a_DT wood_NN ,_, but_CC brother_NN lustig_NN had_VBD begun_VBN to_TO feel_VB the_DT lamb_NN heavy_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD hungry_JJ ,_, so_IN he_PRP said_VBD to_IN St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, look_VBP ,_, thats_VBZ a_DT good_JJ place_NN ,_, we_PRP might_MD cook_VB the_DT lamb_NN there_RB ,_, and_CC eat_VB it_PRP ._.
As_IN you_PRP like_VBP ,_, answered_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, but_CC I_PRP ca_MD nt_RB have_VB anything_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN the_DT cooking_NN ._.
If_IN you_PRP will_MD cook_VB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ a_DT kettle_NN for_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT meantime_NN I_PRP will_MD walk_VB about_IN a_DT little_JJ until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ ready_JJ ._.
But_CC you_PRP must_MD not_RB begin_VB to_TO eat_VB until_IN I_PRP have_VBP come_VBN back_RB ._.
I_PRP will_MD come_VB at_IN the_DT right_JJ time_NN ._.
Well_UH ,_, go_VB ,_, then_RB ,_, said_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ._.
I_PRP understand_VBP cookery_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD manage_VB it_PRP ._.
Then_RB St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP went_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC brother_NN lustig_NN killed_VBD the_DT lamb_NN ,_, lighted_VBD a_DT fire_NN ,_, threw_VBD the_DT meat_NN into_IN the_DT kettle_NN ,_, and_CC boiled_VBD it_PRP ._.
When_WRB the_DT lamb_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD quite_RB ready_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT apostle_NN peter_NN had_VBD not_RB come_VBN back_RB ,_, brother_NN lustig_NN took_VBD it_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT kettle_NN ,_, cut_VB it_PRP up_RP ,_, and_CC found_VBD the_DT heart_NN ._.
That_DT is_VBZ said_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT best_JJS part_NN ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, and_CC tasted_VBD it_PRP ,_, but_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP ate_VBD it_PRP all_DT up_RP ._.
At_IN length_NN St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP returned_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, you_PRP may_MD eat_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT lamb_NN yourself_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD only_RB have_VB the_DT heart_NN ,_, give_VB me_PRP that_DT ._.
Then_RB brother_NN lustig_NNP took_VBD a_DT knife_NN and_CC fork_NN ,_, and_CC pretended_VBD to_TO look_VB anxiously_RB about_IN amongst_IN the_DT lambs_NNS flesh_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO find_VB the_DT heart_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP said_VBD abruptly_RB ,_, there_EX is_VBZ none_NN here_RB ._.
But_CC where_WRB can_MD it_PRP be_VB ,_, said_VBD the_DT apostle_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP nt_RB know_VB ,_, replied_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, but_CC look_VBP ,_, what_WDT fools_NNS we_PRP both_DT are_VBP ,_, to_TO seek_VB for_IN the_DT lambs_NNS heart_NN ,_, and_CC neither_DT of_IN us_PRP to_TO remember_VB that_IN a_DT lamb_NN has_VBZ no_DT heart_NN ._.
Oh_UH ,_, said_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, that_DT is_VBZ something_NN quite_RB new_JJ ._.
Every_DT animal_NN has_VBZ a_DT heart_NN ,_, why_WRB is_VBZ a_DT lamb_NN to_TO have_VB none_NN ._.
No_UH ,_, be_VB assured_VBN ,_, my_PRP$ brother_NN ,_, said_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, that_IN a_DT lamb_NN has_VBZ no_DT heart_NN ._.
Just_RB consider_VB it_PRP seriously_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP will_MD see_VB that_IN it_PRP really_RB has_VBZ none_NN ._.
Well_UH ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ all_RB right_NN ,_, said_VBD St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT heart_NN ,_, then_RB I_PRP want_VBP none_NN of_IN the_DT lamb_NN ._.
You_PRP may_MD eat_VB it_PRP alone_RB ._.
What_WP I_PRP ca_MD nt_RB eat_VB now_RB ,_, I_PRP will_MD carry_VB away_RP in_IN my_PRP$ knapsack_NN ,_, said_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP ate_VBD half_PDT the_DT lamb_NN ,_, and_CC put_VB the_DT rest_NN in_IN his_PRP$ knapsack_NN ._.
They_PRP went_VBD farther_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP caused_VBD a_DT great_JJ stream_NN of_IN water_NN to_TO flow_VB right_RB across_IN their_PRP$ path_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN it_PRP ._.
Said_NNP St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, do_VBP you_PRP go_VB first_RB ._.
No_UH ,_, answered_VBD brother_NN lustig_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD go_VB first_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP thought_VBD ,_, if_IN the_DT water_NN is_VBZ too_RB deep_JJ I_PRP will_MD stay_VB behind_RB ._.
Then_RB St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP strode_VBD through_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT water_NN just_RB reached_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ knee_NN ._.
So_CC brother_NN lustig_NN began_VBD to_TO go_VB through_IN also_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT water_NN grew_VBD deeper_JJR and_CC reached_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ throat_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP cried_VBD ,_, brother_NN ,_, help_VB me_PRP ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP said_VBD ,_, then_RB will_MD you_PRP confess_VB that_IN you_PRP have_VBP eaten_VBN the_DT lambs_NNS heart_NN ._.
No_UH ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB eaten_VBN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT water_NN grew_VBD deeper_RBR still_RB and_CC rose_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ mouth_NN ._.
Help_VB me_PRP ,_, brother_NN ,_, cried_VBD the_DT soldier_NN ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP said_VBD ,_, then_RB will_MD you_PRP confess_VB that_IN you_PRP have_VBP eaten_VBN the_DT lambs_NNS heart_NN ._.
No_UH ,_, he_PRP replied_VBD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB eaten_VBN it_PRP ._.
St_NNP ._.
Peter_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, would_MD not_RB let_VB him_PRP be_VB drowned_VBN ,_, but_CC made_VBD the_DT water_NN sink_NN and_CC helped_VBD him_PRP through_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB they_PRP journeyed_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_IN a_DT kingdom_NN where_WRB they_PRP heard_VBD that_IN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN lay_VBD sick_JJ unto_IN death_NN ._.

He_PRP soon_RB fell_VBD asleep_JJ ,_, but_CC during_IN the_DT night_NN was_VBD disturbed_VBN by_IN a_DT great_JJ noise_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD nine_CD ugly_JJ devils_NNS in_IN the_DT room_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD made_VBN a_DT circle_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD dancing_VBG around_IN him_PRP ._.
Brother_NN lustig_NN said_VBD ,_, well_UH ,_, dance_VB as_RB long_RB as_IN you_PRP like_VBP ,_, but_CC none_NN of_IN you_PRP must_MD come_VB too_RB close_RB ._.

What_WDT sort_NN of_IN a_DT trick_NN is_VBZ this_DT ,_, cried_VBD he_PRP ,_, and_CC helped_VBD the_DT good_JJ Hans_NNPS up_RP ._.

In_IN the_DT village_NN through_IN which_WDT I_PRP passed_VBD ,_, the_DT mayor_NN himself_PRP had_VBD just_RB had_VBN one_CD stolen_VBN out_IN of_IN its_PRP$ sty_NN ._.
I_PRP fear_VBP -_: I_PRP fear_VBP that_IN you_PRP have_VBP got_VBN hold_NN of_IN it_PRP there_RB ._.

The_DT fisherman_NN took_VBD the_DT fish_NN home_RB with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC did_VBD as_IN it_PRP had_VBD bidden_VBN him_PRP ._.
It_PRP came_VBD to_TO pass_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN from_IN the_DT two_CD pieces_NNS that_WDT were_VBD buried_VBN in_IN the_DT ground_NN two_CD golden_JJ lilies_NNS sprang_VBD up_RP ,_, that_IN the_DT horse_NN had_VBD two_CD golden_JJ foals_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT fishermans_NNS wife_NN bore_VBD two_CD children_NNS who_WP were_VBD made_VBN entirely_RB of_IN gold_NN ._.
The_DT children_NNS grew_VBD up_RP ,_, became_VBD tall_JJ and_CC handsome_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT lilies_NNS and_CC horses_NNS grew_VBD likewise_RB ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD about_RB to_TO set_VB out_RP on_IN a_DT long_JJ journey_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN parting_VBG he_PRP asked_VBD his_PRP$ three_CD daughters_NNS what_WP he_PRP should_MD bring_VB back_RP with_IN him_PRP for_IN them_PRP ._.

But_CC the_DT door_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN green_JJ wood_NN which_WDT warped_VBD and_CC left_VBD a_DT little_JJ crack_NN which_WDT no_DT one_NN noticed_VBD ._.

The_DT dove_NN said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, for_IN seven_CD years_NNS must_MD I_PRP fly_VB about_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, but_CC at_IN every_DT seventh_JJ step_NN that_IN you_PRP take_VBP I_PRP will_MD let_VB fall_VB a_DT drop_NN of_IN red_JJ blood_NN and_CC a_DT white_JJ feather_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT will_MD show_VB you_PRP the_DT way_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP follow_VBP the_DT trace_NN you_PRP can_MD release_VB me_PRP ._.
Thereupon_RB the_DT dove_NN flew_VBD out_RP at_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP followed_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC at_IN every_DT seventh_JJ step_NN a_DT red_JJ drop_NN of_IN blood_NN and_CC a_DT little_JJ white_JJ feather_NN fell_VBD down_RB and_CC showed_VBD her_PRP the_DT way_NN ._.
So_RB she_PRP went_VBD continually_RB further_RB and_CC further_RBR in_IN the_DT wide_JJ world_NN ,_, never_RB looking_VBG about_IN her_PRP or_CC resting_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT seven_CD years_NNS were_VBD almost_RB past_JJ ,_, then_RB she_PRP rejoiced_VBD and_CC thought_VBD that_IN they_PRP would_MD soon_RB be_VB saved_VBN ,_, and_CC yet_RB they_PRP were_VBD so_RB far_RB from_IN it_PRP ._.
Once_RB when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD thus_RB moving_VBG onwards_RB ,_, no_DT little_JJ feather_NN and_CC no_DT drop_NN of_IN red_JJ blood_NN fell_VBD ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP raised_VBD her_PRP$ eyes_NNS the_DT dove_NN had_VBD disappeared_VBN ._.
And_CC as_IN she_PRP thought_VBD to_IN herself_PRP ,_, in_IN this_DT no_DT man_NN can_MD help_VB you_PRP ,_, she_PRP climbed_VBD up_IN to_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, you_PRP shine_VBP into_IN every_DT crevice_NN ,_, and_CC over_IN every_DT peak_NN ,_, have_VBP you_PRP not_RB seen_VBN a_DT white_JJ dove_NN flying_VBG ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN an_DT old_JJ queen_NN whose_WP$ husband_NN had_VBD been_VBN dead_JJ for_IN many_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC she_PRP had_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ daughter_NN ._.

After_IN she_PRP had_VBD ridden_VBN for_IN a_DT while_NN she_PRP felt_VBD a_DT burning_VBG thirst_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN her_PRP waiting-maid_JJ ,_, dismount_NN ,_, and_CC take_VB my_PRP$ cup_NN which_WDT you_PRP have_VBP brought_VBN with_IN you_PRP for_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC get_VB me_PRP some_DT water_NN from_IN the_DT stream_NN ,_, for_IN I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO drink_VB ._.

Then_RB in_IN her_PRP$ great_JJ thirst_NN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN alighted_VBN ,_, bent_VBN over_IN the_DT flowing_VBG stream_NN ,_, wept_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, ah_UH ,_, heaven_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT drops_NNS of_IN blood_NN again_RB replied_VBD ,_, if_IN this_DT your_PRP$ mother_NN knew_VBD ,_, her_PRP$ heart_NN would_MD break_VB in_RP two_CD ._.

The_DT waiting-maid_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD seen_VBN it_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP rejoiced_VBD to_TO think_VB that_IN she_PRP had_VBD now_RB power_NN over_IN the_DT bride_NN ,_, for_IN since_IN the_DT princess_NN had_VBD lost_VBN the_DT drops_NNS of_IN blood_NN ,_, she_PRP had_VBD become_VBN weak_JJ and_CC powerless_JJ ._.
