But_CC falada_NNP saw_VBD all_PDT this_DT ,_, and_CC observed_VBD it_PRP well_RB ._.
The_DT waiting-maid_NNP now_RB mounted_VBD falada_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT true_JJ bride_NN the_DT bad_JJ horse_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB they_PRP traveled_VBD onwards_RB ,_, until_IN at_IN length_NN they_PRP entered_VBD the_DT royal_JJ palace_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD great_JJ rejoicings_NNS over_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT prince_NN sprang_VBD forward_RB to_TO meet_VB her_PRP ,_, lifted_VBD the_DT waiting-maid_NN from_IN her_PRP$ horse_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD she_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ consort_NN ._.
She_PRP was_VBD conducted_VBN upstairs_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT real_JJ princess_NN was_VBD left_VBN standing_VBG below_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT old_JJ king_NN looked_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT window_NN and_CC saw_VBD her_PRP$ standing_NN in_IN the_DT courtyard_NN ,_, and_CC noticed_VBD how_WRB dainty_NN and_CC delicate_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ she_PRP was_VBD ,_, and_CC instantly_RB went_VBD to_IN the_DT royal_JJ apartment_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT bride_NN about_IN the_DT girl_NN she_PRP had_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ who_WP was_VBD standing_VBG down_RP below_RB in_IN the_DT courtyard_NN ,_, and_CC who_WP she_PRP was_VBD ._.
I_PRP picked_VBD her_PRP up_NN on_IN my_PRP$ way_NN for_IN a_DT companion_NN ,_, give_VB the_DT girl_NN something_NN to_TO work_VB at_IN ,_, that_IN she_PRP may_MD not_RB stand_VB idle_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT old_JJ king_NN had_VBD no_DT work_NN for_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC knew_VBD of_IN none_NN ,_, so_CC he_PRP said_VBD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP a_DT little_JJ boy_NN who_WP tends_VBZ the_DT geese_NNS ,_, she_PRP may_MD help_VB him_PRP ._.
The_DT boy_NN was_VBD called_VBN conrad_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT true_JJ bride_NN had_VBD to_TO help_VB him_PRP to_TO tend_VB the_DT geese_NNS ._.
Soon_RB afterwards_RB the_DT false_JJ bride_NN said_VBD to_IN the_DT young_JJ king_NN ,_, dearest_JJS husband_NN ,_, I_PRP beg_VBP you_PRP to_TO do_VB me_PRP a_DT favor_NN ._.
He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD do_VB so_RB most_RBS willingly_RB ._.
Then_RB send_VB for_IN the_DT knacker_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT horse_NN on_IN which_WDT I_PRP rode_VBD here_RB cut_VBN off_RP ,_, for_IN it_PRP vexed_VBD me_PRP on_IN the_DT way_NN ._.
In_IN reality_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD afraid_JJ that_IN the_DT horse_NN might_MD tell_VB how_WRB she_PRP had_VBD behaved_VBN to_IN the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP succeeded_VBD in_IN making_VBG the_DT king_NN promise_NN that_IN it_PRP should_MD be_VB done_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT faithful_JJ falada_NN was_VBD to_TO die_VB ,_, this_DT came_VBD to_IN the_DT ears_NNS of_IN the_DT real_JJ princess_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP secretly_RB promised_VBD to_TO pay_VB the_DT knacker_NN a_DT piece_NN of_IN gold_NN if_IN he_PRP would_MD perform_VB a_DT small_JJ service_NN for_IN her_PRP ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT great_JJ dark-looking_NN gateway_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, through_IN which_WDT morning_NN and_CC evening_NN she_PRP had_VBD to_TO pass_VB with_IN the_DT geese_NNS ,_, would_MD he_PRP be_VB so_RB goood_JJ as_IN to_TO nail_VB up_RP faladas_NNS head_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, so_IN that_IN she_PRP might_MD see_VB him_PRP again_RB ,_, more_JJR than_IN once_RB ._.
The_DT knackers_NNS man_NN promised_VBD to_TO do_VB that_DT ,_, and_CC cut_VB off_RP the_DT head_NN ,_, and_CC nailed_VBD it_PRP fast_RB beneath_IN the_DT dark_JJ gateway_NN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP went_VBD still_RB further_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC drove_VBD their_PRP$ geese_NNS into_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB they_PRP had_VBD come_VBN to_IN the_DT meadow_NN ,_, she_PRP sat_VBD down_RB and_CC unbound_JJ her_PRP$ hair_NN which_WDT was_VBD like_IN pure_JJ gold_NN ,_, and_CC conrad_NN saw_VBD it_PRP and_CC delighted_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ brightness_NN ,_, and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO pluck_VB out_RP a_DT few_JJ hairs_NNS ._.
And_CC there_EX came_VBD such_PDT a_DT violent_JJ wind_NN that_IN it_PRP blew_VBD conrads_NNS hat_VBP far_RB away_RB across_IN country_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO run_VB after_IN it_PRP ._.

Then_RB conrad_NNP was_VBD angry_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD not_RB speak_VB to_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC thus_RB they_PRP watched_VBD the_DT geese_NNS until_IN the_DT evening_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP went_VBD home_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT wind_NN blew_VBD ,_, and_CC blew_VBD his_PRP$ little_JJ hat_NN off_IN his_PRP$ head_NN and_CC far_RB away_RB ,_, and_CC conrad_NN was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO run_VB after_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD back_RB ,_, her_PRP$ hair_NN had_VBD been_VBN put_VBN up_RP a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP could_MD get_VB none_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC so_RB they_PRP looked_VBD after_IN their_PRP$ geese_NN till_IN evening_NN came_VBD ._.

The_DT aged_JJ king_NN summoned_VBD his_PRP$ son_NN ,_, and_CC revealed_VBD to_IN him_PRP that_IN he_PRP had_VBD got_VBN the_DT false_JJ bride_NN who_WP was_VBD only_RB a_DT waiting-maid_JJ ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT true_JJ one_CD was_VBD standing_VBG there_RB ,_, as_IN the_DT former_JJ goose-girl_NN ._.
The_DT young_JJ king_NN rejoiced_VBD with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ heart_NN when_WRB he_PRP saw_VBD her_PRP$ beauty_NN and_CC youth_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT great_JJ feast_NN was_VBD made_VBN ready_JJ to_TO which_WDT all_PDT the_DT people_NNS and_CC all_DT good_JJ friends_NNS were_VBD invited_VBN ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT countryman_NN had_VBD a_DT son_NN who_WP was_VBD as_RB big_JJ as_IN a_DT thumb_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB become_VB any_DT bigger_JJR ,_, and_CC during_IN several_JJ years_NNS did_VBD not_RB grow_VB one_CD hairs_NNS breadth_NN ._.
Once_IN when_WRB the_DT father_NN was_VBD going_VBG out_RP to_IN plough_VB ,_, the_DT little_JJ one_CD said_VBD ,_, father_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB out_RP with_IN you_PRP ._.
You_PRP would_MD go_VB out_RP with_IN me_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT father_NN ._.
Stay_VB here_RB ,_, you_PRP will_MD be_VB of_IN no_DT use_NN out_IN there_RB ,_, besides_IN you_PRP might_MD get_VB lost_VBN ._.
Then_RB thumbling_NN began_VBD to_TO cry_VB ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN peace_NN his_PRP$ father_NN put_VBD him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD him_PRP with_IN him_PRP ._.
When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD outside_RB in_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, he_PRP took_VBD him_PRP out_RP again_RB ,_, and_CC set_VBD him_PRP in_IN a_DT freshly_RB cut_NN furrow_NN ._.

Do_VBP you_PRP see_VB that_DT great_JJ bogie_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT father_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO frighten_VB the_DT little_JJ fellow_NN to_TO make_VB him_PRP behave_VB well_RB ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ coming_VBG to_TO fetch_VB you_PRP ._.

He_PRP took_VBD up_RP little_JJ thumbling_VBG carefully_RB with_IN two_CD fingers_NNS ,_, examined_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC without_IN saying_VBG one_CD word_NN went_VBD away_RB with_IN him_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ father_NN stood_VBD by_IN ,_, but_CC could_MD not_RB utter_VB a_DT sound_NN for_IN terror_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP thought_VBD nothing_NN else_RB but_CC that_IN his_PRP$ child_NN was_VBD lost_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN as_RB long_RB as_IN he_PRP lived_VBD he_PRP should_MD never_RB set_VB eyes_NNS on_IN him_PRP again_RB ._.

Then_RB the_DT boy_NN was_VBD already_RB so_RB strong_JJ that_IN he_PRP tore_VBD up_RP a_DT young_JJ tree_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT earth_NN by_IN the_DT roots_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT giant_JJ thought_NN ,_, we_PRP must_MD do_VB better_RBR than_IN that_DT ,_, took_VBD him_PRP back_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC suckled_VBD him_PRP two_CD years_NNS longer_RBR ._.
When_WRB he_PRP tested_VBD him_PRP ,_, his_PRP$ strength_NN had_VBD increased_VBN so_RB much_JJ that_IN he_PRP could_MD tear_VB an_DT old_JJ tree_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
That_DT was_VBD still_RB not_RB enough_JJ for_IN the_DT giant_NN ,_, he_PRP again_RB suckled_VBD him_PRP for_IN two_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP then_RB went_VBD with_IN him_PRP into_IN the_DT forest_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, now_RB just_RB tear_VB up_RP a_DT real_JJ stick_NN ,_, the_DT boy_NN tore_VBD up_RP the_DT biggest_JJS oak-tree_NN from_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP cracked_VBD ,_, and_CC that_DT was_VBD a_DT mere_JJ trifle_NN to_IN him_PRP ._.
Now_RB that_DT will_MD do_VB ,_, said_VBD the_DT giant_NN ,_, you_PRP are_VBP perfect_JJ ._.
And_CC took_VBD him_PRP back_RB to_IN the_DT field_NN from_IN whence_NN he_PRP had_VBD brought_VBN him_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ father_NN was_VBD there_RB following_VBG the_DT plough_NN ._.
The_DT young_JJ giant_NN went_VBD up_RB to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, does_VBZ my_PRP$ father_NN see_VB what_WP a_DT fine_JJ man_NN his_PRP$ son_NN has_VBZ grown_VBN into_IN ._.
The_DT farmer_NN was_VBD alarmed_VBN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, no_UH ,_, you_PRP are_VBP not_RB my_PRP$ son_NN ._.

No_UH ,_, no_UH ,_, you_PRP are_VBP not_RB my_PRP$ son_NN ,_, and_CC you_PRP can_MD not_RB plough_VB -_HYPH go_VB away_RB ._.
However_RB ,_, as_IN he_PRP was_VBD afraid_JJ of_IN this_DT great_JJ man_NN ,_, he_PRP let_VBD go_VB of_IN the_DT plough_NN ,_, stepped_VBD back_RB and_CC sat_VBD down_RP at_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT farmer_NN went_VBD home_NN ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN to_TO prepare_VB the_DT food_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT youth_NN ploughed_VBD the_DT field_NN which_WDT was_VBD two_CD acres_NNS large_JJ ,_, quite_RB alone_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP harnessed_VBD himself_PRP to_IN the_DT harrow_NN ,_, and_CC harrowed_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN ,_, using_VBG two_CD harrows_NNS at_IN once_RB ._.
When_WRB he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN it_PRP ,_, he_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC pulled_VBD up_RP two_CD oak-trees_NNS ,_, laid_VBD them_PRP across_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ,_, and_CC hung_VBD on_IN them_PRP one_CD harrow_NN behind_RB and_CC one_CD before_RB ,_, and_CC also_RB one_CD horse_NN behind_RB and_CC one_CD before_RB ,_, and_CC carried_VBD all_DT as_IN if_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT bundle_NN of_IN straw_NN ,_, to_IN his_PRP$ parents_NNS ,_, house_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP entered_VBD the_DT yard_NN ,_, his_PRP$ mother_NN did_VBD not_RB recognize_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD ,_, who_WP is_VBZ that_RB horrible_JJ tall_JJ man_NN ._.

The_DT youth_NN was_VBD silent_JJ ,_, but_CC led_VBD his_PRP$ horses_NNS to_IN the_DT stable_JJ ,_, gave_VBD them_PRP some_DT oats_NNS and_CC hay_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT that_WDT they_PRP wanted_VBD ._.
When_WRB he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN this_DT ,_, he_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT parlor_NN ,_, sat_VBD down_RP on_IN the_DT bench_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, mother_NN ,_, now_RB I_PRP should_MD like_VB something_NN to_TO eat_VB ,_, will_MD it_PRP soon_RB be_VB ready_JJ ?_.
She_PRP said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, and_CC brought_VBN in_RP two_CD immense_JJ dishes_NNS full_JJ of_IN food_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD have_VB been_VBN enough_JJ to_TO satisfy_VB herself_PRP and_CC her_PRP$ husband_NN for_IN a_DT week_NN ._.
The_DT youth_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, ate_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN it_PRP himself_PRP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD if_IN she_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN more_JJR to_TO set_VB before_IN him_PRP ._.
No_UH ,_, she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, that_DT is_VBZ all_DT we_PRP have_VBP ._.

Then_RB said_VBD he_PRP ,_, father_NN ,_, I_PRP see_VBP well_RB that_IN with_IN you_PRP I_PRP shall_MD never_RB have_VB food_NN enough_RB ,_, if_IN you_PRP will_MD get_VB me_PRP an_DT iron_NN staff_NN which_WDT is_VBZ strong_JJ ,_, and_CC which_WDT I_PRP can_MD not_RB break_VB against_IN my_PRP$ knees_NNS ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB out_RP into_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
The_DT farmer_NN was_VBD glad_JJ ,_, put_VBD his_PRP$ two_CD horses_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ cart_NN ,_, and_CC fetched_VBD from_IN the_DT smith_NN a_DT staff_NN so_RB large_JJ and_CC thick_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT two_CD horses_NNS could_MD only_RB just_RB bring_VB it_PRP away_RB ._.
The_DT youth_NN laid_VBD it_PRP across_IN his_PRP$ knees_NNS ,_, and_CC snap_VB ,_, he_PRP broke_VBD it_PRP in_IN two_CD in_IN the_DT middle_NN like_IN a_DT bean-stalk_NN ,_, and_CC threw_VBD it_PRP away_RB ._.

He_PRP arrived_VBD at_IN a_DT village_NN ,_, wherein_WRB lived_VBD a_DT smith_NN who_WP was_VBD a_DT stingy_JJ fellow_NN ,_, who_WP never_RB did_VBD a_DT kindness_NN to_IN any_DT one_CD ,_, but_CC wanted_VBD everything_NN for_IN himself_PRP ._.

So_RB the_DT head-man_NN went_VBD to_IN the_DT loft_NN ,_, and_CC put_VBD two_CD bushels_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ right_JJ pocket_NN ,_, and_CC two_CD in_IN his_PRP$ left_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD four_CD in_IN a_DT wallet_NN ,_, half_NN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, and_CC half_NN on_IN his_PRP$ breast_NN ,_, and_CC thus_RB laden_NN went_VBD to_IN the_DT haunted_JJ mill_NN ._.

When_WRB the_DT bailiff_NN heard_VBD that_IN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD seriously_RB alarmed_JJ and_CC quite_RB beside_IN himself_PRP ._.
He_PRP walked_VBD to_IN and_CC fro_JJ in_IN the_DT room_NN ,_, and_CC drops_NNS of_IN sweat_NN ran_VBD down_RB from_IN his_PRP$ forehead_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP opened_VBD the_DT window_NN to_TO get_VB some_DT fresh_JJ air_NN ,_, but_CC before_IN he_PRP was_VBD aware_JJ ,_, the_DT head-man_NN had_VBD given_VBN him_PRP such_PDT a_DT kick_NN that_IN he_PRP flew_VBD through_IN the_DT window_NN out_RP into_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB far_RB away_RB that_IN no_DT one_NN ever_RB saw_VBD him_PRP again_RB ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT head-man_NN to_IN the_DT bailiffs_NNS wife_NN ,_, if_IN he_PRP does_VBZ not_RB come_VB back_RB ,_, you_PRP must_MD take_VB the_DT other_JJ blow_NN ._.
She_PRP cried_VBD ,_, no_UH ,_, no_UH I_PRP can_MD not_RB bear_VB it_PRP ._.
And_CC opened_VBD the_DT other_JJ window_NN ,_, because_IN drops_NNS of_IN sweat_NN were_VBD running_VBG down_IN her_PRP$ forehead_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP gave_VBD her_PRP such_PDT a_DT kick_NN that_IN she_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, flew_VBD out_RP ,_, and_CC as_IN she_PRP was_VBD lighter_JJR she_PRP went_VBD much_RB higher_JJR than_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN ._.
Her_PRP$ husband_NN cried_VBD ,_, do_VB come_VB to_IN me_PRP ,_, but_CC she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, come_VBP you_PRP to_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB come_VB to_IN you_PRP ._.
And_CC they_PRP hovered_VBD about_IN there_RB in_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB get_VB to_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC whether_IN they_PRP are_VBP still_RB hovering_VBG about_IN or_CC not_RB ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT young_JJ giant_NN took_VBD up_RP his_PRP$ iron_NN bar_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT rich_JJ king_NN who_WP had_VBD three_CD daughters_NNS ,_, who_WP daily_RB went_VBD to_TO walk_VB in_IN the_DT palace_NN garden_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN was_VBD a_DT great_JJ lover_NN of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN fine_JJ trees_NNS ,_, but_CC there_EX was_VBD one_CD for_IN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD such_PDT an_DT affection_NN ,_, that_IN if_IN anyone_NN gathered_VBD an_DT apple_NN from_IN it_PRP he_PRP wished_VBD him_PRP a_DT hundred_CD fathoms_NNS underground_RB ._.
And_CC when_WRB harvest_NN time_NN came_VBD ,_, the_DT apples_NNS on_IN this_DT tree_NN were_VBD all_DT as_RB red_JJ as_IN blood_NN ._.
The_DT three_CD daughters_NNS went_VBD every_DT day_NN beneath_IN the_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC looked_VBD to_TO see_VB if_IN the_DT wind_NN had_VBD not_RB blown_VBN down_RP an_DT apple_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP never_RB by_IN any_DT chance_NN found_VBD one_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT tree_NN was_VBD so_RB loaded_VBN with_IN them_PRP that_IN it_PRP was_VBD almost_RB breaking_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT branches_NNS hung_VBD down_RP to_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.

Then_RB he_PRP was_VBD much_RB troubled_JJ ,_, and_CC made_VBD known_VBN to_IN the_DT whole_JJ land_NN that_WDT whosoever_WP brought_VBD his_PRP$ daughters_NNS back_RB again_RB should_MD have_VB one_CD of_IN them_PRP to_TO wife_NN ._.
Hereupon_UH so_RB many_JJ young_JJ men_NNS went_VBD about_IN the_DT country_NN in_IN search_NN ,_, that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT counting_VBG them_PRP ,_, for_IN everyone_NN loved_VBD the_DT three_CD children_NNS because_IN they_PRP were_VBD so_RB kind_RB to_IN all_DT ,_, and_CC so_RB fair_JJ of_IN face_NN ._.

The_DT king_NN asked_VBD why_WRB ,_, and_CC they_PRP said_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO tell_VB that_DT ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ father_NN said_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO tell_VB it_PRP to_IN the_DT stove_NN ._.
And_CC he_PRP went_VBD out_RP ,_, listened_VBD at_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC heard_VBD everything_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP caused_VBD the_DT two_CD brothers_NNS to_TO be_VB hanged_VBN on_IN the_DT gallows_NNS ,_, and_CC to_IN the_DT third_NN he_PRP gave_VBD his_PRP$ youngest_JJS daughter_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN that_DT occasion_NN I_PRP wore_VBD a_DT pair_NN of_IN glass_NN shoes_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP struck_VBD them_PRP against_IN a_DT stone_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP said_VBD ,_, klink_UH ,_, and_CC were_VBD broken_VBN ._.
There_EX was_VBD a_DT certain_JJ merchant_NN who_WP had_VBD two_CD children_NNS ,_, a_DT boy_NN and_CC a_DT girl_NN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD both_DT young_JJ ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB walk_VB ._.
And_CC two_CD richly-laden_JJ ships_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ sailed_VBN forth_RB to_IN sea_NN with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ property_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC just_RB as_IN he_PRP was_VBD expecting_VBG to_TO win_VB much_JJ money_NN by_IN them_PRP ,_, news_NN came_VBD that_IN they_PRP had_VBD gone_VBN to_IN the_DT bottom_NN ,_, and_CC now_RB instead_RB of_IN being_VBG a_DT rich_JJ man_NN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT poor_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC had_VBD nothing_NN left_VBN but_CC one_CD field_NN outside_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO drive_VB his_PRP$ misfortune_NN a_DT little_JJ out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ thoughts_NNS ,_, he_PRP went_VBD out_IN to_IN this_DT field_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD walking_VBG to_IN and_CC fro_JJ in_IN it_PRP ,_, a_DT little_JJ black_JJ mannikin_NN stood_VBD suddenly_RB by_IN his_PRP$ side_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD why_WRB he_PRP was_VBD so_RB sad_JJ ,_, and_CC what_WP he_PRP was_VBD taking_VBG so_RB much_JJ to_IN heart_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT merchant_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP could_MD help_VB me_PRP I_PRP would_MD willingly_RB tell_VB you_PRP ._.
Who_WP knows_VBZ ,_, replied_VBD the_DT black_JJ dwarf_NN ._.
Perhaps_RB ,_, I_PRP can_MD help_VB you_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT merchant_NN told_VBD him_PRP that_IN all_DT he_PRP possessed_VBD had_VBD gone_VBN to_IN the_DT bottom_NN of_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN left_VBN but_CC this_DT field_NN ._.
Do_VB not_RB trouble_VB yourself_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN ._.
If_IN you_PRP will_MD promise_VB to_TO give_VB me_PRP the_DT first_JJ thing_NN that_WDT rubs_VBZ itself_PRP against_IN your_PRP$ leg_NN when_WRB you_PRP are_VBP at_IN home_NN again_RB ,_, and_CC to_TO bring_VB it_PRP here_RB to_IN this_DT place_NN in_IN twelve_CD years_NNS ,_, time_NN ,_, you_PRP shall_MD have_VB as_RB much_JJ money_NN as_IN you_PRP will_MD ._.
The_DT merchant_NN thought_VBD ,_, what_WP can_MD that_DT be_VB but_CC my_PRP$ dog_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB remember_VB his_PRP$ little_JJ boy_NN ,_, so_IN he_PRP said_VBD yes_UH ,_, gave_VBD the_DT black_JJ man_NN a_DT written_VBN and_CC sealed_VBN promise_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD home_RB ._.
When_WRB he_PRP reached_VBD home_RB ,_, his_PRP$ little_JJ boy_NN was_VBD so_RB delighted_JJ that_IN he_PRP held_VBD himself_PRP by_IN a_DT bench_NN ,_, trotted_VBD up_RP to_IN him_PRP and_CC seized_VBD him_PRP fast_RB by_IN the_DT legs_NNS ._.
The_DT father_NN was_VBD shocked_JJ ,_, for_IN he_PRP remembered_VBD his_PRP$ promise_NN ,_, and_CC now_RB knew_VBD what_WP he_PRP had_VBD pledged_VBN himself_PRP to_TO do_VB ,_, as_IN however_RB ,_, he_PRP still_RB found_VBD no_DT money_NN in_IN his_PRP$ chest_NN ,_, he_PRP thought_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN had_VBD only_RB been_VBN jesting_VBG ._.
A_DT month_NN afterwards_RB he_PRP went_VBD up_RB to_IN the_DT garret_NN ,_, intending_VBG to_TO gather_VB together_RB some_DT old_JJ tin_NN and_CC to_TO sell_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC saw_VBD lying_VBG there_RB a_DT great_JJ heap_NN of_IN money_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP was_VBD happy_JJ again_RB ,_, made_VBN purchases_NNS ,_, became_VBD a_DT greater_JJR merchant_NN than_IN before_RB ,_, and_CC felt_VBD that_IN God_NNP was_VBD good_JJ to_IN him_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT meantime_NN the_DT boy_NN grew_VBD tall_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN bright_JJ and_CC clever_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT nearer_JJR the_DT twelfth_JJ year_NN approached_VBD the_DT more_RBR anxious_JJ grew_VBD the_DT merchant_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN his_PRP$ distress_NN might_MD be_VB seen_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ face_NN ._.
One_CD day_NN his_PRP$ son_NN asked_VBD what_WP ailed_VBD him_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT father_NN would_MD not_RB say_VB ._.
The_DT boy_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, persisted_VBD so_RB long_RB ,_, that_IN at_IN last_RB he_PRP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN without_IN being_VBG aware_JJ of_IN what_WP he_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG ,_, he_PRP had_VBD promised_VBN him_PRP to_IN a_DT black_JJ dwarf_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD received_VBN much_JJ money_NN for_IN doing_VBG so_RB ._.
He_PRP said_VBD likewise_RB that_IN he_PRP had_VBD set_VBN his_PRP$ hand_NN and_CC seal_VB to_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC that_IN now_RB when_WRB twelve_CD years_NNS had_VBD gone_VBN by_IN he_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO give_VB him_PRP up_RP ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT son_NN ,_, oh_UH ,_, father_NN ,_, do_VBP not_RB be_VB uneasy_JJ ,_, all_DT will_MD go_VB well_RB ._.
The_DT black_JJ man_NN has_VBZ no_DT power_NN over_IN me_PRP ._.
The_DT son_NN had_VBD himself_PRP blessed_VBN by_IN the_DT priest_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT time_NN came_VBD ,_, father_NN and_CC son_NN went_VBD together_RB to_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT son_NN made_VBD a_DT circle_NN and_CC placed_VBD himself_PRP inside_IN it_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ._.
Then_RB came_VBD the_DT black_JJ dwarf_NN and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, have_VBP you_PRP brought_VBN with_IN you_PRP that_IN which_WDT you_PRP have_VBP promised_VBN me_PRP ._.

They_PRP spoke_VBD together_RB for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN after_IN this_DT ,_, but_CC at_IN last_JJ they_PRP agreed_VBD that_IN the_DT son_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP did_VBD not_RB belong_VB to_IN the_DT enemy_NN of_IN mankind_NN ,_, nor_CC yet_RB to_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, should_MD seat_VB himself_PRP in_IN a_DT small_JJ boat_NN ,_, which_WDT should_MD lie_VB on_IN water_NN which_WDT was_VBD flowing_VBG away_RB from_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT father_NN should_MD push_VB it_PRP off_RP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ foot_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT son_NN should_MD remain_VB given_VBN up_RP to_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
So_RB he_PRP took_VBD leave_NN of_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, placed_VBD himself_PRP in_IN a_DT little_JJ boat_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT father_NN had_VBD to_TO push_VB it_PRP off_RP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ foot_NN ._.
The_DT boat_NN capsized_VBD so_IN that_IN the_DT keel_NN was_VBD uppermost_JJ and_CC the_DT deck_NN under_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT father_NN believed_VBD his_PRP$ son_NN was_VBD lost_VBN ,_, and_CC went_VBD home_RB and_CC mourned_VBN for_IN him_PRP ._.
The_DT boat_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD not_RB sink_VB ,_, but_CC floated_VBD quietly_RB away_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT boy_NN sat_VBD safely_RB inside_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC it_PRP floated_VBD thus_RB for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, until_IN at_IN last_JJ it_PRP ran_VBD into_IN an_DT unknown_JJ shore_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP landed_VBD and_CC saw_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ castle_NN before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC set_VBD out_RP to_TO go_VB to_IN it_PRP ._.
But_CC when_WRB he_PRP entered_VBD it_PRP ,_, he_PRP found_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD bewitched_VBN ._.
He_PRP went_VBD through_IN every_DT room_NN ,_, but_CC all_DT were_VBD empty_JJ until_IN he_PRP reached_VBD the_DT last_JJ ,_, where_WRB a_DT snake_NN lay_VBD coiled_VBN in_IN a_DT ring_NN ._.

How_WRB can_MD I_PRP do_VB that_DT ,_, he_PRP inquired_VBD ._.
To-night_NNP come_VB twelve_CD black_JJ men_NNS ,_, covered_VBN with_IN chains_NNS who_WP will_MD ask_VB what_WP you_PRP are_VBP doing_VBG here_RB ,_, but_CC be_VB silent_JJ ,_, give_VB them_PRP no_DT answer_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB them_PRP do_VB what_WP they_PRP will_MD with_IN you_PRP ,_, they_PRP will_MD torment_VB you_PRP ,_, beat_VB you_PRP ,_, stab_NN you_PRP ,_, let_VB everything_NN pass_VB ,_, only_RB do_VBP not_RB speak_VB ,_, at_IN twelve_CD oclock_NN ,_, they_PRP must_MD go_VB away_RB again_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT second_JJ night_NN twelve_CD others_NNS will_MD come_VB ,_, on_IN the_DT third_JJ ,_, four-and-twenty_NNP ,_, who_WP will_MD cut_VB off_RP your_PRP$ head_NN ,_, but_CC at_IN twelve_CD oclock_NN their_PRP$ power_NN will_MD be_VB over_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB if_IN you_PRP have_VBP endured_VBN all_DT ,_, and_CC have_VBP not_RB spoken_VBN the_DT slightest_JJS word_NN ,_, I_PRP shall_MD be_VB released_VBN ._.
I_PRP will_MD come_VB to_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC will_MD have_VB ,_, in_IN a_DT bottle_NN ,_, some_DT of_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ._.
I_PRP will_MD rub_VB you_PRP with_IN that_DT ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP will_MD come_VB to_IN life_NN again_RB ,_, and_CC be_VB as_RB healthy_JJ as_IN before_RB ._.
Then_RB said_VBD he_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD gladly_RB set_VB you_PRP free_JJ ._.
And_CC everything_NN happened_VBD just_RB as_IN she_PRP had_VBD said_VBN ,_, the_DT black_JJ men_NNS could_MD not_RB force_VB a_DT single_JJ word_NN from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT third_JJ night_NN the_DT snake_NN became_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ princess_NN ,_, who_WP came_VBD with_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC brought_VBD him_PRP back_RB to_IN life_NN again_RB ._.
So_RB she_PRP threw_VBD herself_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS and_CC kissed_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC there_EX was_VBD joy_NN and_CC gladness_NN in_IN the_DT whole_JJ castle_NN ._.

They_PRP lived_VBD very_RB happily_RB together_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT queen_NN bore_VBD a_DT fine_JJ boy_NN ._.

The_DT queen_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, would_MD not_RB let_VB him_PRP go_VB away_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP know_VBP beforehand_RB that_IN it_PRP will_MD cause_VB my_PRP$ unhappiness_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP suffered_VBD her_PRP to_TO have_VB no_DT rest_NN until_IN she_PRP consented_VBD ._.

That_IN he_PRP promised_VBD her_PRP ,_, put_VB the_DT ring_NN on_IN his_PRP$ finger_NN ,_, and_CC wished_VBD himself_PRP at_IN home_NN ,_, just_RB outside_IN the_DT town_NN where_WRB his_PRP$ father_NN lived_VBD ._.
Instantly_RB he_PRP found_VBD himself_PRP there_RB ,_, and_CC made_VBD for_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT gate_NN ,_, the_DT sentries_NNS would_MD not_RB let_VB him_PRP in_RP ,_, because_IN he_PRP wore_VBD such_JJ strange_JJ and_CC yet_RB such_JJ rich_JJ and_CC magnificent_JJ clothing_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP went_VBD to_IN a_DT hill_NN where_WRB a_DT shepherd_NN was_VBD watching_VBG his_PRP$ sheep_NN ,_, changed_VBD clothes_NNS with_IN him_PRP ,_, put_VBN on_IN his_PRP$ old_JJ shepherds-coat_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB entered_VBD the_DT town_NN without_IN hindrance_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, he_PRP made_VBD himself_PRP known_VBN to_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB at_RB all_RB believe_VB that_IN the_DT shepherd_NN was_VBD his_PRP$ son_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP certainly_RB had_VBD had_VBN a_DT son_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN he_PRP was_VBD dead_JJ long_RB ago_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, as_IN he_PRP saw_VBD he_PRP was_VBD a_DT poor_JJ ,_, needy_JJ shepherd_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD give_VB him_PRP something_NN to_TO eat_VB ._.

They_PRP were_VBD there_RB in_IN a_DT second_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT queen_NN wept_NN ,_, and_CC reproached_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD broken_VBN his_PRP$ word_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD brought_VBN misfortune_NN upon_IN her_PRP ._.
He_PRP said_VBD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP done_VBN it_PRP thoughtlessly_RB ,_, and_CC not_RB with_IN evil_JJ intention_NN ,_, and_CC tried_VBD to_TO calm_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP pretended_VBD to_TO believe_VB this_DT ,_, but_CC she_PRP had_VBD mischief_NN in_IN her_PRP$ mind_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP led_VBD her_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT town_NN into_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, and_CC showed_VBD her_PRP the_DT stream_NN where_WRB the_DT little_JJ boat_NN had_VBD been_VBN pushed_VBN off_RP ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP said_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP tired_JJ ,_, sit_VB down_RP ,_, I_PRP will_MD sleep_VB awhile_RB on_IN your_PRP$ lap_NN ._.

When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD asleep_JJ ,_, she_PRP first_RB drew_VBD the_DT ring_NN from_IN his_PRP$ finger_NN ,_, then_RB she_PRP drew_VBD away_RP the_DT foot_NN which_WDT was_VBD under_IN him_PRP ,_, leaving_VBG only_RB the_DT slipper_NN behind_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP took_VBD her_PRP$ child_NN in_IN her_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, and_CC wished_VBD herself_PRP back_RB in_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ kingdom_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, there_RB he_PRP lay_VBD quite_RB deserted_JJ ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC child_NN were_VBD gone_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB was_VBD the_DT ring_NN from_IN his_PRP$ finger_NN ,_, the_DT slipper_NN only_RB was_VBD still_RB there_RB as_IN a_DT token_NN ._.
Home_NN to_IN your_PRP$ parents_NNS you_PRP can_MD not_RB return_VB ,_, thought_VBN he_PRP ,_, they_PRP would_MD say_VB that_IN you_PRP were_VBD a_DT wizard_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD be_VB off_RB ,_, and_CC walk_VB on_IN until_IN you_PRP arrive_VBP in_IN your_PRP$ own_JJ kingdom_NN ._.
So_CC he_PRP went_VBD away_RB and_CC came_VBD at_IN length_NN to_IN a_DT hill_NN by_IN which_WDT three_CD giants_NNS were_VBD standing_VBG ,_, disputing_VBG with_IN each_DT other_JJ because_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO divide_VB their_PRP$ fathers_NNS property_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP passing_VBG by_RB ,_, they_PRP called_VBD to_IN him_PRP and_CC said_VBD little_JJ men_NNS had_VBD quick_JJ wits_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO divide_VB their_PRP$ inheritance_NN for_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT inheritance_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, consisted_VBD of_IN a_DT sword_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, if_IN anyone_NN took_VBD it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, all_DT heads_NNS off_RP but_CC mine_PRP ,_, every_DT head_NN would_MD lie_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, secondly_RB ,_, of_IN a_DT cloak_NN which_WDT made_VBD any_DT one_NN who_WP put_VBD it_PRP on_IN invisible_JJ ,_, thirdly_RB ,_, of_IN a_DT pair_NN of_IN boots_NNS which_WDT could_MD transport_VB the_DT wearer_NN to_IN any_DT place_NN he_PRP wished_VBD in_IN a_DT moment_NN ._.
He_PRP said_VBD ,_, give_VB me_PRP the_DT three_CD things_NNS that_WDT I_PRP may_MD see_VB if_IN they_PRP are_VBP still_RB in_IN good_JJ condition_NN ._.
They_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT cloak_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD put_VBN it_PRP on_RB ,_, he_PRP was_VBD invisible_JJ and_CC changed_VBD into_IN a_DT fly_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP resumed_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ form_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, the_DT cloak_NN is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ one_NN ,_, now_RB give_VB me_PRP the_DT sword_NN ._.
They_PRP said_VBD ,_, no_UH ,_, we_PRP will_MD not_RB give_VB you_PRP that_IN ,_, if_IN you_PRP were_VBD to_TO say_VB ,_, all_DT heads_NNS off_RP but_CC mine_UH ,_, all_PDT our_PRP$ heads_NNS would_MD be_VB off_RB ,_, and_CC you_PRP alone_RB would_MD be_VB left_VBN with_IN yours_PRP ._.

This_DT he_PRP did_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT sword_NN cut_NN in_IN two_CD the_DT trunk_NN of_IN a_DT tree_NN as_IN if_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN a_DT blade_NN of_IN straw_NN ._.

And_CC now_RB when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD got_VBN all_PDT these_DT things_NNS ,_, he_PRP thought_VBD of_IN nothing_NN but_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC his_PRP$ child_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD as_IN though_RB to_IN himself_PRP ,_, oh_UH ,_, if_IN I_PRP were_VBD but_IN on_IN the_DT golden_JJ mountain_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ moment_NN he_PRP vanished_VBD from_IN the_DT sight_NN of_IN the_DT giants_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB their_PRP$ inheritance_NN was_VBD divided_VBN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD near_IN his_PRP$ palace_NN ,_, he_PRP heard_VBD sounds_VBZ of_IN joy_NN ,_, and_CC fiddles_NNS ,_, and_CC flutes_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS told_VBD him_PRP that_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN was_VBD celebrating_VBG her_PRP$ wedding_NN with_IN another_DT ._.
Then_RB he_PRP fell_VBD into_IN a_DT rage_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, false_JJ woman_NN ,_, she_PRP betrayed_VBD and_CC deserted_VBD me_PRP whilst_IN I_PRP was_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
So_RB he_PRP put_VBD on_RP his_PRP$ cloak_NN ,_, and_CC unseen_JJ by_IN all_DT went_VBD into_IN the_DT palace_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP entered_VBD the_DT dining-hall_NN a_DT great_JJ table_NN was_VBD spread_VBN with_IN delicious_JJ food_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT guests_NNS were_VBD eating_VBG and_CC drinking_NN ,_, and_CC laughing_VBG ,_, and_CC jesting_NN ._.
She_PRP sat_VBD on_IN a_DT royal_JJ seat_NN in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN them_PRP in_IN splendid_JJ apparel_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT crown_NN on_IN her_PRP$ head_NN ._.
He_PRP placed_VBD himself_PRP behind_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC no_DT one_NN saw_VBD him_PRP ._.
When_WRB she_PRP put_VBD a_DT piece_NN of_IN meat_NN on_IN a_DT plate_NN for_IN herself_PRP ,_, he_PRP took_VBD it_PRP away_RB and_CC ate_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP poured_VBD out_RP a_DT glass_NN of_IN wine_NN for_IN herself_PRP ,_, he_PRP took_VBD it_PRP away_RB and_CC drank_VB it_PRP ._.
She_PRP was_VBD always_RB helping_VBG herself_PRP to_IN something_NN ,_, and_CC yet_CC she_PRP never_RB got_VBD anything_NN ,_, for_IN plate_NN and_CC glass_NN disappeared_VBD immediately_RB ._.
Then_RB dismayed_VBN and_CC ashamed_JJ ,_, she_PRP arose_VBD and_CC went_VBD to_IN her_PRP$ chamber_NN and_CC wept_VB ,_, but_CC he_PRP followed_VBD her_PRP there_RB ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT queen_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT little_JJ daughter_NN who_WP was_VBD still_RB so_RB young_JJ that_IN she_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN ._.

Then_RB she_PRP became_VBD impatient_JJ ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT ravens_NNS were_VBD flying_VBG about_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, she_PRP opened_VBD the_DT window_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP wish_VBP you_PRP were_VBD a_DT raven_NN and_CC would_MD fly_VB away_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB I_PRP should_MD have_VB some_DT rest_NN ._.

Then_RB he_PRP cried_VBD for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN ,_, God_NNP be_VB with_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, I_PRP must_MD see_VB what_WP these_DT three_CD are_VBP about_IN ,_, and_CC went_VBD thither_RB and_CC asked_VBD why_WRB they_PRP were_VBD beating_VBG each_DT other_JJ so_RB furiously_RB ._.
One_CD of_IN them_PRP said_VBD that_IN he_PRP found_VBD a_DT stick_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN when_WRB he_PRP struck_VBD a_DT door_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, that_IN door_NN would_MD spring_VB open_RB ._.
The_DT next_JJ said_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD found_VBN a_DT mantle_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN whenever_WRB he_PRP put_VBD it_PRP on_RP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD invisible_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT third_NN said_VBD he_PRP had_VBD found_VBN a_DT horse_NN on_IN which_WDT a_DT man_NN could_MD ride_VB everywhere_RB even_RB up_IN the_DT glass-mountain_NN ._.
And_CC now_RB they_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB whether_IN they_PRP ought_MD to_TO have_VB these_DT things_NNS in_IN common_JJ ,_, or_CC whether_IN they_PRP ought_MD to_TO divide_VB them_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT man_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD give_VB you_PRP something_NN in_IN exchange_NN for_IN these_DT three_CD things_NNS ._.
Money_NN indeed_RB have_VBP I_PRP not_RB ,_, but_CC I_PRP have_VBP other_JJ things_NNS of_IN more_JJR value_NN ,_, but_CC first_RB I_PRP must_MD make_VB an_DT experiment_NN to_TO see_VB if_IN you_PRP have_VBP told_VBN the_DT truth_NN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP put_VBD him_PRP on_IN the_DT horse_NN ,_, threw_VBD the_DT mantle_JJ round_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT stick_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD all_PDT these_DT things_NNS they_PRP were_VBD no_RB longer_RBR able_JJ to_TO see_VB him_PRP ._.
So_CC he_PRP gave_VBD them_PRP some_DT vigorous_JJ blows_NNS and_CC cried_JJ ,_, now_RB ,_, vagabonds_NNS ,_, you_PRP have_VBP got_VBN what_WP you_PRP deserve_VBP ,_, are_VBP you_PRP satisfied_JJ ._.
And_CC he_PRP rode_VBD up_RP the_DT glass-mountain_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT castle_NN at_IN the_DT top_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD shut_VBN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP struck_VBD the_DT door_NN with_IN his_PRP$ stick_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP sprang_VBD open_RB immediately_RB ._.
He_PRP went_VBD in_RB and_CC ascended_VBD the_DT stairs_NNS until_IN he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT hall_NN where_WRB the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG with_IN a_DT golden_JJ globlet_NN of_IN wine_NN before_IN her_PRP ._.

And_CC when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD up_RB to_IN her_PRP ,_, he_PRP drew_VBD from_IN his_PRP$ finger_NN the_DT ring_NN which_WDT she_PRP had_VBD given_VBN him_PRP ,_, and_CC threw_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT goblet_NN so_IN that_IN it_PRP rang_VBD ._.

They_PRP searched_VBD the_DT whole_JJ castle_NN and_CC did_VBD not_RB find_VB him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP had_VBD gone_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC had_VBD seated_VBN himself_PRP on_IN the_DT horse_NN and_CC thrown_VBN off_RP the_DT mantle_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, they_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP and_CC cried_VBD aloud_RB in_IN their_PRP$ delight_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP alighted_VBD and_CC took_VBD the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN in_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, but_CC she_PRP kissed_VBD him_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, now_RB have_VBP you_PRP set_VBN me_PRP free_JJ ,_, and_CC to-morrow_VB we_PRP will_MD celebrate_VB our_PRP$ wedding_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT poor_JJ peasant_NN who_WP had_VBD no_DT land_NN ,_, but_CC only_RB a_DT small_JJ house_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD daughter_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT daughter_NN ,_, we_PRP ought_MD to_TO ask_VB our_PRP$ lord_NN the_DT king_NN for_IN a_DT bit_NN of_IN newly-cleared_JJ land_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT king_NN heard_VBD of_IN their_PRP$ poverty_NN ,_, he_PRP presented_VBD them_PRP with_IN a_DT piece_NN of_IN land_NN ,_, which_WDT she_PRP and_CC her_PRP$ father_NN dug_VBD up_RP ,_, and_CC intended_VBN to_TO sow_VB with_IN a_DT little_JJ corn_NN and_CC grain_NN of_IN that_DT kind_RB ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD dug_VBN nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, they_PRP found_VBD in_IN the_DT earth_NN a_DT mortar_NN made_VBN of_IN pure_JJ gold_NN ._.

The_DT daughter_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, would_MD not_RB consent_VB to_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, father_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP have_VBP the_DT mortar_NN without_IN having_VBG the_DT pestle_NN as_RB well_RB ,_, we_PRP shall_MD have_VB to_TO get_VB the_DT pestle_NN ,_, so_IN you_PRP had_VBD much_RB better_RBR say_VB nothing_NN about_IN it_PRP ._.
But_CC he_PRP would_MD not_RB obey_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC took_VBD the_DT mortar_NN and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP to_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, said_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD found_VBN it_PRP in_IN the_DT cleared_VBN land_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD if_IN he_PRP would_MD accept_VB it_PRP as_IN a_DT present_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN took_VBD the_DT mortar_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD if_IN he_PRP had_VBD found_VBN nothing_NN besides_IN that_DT ._.
No_UH ,_, answered_VBD the_DT countryman_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT king_NN said_VBD that_IN he_PRP must_MD now_RB bring_VB him_PRP the_DT pestle_NN ._.
The_DT peasant_NN said_VBD they_PRP had_VBD not_RB found_VBN that_IN ,_, but_CC he_PRP might_MD just_RB as_RB well_RB have_VBP spoken_VBN to_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD put_VBN in_IN prison_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD to_TO stay_VB there_RB until_IN he_PRP produced_VBD the_DT pestle_NN ._.
The_DT servants_NNS had_VBD daily_JJ to_TO carry_VB him_PRP bread_NN and_CC water_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ what_WP people_NNS get_VBP in_IN prison_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP heard_VBD how_WRB the_DT man_NN cried_VBD out_RP continually_RB ,_, ah_UH ,_, if_IN I_PRP had_VBD but_CC listened_VBN to_IN my_PRP$ daughter_NN ._.
Alas_UH ,_, alas_UH ,_, if_IN I_PRP had_VBD but_CC listened_VBN to_IN my_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD neither_CC eat_VB nor_CC drink_VB ._.
So_RB he_PRP commanded_VBD the_DT servants_NNS to_TO bring_VB the_DT prisoner_NN before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT king_NN asked_VBD the_DT peasant_NN why_WRB he_PRP was_VBD always_RB crying_VBG ,_, ah_UH ,_, if_IN I_PRP had_VBD but_CC listened_VBN to_IN my_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC what_WP it_PRP was_VBD that_IN his_PRP$ daughter_NN had_VBD said_VBN ._.
She_PRP told_VBD me_PRP that_IN I_PRP ought_MD not_RB to_TO take_VB the_DT mortar_NN to_IN you_PRP ,_, for_IN I_PRP should_MD have_VB to_TO produce_VB the_DT pestle_NN as_RB well_RB ._.
If_IN you_PRP have_VBP a_DT daughter_NN who_WP is_VBZ as_RB wise_JJ as_IN that_DT ,_, let_VB her_PRP come_VB here_RB ._.
She_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB obliged_JJ to_TO appear_VB before_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, who_WP asked_VBD her_PRP if_IN she_PRP really_RB was_VBD so_RB wise_JJ ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP would_MD set_VB her_PRP a_DT riddle_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN she_PRP could_MD guess_VB that_DT ,_, he_PRP would_MD marry_VB her_PRP ._.
She_PRP at_IN once_RB said_VBD yes_UH ,_, she_PRP would_MD guess_VB it_PRP ._.

So_CC she_PRP went_VBD away_RB ,_, put_VBD off_RP everything_NN she_PRP had_VBD on_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP was_VBD not_RB clothed_VBN ,_, and_CC took_VBD a_DT great_JJ fishing_NN net_NN ,_, and_CC seated_VBD herself_PRP in_IN it_PRP and_CC wrapped_VBD it_PRP entirely_RB round_JJ and_CC round_VB her_PRP ,_, so_IN that_IN she_PRP was_VBD not_RB naked_JJ ,_, and_CC she_PRP hired_VBD an_DT ass_NN ,_, and_CC tied_VBD the_DT fishermans_NNS net_NN to_IN its_PRP$ tail_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO drag_VB her_PRP along_RP ,_, and_CC that_DT was_VBD neither_CC riding_NN nor_CC walking_VBG ._.

And_CC when_WRB she_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN that_DT fashion_NN ,_, the_DT king_NN said_VBD she_PRP had_VBD guessed_VBN the_DT riddle_NN and_CC fulfilled_VBD all_PDT the_DT conditions_NNS ._.
Then_RB he_PRP ordered_VBD her_PRP$ father_NN to_TO be_VB released_VBN from_IN the_DT prison_NN ,_, took_VBD her_PRP to_IN wife_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD into_IN her_PRP$ care_NN all_PDT the_DT royal_JJ possessions_NNS ._.
Now_RB when_WRB some_DT years_NNS had_VBD passed_VBN ,_, the_DT king_NN was_VBD once_RB reviewing_VBG his_PRP$ troops_NNS on_IN parade_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN some_DT peasants_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN selling_VBG wood_NN stopped_VBD with_IN their_PRP$ waggons_NNS before_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, some_DT of_IN them_PRP had_VBD oxen_NNS yoked_VBN to_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC some_DT horses_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD one_CD peasant_NN who_WP had_VBD three_CD horses_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN which_WDT was_VBD delivered_VBN of_IN a_DT young_JJ foal_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP ran_VBD away_RB and_CC lay_VBD down_RP between_IN two_CD oxen_NNS which_WDT were_VBD in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT waggon_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT peasants_NNS came_VBD together_RB ,_, they_PRP began_VBD to_TO dispute_VB ,_, to_TO beat_VB each_DT other_JJ and_CC make_VB a_DT disturbance_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT peasant_NN with_IN the_DT oxen_NN wanted_VBD to_TO keep_VB the_DT foal_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT oxen_NNS had_VBD given_VBN birth_NN to_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ said_VBD his_PRP$ horse_NN had_VBD had_VBN it_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ ._.
The_DT quarrel_NN came_VBD before_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP give_VBP the_DT verdict_NN that_IN the_DT foal_NN should_MD stay_VB where_WRB it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN ,_, and_CC so_RB the_DT peasant_NN with_IN the_DT oxen_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP it_PRP did_VBD not_RB belong_VB ,_, got_VBD it_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT other_JJ went_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC wept_JJ and_CC lamented_VBD over_IN his_PRP$ foal_NN ._.
Now_RB he_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN how_WRB gracious_JJ his_PRP$ lady_NN the_DT queen_NN was_VBD because_IN she_PRP herself_PRP had_VBD sprung_VBN from_IN poor_JJ peasant_NN folks_NNS ,_, so_IN he_PRP went_VBD to_IN her_PRP and_CC begged_VBD her_PRP to_TO see_VB if_IN she_PRP could_MD not_RB help_VB him_PRP to_TO get_VB his_PRP$ foal_NN back_RB again_RB ._.

Early_RB to-morrow_JJ morning_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT king_NN parades_VBZ the_DT guard_NN ,_, place_VB yourself_PRP there_RB in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT road_NN by_IN which_WDT he_PRP must_MD pass_VB ,_, take_VB a_DT great_JJ fishing-net_NN and_CC pretend_VB to_TO be_VB fishing_VBG ,_, go_VB on_IN fishing_NN ,_, and_CC empty_VB out_RP the_DT net_NN as_IN if_IN you_PRP had_VBD got_VBN it_PRP full_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP told_VBD him_PRP also_RB what_WP he_PRP was_VBD to_TO say_VB if_IN he_PRP was_VBD questioned_VBN by_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ day_NN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, the_DT peasant_NN stood_VBD there_RB ,_, and_CC fished_VBN on_IN dry_JJ ground_NN ._.

He_PRP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP fishing_NN ._.

The_DT peasant_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, would_MD not_RB do_VB so_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD always_RB ,_, God_NNP forbid_VB he_PRP should_MD ,_, the_DT idea_NN was_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ ._.

He_PRP soon_RB fell_VBD into_IN a_DT deep_JJ sleep_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP perceived_VBD that_DT ,_, she_PRP called_VBD a_DT servant_NN and_CC took_VBD a_DT fair_JJ white_JJ linen_NN cloth_NN and_CC wrapped_VBD the_DT king_NN in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT servant_NN was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO carry_VB him_PRP into_IN a_DT carriage_NN that_WDT stood_VBD before_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP drove_VBD with_IN him_PRP to_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ little_JJ house_NN ._.
She_PRP laid_VBD him_PRP in_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ little_JJ bed_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP slept_VBD one_CD day_NN and_CC one_CD night_NN without_IN awakening_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP awoke_VBD he_PRP looked_VBD round_RB and_CC said_VBD ,_, good_JJ God_NNP ,_, where_WRB am_VBP I_PRP ._.
He_PRP called_VBD his_PRP$ attendants_NNS ,_, but_CC none_NN of_IN them_PRP were_VBD there_RB ._.
At_IN length_NN his_PRP$ wife_NN came_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ bedside_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, my_PRP$ dear_JJ lord_NN and_CC king_NN ,_, you_PRP told_VBD me_PRP I_PRP might_MD bring_VB away_RP with_IN me_PRP from_IN the_DT palace_NN that_IN which_WDT was_VBD dearest_JJS and_CC most_RBS precious_JJ in_IN my_PRP$ eyes_NNS -_, I_PRP have_VBP nothing_NN more_RBR precious_JJ and_CC dear_JJ than_IN yourself_PRP ,_, so_IN I_PRP have_VBP brought_VBN you_PRP with_IN me_PRP ._.
Tears_NNS rose_VBD to_IN the_DT kings_NNS eyes_NNS and_CC he_PRP said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ wife_NN ,_, you_PRP shall_MD be_VB mine_PRP and_CC I_PRP will_MD be_VB yours_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP took_VBD her_PRP back_RB with_IN him_PRP to_IN the_DT royal_JJ palace_NN and_CC was_VBD married_VBN again_RB to_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN they_PRP are_VBP very_RB likely_RB still_RB living_VBG ._.
About_RB a_DT thousand_CD or_CC more_JJR years_NNS ago_RB ,_, there_EX were_VBD in_IN this_DT country_NN nothing_NN but_CC small_JJ kings_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN them_PRP who_WP lived_VBD on_IN the_DT Keuterberg_NNP was_VBD very_RB fond_JJ of_IN hunting_NN ._.

Hullo_NNP ._.

Hullo_NNP ._.
If_IN I_PRP do_VBP not_RB get_VB him_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD have_VB no_DT one_NN ._.
These_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, were_VBD the_DT two_CD ministers_NNS ._.

This_DT they_PRP would_MD not_RB tell_VB him_PRP ,_, so_CC the_DT king_NN asked_VBD the_DT eldest_JJS if_IN she_PRP really_RB would_MD take_VB him_PRP for_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD ministers_NNS married_VBD the_DT two_CD sisters_NNS ,_, for_IN they_PRP were_VBD all_DT three_CD fair_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ of_IN face_NN ,_, especially_RB the_DT queen_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD hair_NN like_IN flax_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT two_CD sisters_NNS had_VBD no_DT children_NNS ,_, and_CC once_RB when_WRB the_DT king_NN was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO go_VB from_IN home_NN he_PRP invited_VBD them_PRP to_TO come_VB to_IN the_DT queen_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO cheer_VB her_PRP ,_, for_IN she_PRP was_VBD about_JJ to_TO bear_VB a_DT child_NN ._.
She_PRP had_VBD a_DT little_JJ boy_NN who_WP brought_VBD a_DT bright_JJ red_JJ star_NN into_IN the_DT world_NN with_IN him_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT two_CD sisters_NNS said_VBD to_IN each_DT other_JJ that_IN they_PRP would_MD throw_VB the_DT beautiful_JJ boy_NN into_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT two_CD heard_VBD that_DT ,_, they_PRP were_VBD frightened_VBN to_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC ran_VBD away_RB in_IN great_JJ haste_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT king_NN came_VBD home_RB they_PRP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT queen_NN had_VBD been_VBN delivered_VBN of_IN a_DT dog_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, what_WDT God_NNP does_VBZ ,_, is_VBZ well_RB done_VBN ._.
But_CC a_DT fisherman_NN who_WP dwelt_VBD near_IN the_DT water_NN fished_VBD the_DT little_JJ boy_NN out_RB again_RB while_IN he_PRP was_VBD still_RB alive_JJ ,_, and_CC as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN had_VBD no_DT children_NNS ,_, they_PRP reared_VBD him_PRP ._.
When_WRB a_DT year_NN had_VBD gone_VBN by_RB ,_, the_DT king_NN again_RB went_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT queen_NN had_VBD another_DT little_JJ boy_NN ,_, whom_WP the_DT false_JJ sisters_NNS likewise_RB took_VBD and_CC threw_VBD into_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT king_NN came_VBD back_RB ,_, they_PRP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT queen_NN had_VBD once_RB more_RBR given_VBN birth_NN to_IN a_DT dog_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP again_RB said_VBD ,_, what_WDT God_NNP does_VBZ ,_, is_VBZ well_RB done_VBN ._.
The_DT fisherman_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, fished_VBD this_DT one_NN also_RB out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC reared_VBD him_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT king_NN again_RB journeyed_VBD forth_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT queen_NN had_VBD a_DT little_JJ girl_NN ,_, whom_WP also_RB the_DT false_JJ sisters_NNS threw_VBD into_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
And_CC when_WRB the_DT king_NN came_VBD home_RB they_PRP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT queen_NN had_VBD been_VBN delivered_VBN of_IN a_DT cat_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT king_NN grew_VBD angry_JJ ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN to_TO be_VB cast_VBN into_IN prison_NN ,_, and_CC therein_RB was_VBD she_PRP shut_VBD up_RP for_IN many_JJ long_JJ years_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT children_NNS had_VBD grown_VBN up_RP ,_, the_DT eldest_JJS once_RB went_VBD out_RP with_IN some_DT other_JJ boys_NNS to_TO fish_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT other_JJ boys_NNS would_MD not_RB have_VB him_PRP with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, go_VB your_PRP$ way_NN ,_, foundling_VBG ._.
Hereupon_UH he_PRP was_VBD much_RB troubled_VBN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT old_JJ fisherman_NN if_IN that_DT was_VBD true_JJ ._.
The_DT fisherman_NN told_VBD him_PRP that_IN once_RB when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD fishing_VBG he_PRP had_VBD drawn_VBN him_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
So_RB the_DT boy_NN said_VBD he_PRP would_MD go_VB forth_RB and_CC seek_VB his_PRP$ father_NN ._.
The_DT fisherman_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, entreated_VBD him_PRP to_TO stay_VB ,_, but_CC he_PRP would_MD not_RB let_VB himself_PRP be_VB hindered_VBN ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ the_DT fisherman_NN consented_VBD ._.
Then_RB the_DT boy_NN went_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN and_CC walked_VBD for_IN many_JJ days_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT great_JJ stretch_NN of_IN water_NN by_IN the_DT side_NN of_IN which_WDT stood_VBD an_DT old_JJ woman_NN fishing_NN ._.
Good_JJ day_NN ,_, mother_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT boy_NN ._.
Many_JJ thanks_NNS ,_, said_VBD she_PRP ._.
You_PRP will_MD fish_VB long_RB enough_RB before_IN you_PRP catch_VBP anything_NN ._.
And_CC you_PRP will_MD seek_VB long_RB enough_RB before_IN you_PRP find_VBP your_PRP$ father_NN ._.
How_WRB will_MD you_PRP get_VB over_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT woman_NN ._.
God_NNP knows_VBZ ._.
Then_RB the_DT old_JJ woman_NN took_VBD him_PRP up_RP on_IN her_PRP$ back_NN and_CC carried_VBD him_PRP through_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP sought_VBD for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, but_CC could_MD not_RB find_VB his_PRP$ father_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT year_NN had_VBD gone_VBN by_RB ,_, the_DT second_JJ boy_NN set_VBD out_RP to_TO seek_VB his_PRP$ brother_NN ._.
He_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT fared_VBN with_IN him_PRP just_RB as_IN with_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN ._.
And_CC now_RB there_EX was_VBD no_DT one_NN at_IN home_NN but_CC the_DT daughter_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP mourned_VBD for_IN her_PRP$ brothers_NNS so_RB much_JJ that_IN at_IN last_JJ she_PRP also_RB begged_VBD the_DT fisherman_NN to_TO let_VB her_PRP set_VB forth_RB ,_, for_IN she_PRP wished_VBD to_TO go_VB in_IN search_NN of_IN her_PRP$ brothers_NNS ._.
Then_RB she_PRP likewise_RB came_VBD to_IN the_DT great_JJ stretch_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, Good_JJ day_NN ,_, mother_NN ._.
Many_JJ thanks_NNS ,_, replied_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ._.

When_WRB the_DT old_JJ woman_NN heard_VBD that_IN ,_, she_PRP became_VBD quite_RB friendly_JJ ,_, and_CC carried_VBD her_PRP over_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, gave_VBD her_PRP a_DT wand_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, Go_VB ,_, my_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, ever_RB onwards_RB by_IN this_DT road_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB you_PRP come_VBP to_IN a_DT great_JJ black_JJ dog_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD pass_VB it_PRP silently_RB and_CC boldly_RB ,_, without_IN either_CC laughing_VBG or_CC looking_VBG at_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB you_PRP will_MD come_VB to_IN a_DT great_JJ high_JJ castle_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT threshold_NN of_IN which_WDT you_PRP must_MD let_VB the_DT wand_NN fall_VB ,_, and_CC go_VB straight_RB through_IN the_DT castle_NN ,_, and_CC out_RB again_RB on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN ._.
There_RB you_PRP will_MD see_VB an_DT old_JJ fountain_NN out_IN of_IN which_WDT a_DT large_JJ tree_NN has_VBZ grown_VBN ,_, whereon_NN hangs_VBZ a_DT bird_NN in_IN a_DT cage_NN which_WDT you_PRP must_MD take_VB down_RP ._.
Take_VB likewise_RB a_DT glass_NN of_IN water_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT fountain_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN these_DT two_CD things_NNS go_VBP back_RB by_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN ._.
Pick_VB up_RP the_DT wand_NN again_RB from_IN the_DT threshold_NN and_CC take_VB it_PRP with_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB you_PRP again_RB pass_VBP by_IN the_DT dog_NN ,_, strike_VB him_PRP in_IN the_DT face_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC be_VB sure_JJ that_IN you_PRP hit_VBP him_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB just_RB come_VB back_RB here_RB to_IN me_PRP ._.
The_DT maiden_NN found_VBD everything_NN exactly_RB as_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN had_VBD said_VBN ,_, and_CC on_IN her_PRP$ way_NN back_RB she_PRP found_VBD her_PRP$ two_CD brothers_NNS who_WP had_VBD sought_VBN each_DT other_JJ over_IN half_PDT the_DT world_NN ._.
They_PRP went_VBD together_RB to_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB the_DT black_JJ dog_NN was_VBD lying_VBG on_IN the_DT road_NN ,_, she_PRP struck_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT face_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP turned_VBD into_IN a_DT handsome_JJ prince_NN who_WP went_VBD with_IN them_PRP to_IN the_DT river_NN ._.
There_EX the_DT old_JJ woman_NN was_VBD still_RB standing_VBG ._.

The_DT others_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, went_VBD to_IN the_DT old_JJ fisherman_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT were_VBD glad_JJ that_IN they_PRP had_VBD found_VBN each_DT other_JJ again_RB ,_, but_CC they_PRP hung_VBD the_DT bird_NN on_IN the_DT wall_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT second_JJ son_NN could_MD not_RB settle_VB at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD his_PRP$ crossbow_NN and_CC went_VBD a-hunting_JJ ._.
When_WRB he_PRP was_VBD tired_JJ he_PRP took_VBD his_PRP$ flute_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD music_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN was_VBD hunting_VBG too_RB ,_, and_CC heard_VBD that_DT and_CC went_VBD thither_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP met_VBD the_DT youth_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, Who_WP has_VBZ given_VBN you_PRP leave_VB to_TO hunt_VB here_RB ?_.
Oh_UH ,_, no_DT one_NN ._.
To_TO whom_WP do_VBP you_PRP belong_VB ,_, then_RB ?_.
I_PRP am_VBP the_DT fishermans_NNS son_NN ._.
But_CC he_PRP has_VBZ no_DT children_NNS ._.
If_IN you_PRP will_MD not_RB believe_VB ,_, come_VBN with_IN me_PRP ._.
That_IN the_DT king_NN did_VBD ,_, and_CC questioned_VBD the_DT fisherman_NN ,_, who_WP told_VBD him_PRP everything_NN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP were_VBD all_DT terrified_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN took_VBD the_DT bird_NN ,_, the_DT fisherman_NN and_CC the_DT three_CD children_NNS back_RB with_IN him_PRP to_IN the_DT castle_NN ,_, and_CC ordered_VBD the_DT prison_NN to_TO be_VB opened_VBN and_CC brought_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN out_RP again_RB ._.
She_PRP had_VBD grown_VBN quite_RB ill_JJ and_CC weak_JJ ,_, so_IN the_DT daughter_NN gave_VBD her_PRP some_DT of_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN the_DT fountain_NN to_TO drink_VB ,_, and_CC she_PRP became_VBD strong_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT two_CD false_JJ sisters_NNS were_VBD burnt_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT daughter_NN married_VBD the_DT prince_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT king_NN who_WP had_VBD an_DT illness_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT one_NN believed_VBD that_IN he_PRP would_MD come_VB out_IN of_IN it_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._.
He_PRP had_VBD three_CD sons_NNS who_WP were_VBD much_RB distressed_JJ about_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC went_VBD down_RB into_IN the_DT palace-garden_JJ and_CC wept_VBN ._.
There_RB they_PRP met_VBD an_DT old_JJ man_NN who_WP inquired_VBD as_IN to_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN their_PRP$ grief_NN ._.
They_PRP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN their_PRP$ father_NN was_VBD so_RB ill_JJ that_IN he_PRP would_MD most_RBS certainly_RB die_VB ,_, for_IN nothing_NN seemed_VBD to_TO cure_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT old_JJ man_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP know_VBP of_IN one_CD more_JJR remedy_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT is_VBZ the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP drinks_VBZ of_IN it_PRP he_PRP will_MD become_VB well_RB again_RB ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ hard_JJ to_TO find_VB ._.
The_DT eldest_JJS said_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD manage_VB to_TO find_VB it_PRP ._.
And_CC went_VBD to_IN the_DT sick_JJ king_NN ,_, and_CC begged_VBD to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB forth_RB in_IN search_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, for_IN that_DT alone_RB could_MD save_VB him_PRP ._.
No_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, the_DT danger_NN of_IN it_PRP is_VBZ too_RB great_JJ ._.
I_PRP would_MD rather_RB die_VB ._.
But_CC he_PRP begged_VBD so_RB long_RB that_IN the_DT king_NN consented_VBD ._.
The_DT prince_NN thought_VBD in_IN his_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, If_IN I_PRP bring_VBP the_DT water_NN ,_, then_RB I_PRP shall_MD be_VB best_RBS beloved_JJ of_IN my_PRP$ father_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD inherit_VB the_DT kingdom_NN ._.
So_RB he_PRP set_VBD out_RP ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD ridden_VBN forth_RB a_DT little_JJ distance_NN ,_, a_DT dwarf_NN stood_VBD there_RB in_IN the_DT road_NN who_WP called_VBD to_IN him_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, Whither_NNP away_RB so_RB fast_RB ?_. Silly_RB shrimp_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT prince_NN ,_, very_RB haughtily_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN you_PRP ._.
And_CC rode_VBD on_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT little_JJ dwarf_NN had_VBD grown_VBN angry_JJ ,_, and_CC had_VBD wished_VBN an_DT evil_JJ wish_NN ._.
Soon_RB after_IN this_DT the_DT prince_NN entered_VBD a_DT ravine_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT further_RBR he_PRP rode_VBD the_DT closer_JJR the_DT mountains_NNS drew_VBD together_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ the_DT road_NN became_VBD so_RB narrow_JJ that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB advance_VB a_DT step_NN further_RBR ._.
It_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ either_CC to_TO turn_VB his_PRP$ horse_NN or_CC to_TO dismount_VB from_IN the_DT saddle_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD shut_VBN in_RP there_RB as_IN if_IN in_IN prison_NN ._.
The_DT sick_JJ king_NN waited_VBD long_RB for_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP came_VBD not_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT second_JJ son_NN said_VBD ,_, father_NN ,_, let_VB me_PRP go_VB forth_RB to_TO seek_VB the_DT water_NN ._.
And_CC thought_VBD to_IN himself_PRP ,_, If_IN my_PRP$ brother_NN is_VBZ dead_JJ ,_, then_RB the_DT kingdom_NN will_MD fall_VB to_IN me_PRP ._.
At_IN first_RB the_DT king_NN would_MD not_RB allow_VB him_PRP to_TO go_VB either_RB ,_, but_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP yielded_VBD ,_, so_IN the_DT prince_NN set_VBD out_RP on_IN the_DT same_JJ road_NN that_WDT his_PRP$ brother_NN had_VBD taken_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP too_RB met_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN ,_, who_WP stopped_VBD him_PRP to_TO ask_VB whither_NN he_PRP was_VBD going_VBG in_IN such_JJ haste_NN ._.
Little_JJ shrimp_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT prince_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO do_VB with_IN you_PRP ._.
And_CC rode_VBD on_RP without_IN giving_VBG him_PRP another_DT look_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT dwarf_NN bewitched_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP ,_, like_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, rode_VBD into_IN a_DT ravine_NN ,_, and_CC could_MD neither_CC go_VB forwards_NNS nor_CC backwards_RB ._.
So_RB fare_VB haughty_JJ people_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT second_JJ son_NN also_RB remained_VBD away_RB ,_, the_DT youngest_JJS begged_VBN to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB forth_RB to_TO fetch_VB the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ the_DT king_NN was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO let_VB him_PRP go_VB ._.
When_WRB he_PRP met_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN and_CC the_DT latter_JJ asked_VBD him_PRP whither_WRB he_PRP was_VBD going_VBG in_IN such_JJ haste_NN ,_, he_PRP stopped_VBD ,_, gave_VBD him_PRP an_DT explanation_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP seeking_VBG the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, for_IN my_PRP$ father_NN is_VBZ sick_JJ unto_IN death_NN ._.
Do_VBP you_PRP know_VB ,_, then_RB ,_, where_WRB that_DT is_VBZ to_TO be_VB found_VBN ?_.
No_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT prince_NN ._.
As_IN you_PRP have_VBP borne_VBN yourself_PRP as_IN is_VBZ seemly_RB ,_, and_CC not_RB haughtily_RB like_IN your_PRP$ false_JJ brothers_NNS ,_, I_PRP will_MD give_VB you_PRP the_DT information_NN and_CC tell_VB you_PRP how_WRB you_PRP may_MD obtain_VB the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ._.
It_PRP springs_VBZ from_IN a_DT fountain_NN in_IN the_DT courtyard_NN of_IN an_DT enchanted_VBN castle_NN ,_, but_CC you_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO make_VB your_PRP$ way_NN to_IN it_PRP ,_, if_IN I_PRP do_VBP not_RB give_VB you_PRP an_DT iron_NN wand_NN and_CC two_CD small_JJ loaves_NNS of_IN bread_NN ._.
Strike_NN thrice_NN with_IN the_DT wand_NN on_IN the_DT iron_JJ door_NN of_IN the_DT castle_NN and_CC it_PRP will_MD spring_VB open_RB ,_, inside_RB lie_VBP two_CD lions_NNS with_IN gaping_VBG jaws_NNS ,_, but_CC if_IN you_PRP throw_VBP a_DT loaf_NN to_IN each_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, they_PRP will_MD be_VB quieted_VBN ._.
Then_RB hasten_VB to_TO fetch_VB some_DT of_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN before_IN the_DT clock_NN strikes_VBZ twelve_CD else_RB the_DT door_NN will_MD shut_VB again_RB ,_, and_CC you_PRP will_MD be_VB imprisoned_VBN ._.
The_DT prince_NN thanked_VBD him_PRP ,_, took_VBD the_DT wand_NN and_CC the_DT bread_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD out_RP on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP arrived_VBD ,_, everything_NN was_VBD as_IN the_DT dwarf_NN had_VBD said_VBN ._.
The_DT door_NN sprang_VBD open_JJ at_IN the_DT third_JJ stroke_NN of_IN the_DT wand_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD appeased_VBN the_DT lions_NNS with_IN the_DT bread_NN ,_, he_PRP entered_VBD the_DT castle_NN ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_IN a_DT large_JJ and_CC splendid_JJ hall_NN ,_, wherein_WRB sat_VBD some_DT enchanted_VBN princes_NNS whose_WP$ rings_NNS he_PRP drew_VBD off_RP their_PRP$ fingers_NNS ._.
A_DT sword_NN and_CC a_DT loaf_NN of_IN bread_NN were_VBD lying_VBG there_RB ,_, which_WDT he_PRP carried_VBD away_RP ._.
After_IN this_DT ,_, he_PRP entered_VBD a_DT chamber_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT was_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ maiden_NN who_WP rejoiced_VBD when_WRB she_PRP saw_VBD him_PRP ,_, kissed_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC told_VBD him_PRP that_IN he_PRP had_VBD set_VBN her_PRP free_JJ ,_, and_CC should_MD have_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN her_PRP$ kingdom_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN he_PRP would_MD return_VB in_IN a_DT year_NN their_PRP$ wedding_NN should_MD be_VB celebrated_VBN ._.
Likewise_RB she_PRP told_VBD him_PRP where_WRB the_DT spring_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN was_VBD ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO hasten_VB and_CC draw_VB some_DT of_IN it_PRP before_IN the_DT clock_NN struck_VBD twelve_CD ._.
Then_RB he_PRP went_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN last_RB entered_VBD a_DT room_NN where_WRB there_EX was_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ newly-made_NN bed_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD very_RB weary_JJ ,_, he_PRP felt_VBD inclined_JJ to_TO rest_VB a_DT little_JJ ._.
So_RB he_PRP lay_VBD down_RP and_CC fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
When_WRB he_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD striking_VBG a_DT quarter_NN to_IN twelve_CD ._.
He_PRP sprang_VBD up_RP in_IN a_DT fright_NN ,_, ran_VBD to_IN the_DT spring_NN ,_, drew_VBD some_DT water_NN in_IN a_DT cup_NN which_WDT stood_VBD near_RB ,_, and_CC hastened_VBD away_RB ._.
But_CC just_RB as_IN he_PRP was_VBD passing_VBG through_IN the_DT iron_JJ door_NN ,_, the_DT clock_NN struck_VBD twelve_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT door_NN fell_VBD to_IN with_IN such_JJ violence_NN that_IN it_PRP carried_VBD away_RP a_DT piece_NN of_IN his_PRP$ heel_NN ._.
He_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, rejoicing_VBG at_IN having_VBG obtained_VBN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, went_VBD homewards_NNS ,_, and_CC again_RB passed_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT latter_JJ saw_VBD the_DT sword_NN and_CC the_DT loaf_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, With_IN these_DT you_PRP have_VBP won_VBN great_JJ wealth_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT sword_NN you_PRP can_MD slay_VB whole_JJ armies_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT bread_NN will_MD never_RB come_VB to_IN an_DT end_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT prince_NN would_MD not_RB go_VB home_RB to_IN his_PRP$ father_NN without_IN his_PRP$ brothers_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Dear_JJ dwarf_NN ,_, can_MD you_PRP not_RB tell_VB me_PRP where_WRB my_PRP$ two_CD brothers_NNS are_VBP ?_.
They_PRP went_VBD out_RP before_IN I_PRP did_VBD in_IN search_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP not_RB returned_VBN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP imprisoned_VBN between_IN two_CD mountains_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP condemned_VBN them_PRP to_TO stay_VB there_RB ,_, because_IN they_PRP were_VBD so_RB haughty_JJ ._.
Then_RB the_DT prince_NN begged_VBD until_IN the_DT dwarf_NN released_VBD them_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP warned_VBD him_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, Beware_VB of_IN them_PRP ,_, for_IN they_PRP have_VBP bad_JJ hearts_NNS ._.
When_WRB his_PRP$ brothers_NNS came_VBD ,_, he_PRP rejoiced_VBD ,_, and_CC told_VBD them_PRP how_WRB things_NNS had_VBD gone_VBN with_IN him_PRP ,_, that_IN he_PRP had_VBD found_VBN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC had_VBD brought_VBN a_DT cupful_JJ away_RP with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC had_VBD rescued_VBN a_DT beautiful_JJ princess_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD willing_JJ to_TO wait_VB a_DT year_NN for_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB their_PRP$ wedding_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB celebrated_VBN and_CC he_PRP would_MD obtain_VB a_DT great_JJ kingdom_NN ._.
After_IN that_IN they_PRP rode_VBD on_RP together_RB ,_, and_CC chanced_VBN upon_IN a_DT land_NN where_WRB war_NN and_CC famine_NN reigned_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN already_RB thought_VBD he_PRP must_MD perish_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT scarcity_NN was_VBD so_RB great_JJ ._.
Then_RB the_DT prince_NN went_VBD to_IN him_PRP and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT loaf_NN ,_, wherewith_WRB he_PRP fed_VBD and_CC satisfied_VBD the_DT whole_NN of_IN his_PRP$ kingdom_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT prince_NN gave_VBD him_PRP the_DT sword_NN also_RB wherewith_WRB he_PRP slew_VBD the_DT hosts_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ enemies_NNS ,_, and_CC could_MD now_RB live_VB in_IN rest_NN and_CC peace_NN ._.
The_DT prince_NN then_RB took_VBD back_RP his_PRP$ loaf_NN and_CC his_PRP$ sword_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT three_CD brothers_NNS rode_VBD on_RP ._.
But_CC after_IN this_DT they_PRP entered_VBD two_CD more_JJR countries_NNS where_WRB war_NN and_CC famine_NN reigned_VBD and_CC each_DT time_NN the_DT prince_NN gave_VBD his_PRP$ loaf_NN and_CC his_PRP$ sword_NN to_IN the_DT kings_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD now_RB delivered_VBN three_CD kingdoms_NNS ,_, and_CC after_IN that_DT they_PRP went_VBD on_IN board_NN a_DT ship_NN and_CC sailed_VBD over_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT passage_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD eldest_JJS conversed_VBN apart_RB and_CC said_VBD ,_, The_DT youngest_JJS has_VBZ found_VBN the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC not_RB we_PRP ,_, for_IN that_IN our_PRP$ father_NN will_MD give_VB him_PRP the_DT kingdom_NN -_, the_DT kingdom_NN which_WDT belongs_VBZ to_IN us_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP will_MD rob_VB us_PRP of_IN all_PDT our_PRP$ fortune_NN ._.
They_PRP then_RB began_VBD to_TO seek_VB revenge_NN ,_, and_CC plotted_VBN with_IN each_DT other_JJ to_TO destroy_VB him_PRP ._.
They_PRP waited_VBD until_IN they_PRP found_VBD him_PRP fast_RB asleep_RB ,_, then_RB they_PRP poured_VBD the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT cup_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD it_PRP for_IN themselves_PRP ,_, but_CC into_IN the_DT cup_NN they_PRP poured_VBD salt_NN sea-water_NN ._.
Now_RB therefore_RB ,_, when_WRB they_PRP arrived_VBD home_RB ,_, the_DT youngest_JJS took_VBD his_PRP$ cup_NN to_IN the_DT sick_JJ king_NN in_IN order_NN that_IN he_PRP might_MD drink_VB out_IN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC be_VB cured_VBN ._.

And_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD lamenting_VBG over_IN this_DT ,_, the_DT two_CD eldest_JJS brothers_NNS came_VBD ,_, and_CC accused_VBD the_DT youngest_JJS of_IN having_VBG intended_VBN to_TO poison_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD that_IN they_PRP had_VBD brought_VBN him_PRP the_DT true_JJ water_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC handed_VBD it_PRP to_IN him_PRP ._.
He_PRP had_VBD scarcely_RB tasted_VBN it_PRP ,_, when_WRB he_PRP felt_VBD his_PRP$ sickness_NN departing_NN ,_, and_CC became_VBD strong_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT days_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ youth_NN ._.
After_IN that_IN they_PRP both_DT went_VBD to_IN the_DT youngest_JJS ,_, mocked_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, You_PRP certainly_RB found_VBD the_DT water_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, but_CC you_PRP have_VBP had_VBN the_DT pain_NN ,_, and_CC we_PRP the_DT gain_NN ,_, you_PRP should_MD have_VB been_VBN cleverer_JJR ,_, and_CC should_MD have_VB kept_VBN your_PRP$ eyes_NNS open_JJ ._.

So_RB he_PRP set_VBD out_RP and_CC thought_VBD of_IN her_PRP so_RB incessantly_RB ,_, and_CC wished_VBD to_TO be_VB with_IN her_PRP so_RB much_RB ,_, that_IN he_PRP never_RB noticed_VBD the_DT golden_JJ road_NN at_RB all_RB ._.

The_DT son_NN took_VBD his_PRP$ bread_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Just_RB you_PRP rest_VBP ,_, father_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP not_RB tired_JJ ,_, I_PRP will_MD walk_VB up_RB and_CC down_IN a_DT little_JJ in_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC look_VB for_IN birds_NNS nests_NNS ._.

He_PRP stood_VBD still_RB and_CC looked_VBD at_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, many_JJ a_DT bird_NN must_MD have_VB built_VBN its_PRP$ nest_NN in_IN that_DT ._.
Then_RB all_RB at_IN once_RB it_PRP seemed_VBD to_IN him_PRP that_IN he_PRP heard_VBD a_DT voice_NN ._.

Let_VB me_PRP out_RP ._.

Let_VB me_PRP out_RP ._.

No_UH ,_, it_PRP was_VBD a_DT punishment_NN for_IN me_PRP ._.

The_DT spirit_NN said_VBD haughtily_RB ,_, that_DT is_VBZ a_DT very_RB trifling_JJ feat_NN ._.

Scarcely_RB was_VBD he_PRP within_IN than_IN the_DT boy_NN thrust_VBD the_DT cork_NN he_PRP had_VBD drawn_VBN back_RB into_IN the_DT bottle_NN ,_, and_CC threw_VBD it_PRP among_IN the_DT roots_NNS of_IN the_DT oak_NN into_IN its_PRP$ old_JJ place_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT spirit_NN was_VBD deceived_VBN ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT young_JJ fellow_NN who_WP enlisted_VBD as_IN a_DT soldier_NN ,_, conducted_VBD himself_PRP bravely_RB ,_, and_CC was_VBD always_RB the_DT foremost_RB when_WRB it_PRP rained_VBD bullets_NNS ._.
So_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT war_NN lasted_VBD ,_, all_DT went_VBD well_RB ,_, but_CC when_WRB peace_NN was_VBD made_VBN ,_, he_PRP received_VBD his_PRP$ dismissal_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT captain_NN said_VBD he_PRP might_MD go_VB where_WRB he_PRP liked_VBD ._.

Once_RB in_IN summer-time_NN the_DT bear_NN and_CC the_DT wolf_NN were_VBD walking_VBG in_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bear_NN heard_VBD a_DT bird_NN singing_NN so_RB beautifully_RB that_IN he_PRP said_VBD ,_, Brother_NNP wolf_NN ,_, what_WP bird_NN is_VBZ it_PRP that_IN sings_VBZ so_RB well_RB ?_, That_WDT is_VBZ the_DT king_NN of_IN birds_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT wolf_NN ,_, before_IN whom_WP we_PRP must_MD bow_VB down_RB ._.
In_IN reality_NN the_DT bird_NN was_VBD the_DT willow-wren_NN ._.
If_IN thats_NNS the_DT case_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT bear_NN ,_, I_PRP should_MD very_RB much_RB like_VB to_TO see_VB his_PRP$ royal_JJ palace_NN ,_, come_VB ,_, take_VB me_PRP thither_RB ._.
That_DT is_VBZ not_RB done_VBN quite_RB as_IN you_PRP seem_VBP to_TO think_VB ,_, said_VBD the_DT wolf_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD wait_VB until_IN the_DT queen_NN comes_VBZ ._.

Thus_RB war_NN was_VBD announced_VBN to_IN the_DT bear_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT four-footed_JJ animals_NNS were_VBD summoned_VBN to_TO take_VB part_NN in_IN it_PRP ,_, oxen_NN ,_, asses_NNS ,_, cows_NNS ,_, deer_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT other_JJ animal_NN the_DT earth_NN contained_VBN ._.

Once_RB on_IN a_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT girl_NN had_VBD gone_VBN out_RP ,_, her_PRP$ mother_NN said_VBD ,_, cook_VB ,_, little_JJ pot_NN ,_, cook_NN ._.

If_IN you_PRP ca_MD nt_RB manage_VB it_PRP any_DT other_JJ way_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT peasant_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD do_VB you_PRP that_DT favor_VB ._.

Then_RB they_PRP laughed_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, Indeed_RB ,_, stupid_JJ Hans_NNP ,_, where_WRB will_MD you_PRP get_VB a_DT horse_NN ?_. It_PRP will_MD be_VB a_DT fine_JJ one_NN ._.
Hans_NNP went_VBD into_IN the_DT parlor_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT miller_NN said_VBD he_PRP should_MD not_RB sit_VB down_RP to_IN table_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP was_VBD so_RB ragged_JJ and_CC torn_JJ ,_, that_IN they_PRP would_MD all_DT be_VB ashamed_JJ of_IN him_PRP if_IN any_DT one_CD came_VBD in_RB ._.
So_CC they_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT mouthful_NN of_IN food_NN outside_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN night_NN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP went_VBD to_TO rest_NN ,_, the_DT two_CD others_NNS would_MD not_RB let_VB him_PRP have_VB a_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO creep_VB into_IN the_DT goose-house_NN ,_, and_CC lie_VB down_RB on_IN a_DT little_JJ hard_JJ straw_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT morning_NN when_WRB he_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, the_DT three_CD days_NNS had_VBD passed_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT coach_NN came_VBD with_IN six_CD horses_NNS and_CC they_PRP shone_VBD so_RB bright_JJ that_IN it_PRP was_VBD delightful_JJ to_TO see_VB them_PRP -_: and_CC a_DT servant_NN brought_VBD a_DT seventh_JJ as_RB well_RB ,_, which_WDT was_VBD for_IN the_DT poor_JJ millers_NNS boy_NN ._.
And_CC a_DT magnificent_JJ princess_NN alighted_VBN from_IN the_DT coach_NN and_CC went_VBD into_IN the_DT mill_NN ,_, and_CC this_DT princess_NN was_VBD the_DT little_JJ tabby-cat_NN whom_WP poor_JJ Hans_NNPS had_VBD served_VBN for_IN seven_CD years_NNS ._.
She_PRP asked_VBD the_DT miller_NN where_WRB the_DT millers_NNS boy_NN and_CC dunce_NN was_VBD ._.
Then_RB the_DT miller_NN said_VBD ,_, We_PRP can_MD not_RB have_VB him_PRP here_RB in_IN the_DT mill_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP is_VBZ so_RB ragged_JJ ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ lying_VBG in_IN the_DT goose-house_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN said_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO bring_VB him_PRP immediately_RB ._.

Then_RB the_DT maiden_NN desired_VBN to_TO see_VB the_DT horses_NNS which_WDT the_DT other_JJ apprentices_NNS had_VBD brought_VBN home_RB with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC one_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD blind_JJ and_CC the_DT other_JJ lame_NN ._.
So_RB she_PRP ordered_VBD the_DT servant_NN to_TO bring_VB the_DT seventh_JJ horse_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT miller_NN saw_VBD it_PRP ,_, he_PRP said_VBD that_IN such_PDT a_DT horse_NN as_IN that_WDT had_VBD never_RB yet_RB entered_VBN his_PRP$ yard_NN ._.
And_CC that_DT is_VBZ for_IN the_DT third_JJ millers_NNS boy_NN ,_, said_VBD she_PRP ._.

They_PRP first_RB drove_VBD to_IN the_DT little_JJ house_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD built_VBN with_IN the_DT silver_NN tools_NNS ,_, and_CC behold_VB it_PRP was_VBD a_DT great_JJ castle_NN ,_, and_CC everything_NN inside_IN it_PRP was_VBD of_IN silver_NN and_CC gold_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP married_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD rich_JJ ,_, so_RB rich_JJ that_IN he_PRP had_VBD enough_JJ for_IN all_PDT the_DT rest_NN of_IN his_PRP$ life_NN ._.
After_IN this_DT ,_, let_VBD no_DT one_NN ever_RB say_VB that_IN anyone_NN who_WP is_VBZ silly_JJ can_MD never_RB become_VB a_DT person_NN of_IN importance_NN ._.
Hill_NNP and_CC vale_NN do_VBP not_RB meet_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT children_NNS of_IN men_NNS do_VBP ,_, good_JJ and_CC bad_JJ ._.
In_IN this_DT way_NN a_DT shoemaker_NN and_CC a_DT tailor_NN once_RB met_VBD on_IN their_PRP$ travels_NNS ._.
The_DT tailor_NN was_VBD a_DT handsome_JJ little_JJ fellow_NN who_WP was_VBD always_RB merry_JJ and_CC full_JJ of_IN enjoyment_NN ._.
The_DT shoemaker_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, could_MD not_RB bear_VB a_DT joke_NN ,_, he_PRP pulled_VBD a_DT face_NN as_IN if_IN he_PRP had_VBD drunk_VBN vinegar_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT gesture_NN as_IN if_IN he_PRP were_VBD about_RB to_TO seize_VB the_DT tailor_NN by_IN the_DT throat_NN ._.

That_DT is_VBZ just_RB where_WRB I_PRP want_VBP to_TO go_VB ,_, answered_VBD the_DT shoemaker_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT small_JJ hamlet_NN there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN to_TO earn_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, people_NNS like_VBP to_TO go_VB barefoot_RB ._.
They_PRP traveled_VBD therefore_RB onwards_RB together_RB ,_, and_CC always_RB set_VB one_CD foot_NN before_IN the_DT other_JJ like_IN a_DT weasel_NN in_IN the_DT snow_NN ._.
Both_DT of_IN them_PRP had_VBD time_NN enough_RB ,_, but_CC little_JJ to_TO bite_VB and_CC to_TO break_VB ._.

When_WRB he_PRP again_RB fell_VBD in_RB with_IN the_DT shoemaker_NN ,_, the_DT tailor_NN had_VBD always_RB the_DT most_RBS in_IN his_PRP$ bundle_NN ._.
The_DT ill-tempered_VBN shoemaker_NN made_VBD a_DT wry_NN face_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, the_DT greater_JJR the_DT rascal_JJ the_DT more_JJR the_DT luck_NN ._.

Two_CD foot-paths_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, led_VBN through_IN it_PRP ,_, one_CD of_IN which_WDT was_VBD a_DT seven_CD days_NNS ,_, journey_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ only_RB two_CD ,_, but_CC neither_DT of_IN the_DT travelers_NNS knew_VBD which_WDT way_NN was_VBD the_DT short_JJ one_NN ._.
They_PRP seated_VBD themselves_PRP beneath_IN an_DT oak-tree_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD counsel_NN together_RB how_WRB they_PRP should_MD forecast_VB ,_, and_CC for_IN how_WRB many_JJ days_NNS they_PRP should_MD provide_VB themselves_PRP with_IN bread_NN ._.
The_DT shoemaker_NN said_VBD ,_, One_PRP must_MD look_VB before_IN one_CD leaps_NNS ,_, I_PRP will_MD take_VB with_IN me_PRP bread_NN for_IN a_DT week_NN ._.
What_WP ,_, said_VBD the_DT tailor_NN ,_, drag_NN bread_NN for_IN seven_CD days_NNS on_IN ones_NNS back_RB like_IN a_DT beast_NN of_IN burden_NN and_CC not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO look_VB about_IN ?_.
I_PRP shall_MD trust_VB in_IN God_NNP ,_, and_CC not_RB trouble_VB myself_PRP about_IN anything_NN ._.
