Besides_RB ,_, why_WRB should_MD we_PRP not_RB find_VB the_DT right_JJ way_NN ?_.
Bread_NNP for_IN two_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC thats_NNS enough_RB ._.
Each_DT ,_, therefore_RB ,_, bought_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ bread_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP tried_VBD their_PRP$ luck_NN in_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD as_RB quiet_JJ there_RB as_RB in_IN a_DT church_NN ._.
No_DT wind_NN stirred_VBD ,_, no_DT brook_NN murmured_VBN ,_, no_DT bird_NN sang_VBD ,_, and_CC through_IN the_DT thickly-leaved_JJ branches_NNS no_DT sunbeam_NN forced_VBD its_PRP$ way_NN ._.
The_DT shoemaker_NN spoke_VBD never_RB a_DT word_NN ,_, the_DT bread_NN weighed_VBD so_RB heavily_RB on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN that_IN the_DT sweat_NN streamed_VBD down_RP his_PRP$ cross_NN and_CC gloomy_JJ face_NN ._.
The_DT tailor_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD quite_RB merry_NN ,_, he_PRP jumped_VBD about_RB ,_, whistled_VBN on_IN a_DT leaf_NN ,_, or_CC sang_VBD a_DT song_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD to_IN himself_PRP ,_, God_NNP in_IN heaven_NN must_MD be_VB pleased_JJ to_TO see_VB me_PRP so_RB happy_JJ ._.
This_DT lasted_VBD two_CD days_NNS ,_, but_CC on_IN the_DT third_JJ the_DT forest_NN would_MD not_RB come_VB to_IN an_DT end_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT tailor_NN had_VBD eaten_VBN up_RP all_PDT his_PRP$ bread_NN ,_, so_IN after_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ heart_NN sank_VBD down_RP a_DT yard_NN deeper_RBR ._.
Nevertheless_RB ,_, he_PRP did_VBD not_RB lose_VB courage_NN ,_, but_CC relied_VBD on_IN God_NNP and_CC on_IN his_PRP$ luck_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN he_PRP lay_VBD down_RP hungry_JJ under_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC rose_VBD again_RB next_JJ morning_NN hungry_JJ still_RB ,_, so_RB also_RB passed_VBD the_DT fourth_JJ day_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT shoemaker_NN seated_VBD himself_PRP on_IN a_DT fallen_VBN tree_NN and_CC devoured_VBD his_PRP$ dinner_NN the_DT tailor_NN was_VBD only_RB a_DT spectator_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP begged_VBD for_IN a_DT little_JJ piece_NN of_IN bread_NN ,_, the_DT other_JJ laughed_VBD mockingly_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, You_PRP have_VBP always_RB been_VBN so_RB merry_JJ ,_, now_RB you_PRP can_MD see_VB for_IN once_RB what_WP it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB sad_JJ ,_, the_DT birds_NNS which_WDT sing_VBP too_RB early_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN are_VBP struck_VBN by_IN the_DT hawk_NN in_IN the_DT evening_NN ._.
In_IN short_JJ ,_, he_PRP was_VBD pitiless_JJ ._.
But_CC on_IN the_DT fifth_JJ morning_NN the_DT poor_JJ tailor_NN could_MD no_RB longer_RB stand_VB up_RP ,_, and_CC was_VBD hardly_RB able_JJ to_TO utter_VB one_CD word_NN for_IN weakness_NN ,_, his_PRP$ cheeks_NNS were_VBD white_JJ ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ eyes_NNS were_VBD red_JJ ._.
Then_RB the_DT shoemaker_NN said_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD give_VB you_PRP a_DT bit_NN of_IN bread_NN to-day_NNP ,_, but_CC in_IN return_NN for_IN it_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD put_VB out_RP your_PRP$ right_JJ eye_NN ._.
The_DT unhappy_JJ tailor_NN who_WP still_RB wished_VBD to_TO save_VB his_PRP$ life_NN ,_, had_VBD to_TO submit_VB ,_, he_PRP wept_VBD once_RB more_JJR with_IN both_DT eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB held_VBD them_PRP out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT shoemaker_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD a_DT heart_NN of_IN stone_NN ,_, put_VB out_RP his_PRP$ right_JJ eye_NN with_IN a_DT sharp_JJ knife_NN ._.
The_DT tailor_NN called_VBD to_TO remembrance_VB what_WP his_PRP$ mother_NN had_VBD formerly_RB said_VBN to_IN him_PRP when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN eating_VBG secretly_RB in_IN the_DT pantry_NN ._.

But_CC on_IN the_DT sixth_JJ day_NN ,_, hunger_NN made_VBD itself_PRP felt_VBN again_RB and_CC gnawed_VBD him_PRP almost_RB to_IN the_DT heart_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT evening_NN he_PRP fell_VBD down_RB by_IN a_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN the_DT seventh_JJ morning_NN he_PRP could_MD not_RB raise_VB himself_PRP up_RP for_IN faintness_NN ,_, and_CC death_NN was_VBD close_JJ at_IN hand_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT shoemaker_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD show_VB mercy_NN and_CC give_VB you_PRP bread_VBP once_RB more_JJR ,_, but_CC you_PRP shall_MD not_RB have_VB it_PRP for_IN nothing_NN ,_, I_PRP shall_MD put_VB out_RP your_PRP$ other_JJ eye_NN for_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC now_RB the_DT tailor_NN felt_VBD how_WRB thoughtless_JJ his_PRP$ life_NN had_VBD been_VBN ,_, prayed_VBN to_IN God_NNP for_IN forgiveness_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Do_VBP what_WP you_PRP will_MD ,_, I_PRP will_MD bear_VB what_WP I_PRP must_MD ,_, but_CC remember_VB that_IN our_PRP$ Lord_NNP God_NNP does_VBZ not_RB always_RB look_VB on_IN passively_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN an_DT hour_NN will_MD come_VB when_WRB the_DT evil_JJ deed_NN which_WDT you_PRP have_VBP done_VBN to_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP not_RB deserved_VBN of_IN you_PRP ,_, will_MD be_VB requited_VBN ._.
When_WRB times_NNS were_VBD good_JJ with_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP shared_VBD what_WP I_PRP had_VBD with_IN you_PRP ._.
My_PRP$ trade_NN is_VBZ of_IN that_DT kind_NN that_IN each_DT stitch_NN must_MD always_RB be_VB exactly_RB like_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
If_IN I_PRP no_RB longer_RBR have_VBP my_PRP$ eyes_NNS and_CC can_MD sew_VB no_DT more_RBR I_PRP must_MD go_VB a-begging_JJ ._.
At_IN any_DT rate_NN do_VBP not_RB leave_VB me_PRP here_RB alone_RB when_WRB I_PRP am_VBP blind_JJ ,_, or_CC I_PRP shall_MD die_VB of_IN hunger_NN ._.
The_DT shoemaker_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, who_WP had_VBD driven_VBN God_NNP out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, took_VBD the_DT knife_NN and_CC put_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ left_JJ eye_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT bit_NN of_IN bread_NN to_TO eat_VB ,_, held_VBN out_RP a_DT stick_NN to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC drew_VBD him_PRP on_RP behind_IN him_PRP ._.
When_WRB the_DT sun_NN went_VBD down_RB ,_, they_PRP got_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC before_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN stood_VBD the_DT gallows_NNS ._.
Thither_RB the_DT shoemaker_NN guided_VBD the_DT blind_NN tailor_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB left_VBD him_PRP alone_RB and_CC went_VBD his_PRP$ way_NN ._.
Weariness_NN ,_, pain_NN ,_, and_CC hunger_NN made_VBD the_DT wretched_JJ man_NN fall_VB asleep_JJ ,_, and_CC he_PRP slept_VBD the_DT whole_JJ night_NN ._.
When_WRB day_NN dawned_VBD he_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, but_CC knew_VBD not_RB where_WRB he_PRP lay_VBD ._.

Then_RB one_CD of_IN the_DT men_NNS who_WP had_VBD been_VBN hanged_VBN began_VBD to_TO speak_VB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Brother_NNP ,_, are_VBP you_PRP awake_JJ ?_. Yes_UH ,_, I_PRP am_VBP awake_JJ ,_, answered_VBD the_DT second_JJ ._.
Then_RB I_PRP will_MD tell_VB you_PRP something_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT first_JJ ,_, the_DT dew_NN which_WDT this_DT night_NN has_VBZ fallen_VBN down_RP over_IN us_PRP from_IN the_DT gallows_NNS ,_, gives_VBZ every_DT one_NN who_WP washes_VBZ himself_PRP with_IN it_PRP his_PRP$ eyes_NNS again_RB ._.
If_IN blind_JJ people_NNS did_VBD but_CC know_VB this_DT ,_, how_WRB many_JJ would_MD regain_VB their_PRP$ sight_NN who_WP do_VBP not_RB believe_VB that_IN to_TO be_VB possible_JJ ._.
When_WRB the_DT tailor_NN heard_VBD that_IN ,_, he_PRP took_VBD his_PRP$ pocket-handkerchief_NN ,_, pressed_VBD it_PRP on_IN the_DT grass_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD moist_JJ with_IN dew_NN ,_, washed_VBD the_DT sockets_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS with_IN it_PRP ._.
Immediately_RB was_VBD fulfilled_VBN what_WP the_DT man_NN on_IN the_DT gallows_NNS had_VBD said_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT couple_NN of_IN healthy_JJ new_JJ eyes_NNS filled_VBD the_DT sockets_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB long_JJ before_IN the_DT tailor_NN saw_VBD the_DT sun_NN rise_VB behind_IN the_DT mountains_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT plain_NN before_IN him_PRP lay_VBD the_DT great_JJ royal_JJ city_NN with_IN its_PRP$ magnificent_JJ gates_NNS and_CC hundred_CD towers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT golden_JJ balls_NNS and_CC crosses_NNS which_WDT were_VBD on_IN the_DT spires_NNS began_VBD to_TO shine_VB ._.
He_PRP could_MD distinguish_VB every_DT leaf_NN on_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, saw_VBD the_DT birds_NNS which_WDT flew_VBD past_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT midges_NNS which_WDT danced_VBD in_IN the_DT air_NN ._.
He_PRP took_VBD a_DT needle_NN out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP could_MD thread_VB it_PRP as_RB well_RB as_IN ever_RB he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN ,_, his_PRP$ heart_NN danced_VBD with_IN delight_NN ._.
He_PRP threw_VBD himself_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ knees_NNS ,_, thanked_VBD God_NNP for_IN the_DT mercy_NN he_PRP had_VBD shown_VBN him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD his_PRP$ morning_NN prayer_NN ._.
Nor_CC did_VBD he_PRP forget_VB to_TO pray_VB for_IN the_DT poor_JJ sinners_NNS who_WP were_VBD hanging_VBG there_RB swinging_VBG against_IN each_DT other_JJ in_IN the_DT wind_NN like_IN the_DT pendulums_NNS of_IN clocks_NNS ._.
Then_RB he_PRP took_VBD his_PRP$ bundle_NN on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN and_CC soon_RB forgot_VBD the_DT pain_NN of_IN heart_NN he_PRP had_VBD endured_VBN ,_, and_CC went_VBD on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN singing_NN and_CC whistling_VBG ._.
The_DT first_JJ thing_NN he_PRP met_VBD was_VBD a_DT brown_JJ foal_NN running_VBG about_IN the_DT fields_NNS at_IN large_JJ ._.
He_PRP caught_VBD it_PRP by_IN the_DT mane_NN ,_, and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO spring_VB on_IN it_PRP and_CC ride_VB into_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT foal_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, begged_VBN to_TO be_VB set_VBN free_JJ ._.
I_PRP am_VBP still_RB too_RB young_JJ ,_, it_PRP said_VBD ,_, even_RB a_DT light_JJ tailor_NN such_JJ as_IN you_PRP are_VBP would_MD break_VB my_PRP$ back_NN in_IN two_CD -_, let_VB me_PRP go_VB till_IN I_PRP have_VBP grown_VBN strong_JJ ._.
A_DT time_NN may_MD perhaps_RB come_VB when_WRB I_PRP may_MD reward_VB you_PRP for_IN it_PRP ._.
Run_NNP off_RP ,_, said_VBD the_DT tailor_NN ,_, I_PRP see_VBP you_PRP are_VBP still_RB a_DT giddy_JJ thing_NN ._.
He_PRP gave_VBD it_PRP a_DT touch_NN with_IN a_DT switch_NN over_IN its_PRP$ back_NN ,_, whereupon_WRB it_PRP kicked_VBD up_RP its_PRP$ hind_JJ legs_NNS for_IN joy_NN ,_, leapt_VBN over_IN hedges_NNS and_CC ditches_NNS ,_, and_CC galloped_VBD away_RB into_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT little_JJ tailor_NN had_VBD eaten_VBN nothing_NN since_IN the_DT day_NN before_RB ._.

When_WRB the_DT evening_NN came_VBD and_CC they_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO go_VB to_IN sleep_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD afraid_JJ of_IN his_PRP$ quills_NNS ,_, but_CC he_PRP told_VBD her_PRP she_PRP was_VBD not_RB to_TO fear_VB ,_, for_IN no_DT harm_NN would_MD befall_VB her_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP told_VBD the_DT old_JJ king_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO appoint_VB four_CD men_NNS to_TO watch_VB by_IN the_DT door_NN of_IN the_DT chamber_NN ,_, and_CC light_VB a_DT great_JJ fire_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP entered_VBD the_DT room_NN and_CC was_VBD about_JJ to_TO get_VB into_IN bed_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD creep_VB out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ hedgehogs_NNS skin_NN and_CC leave_VB it_PRP lying_VBG there_RB by_IN the_DT bedside_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT men_NNS were_VBD to_TO run_VB nimbly_RB to_IN it_PRP ,_, throw_VB it_PRP in_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC stay_VB by_IN it_PRP until_IN it_PRP was_VBD consumed_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT clock_NN struck_VBD eleven_CD ,_, he_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT chamber_NN ,_, stripped_VBN off_RP the_DT hedgehogs_NNS skin_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD it_PRP lying_VBG by_IN the_DT bed_NN ._.
Then_RB came_VBD the_DT men_NNS and_CC fetched_VBD it_PRP swiftly_RB ,_, and_CC threw_VBD it_PRP in_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT fire_NN had_VBD consumed_VBN it_PRP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD saved_VBN ,_, and_CC lay_VB there_RB in_IN bed_NN in_IN human_JJ form_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP was_VBD coal-black_JJ as_IN if_IN he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN burnt_VBN ._.
The_DT king_NN sent_VBD for_IN his_PRP$ physician_NN who_WP washed_VBD him_PRP with_IN precious_JJ salves_NNS ,_, and_CC anointed_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP became_VBD white_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD a_DT handsome_JJ young_JJ man_NN ._.

When_WRB several_JJ years_NNS had_VBD passed_VBN he_PRP went_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN to_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ son_NN ._.
The_DT father_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, declared_VBD he_PRP had_VBD no_DT son_NN -_, he_PRP had_VBD never_RB had_VBN but_IN one_CD ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN born_VBN like_IN a_DT hedgehog_NN with_IN spikes_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD gone_VBN forth_RB into_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT mother_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT little_JJ boy_NN of_IN seven_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, who_WP was_VBD so_RB handsome_JJ and_CC lovable_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN could_MD look_VB at_IN him_PRP without_IN liking_VBG him_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP herself_PRP worshipped_VBD him_PRP above_IN everything_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
Now_RB it_PRP so_RB happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP suddenly_RB became_VBD ill_JJ ,_, and_CC God_NNP took_VBD him_PRP to_IN himself_PRP ,_, and_CC for_IN this_DT the_DT mother_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB comforted_VBN and_CC wept_VBN both_DT day_NN and_CC night_NN ._.

The_DT mother_NN was_VBD afraid_JJ when_WRB she_PRP heard_VBD that_IN ,_, and_CC wept_VBD no_DT more_JJR ._.

Then_RB there_EX met_VBD him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ rambles_NNS a_DT huntsman_NN dressed_VBN in_IN green_NN ,_, who_WP asked_VBD whence_NN he_PRP came_VBD and_CC whither_RB he_PRP was_VBD going_VBG ._.

After_IN this_DT he_PRP wished_VBD to_TO try_VB his_PRP$ luck_NN elsewhere_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT huntsman_NN gave_VBD him_PRP nothing_NN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN payment_NN but_CC an_DT air-gun_NN ,_, which_WDT had_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, this_DT property_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP hit_VBD its_PRP$ mark_NN without_IN fail_VB whenever_WRB he_PRP shot_VBD with_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP set_VBD out_RP and_CC found_VBD himself_PRP in_IN a_DT very_RB large_JJ forest_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP could_MD not_RB get_VB to_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN in_IN one_CD day_NN ._.
When_WRB evening_NN came_VBD he_PRP seated_VBD himself_PRP in_IN a_DT high_JJ tree_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO escape_VB from_IN the_DT wild_JJ beasts_NNS ._.
Towards_IN midnight_NN ,_, it_PRP seemed_VBD to_IN him_PRP as_IN if_IN a_DT tiny_JJ little_JJ light_NN glimmered_VBN in_IN the_DT distance_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP looked_VBD down_RP through_IN the_DT branches_NNS towards_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC kept_VBD well_RB in_IN his_PRP$ mind_NN where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ._.

He_PRP got_VBD down_RB and_CC went_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ hat_NN ,_, put_VB it_PRP on_RP again_RB and_CC went_VBD straight_RB forwards_NNS ._.

But_CC when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD just_RB about_IN to_TO bite_VB into_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT huntsman_NN again_RB shot_VBD it_PRP away_RB from_IN him_PRP ._.
On_IN this_DT the_DT giant_NN gave_VBD the_DT one_NN who_WP was_VBD sitting_VBG next_IN him_PRP a_DT box_NN on_IN the_DT ear_NN ,_, and_CC cried_VBD angrily_RB ,_, Why_WRB are_VBP you_PRP snatching_VBG my_PRP$ piece_NN away_RB from_IN me_PRP ?_. I_PRP have_VBP not_RB snatched_VBN it_PRP away_RB ,_, said_VBD the_DT other_JJ ,_, a_DT sharpshooter_NN must_MD have_VB shot_VBN it_PRP away_RB from_IN you_PRP ._.
The_DT giant_NN took_VBD another_DT piece_NN ,_, but_CC again_RB could_MD not_RB keep_VB it_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT huntsman_NN shot_VBD it_PRP out_RP ._.
Then_RB the_DT giant_NN said_VBD ,_, That_DT must_MD be_VB a_DT good_JJ shot_NN to_TO shoot_VB the_DT bit_NN out_IN of_IN ones_NNS very_RB mouth_NN ,_, such_PDT an_DT one_NN would_MD be_VB useful_JJ to_IN us_PRP ._.

On_IN this_DT the_DT youth_NN went_VBD up_RB to_IN them_PRP and_CC told_VBD them_PRP he_PRP was_VBD a_DT skilled_JJ huntsman_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN whatever_WP he_PRP aimed_VBD at_IN with_IN his_PRP$ gun_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD certain_JJ to_TO hit_VB ._.

Now_RB the_DT maiden_NN still_RB lay_VBD sleeping_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD quite_RB sewn_JJ into_IN her_PRP$ night-dress_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP cut_VBD a_DT morsel_NN from_IN this_DT also_RB ,_, and_CC thrust_VBD it_PRP in_RP with_IN the_DT rest_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD all_DT without_IN touching_VBG her_PRP ._.

But_CC when_WRB the_DT king_NN in_IN the_DT castle_NN awoke_NN ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD the_DT three_CD giants_NNS lying_VBG there_RB dead_JJ ._.

Then_RB said_VBD she_PRP ,_, Dear_JJ father_NN ,_, I_PRP know_VBP not_RB ,_, I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN asleep_JJ ._.

The_DT king_NN summoned_VBD his_PRP$ whole_JJ court_NN together_RB ,_, soldiers_NNS and_CC every_DT one_CD else_RB who_WP was_VBD there_RB ,_, and_CC asked_VBD who_WP had_VBD set_VBN his_PRP$ daughter_NN at_IN liberty_NN ,_, and_CC killed_VBD the_DT giants_NNS ._.
Now_RB it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD a_DT captain_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD one-eyed_VBN and_CC a_DT hideous_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP said_VBD that_IN he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT old_JJ king_NN said_VBD that_IN as_IN he_PRP had_VBD accomplished_VBN this_DT ,_, he_PRP should_MD marry_VB his_PRP$ daughter_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT maiden_NN said_VBD ,_, Rather_NNP than_IN marry_VB him_PRP ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB away_RB into_IN the_DT world_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN my_PRP$ legs_NNS can_MD carry_VB me_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT king_NN said_VBD that_IN if_IN she_PRP would_MD not_RB marry_VB him_PRP she_PRP should_MD take_VB off_RP her_PRP$ royal_JJ garments_NNS and_CC wear_VB peasants_NNS clothing_NN ,_, and_CC go_VB forth_RB ,_, and_CC that_IN she_PRP should_MD go_VB to_IN a_DT potter_NN ,_, and_CC begin_VB a_DT trade_NN in_IN earthen_JJ vessels_NNS ._.
So_RB she_PRP put_VBD off_RP her_PRP$ royal_JJ apparel_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_IN a_DT potter_NN and_CC borrowed_VBN crockery_NN enough_RB for_IN a_DT stall_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP promised_VBD him_PRP also_RB that_IN if_IN she_PRP had_VBD sold_VBN it_PRP by_IN the_DT evening_NN ,_, she_PRP would_MD pay_VB for_IN it_PRP ._.

Oh_UH ,_, said_VBD she_PRP ,_, you_PRP must_MD just_RB come_VB and_CC eat_VB something_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP will_MD be_VB in_IN another_DT frame_NN of_IN mind_NN ._.
No_UH ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB eat_VB ,_, I_PRP am_VBP far_RB too_RB unhappy_JJ for_IN that_DT ._.
Then_RB she_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP many_JJ good_JJ words_NNS until_IN at_IN last_JJ he_PRP came_VBD and_CC ate_VBN something_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP loused_VBD him_PRP again_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP fell_VBD asleep_JJ ,_, so_RB once_RB more_RBR she_PRP took_VBD her_PRP$ handkerchief_NN ,_, tied_VBD a_DT knot_NN in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC struck_VBD the_DT ground_NN thrice_NN with_IN the_DT knot_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Earth-workers_NNP ,_, come_VB forth_RB ._.
In_IN a_DT moment_NN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ little_JJ earth-men_NNS came_VBD and_CC asked_VBD what_WP she_PRP desired_VBD ,_, and_CC she_PRP told_VBD them_PRP that_IN in_IN three_CD hours_NNS ,_, time_NN ,_, they_PRP must_MD have_VB the_DT fish-pond_NNP entirely_RB cleaned_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC it_PRP must_MD be_VB so_RB clear_JJ that_IN people_NNS could_MD see_VB themselves_PRP reflected_VBN in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC every_DT kind_NN of_IN fish_NNS must_MD be_VB in_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT little_JJ earth-men_NNS went_VBD away_RB and_CC summoned_VBD all_PDT their_PRP$ kindred_VBN to_TO help_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC in_IN two_CD hours_NNS it_PRP was_VBD done_VBN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP returned_VBD to_IN her_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, We_PRP have_VBP done_VBN as_IN you_PRP have_VBP commanded_VBN ._.
The_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN took_VBD the_DT handkerchief_NN and_CC once_RB more_JJR struck_VBN thrice_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, earth-workers_NNS ,_, go_VB home_RB again_RB ._.
Then_RB they_PRP all_DT went_VBD away_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT kings_NNS son_NN awoke_VBD the_DT fish-pond_NN was_VBD done_VBN ._.

When_WRB he_PRP arrived_VBD at_IN the_DT house_NN the_DT king_NN asked_VBD ,_, Have_VBP you_PRP got_VBD the_DT fish-pond_NN done_VBN ?_. Yes_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ._.
That_DT was_VBD very_RB good_JJ ._.
When_WRB they_PRP were_VBD again_RB sitting_VBG at_IN table_NN the_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, You_PRP have_VBP certainly_RB done_VBN the_DT fish-pond_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB give_VB you_PRP my_PRP$ daughter_NN yet_RB ,_, you_PRP must_MD just_RB do_VB one_CD thing_NN more_JJR ._.
What_WP is_VBZ that_DT ,_, then_RB ?_. asked_VBD the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD he_PRP had_VBD a_DT great_JJ mountain_NN on_IN which_WDT there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN but_IN briars_NNS which_WDT must_MD all_DT be_VB cut_VBN down_RP ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN it_PRP the_DT youth_NN must_MD build_VB a_DT great_JJ castle_NN ,_, which_WDT must_MD be_VB as_RB strong_JJ as_IN could_MD be_VB conceived_VBN ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT furniture_NN and_CC fittings_NNS belonging_VBG to_IN a_DT castle_NN must_MD be_VB inside_IN it_PRP ._.
And_CC when_WRB he_PRP arose_VBD next_JJ morning_NN the_DT king_NN gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT glass_NN axe_NN and_CC a_DT glass_NN gimlet_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD to_TO have_VB all_DT done_VBN by_IN six_CD oclock_NN ._.

When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD mid-day_: she_PRP came_VBD and_CC brought_VBD him_PRP something_NN to_TO eat_VB ._.

She_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO catch_VB the_DT fish_NN ,_, but_CC she_PRP could_MD not_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP was_VBD very_RB angry_JJ ,_, and_CC drank_VB up_RP the_DT whole_JJ pond_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO catch_VB the_DT fish_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP made_VBD her_PRP so_RB ill_JJ that_IN she_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO vomit_VB ,_, and_CC vomited_VBD the_DT whole_JJ pond_NN out_RP again_RB ._.

Then_RB they_PRP harnessed_VBD the_DT horses_NNS at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC many_JJ attendants_NNS seated_VBD themselves_PRP outside_IN the_DT carriage_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN took_VBD service_NN in_IN the_DT mill_NN which_WDT belonged_VBD to_IN the_DT castle_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD obliged_VBN to_TO sit_VB by_IN the_DT pond_NN every_DT afternoon_NN and_CC clean_VB the_DT tubs_NNS ._.

She_PRP pleases_VBZ me_PRP well_RB ._.

So_RB a_DT long_JJ time_NN passed_VBN by_RP during_IN which_WDT the_DT maiden_NN served_VBD the_DT miller_NN honorably_RB and_CC faithfully_RB ._.

When_WRB the_DT bride_NN came_VBD ,_, they_PRP were_VBD at_RB once_RB to_TO be_VB married_VBN ._.

So_RB the_DT miller_NN said_VBD ,_, Yes_UH ,_, do_VBP go_VB there_RB ._.

So_CC they_PRP went_VBD back_RB to_IN the_DT house_NN again_RB ,_, and_CC sent_VBN to_TO ask_VB the_DT lady_NN if_IN she_PRP would_MD sell_VB that_DT dress_NN ._.
No_UH ,_, she_PRP would_MD not_RB sell_VB it_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT bride_NN might_MD perhaps_RB earn_VB it_PRP ._.

The_DT kings_NNS son_NN did_VBD not_RB hear_VB one_CD word_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT servants_NNS had_VBD been_VBN awakened_VBN ,_, and_CC had_VBD listened_VBN to_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC had_VBD not_RB known_VBN what_WP it_PRP could_MD mean_VB ._.

And_CC the_DT maiden_NN again_RB lay_VBD all_DT night_NN on_IN the_DT threshold_NN which_WDT led_VBD to_IN the_DT chamber_NN of_IN the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT servant_NN was_VBD once_RB more_JJR to_TO give_VB him_PRP a_DT sleeping_NN draught_NN ._.
The_DT servant_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, went_VBD to_IN him_PRP and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP something_NN to_TO keep_VB him_PRP awake_JJ ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT kings_NNS son_NN went_VBD to_IN bed_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT millers_NNS maiden_NN bemoaned_VBD herself_PRP as_IN before_RB on_IN the_DT threshold_NN of_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD of_IN all_DT that_IN she_PRP had_VBD done_VBN ._.
All_PDT this_DT the_DT kings_NNS son_NN heard_VBN ,_, and_CC was_VBD sore_JJ troubled_VBN ,_, and_CC what_WP was_VBD past_NN came_VBD back_RB to_IN him_PRP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO go_VB to_IN her_PRP ,_, but_CC his_PRP$ mother_NN had_VBD locked_VBN the_DT door_NN ._.
The_DT next_JJ morning_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, he_PRP went_VBD at_IN once_RB to_IN his_PRP$ beloved_JJ ,_, and_CC told_VBD her_PRP$ everything_NN which_WDT had_VBD happened_VBN to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC prayed_VBD her_PRP$ not_RB to_TO be_VB angry_JJ with_IN him_PRP for_IN having_VBG forgotten_VBN her_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN opened_VBD the_DT third_JJ walnut_NN ,_, and_CC within_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT still_RB more_RBR magnificent_JJ dress_NN ,_, which_WDT she_PRP put_VBD on_RP ,_, and_CC went_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ bridegroom_NN to_IN church_NN ,_, and_CC numbers_NNS of_IN children_NNS came_VBD who_WP gave_VBD them_PRP flowers_NNS ,_, and_CC offered_VBD them_PRP gay_JJ ribbons_NNS to_TO bind_VB about_IN their_PRP$ feet_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD blessed_VBN by_IN the_DT priest_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD a_DT merry_JJ wedding_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT false_JJ mother_NN and_CC the_DT bride_NN had_VBD to_TO depart_VB ._.
And_CC the_DT mouth_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN who_WP last_RB told_VBD all_PDT this_DT is_VBZ still_RB warm_JJ ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT princess_NN who_WP was_VBD extremely_RB proud_JJ ._.

The_DT soldier_NN spent_VBD the_DT whole_JJ day_NN in_IN doing_VBG it_PRP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT evening_NN the_DT witch_NN proposed_VBD that_IN he_PRP should_MD stay_VB one_CD night_NN more_JJR ._.

Next_JJ day_NN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN took_VBD him_PRP to_IN the_DT well_RB ,_, and_CC let_VB him_PRP down_RP in_IN a_DT basket_NN ._.
He_PRP found_VBD the_DT blue_JJ light_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD her_PRP a_DT signal_NN to_TO draw_VB him_PRP up_RP again_RB ._.

The_DT witch_NN fell_VBD into_IN a_DT passion_NN ,_, let_VB him_PRP fall_VB again_RB into_IN the_DT well_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD away_RB ._.
The_DT poor_JJ soldier_NN fell_VBD without_IN injury_NN on_IN the_DT moist_JJ ground_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT blue_JJ light_NN went_VBD on_IN burning_VBG ,_, but_CC of_IN what_WP use_NN was_VBD that_DT to_IN him_PRP ._.

Next_JJ day_NN the_DT soldier_NN was_VBD tried_VBN ,_, and_CC though_IN he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN nothing_NN wicked_JJ ,_, the_DT judge_NN condemned_VBD him_PRP to_IN death_NN ._.

The_DT king_NN was_VBD terrified_VBN ,_, he_PRP threw_VBD himself_PRP on_IN the_DT soldiers_NNS mercy_NN ,_, and_CC merely_RB to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO live_VB at_RB all_RB ,_, gave_VBD him_PRP his_PRP$ kingdom_NN for_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN wife_NN ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT child_NN who_WP was_VBD willful_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD not_RB do_VB what_WP her_PRP$ mother_NN wished_VBD ._.
For_IN this_DT reason_NN God_NNP had_VBD no_DT pleasure_NN in_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC let_VB her_PRP become_VB ill_JJ ,_, and_CC no_DT doctor_NN could_MD do_VB her_PRP any_DT good_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN she_PRP lay_VBD on_IN her_PRP$ death-bed_VBN ._.
When_WRB she_PRP had_VBD been_VBN lowered_VBN into_IN her_PRP$ grave_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT earth_NN was_VBD spread_VBN over_IN her_PRP ,_, all_DT at_IN once_RB her_PRP$ arm_NN came_VBD out_RP again_RB ,_, and_CC stretched_VBD upwards_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP had_VBD put_VBN it_PRP in_IN and_CC spread_VB fresh_JJ earth_NN over_IN it_PRP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD all_DT to_IN no_DT purpose_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT arm_NN always_RB came_VBD out_RP again_RB ._.

It_PRP came_VBD to_TO pass_VB that_IN he_PRP arrived_VBD at_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN a_DT giant_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD so_RB tired_JJ he_PRP sat_VBD down_RP by_IN the_DT door_NN and_CC rested_VBD ._.
And_CC as_IN he_PRP let_VBD his_PRP$ eyes_NNS roam_NN here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, he_PRP saw_VBD the_DT giants_NNS playthings_NNS lying_VBG in_IN the_DT yard_NN ._.
These_DT were_VBD a_DT couple_NN of_IN enormous_JJ balls_NNS ,_, and_CC nine-pins_NNS as_RB tall_JJ as_IN a_DT man_NN ._.

The_DT giant_NN heard_VBD the_DT noise_NN ,_, stretched_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT window_NN ,_, and_CC saw_VBD a_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD not_RB taller_JJR than_IN other_JJ men_NNS ,_, and_CC yet_CC played_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ nine-pins_NNS ._.
Little_JJ worm_NN ,_, cried_VBD he_PRP ,_, why_WRB are_VBP you_PRP playing_VBG with_IN my_PRP$ balls_NNS ?_.
Who_WP gave_VBD you_PRP strength_NN to_TO do_VB it_PRP ?_. The_DT kings_NNS son_NN looked_VBD up_RP ,_, saw_VBD the_DT giant_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Oh_UH ,_, you_PRP blockhead_VBP ,_, you_PRP think_VBP indeed_RB that_IN you_PRP only_RB have_VBP strong_JJ arms_NNS ,_, I_PRP can_MD do_VB everything_NN I_PRP want_VBP to_TO do_VB ._.
The_DT giant_NN came_VBD down_RB and_CC watched_VBD the_DT bowling_NN with_IN great_JJ admiration_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Child_NN of_IN man_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP are_VBP one_CD of_IN that_DT kind_NN ,_, go_VB and_CC bring_VB me_PRP an_DT apple_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN of_IN life_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP traveled_VBN far_RB about_IN the_DT world_NN and_CC can_MD not_RB find_VB the_DT tree_NN ._.
I_PRP will_MD soon_RB find_VB it_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB what_WP is_VBZ to_TO prevent_VB me_PRP from_IN getting_VBG the_DT apple_NN down_RP ._.
The_DT giant_NN said_VBD ,_, You_PRP really_RB believe_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB so_RB easy_JJ ._.
The_DT garden_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT tree_NN stands_VBZ is_VBZ surrounded_VBN by_IN an_DT iron_NN railing_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT railing_NN lie_VBP wild_JJ beasts_NNS ,_, each_DT close_JJ to_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP keep_VBP watch_VBP and_CC let_VB no_DT man_NN go_VB in_RB ._.
They_PRP will_MD be_VB sure_JJ to_TO let_VB me_PRP in_RP ,_, said_VBD the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ._.
Yes_UH ,_, but_CC even_RB if_IN you_PRP do_VBP get_VB into_IN the_DT garden_NN ,_, and_CC see_VB the_DT apple_NN hanging_VBG to_IN the_DT tree_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ still_RB not_RB yours_PRP ._.
A_DT ring_NN hangs_NNS in_IN front_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, through_IN which_WDT any_DT one_NN who_WP wants_VBZ to_TO reach_VB the_DT apple_NN and_CC break_VB it_PRP off_RP ,_, must_MD put_VB his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC no_DT one_NN has_VBZ yet_RB had_VBN the_DT luck_NN to_TO do_VB it_PRP ._.
That_DT luck_NN will_MD be_VB mine_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP took_VBD leave_NN of_IN the_DT giant_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD forth_RB over_IN mountain_NN and_CC valley_NN ,_, and_CC through_IN plains_NNS and_CC forests_NNS ,_, until_IN at_IN length_NN he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT wondrous_JJ garden_NN ._.
The_DT beasts_NNS lay_VBP round_RB about_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC they_PRP had_VBD put_VBN their_PRP$ heads_NNS down_RP and_CC were_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, they_PRP did_VBD not_RB awake_JJ when_WRB he_PRP went_VBD up_RP to_IN them_PRP ,_, so_IN he_PRP stepped_VBD over_IN them_PRP ,_, climbed_VBD the_DT fence_NN ,_, and_CC got_VBD safely_RB into_IN the_DT garden_NN ._.
There_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT very_JJ middle_JJ of_IN it_PRP ,_, stood_VBD the_DT tree_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT red_JJ apples_NNS were_VBD shining_VBG upon_IN the_DT branches_NNS ._.

He_PRP gathered_VBD together_RB a_DT heap_NN of_IN gold_NN ,_, but_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP thought_VBD ,_, Of_IN what_WDT use_NN is_VBZ all_PDT my_PRP$ gold_NN to_IN me_PRP if_IN I_PRP stay_VBP at_IN home_NN ?_.
I_PRP will_MD go_VB forth_RB and_CC see_VB the_DT world_NN ._.

The_DT beautiful_JJ girl_NN fell_VBD on_IN her_PRP$ knees_NNS before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Ah_NNP ,_, my_PRP$ beloved_JJ ,_, forgive_VB me_PRP for_IN the_DT evil_NN I_PRP have_VBP done_VBN you_PRP ,_, my_PRP$ mother_NN drove_VBD me_PRP to_IN it_PRP ._.

Your_PRP$ wishing-cloak_NN hangs_NNS in_IN a_DT cupboard_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN for_IN the_DT birds-heart_NN I_PRP will_MD take_VB a_DT vomiting_VBG potion_NN ._.
But_CC he_PRP thought_VBD otherwise_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Keep_VB it_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ all_PDT the_DT same_JJ ,_, for_IN I_PRP will_MD take_VB you_PRP for_IN my_PRP$ true_JJ wife_NN ._.
So_RB the_DT wedding_NN was_VBD celebrated_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP lived_VBD happily_RB together_RB until_IN their_PRP$ death_NN ._.
A_DT poor_JJ servant-girl_NN was_VBD once_RB traveling_VBG with_IN the_DT family_NN with_IN which_WDT she_PRP was_VBD in_IN service_NN ,_, through_IN a_DT great_JJ forest_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, robbers_NNS came_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT thicket_NN ,_, and_CC murdered_VBD all_DT they_PRP found_VBD ._.
All_DT perished_VBD together_RB except_IN the_DT girl_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD jumped_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT carriage_NN in_IN a_DT fright_NN ,_, and_CC hidden_VBD herself_PRP behind_IN a_DT tree_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT robbers_NNS had_VBD gone_VBN away_RB with_IN their_PRP$ booty_NN ,_, she_PRP came_VBD out_RP and_CC beheld_VB the_DT great_JJ disaster_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP began_VBD to_TO weep_VB bitterly_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, What_WP can_MD a_DT poor_JJ girl_NN like_IN me_PRP do_VB now_RB ?_.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO get_VB out_IN of_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, no_DT human_NN being_VBG lives_NNS in_IN it_PRP ,_, so_CC I_PRP must_MD certainly_RB starve_VB ._.

The_DT sons_NNS were_VBD well_RB content_JJ with_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC the_DT eldest_JJS determined_JJ to_TO be_VB a_DT blacksmith_NN ,_, the_DT second_JJ a_DT barber_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT third_JJ a_DT fencing-master_NN ._.

One_CD of_IN them_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT others_NNS ,_, If_IN we_PRP are_VBP caught_VBN we_PRP shall_MD be_VB hanged_VBN on_IN the_DT gallows_NNS ,_, how_WRB shall_MD we_PRP manage_VB it_PRP ?_. Another_DT said_VBD ,_, Look_VB at_IN that_DT great_JJ cornfield_NN ,_, if_IN we_PRP were_VBD to_TO hide_VB ourselves_PRP there_RB ,_, no_DT one_NN could_MD find_VB us_PRP ,_, the_DT troops_NNS are_VBP not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC to-morrow_VB they_PRP are_VBP to_TO march_VB away_RB ._.

Then_RB the_DT dragon_NN flew_VBD away_RB from_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC they_PRP went_VBD away_RB with_IN their_PRP$ whip_NN ,_, had_VBD gold_NN in_IN plenty_NN ,_, ordered_VBD themselves_PRP rich_JJ apparel_NN ,_, and_CC traveled_VBD about_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
Wherever_WRB they_PRP were_VBD they_PRP lived_VBD in_IN pleasure_NN and_CC magnificence_NN ,_, rode_VBD on_IN horseback_NN ,_, drove_VBD in_IN carriages_NNS ,_, ate_VBN and_CC drank_NN ,_, but_CC did_VBD nothing_NN wicked_JJ ._.
The_DT time_NN slipped_VBD quickly_RB by_IN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT seven_CD years_NNS were_VBD coming_VBG to_IN an_DT end_NN ,_, two_CD of_IN them_PRP were_VBD terribly_RB anxious_JJ and_CC alarmed_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT third_JJ took_VBD the_DT affair_NN easily_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Brothers_NNPS ,_, fear_VBP nothing_NN ,_, I_PRP still_RB have_VBP my_PRP$ wits_NNS about_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP shall_MD guess_VB the_DT riddle_NN ._.
They_PRP went_VBD out_RB into_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN and_CC sat_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD pulled_VBD sorrowful_JJ faces_NNS ._.
Then_RB an_DT aged_JJ woman_NN came_VBD up_RP to_IN them_PRP who_WP inquired_VBD why_WRB they_PRP were_VBD so_RB sad_JJ ._.
Well_UH ,_, said_VBD they_PRP ,_, what_WP has_VBZ that_DT got_VBD to_TO do_VB with_IN you_PRP ?_.
After_RB all_RB ,_, you_PRP can_MD not_RB help_VB us_PRP ._.
Who_WP knows_VBZ ?_. said_VBD she_PRP ._.
Just_RB confide_VB your_PRP$ trouble_NN to_IN me_PRP ._.

After_IN this_DT she_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT three_CD piercing_NN swords_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP seated_VBD herslef_RB on_IN her_PRP$ plough-wheel_NN ,_, and_CC rolled_VBD over_IN them_PRP ._.
At_IN last_RB she_PRP arrived_VBD in_IN front_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ lake_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP had_VBD crossed_VBN it_PRP ,_, she_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT large_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ castle_NN ._.
She_PRP went_VBD and_CC asked_VBD for_IN a_DT place_NN ,_, she_PRP was_VBD a_DT poor_JJ girl_NN ,_, she_PRP said_VBD ,_, and_CC would_MD like_VB to_TO be_VB hired_VBN ._.
She_PRP knew_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT kings_NNS son_NN whom_WP she_PRP had_VBD released_VBN from_IN the_DT iron_NN stove_NN in_IN the_DT great_JJ forest_NN was_VBD in_IN the_DT castle_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP was_VBD taken_VBN as_IN a_DT scullery-maid_NN at_IN low_JJ wages_NNS ._.

The_DT monster_NN fell_VBD down_RB dead_JJ ,_, but_CC was_VBD so_RB large_JJ and_CC powerful_JJ that_IN his_PRP$ fall_NN shattered_VBD the_DT whole_JJ ship_NN ._.
Fortunately_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, they_PRP laid_VBD hold_NN of_IN a_DT couple_NN of_IN planks_NNS ,_, and_CC swam_NN about_IN the_DT wide_JJ sea_NN ._.
Then_RB again_RB they_PRP were_VBD in_IN great_JJ peril_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT tailor_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD not_RB idle_JJ ,_, took_VBD his_PRP$ wondrous_JJ needle_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN a_DT few_JJ stitches_NNS sewed_VBD the_DT planks_NNS together_RB and_CC they_PRP seated_VBD themselves_PRP upon_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC collected_VBN together_RB all_PDT the_DT fragments_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP sewed_VBD these_DT so_RB skillfully_RB together_RB ,_, that_IN in_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN the_DT ship_NN was_VBD once_RB more_RBR seaworthy_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP could_MD go_VB home_RB again_RB in_IN safety_NN ._.

The_DT eldest_JJS then_RB went_VBD to_IN her_PRP$ bed_NN and_CC tapped_VBD it_PRP ,_, whereupon_WRB it_PRP immediately_RB sank_VBD into_IN the_DT earth_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ they_PRP descended_VBD through_IN the_DT opening_NN ,_, the_DT eldest_JJS going_VBG first_RB ._.
The_DT soldier_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD watched_VBN everything_NN ,_, tarried_VBD no_RB longer_RBR ,_, put_VB on_RP his_PRP$ little_JJ cloak_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD down_RB last_JJ with_IN the_DT youngest_JJS ._.

After_IN that_DT they_PRP came_VBD into_IN an_DT avenue_NN where_WRB all_PDT the_DT leaves_NNS were_VBD of_IN gold_NN ,_, and_CC lastly_RB into_IN a_DT third_NN where_WRB they_PRP were_VBD of_IN bright_JJ diamonds_NNS ,_, he_PRP broke_VBD off_RP a_DT twig_NN from_IN each_DT ,_, which_WDT made_VBD such_PDT a_DT crack_NN each_DT time_NN that_WDT the_DT youngest_JJS started_VBD back_RB in_IN terror_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT eldest_JJS still_RB maintained_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD salutes_NNS ._.

May_MD I_PRP invite_VB no_DT guests_NNS to_IN this_DT repast_NN ?_. inquired_VBD the_DT prince_NN ,_, No_DT dinner_NN is_VBZ good_JJ without_IN some_DT company_NN ._.
The_DT old_JJ woman_NN laughed_VBD maliciously_RB ,_, and_CC replied_VBD ,_, You_PRP may_MD invite_VB one_CD for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN companionship_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT more_JJR ._.
The_DT kings_NNS son_NN went_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ servants_NNS and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT stout_JJ one_CD ,_, You_PRP shall_MD be_VB my_PRP$ guest_NN to-day_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD eat_VB your_PRP$ fill_NN ._.
Hereupon_UH the_DT stout_NN one_CD puffed_VBD himself_PRP up_RP and_CC ate_VBD the_DT three_CD hundred_CD oxen_NN without_IN leaving_VBG one_CD single_JJ hair_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP asked_VBD if_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO have_VB nothing_NN but_IN his_PRP$ breakfast_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP drank_VBD the_DT wine_NN straight_RB from_IN the_DT casks_NNS without_IN feeling_VBG any_DT need_NN of_IN a_DT glass_NN ,_, and_CC drained_VBD them_PRP down_RP to_IN their_PRP$ dregs_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT meal_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, the_DT prince_NN went_VBD to_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD her_PRP that_IN the_DT second_JJ task_NN also_RB was_VBD performed_VBN ._.
She_PRP wondered_VBD at_IN this_DT and_CC said_VBD ,_, No_DT one_NN has_VBZ ever_RB done_VBN so_RB much_RB before_RB ,_, but_CC one_CD task_NN still_RB remains_VBZ ,_, and_CC she_PRP thought_VBD to_IN herself_PRP ,_, You_PRP shall_MD not_RB escape_VB me_PRP ,_, and_CC will_MD not_RB keep_VB your_PRP$ head_NN on_IN your_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ._.
This_DT night_NN ,_, said_VBD she_PRP ,_, I_PRP will_MD bring_VB my_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN you_PRP in_IN your_PRP$ chamber_NN ,_, and_CC you_PRP shall_MD put_VB your_PRP$ arms_NNS round_IN her_PRP ,_, but_CC when_WRB you_PRP are_VBP sitting_VBG there_RB together_RB ,_, beware_NN of_IN falling_VBG asleep_JJ ._.
When_WRB twelve_CD oclock_NN is_VBZ striking_VBG ,_, I_PRP will_MD come_VB ,_, and_CC if_IN she_PRP is_VBZ then_RB no_RB longer_RBR in_IN your_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, you_PRP are_VBP lost_VBN ._.
The_DT prince_NN thought_VBD ,_, The_DT task_NN is_VBZ easy_JJ ,_, I_PRP will_MD most_RBS certainly_RB keep_VB my_PRP$ eyes_NNS open_JJ ._.
Nevertheless_RB he_PRP called_VBD his_PRP$ servants_NNS ,_, told_VBD them_PRP what_WP the_DT old_JJ woman_NN had_VBD said_VBN ,_, and_CC remarked_VBD ,_, Who_WP knows_VBZ what_WDT treachery_NN lurks_VBZ behind_IN this_DT ?_.
Foresight_NN is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ thing_NN -_HYPH keep_VB watch_NN ,_, and_CC take_VB care_NN that_IN the_DT maiden_NN does_VBZ not_RB go_VB out_IN of_IN my_PRP$ room_NN again_RB ._.
When_WRB night_NN fell_VBD ,_, the_DT old_JJ woman_NN came_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD her_PRP into_IN the_DT princess_NN arms_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT tall_JJ one_CD wound_VBD himself_PRP round_VB the_DT two_CD in_IN a_DT circle_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT stout_JJ one_CD placed_VBD himself_PRP by_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN no_DT living_VBG creature_NN could_MD enter_VB ._.
There_EX the_DT two_CD sat_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT maiden_NN spoke_VBD never_RB a_DT word_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT moon_NN shone_VBD through_IN the_DT window_NN on_IN her_PRP$ face_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT prince_NN could_MD behold_VB her_PRP$ wondrous_JJ beauty_NN ._.
He_PRP did_VBD nothing_NN but_IN gaze_NN at_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC was_VBD filled_VBN with_IN love_NN and_CC happiness_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ eyes_NNS never_RB felt_VBD weary_JJ ._.
This_DT lasted_VBD until_IN eleven_CD oclock_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT old_JJ woman_NN cast_VBD such_PDT a_DT spell_NN over_IN all_DT of_IN them_PRP that_IN they_PRP fell_VBD asleep_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT self-same_JJ moment_NN the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD carried_VBN away_RP ._.
Then_RB they_PRP all_DT slept_VBD soundly_RB until_IN a_DT quarter_NN to_IN twelve_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT magic_NN lost_VBD its_PRP$ power_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT awoke_NN again_RB ._.
Oh_UH ,_, misery_NN and_CC misfortune_NN ,_, cried_VBD the_DT prince_NN ,_, now_RB I_PRP am_VBP lost_VBN ._.
The_DT faithful_JJ servants_NNS also_RB began_VBD to_TO lament_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT listener_NN said_VBD ,_, Be_VB quiet_JJ ,_, I_PRP want_VBP to_TO listen_VB ._.
Then_RB he_PRP listened_VBD for_IN an_DT instant_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, She_PRP is_VBZ on_IN a_DT rock_NN ,_, three_CD hundred_CD leagues_NNS from_IN hence_RB ,_, bewailing_VBG her_PRP$ fate_NN ._.
You_PRP alone_RB ,_, tall_JJ one_NN ,_, can_MD help_VB her_PRP ,_, if_IN you_PRP will_MD stand_VB up_RP ,_, you_PRP will_MD be_VB there_RB in_IN a_DT couple_NN of_IN steps_NNS ._.
Yes_UH ,_, answered_VBD the_DT tall_JJ one_CD ,_, but_CC the_DT one_CD with_IN the_DT sharp_JJ eyes_NNS must_MD go_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_, that_IN we_PRP may_MD destroy_VB the_DT rock_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT tall_JJ one_CD took_VBD the_DT one_NN with_IN bandaged_JJ eyes_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT twinkling_NN of_IN an_DT eye_NN they_PRP were_VBD on_IN the_DT enchanted_VBN rock_NN ._.
The_DT tall_JJ one_NN immediately_RB took_VBD the_DT bandage_NN from_IN the_DT others_NNS eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP did_VBD but_CC look_VB round_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT rock_NN shivered_VBD into_IN a_DT thousand_CD pieces_NNS ._.
Then_RB the_DT tall_JJ one_NN took_VBD the_DT maiden_NN in_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, carried_VBD her_PRP$ back_RB in_IN a_DT second_JJ ,_, then_RB fetched_VBD his_PRP$ companion_NN with_IN the_DT same_JJ rapidity_NN ,_, and_CC before_IN it_PRP struck_VBD twelve_CD they_PRP were_VBD all_RB sitting_VBG as_IN they_PRP had_VBD sat_VBN before_RB ,_, quite_RB merrily_RB and_CC happily_RB ._.
When_WRB twelve_CD struck_VBD ,_, the_DT aged_JJ sorceress_NN came_VBD stealing_VBG in_RP with_IN a_DT malicious_JJ face_NN ,_, as_RB much_JJ as_IN to_TO say_VB ,_, Now_RB he_PRP is_VBZ mine_NN ,_, for_IN she_PRP believed_VBD that_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN was_VBD on_IN the_DT rock_NN three_CD hundred_CD leagues_NNS off_RP ._.
But_CC when_WRB she_PRP saw_VBD her_PRP in_IN the_DT princes_NNS arms_NNS ,_, she_PRP was_VBD alarmed_VBN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, Here_RB is_VBZ one_CD who_WP knows_VBZ more_JJR than_IN I_PRP do_VBP ._.
She_PRP dared_VBD not_RB make_VB any_DT opposition_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO give_VB him_PRP her_PRP$ daughter_NN ._.

On_IN this_DT the_DT proud_JJ heart_NN of_IN the_DT maiden_NN was_VBD filled_VBN with_IN anger_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP meditated_VBD revenge_NN ._.

She_PRP thought_VBD that_IN none_NN of_IN his_PRP$ servants_NNS would_MD let_VB themselves_PRP be_VB burnt_VBN for_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC that_DT out_IN of_IN love_NN for_IN her_PRP ,_, he_PRP himself_PRP would_MD place_VB himself_PRP upon_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP would_MD be_VB free_JJ ._.
But_CC the_DT servants_NNS said_VBD ,_, Every_DT one_CD of_IN us_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN something_NN except_IN the_DT frosty_JJ one_NN ,_, he_PRP must_MD set_VB to_TO work_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP put_VBD him_PRP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT pile_NN ,_, and_CC set_VB fire_NN to_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT fire_NN began_VBD to_TO burn_VB ,_, and_CC burnt_VBN for_IN three_CD days_NNS until_IN all_PDT the_DT wood_NN was_VBD consumed_VBN ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT flames_NNS had_VBD burnt_VBN out_RP ,_, the_DT frosty_JJ one_CD was_VBD standing_VBG amid_IN the_DT ashes_NNS ,_, trembling_VBG like_IN an_DT aspen_NN leaf_NN ,_, and_CC saying_VBG ,_, I_PRP never_RB felt_VBD such_PDT a_DT frost_NN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ course_NN of_IN my_PRP$ life_NN ,_, if_IN it_PRP had_VBD lasted_VBN much_RB longer_RBR ,_, I_PRP should_MD have_VB been_VBN benumbed_VBN ._.

But_CC the_DT listener_NN had_VBD sharpened_VBN his_PRP$ ears_NNS ,_, and_CC heard_VBD the_DT secret_JJ discourse_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ._.
What_WP shall_MD we_PRP do_VB ?_. said_VBD he_PRP to_IN the_DT stout_NN one_CD ._.

I_PRP am_VBP no_DT prince_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT herder_NN of_IN swine_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT man_NN who_WP is_VBZ there_RB with_IN that_DT herd_NN ,_, is_VBZ my_PRP$ father_NN ._.
We_PRP two_CD shall_MD have_VB to_TO set_VB to_IN work_VB also_RB ,_, and_CC help_VB him_PRP ._.

So_RB when_WRB she_PRP awoke_VBD in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, she_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN to_TO put_VB on_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT innkeepers_NNS wife_NN gave_VBD her_PRP an_DT old_JJ gown_NN and_CC a_DT pair_NN of_IN worsted_VBN stockings_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN seemed_VBD to_TO consider_VB it_PRP a_DT great_JJ present_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, If_IN it_PRP were_VBD not_RB for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN your_PRP$ husband_NN I_PRP should_MD have_VB given_VBN you_PRP nothing_NN at_RB all_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT princess_NN believed_VBD that_IN he_PRP really_RB was_VBD a_DT swineherd_NN ,_, and_CC tended_VBD the_DT herd_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC thought_VBD to_IN herself_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP deserved_VBN this_DT for_IN my_PRP$ haughtiness_NN and_CC pride_NN ._.
This_DT lasted_VBD for_IN a_DT week_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP could_MD endure_VB it_PRP no_RB longer_RBR ,_, for_IN she_PRP had_VBD sores_NNS on_IN her_PRP$ feet_NNS ._.
And_CC now_RB came_VBD a_DT couple_NN of_IN people_NNS who_WP asked_VBD if_IN she_PRP knew_VBD who_WP her_PRP$ husband_NN was_VBD ._.

And_CC then_RB the_DT wedding_NN was_VBD celebrated_VBN ,_, and_CC he_PRP who_WP has_VBZ related_VBN this_DT ,_, wishes_VBZ that_IN he_PRP ,_, too_RB ,_, had_VBD been_VBN present_JJ at_IN it_PRP ._.
A_DT woman_NN was_VBD walking_VBG about_IN the_DT fields_NNS with_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN and_CC her_PRP$ step-daughter_JJ cutting_VBG fodder_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT Lord_NNP came_VBD towards_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT poor_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD ,_, Which_WDT is_VBZ the_DT way_NN into_IN the_DT village_NN ?_. If_IN you_PRP want_VBP to_TO know_VB ,_, said_VBD the_DT mother_NN ,_, seek_VB it_PRP for_IN yourself_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT daughter_NN added_VBD ,_, If_IN you_PRP are_VBP afraid_JJ you_PRP will_MD not_RB find_VB it_PRP ,_, take_VB a_DT guide_NN with_IN you_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT step-daughter_NN said_VBD ,_, Poor_JJ man_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD take_VB you_PRP there_RB ,_, come_VB with_IN me_PRP ._.
Then_RB God_NNP was_VBD angry_JJ with_IN the_DT mother_NN and_CC daughter_NN ,_, and_CC turned_VBD His_PRP$ back_NN on_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC wished_VBD that_IN they_PRP should_MD become_VB as_RB black_JJ as_IN night_NN and_CC as_RB ugly_JJ as_IN sin_NN ._.
To_IN the_DT poor_JJ step-daughter_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, God_NNP was_VBD gracious_JJ ,_, and_CC went_VBD with_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD near_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, He_PRP said_VBD a_DT blessing_NN over_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC spoke_VBD ,_, Choose_VB three_CD things_NNS for_IN yourself_PRP ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD grant_VB them_PRP to_IN you_PRP ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT maiden_NN ,_, I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO be_VB as_RB beautiful_JJ and_CC fair_JJ as_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, and_CC instantly_RB she_PRP was_VBD white_JJ and_CC fair_JJ as_IN day_NN ._.
Then_RB I_PRP should_MD like_VB to_TO have_VB a_DT purse_NN of_IN money_NN which_WDT would_MD never_RB grow_VB empty_JJ ._.
That_IN the_DT Lord_NNP gave_VBD her_PRP also_RB ,_, but_CC He_PRP said_VBD ,_, Do_VB not_RB forget_VB what_WP is_VBZ best_JJS of_IN all_DT ._.

That_DT also_RB was_VBD granted_VBN unto_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT Lord_NNP left_VBD her_PRP ._.
When_WRB the_DT step-mother_NN came_VBD home_RB with_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP saw_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD both_DT as_RB black_JJ as_IN coal_NN and_CC ugly_RB ,_, but_CC that_IN the_DT step-daughter_NN was_VBD white_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ ,_, wickedness_NN increased_VBD still_RB more_JJR in_IN their_PRP$ hearts_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP thought_VBD of_IN nothing_NN else_RB but_CC how_WRB they_PRP could_MD do_VB her_PRP an_DT injury_NN ._.
The_DT step-daughter_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD a_DT brother_NN called_VBN Reginer_NNP ,_, whom_WP she_PRP loved_VBD much_JJ ,_, and_CC she_PRP told_VBD him_PRP all_DT that_WDT had_VBD happened_VBN ._.
And_CC Reginer_NNP said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, Dear_JJ sister_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD paint_VB your_PRP$ portrait_NN ,_, that_IN I_PRP may_MD continually_RB see_VB you_PRP before_IN my_PRP$ eyes_NNS ,_, for_IN my_PRP$ love_NN for_IN you_PRP is_VBZ so_RB great_JJ that_IN I_PRP should_MD like_VB always_RB to_TO look_VB at_IN you_PRP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP answered_VBD ,_, But_CC ,_, I_PRP pray_VBP you_PRP ,_, let_VB no_DT one_NN see_VB the_DT picture_NN ._.

Every_DT day_NN he_PRP went_VBD and_CC stood_VBD before_IN the_DT picture_NN ,_, and_CC thanked_VBD God_NNP for_IN the_DT happiness_NN of_IN having_VBG such_PDT a_DT dear_JJ sister_NN ._.
Now_RB it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN the_DT king_NN whom_WP he_PRP served_VBD ,_, had_VBD just_RB lost_VBN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN so_RB beautiful_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN could_MD be_VB found_VBN to_TO compare_VB with_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC on_IN this_DT account_NN the_DT king_NN was_VBD in_IN deep_JJ grief_NN ._.
The_DT attendants_NNS about_IN the_DT court_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, noticed_VBD that_IN the_DT coachman_NN stood_VBD daily_RB before_IN this_DT beautiful_JJ picture_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD jealous_JJ of_IN him_PRP ,_, so_IN they_PRP informed_VBD the_DT king_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT latter_JJ ordered_VBD the_DT picture_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP saw_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD like_IN his_PRP$ lost_VBN wife_NN in_IN every_DT respect_NN ,_, except_IN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD still_RB more_RBR beautiful_JJ ,_, he_PRP fell_VBD mortally_RB in_IN love_NN with_IN it_PRP He_PRP caused_VBD the_DT coachman_NN to_TO be_VB brought_VBN before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD whom_WP the_DT portrait_NN represented_VBD ._.
The_DT coachman_NN said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD his_PRP$ sister_NN ,_, so_IN the_DT king_NN resolved_VBD to_TO take_VB no_DT one_NN but_CC her_PRP as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT carriage_NN and_CC horses_NNS and_CC splendid_JJ garments_NNS of_IN cloth_NN of_IN gold_NN ,_, and_CC sent_VBD him_PRP forth_RB to_TO fetch_VB his_PRP$ chosen_JJ bride_NN ._.
When_WRB Reginer_NNP came_VBD on_IN this_DT errand_NN ,_, his_PRP$ sister_NN was_VBD glad_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT black_JJ maiden_NN was_VBD jealous_JJ of_IN her_PRP$ good_JJ fortune_NN ,_, and_CC grew_VBD angry_JJ above_IN all_DT measure_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN her_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, Of_IN what_WDT use_NN are_VBP all_PDT your_PRP$ arts_NNS to_IN us_PRP now_RB when_WRB you_PRP can_MD not_RB procure_VB such_PDT a_DT piece_NN of_IN luck_NN for_IN me_PRP ._.
Be_VB quiet_JJ ,_, said_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD soon_RB divert_VB it_PRP to_IN you_PRP ,_, -_HYPH and_CC by_IN her_PRP$ arts_NNS of_IN witchcraft_NN ,_, she_PRP so_RB troubled_VBD the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT coachman_NN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD half-blind_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP stopped_VBD the_DT ears_NNS of_IN the_DT white_JJ maiden_NN so_IN that_IN she_PRP was_VBD half-deaf_JJ ._.
Then_RB they_PRP got_VBD into_IN the_DT carriage_NN ,_, first_RB the_DT bride_NN in_IN her_PRP$ noble_JJ royal_JJ apparel_NN ,_, then_RB the_DT step-mother_NN with_IN her_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC Reginer_NNP sat_VBD on_IN the_DT box_NN to_TO drive_VB ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD been_VBN on_IN the_DT way_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN the_DT coachman_NN cried_VBD ,_, 	_NFP Cover_NNP thee_PRP well_RB ,_, my_PRP$ sister_NN dear_NN ,_, 	_, That_IN the_DT rain_NN may_MD not_RB wet_VB thee_NNP ,_, 	_, That_IN the_DT wind_NN may_MD not_RB load_VB thee_PRP with_IN dust_NN ,_, 	_, That_IN thou_FW mayst_NN be_VB fair_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ 	_, When_WRB thou_NNP appearest_RBS before_IN the_DT king_NN ._.
The_DT bride_NN asked_VBD ,_, What_WP is_VBZ my_PRP$ dear_JJ brother_NN saying_VBG ?_. Ah_NNP ,_, said_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, he_PRP says_VBZ that_IN you_PRP ought_MD to_TO take_VB off_RP your_PRP$ golden_JJ dress_NN and_CC give_VB it_PRP to_IN your_PRP$ sister_NN ._.

***There_RB was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT king_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT great_JJ forest_NN near_IN his_PRP$ palace_NN ,_, full_JJ of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN wild_JJ animals_NNS ._.
One_CD day_NN he_PRP sent_VBD out_RP a_DT huntsman_NN to_TO shoot_VB him_PRP a_DT roe_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB come_VB back_RB ._.
Perhaps_RB some_DT accident_NN has_VBZ befallen_VBN him_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT king_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ day_NN he_PRP sent_VBD out_RP two_CD more_JJR huntsmen_NNS who_WP were_VBD to_TO search_VB for_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC they_PRP too_RB stayed_VBD away_RB ._.
Then_RB on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, he_PRP sent_VBD for_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ huntsmen_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, scour_VB the_DT whole_JJ forest_NN through_RB ,_, and_CC do_VB not_RB give_VB up_RP until_IN you_PRP have_VBP found_VBN all_DT three_CD ._.
But_CC of_IN these_DT also_RB ,_, none_NN came_VBD home_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT pack_NN of_IN hounds_NNS which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN with_IN them_PRP ,_, none_NN were_VBD seen_VBN again_RB ._.
From_IN that_DT time_NN forth_RB ,_, no_DT one_NN would_MD any_RB longer_RBR venture_VB into_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP lay_VBD there_RB in_IN deep_JJ stillness_NN and_CC solitude_NN ,_, and_CC nothing_NN was_VBD seen_VBN of_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC sometimes_RB an_DT eagle_NN or_CC a_DT hawk_NN flying_VBG over_IN it_PRP ._.
This_DT lasted_VBD for_IN many_JJ years_NNS ,_, when_WRB an_DT unknown_JJ huntsman_NN announced_VBD himself_PRP to_IN the_DT king_NN as_IN seeking_VBG a_DT situation_NN ,_, and_CC offered_VBD to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT dangerous_JJ forest_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, would_MD not_RB give_VB his_PRP$ consent_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB safe_JJ in_IN there_RB ,_, I_PRP fear_VBP it_PRP would_MD fare_VB with_IN you_PRP no_RB better_RBR than_IN with_IN the_DT others_NNS ,_, and_CC you_PRP would_MD never_RB come_VB out_RP again_RB ._.
The_DT huntsman_NN replied_VBD ,_, lord_NNP ,_, I_PRP will_MD venture_VB it_PRP at_IN my_PRP$ own_JJ risk_NN ,_, of_IN fear_NN I_PRP know_VBP nothing_NN ._.
The_DT huntsman_NN therefore_RB betook_VBD himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ dog_NN to_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB long_JJ before_IN the_DT dog_NN fell_VBD in_RB with_IN some_DT game_NN on_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO pursue_VB it_PRP ,_, but_CC hardly_RB had_VBD the_DT dog_NN run_VBN two_CD steps_NNS when_WRB it_PRP stood_VBD before_IN a_DT deep_JJ pool_NN ,_, could_MD go_VB no_RB farther_RB ,_, and_CC a_DT naked_JJ arm_NN stretched_VBD itself_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, seized_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC drew_VBD it_PRP under_IN ._.
When_WRB the_DT huntsman_NN saw_VBD that_IN ,_, he_PRP went_VBD back_RB and_CC fetched_VBD three_CD men_NNS to_TO come_VB with_IN buckets_NNS and_CC bale_VB out_RP the_DT water_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP could_MD see_VB to_IN the_DT bottom_NN there_RB lay_VBD a_DT wild_JJ man_NN whose_WP$ body_NN was_VBD brown_JJ like_IN rusty_JJ iron_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ hair_NN hung_VBD over_IN his_PRP$ face_NN down_RB to_IN his_PRP$ knees_NNS ._.
They_PRP bound_VBD him_PRP with_IN cords_NNS ,_, and_CC led_VBD him_PRP away_RB to_IN the_DT castle_NN ._.

And_CC from_IN this_DT time_NN forth_RB every_DT one_NN could_MD again_RB go_VB into_IN the_DT forest_NN with_IN safety_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN had_VBD a_DT son_NN of_IN eight_CD years_NNS ,_, who_WP was_VBD once_RB playing_VBG in_IN the_DT court-yard_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN he_PRP was_VBD playing_VBG ,_, his_PRP$ golden_JJ ball_NN fell_VBD into_IN the_DT cage_NN ._.

The_DT boy_NN had_VBD become_VBN afraid_JJ ,_, he_PRP called_VBD and_CC cried_VBD after_IN him_PRP ,_, oh_UH ,_, wild_JJ man_NN ,_, do_VBP not_RB go_VB away_RB ,_, or_CC I_PRP shall_MD be_VB beaten_VBN ._.
The_DT wild_JJ man_NN turned_VBD back_RB ,_, took_VBD him_PRP up_RP ,_, set_VBD him_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ shoulder_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD with_IN hasty_JJ steps_NNS into_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT king_NN came_VBD home_RB ,_, he_PRP observed_VBD the_DT empty_JJ cage_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT queen_NN how_WRB that_WDT had_VBD happened_VBN ._.

The_DT king_NN sent_VBD out_RP people_NNS to_TO seek_VB for_IN him_PRP in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP did_VBD not_RB find_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP could_MD easily_RB guess_VB what_WP had_VBD happened_VBN ,_, and_CC much_JJ grief_NN reigned_VBN in_IN the_DT royal_JJ court_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT wild_JJ man_NN had_VBD once_RB more_RBR reached_VBD the_DT dark_JJ forest_NN ,_, he_PRP took_VBD the_DT boy_NN down_RB from_IN his_PRP$ shoulder_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, you_PRP will_MD never_RB see_VB your_PRP$ father_NN and_CC mother_NN again_RB ,_, but_CC I_PRP will_MD keep_VB you_PRP with_IN me_PRP ,_, for_IN you_PRP have_VBP set_VBN me_PRP free_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP compassion_NN on_IN you_PRP ._.
If_IN you_PRP do_VBP all_DT I_PRP bid_VBP you_PRP ,_, you_PRP shall_MD fare_VB well_RB ._.
Of_IN treasure_NN and_CC gold_NN have_VBP I_PRP enough_RB ,_, and_CC more_JJR than_IN anyone_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
He_PRP made_VBD a_DT bed_NN of_IN moss_NN for_IN the_DT boy_NN on_IN which_WDT he_PRP slept_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ morning_NN the_DT man_NN took_VBD him_PRP to_IN a_DT well_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, behold_JJ ,_, the_DT gold_NN well_NN is_VBZ as_IN bright_JJ and_CC clear_JJ as_IN crystal_NN ,_, you_PRP shall_MD sit_VB beside_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC take_VB care_NN that_IN nothing_NN falls_VBZ into_IN it_PRP ,_, or_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB polluted_VBN ._.

The_DT boy_NN placed_VBD himself_PRP by_IN the_DT brink_NN of_IN the_DT well_NN ,_, and_CC often_RB saw_VBD a_DT golden_JJ fish_NN or_CC a_DT golden_JJ snake_NN show_VBP itself_PRP therein_RB ,_, and_CC took_VBD care_NN that_IN nothing_NN fell_VBD in_RB ._.

In_IN the_DT evening_NN iron_NN Hans_NNP came_VBD back_RB ,_, looked_VBD at_IN the_DT boy_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, what_WP has_VBZ happened_VBN to_IN the_DT well_RB ._.
Nothing_NN ,_, nothing_NN ,_, he_PRP answered_VBD ,_, and_CC held_VBD his_PRP$ finger_NN behind_IN his_PRP$ back_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT man_NN might_MD not_RB see_VB it_PRP ._.
But_CC he_PRP said_VBD ,_, you_PRP have_VBP dipped_VBN your_PRP$ finger_NN into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, this_DT time_NN it_PRP may_MD pass_VB ,_, but_CC take_VB care_NN you_PRP do_VBP not_RB again_RB let_VB anything_NN go_VB in_RB ._.
By_IN daybreak_NN the_DT boy_NN was_VBD already_RB sitting_VBG by_IN the_DT well_RB and_CC watching_VBG it_PRP ._.
His_PRP$ finger_NN hurt_VBD him_PRP again_RB and_CC he_PRP passed_VBD it_PRP over_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB unhappily_RB a_DT hair_NN fell_VBD down_RB into_IN the_DT well_NN ._.
He_PRP took_VBD it_PRP quickly_RB out_RP ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD already_RB quite_RB gilded_JJ ._.

You_PRP have_VBP let_VBN a_DT hair_NN fall_VB into_IN the_DT well_NN ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ._.
I_PRP will_MD allow_VB you_PRP to_TO watch_VB by_IN it_PRP once_RB more_RBR ,_, but_CC if_IN this_DT happens_VBZ for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN then_RB the_DT well_NN is_VBZ polluted_JJ ,_, and_CC you_PRP can_MD no_RB longer_RB remain_VB with_IN me_PRP ._.
On_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, the_DT boy_NN sat_VBD by_IN the_DT well_RB ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB stir_VB his_PRP$ finger_NN ,_, however_RB much_RB it_PRP hurt_VBD him_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT time_NN was_VBD long_JJ to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP looked_VBD at_IN the_DT reflection_NN of_IN his_PRP$ face_NN on_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
And_CC as_IN he_PRP still_RB bent_VBP down_RP more_JJR and_CC more_JJR while_IN he_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG so_RB ,_, and_CC trying_VBG to_TO look_VB straight_RB into_IN the_DT eyes_NNS ,_, his_PRP$ long_JJ hair_NN fell_VBD down_RB from_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS into_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
He_PRP raised_VBD himself_PRP up_RP quickly_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT hair_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN was_VBD already_RB golden_JJ and_CC shone_VBN like_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
You_PRP can_MD imagine_VB how_WRB terrified_VBN the_DT poor_JJ boy_NN was_VBD ._.
He_PRP took_VBD his_PRP$ pocket-handkerchief_NN and_CC tied_VBD it_PRP round_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT man_NN might_MD not_RB see_VB it_PRP ._.
When_WRB he_PRP came_VBD he_PRP already_RB knew_VBD everything_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, take_VB the_DT handkerchief_NN off_RP ._.
Then_RB the_DT golden_JJ hair_NN streamed_VBN forth_RB ,_, and_CC let_VB the_DT boy_NN excuse_VB himself_PRP as_IN he_PRP might_MD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD of_IN no_DT use_NN ._.
You_PRP have_VBP not_RB stood_VBN the_DT trial_NN ,_, and_CC can_MD stay_VB here_RB no_RB longer_RBR ._.
Go_VB forth_RB into_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, there_RB you_PRP will_MD learn_VB what_WDT poverty_NN is_VBZ ._.
But_CC as_IN you_PRP have_VBP not_RB a_DT bad_JJ heart_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN I_PRP mean_VBP well_RB by_IN you_PRP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ one_CD thing_NN I_PRP will_MD grant_VB you_PRP ._.
If_IN you_PRP fall_VBP into_IN any_DT difficulty_NN ,_, come_VB to_IN the_DT forest_NN and_CC cry_NN ,_, iron_VB Hans_NNP ,_, and_CC then_RB I_PRP will_MD come_VB and_CC help_VB you_PRP ._.
My_PRP$ power_NN is_VBZ great_JJ ,_, greater_JJR than_IN you_PRP think_VBP ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP gold_NN and_CC silver_NN in_IN abundance_NN ._.

At_IN length_NN he_PRP went_VBD to_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD if_IN they_PRP would_MD take_VB him_PRP in_IN ._.

At_IN length_NN the_DT cook_NN took_VBD him_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ service_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP might_MD carry_VB wood_NN and_CC water_NN ,_, and_CC rake_VB the_DT cinders_NNS together_RB ._.

He_PRP is_VBZ at_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT garden_NN ._.

He_PRP has_VBZ likewise_RB shown_VBN my_PRP$ children_NNS three_CD golden_JJ apples_NNS which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ won_VBN ._.

And_CC as_IN they_PRP were_VBD sitting_VBG at_IN the_DT marriage-feast_NN ,_, the_DT music_NN suddenly_RB stopped_VBD ,_, the_DT doors_NNS opened_VBD ,_, and_CC a_DT stately_JJ king_NN came_VBD in_RB with_IN a_DT great_JJ retinue_NN ._.
He_PRP went_VBD up_RB to_IN the_DT youth_NN ,_, embraced_VBD him_PRP and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP iron_NN Hans_NNP ,_, and_CC was_VBD by_IN enchantment_NN a_DT wild_JJ man_NN ,_, but_CC you_PRP have_VBP set_VBN me_PRP free_JJ ._.
All_PDT the_DT treasures_NNS which_WDT I_PRP possess_VBP ,_, shall_MD be_VB your_PRP$ property_NN ._.
East_JJ india_NN was_VBD besieged_VBN by_IN an_DT enemy_NN who_WP would_MD not_RB retire_VB until_IN he_PRP had_VBD received_VBN six_CD hundred_CD dollars_NNS ._.
Then_RB the_DT townsfolk_NN caused_VBD it_PRP to_TO be_VB proclaimed_VBN by_IN beat_NN of_IN drum_NN that_IN whosoever_EX was_VBD able_JJ to_TO procure_VB the_DT money_NN should_MD be_VB burgomaster_VBN ._.
Now_RB there_EX was_VBD a_DT poor_JJ fisherman_NN who_WP fished_VBD on_IN the_DT sea_NN with_IN his_PRP$ son_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT enemy_NN came_VBD and_CC took_VBD the_DT son_NN prisoner_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD the_DT father_NN six_CD hundred_CD dollars_NNS for_IN him_PRP ._.
So_CC the_DT father_NN went_VBD and_CC gave_VBD them_PRP to_IN the_DT great_JJ men_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT enemy_NN departed_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT fisherman_NN became_VBD burgomaster_NN ._.
Then_RB it_PRP was_VBD proclaimed_VBN that_IN whosoever_WP did_VBD not_RB say_VB mr_NNP ._.
Burgomaster_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB put_VBN to_IN death_NN on_IN the_DT gallows_NN ._.
The_DT son_NN got_VBD away_RB again_RB from_IN the_DT enemy_NN ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_IN a_DT great_JJ forest_NN on_IN a_DT high_JJ mountain_NN ._.

The_DT poor_JJ man_NN then_RB told_VBD him_PRP everything_NN ,_, just_RB as_IN it_PRP had_VBD happened_VBN ._.
So_RB the_DT rich_JJ man_NN ordered_VBD his_PRP$ carriage_NN to_TO be_VB made_VBN ready_JJ ,_, and_CC drove_VBD away_RB ,_, resolved_VBN to_TO use_VB the_DT opportunity_NN better_RBR than_IN his_PRP$ brother_NN had_VBD done_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO bring_VB back_RP with_IN him_PRP quite_RB different_JJ treasures_NNS ._.
When_WRB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT mountain_NN he_PRP cried_VBD ,_, semsi_UH mountain_NN ,_, semsi_NN mountain_NN ,_, open_VB up_RP ._.
The_DT mountain_NN opened_VBD ,_, and_CC he_PRP went_VBD inside_IN it_PRP ._.

Just_RB count_VB them_PRP ._.
But_CC no_DT one_NN was_VBD able_JJ to_TO do_VB it_PRP ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, the_DT third_JJ question_NN is_VBZ ,_, how_WRB many_JJ seconds_NNS of_IN time_NN are_VBP there_EX in_IN eternity_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT shepherd_NN boy_NN ,_, in_IN lower_JJR pomerania_NN is_VBZ the_DT diamond_NN mountain_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ two_CD miles_NNS high_JJ ,_, two_CD miles_NNS wide_RB ,_, and_CC two_CD miles_NNS deep_JJ ._.
Every_DT hundred_CD years_NNS a_DT little_JJ bird_NN comes_VBZ and_CC sharpens_VBZ its_PRP$ beak_NN on_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT whole_JJ mountain_NN is_VBZ worn_VBN away_RP by_IN this_DT ,_, then_RB the_DT first_JJ second_NN of_IN eternity_NN will_MD be_VB over_RB ._.
The_DT king_NN said_VBD ,_, you_PRP have_VBP answered_VBN the_DT three_CD questions_NNS like_IN a_DT wise_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD henceforth_RB dwell_VB with_IN me_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ royal_JJ palace_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD regard_VB you_PRP as_IN my_PRP$ own_JJ child_NN ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT little_JJ girl_NN whose_WP$ father_NN and_CC mother_NN were_VBD dead_JJ ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD so_RB poor_JJ that_IN she_PRP no_RB longer_RBR had_VBD a_DT room_NN to_TO live_VB in_IN ,_, or_CC bed_NN to_TO sleep_VB in_RP ,_, and_CC at_IN last_JJ she_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN else_RB but_CC the_DT clothes_NNS she_PRP was_VBD wearing_VBG and_CC a_DT little_JJ bit_NN of_IN bread_NN in_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN which_WDT some_DT charitable_JJ soul_NN had_VBD given_VBN her_PRP ._.
She_PRP was_VBD good_JJ and_CC pious_JJ ,_, however_RB ._.
And_CC as_IN she_PRP was_VBD thus_RB forsaken_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT world_NN ,_, she_PRP went_VBD forth_RB into_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN ,_, trusting_VBG in_IN the_DT good_JJ God_NNP ._.
Then_RB a_DT poor_JJ man_NN met_VBD her_PRP ,_, who_WP said_VBD ,_, ah_UH ,_, give_VB me_PRP something_NN to_TO eat_VB ,_, I_PRP am_VBP so_RB hungry_JJ ._.
She_PRP handed_VBD him_PRP the_DT whole_NN of_IN her_PRP$ piece_NN of_IN bread_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, may_MD God_NNP bless_VB you_PRP ,_, and_CC went_VBD onwards_RB ._.
Then_RB came_VBD a_DT child_NN who_WP moaned_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, my_PRP$ head_NN is_VBZ so_RB cold_JJ ,_, give_VB me_PRP something_NN to_TO cover_VB it_PRP with_IN ._.
So_RB she_PRP took_VBD off_RP her_PRP$ hood_NN and_CC gave_VBD it_PRP to_IN him_PRP ._.
And_CC when_WRB she_PRP had_VBD walked_VBN a_DT little_JJ farther_RB ,_, she_PRP met_VBD another_DT child_NN who_WP had_VBD no_DT jacket_NN and_CC was_VBD frozen_VBN with_IN cold_JJ ._.
Then_RB she_PRP gave_VBD it_PRP her_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT little_RB farther_JJR on_IN one_CD begged_VBN for_IN a_DT frock_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP gave_VBD away_RP that_DT also_RB ._.
At_IN length_NN she_PRP got_VBD into_IN a_DT forest_NN and_CC it_PRP had_VBD already_RB become_VBN dark_JJ ,_, and_CC there_EX came_VBD yet_RB another_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD for_IN a_DT shirt_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT good_JJ little_JJ girl_NN thought_VBN to_IN herself_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT dark_JJ night_NN and_CC no_DT one_NN sees_VBZ you_PRP ,_, you_PRP can_MD very_RB well_RB give_VB your_PRP$ shirt_NN away_RB ,_, and_CC took_VBD it_PRP off_RP ,_, and_CC gave_VBD away_RP that_DT also_RB ._.
And_CC as_IN she_PRP so_RB stood_VBD ,_, and_CC had_VBD not_RB one_CD single_JJ thing_NN left_VBN ,_, suddenly_RB some_DT stars_NNS from_IN heaven_NN fell_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD nothing_NN else_JJ but_CC hard_JJ smooth_JJ pieces_NNS of_IN money_NN ,_, and_CC although_IN she_PRP had_VBD just_RB given_VBN her_PRP$ shirt_NN away_RB ,_, she_PRP had_VBD a_DT new_JJ one_NN which_WDT was_VBD of_IN the_DT very_RB finest_JJS linen_NN ._.
Then_RB she_PRP put_VBD the_DT money_NN into_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC was_VBD rich_JJ all_PDT the_DT days_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ life_NN ._.
A_DT father_NN was_VBD one_CD day_NN sitting_VBG at_IN dinner_NN with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC his_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT good_JJ friend_NN who_WP had_VBD come_VBN on_IN a_DT visit_NN ate_VBN with_IN them_PRP ._.
And_CC as_IN they_PRP thus_RB sat_VBD ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD striking_VBG twelve_CD oclock_NN ,_, the_DT stranger_NN saw_VBD the_DT door_NN open_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT very_RB pale_JJ child_NN dressed_VBN in_IN snow-white_JJ clothes_NNS came_VBD in_RB ._.
It_PRP did_VBD not_RB look_VB around_RB ,_, and_CC it_PRP did_VBD not_RB speak_VB ,_, but_CC went_VBD straight_RB into_IN the_DT next_JJ room_NN ._.
Soon_RB afterwards_RB it_PRP came_VBD back_RB ,_, and_CC went_VBD out_RP at_IN the_DT door_NN again_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ quiet_JJ manner_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT second_JJ and_CC on_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN ,_, it_PRP came_VBD also_RB exactly_RB in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN ._.
At_IN last_JJ the_DT stranger_NN asked_VBD the_DT father_NN to_TO whom_WP the_DT beautiful_JJ child_NN that_WDT went_VBD into_IN the_DT next_JJ room_NN every_DT day_NN at_IN noon_NN belonged_VBD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP never_RB seen_VBN it_PRP ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, neither_CC did_VBD he_PRP know_VB to_IN whom_WP it_PRP could_MD belong_VB ._.

At_IN this_DT the_DT stranger_NN got_VBD up_RP ,_, went_VBD to_IN the_DT room_NN door_NN ,_, opened_VBD it_PRP a_DT little_JJ ,_, and_CC peeped_VBN in_RP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP saw_VBD the_DT child_NN sitting_VBG on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, and_CC busily_RB digging_VBG and_CC seeking_VBG about_IN between_IN the_DT boards_NNS of_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB it_PRP saw_VBD the_DT stranger_NN ,_, it_PRP disappeared_VBD ._.

The_DT parents_NNS gave_VBD the_DT money_NN at_IN once_RB to_IN a_DT poor_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN that_IN the_DT child_NN was_VBD never_RB seen_VBN again_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT young_JJ shepherd_NN who_WP wanted_VBD very_RB much_JJ to_TO marry_VB ,_, and_CC was_VBD acquainted_VBN with_IN three_CD sisters_NNS who_WP were_VBD all_DT equally_RB pretty_RB ,_, so_IN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD difficult_JJ for_IN him_PRP to_TO make_VB a_DT choice_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP could_MD not_RB decide_VB to_TO give_VB the_DT preference_NN to_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN them_PRP ._.
Then_RB he_PRP asked_VBD his_PRP$ mother_NN for_IN advice_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP said_VBD ,_, invite_VBP all_DT three_CD ,_, and_CC set_VBN some_DT cheese_NN before_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC watch_VB how_WRB they_PRP eat_VBP it_PRP ._.
The_DT youth_NN did_VBD so_RB ,_, the_DT first_JJ swallowed_VBD the_DT cheese_NN with_IN the_DT rind_NN on_IN ,_, the_DT second_JJ hastily_RB cut_VBD the_DT rind_NN off_IN the_DT cheese_NN ,_, but_CC she_PRP cut_VBD it_PRP so_RB quickly_RB that_IN she_PRP left_VBD much_RB good_JJ cheese_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC threw_VBD that_DT away_RB also_RB ,_, the_DT third_RB peeled_VBD the_DT rind_NN off_RP carefully_RB ,_, and_CC cut_VB neither_CC too_RB much_JJ nor_CC too_RB little_JJ ._.
The_DT shepherd_NN told_VBD all_PDT this_DT to_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, who_WP said_VBD ,_, take_VB the_DT third_NN for_IN your_PRP$ wife_NN ._.
This_DT he_PRP did_VBD ,_, and_CC lived_VBD contentedly_RB and_CC happily_RB with_IN her_PRP ._.
A_DT sparrow_NN had_VBD four_CD young_JJ ones_NNS in_IN a_DT swallows_NNS nest_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP were_VBD fledged_VBN ,_, some_DT naughty_JJ boys_NNS pulled_VBD out_RP the_DT nest_NN ,_, but_CC fortunately_RB all_PDT the_DT birds_NNS got_VBD safely_RB away_RB in_IN the_DT high_JJ wind_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT old_JJ bird_NN was_VBD grieved_VBN that_IN as_IN his_PRP$ sons_NNS had_VBD all_RB gone_VBN out_RP into_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, he_PRP had_VBD not_RB first_RB warned_VBD them_PRP of_IN every_DT kind_NN of_IN danger_NN ,_, and_CC given_VBN them_PRP good_JJ instruction_NN how_WRB to_TO deal_VB with_IN each_DT ._.
In_IN the_DT autumn_NN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ sparrows_NNS assembled_VBN together_RB in_IN a_DT wheatfield_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX the_DT old_JJ bird_NN met_VBD his_PRP$ four_CD children_NNS again_RB ,_, and_CC full_JJ of_IN joy_NN took_VBD them_PRP home_RB with_IN him_PRP ._.
Ah_UH ,_, my_PRP$ dear_JJ sons_NNS ,_, how_WRB I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN worrying_VBG about_IN you_PRP all_DT through_IN the_DT summer_NN ,_, because_IN you_PRP got_VBD away_RB in_IN the_DT wind_NN without_IN my_PRP$ teaching_NN ._.
Listen_VB to_IN my_PRP$ words_NNS ,_, obey_VB your_PRP$ father_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB well_RB on_IN your_PRP$ guard_NN ._.
Little_JJ birds_NNS have_VBP to_TO encounter_VB great_JJ dangers_NNS ._.
And_CC then_RB he_PRP asked_VBD the_DT eldest_JJS where_WRB he_PRP had_VBD spent_VBN the_DT summer_NN ,_, and_CC how_WRB he_PRP had_VBD supported_VBN himself_PRP ._.
I_PRP stayed_VBD in_IN the_DT gardens_NNS ,_, and_CC looked_VBD for_IN caterpillars_NNS and_CC small_JJ worms_NNS ,_, until_IN the_DT cherries_NNS were_VBD ripe_JJ ._.
Ah_UH ,_, my_PRP$ son_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT father_NN ,_, tit-bits_NNS are_VBP not_RB bad_JJ ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ great_JJ risk_NN about_IN them_PRP ._.
On_IN that_DT account_NN take_VB great_JJ care_NN of_IN yourself_PRP henceforth_RB ,_, and_CC particularly_RB when_WRB people_NNS are_VBP going_VBG about_IN the_DT gardens_NNS who_WP carry_VBP long_JJ green_JJ poles_NNS which_WDT are_VBP hollow_JJ inside_RB and_CC have_VBP a_DT little_JJ hole_NN at_IN the_DT top_NN ._.
Yes_UH ,_, father_NN ,_, but_CC what_WP if_IN a_DT little_JJ green_JJ leaf_NN is_VBZ stuck_VBN over_IN the_DT hole_NN with_IN wax_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT son_NN ._.
Where_WRB have_VBP you_PRP seen_VBN that_DT ._.

If_IN you_PRP have_VBP been_VBN among_IN the_DT children_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, you_PRP have_VBP learned_VBN worldly_RB craftiness_JJ enough_RB ,_, only_RB see_VBP that_IN you_PRP use_VBP it_PRP well_RB ,_, and_CC do_VBP not_RB be_VB too_RB confident_JJ ._.
Then_RB he_PRP asked_VBD the_DT next_JJ ,_, where_WRB have_VBP you_PRP passed_VBN your_PRP$ time_NN ._.

There_EX one_CD finds_VBZ much_JJ gold_NN ,_, velvet_NN ,_, silk_NN ,_, armor_NN ,_, harnesses_NNS ,_, sparrow-hawks_NNS ,_, screech-owls_NNS and_CC lanners_NNS ._.

Yes_UH ,_, father_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT son_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB the_DT stable-boys_NNS make_VBP traps_NNS and_CC fix_VB their_PRP$ gins_NNS and_CC snares_NNS in_IN the_DT straw_NN ,_, many_PDT a_DT one_NN is_VBZ caught_VBN ._.
Where_WRB have_VBP you_PRP seen_VBN that_IN ,_, said_VBD the_DT old_JJ bird_NN ._.

If_IN you_PRP have_VBP been_VBN to_IN court_NN and_CC among_IN the_DT lords_NNS ,_, and_CC have_VBP left_VBN no_DT feathers_NNS there_RB ,_, you_PRP have_VBP learnt_VBN a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD know_VB very_RB well_RB how_WRB to_TO go_VB about_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, but_CC look_VBP around_IN you_PRP and_CC above_IN you_PRP ,_, for_IN the_DT wolves_NNS often_RB devour_VBP the_DT wisest_JJS dogs_NNS ._.
The_DT father_NN examined_VBD the_DT third_JJ also_RB ,_, where_WRB did_VBD you_PRP seek_VB your_PRP$ fortune_NN ._.
