That_DT is_VBZ indeed_RB dainty_NN fare_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT father_NN ,_, but_CC take_VB care_NN what_WP you_PRP are_VBP about_IN and_CC look_VB carefully_RB around_RB ,_, especially_RB when_WRB you_PRP see_VBP anyone_NN stooping_VBG and_CC about_IN to_TO pick_VB up_RP a_DT stone_NN ,_, for_IN then_RB you_PRP have_VBP not_RB much_JJ time_NN to_TO waste_VB ._.
That_DT is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, said_VBD the_DT son_NN ,_, but_CC what_WP if_IN anyone_NN should_MD carry_VB a_DT bit_NN of_IN rock_NN ,_, or_CC ore_NN ,_, ready_JJ beforehand_RB in_IN his_PRP$ breast_NN or_CC pocket_NN ._.
Where_WRB have_VBP you_PRP seen_VBN that_DT ._.
Among_IN the_DT miners_NNS ,_, dear_JJ father_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP get_VBP out_IN of_IN the_DT pit_NN ,_, they_PRP generally_RB take_VBP little_JJ bits_NNS of_IN ore_NN with_IN them_PRP ._.
Mining_NN folks_NNS are_VBP working_VBG folks_NNS ,_, and_CC clever_JJ folks_NNS ._.
If_IN you_PRP have_VBP been_VBN among_IN mining_NN lads_NNS ,_, you_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN and_CC learnt_VB something_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB you_PRP go_VBP thither_RB beware_RB ,_, for_IN many_JJ a_DT sparrow_NN has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN to_IN a_DT bad_JJ end_NN by_IN a_DT mining_NN boy_NN throwing_VBG a_DT piece_NN of_IN cobalt_NN ._.
At_IN length_NN the_DT father_NN came_VBD to_IN the_DT youngest_JJS son_NN ,_, you_PRP ,_, my_PRP$ dear_JJ chirping_NN nestling_NN ,_, were_VBD always_RB the_DT silliest_JJS and_CC weakest_JJS ._.
Stay_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_, the_DT world_NN has_VBZ many_JJ rough_JJ ,_, wicked_JJ birds_NNS which_WDT have_VBP crooked_VBN beaks_NNS and_CC long_JJ claws_NNS ,_, and_CC lie_VB in_IN wait_NN for_IN poor_JJ little_JJ birds_NNS and_CC swallow_VB them_PRP ._.
Keep_VB with_IN those_DT of_IN your_PRP$ own_JJ kind_NN ,_, and_CC pick_VB up_RP little_JJ spiders_NNS and_CC caterpillars_NNS from_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT houses_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP will_MD live_VB long_RB in_IN peace_NN ._.
My_PRP$ dear_JJ father_NN ,_, he_PRP who_WP feeds_VBZ himself_PRP without_IN injury_NN to_IN other_JJ people_NNS fares_NNS well_RB ,_, and_CC no_DT sparrow-hawk_NN ,_, eagle_UH ,_, or_CC kite_NN will_MD hurt_VB him_PRP if_IN he_PRP commits_VBZ himself_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ lawful_JJ food_NN ,_, evening_NN and_CC morning_NN ,_, faithfully_RB to_IN God_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ the_DT creator_NN and_CC preserver_NN of_IN all_DT forest_NN and_CC village_NN birds_NNS ,_, who_WP likewise_RB heareth_JJ the_DT cry_NN and_CC prayer_NN of_IN the_DT young_JJ ravens_NNS ,_, for_IN no_DT sparrow_NN or_CC wren_NNS ever_RB falls_VBZ to_IN the_DT ground_NN except_IN by_IN his_PRP$ will_NN ._.
Where_WRB have_VBP you_PRP learnt_VBN this_DT ._.
The_DT son_NN answered_VBD ,_, when_WRB the_DT great_JJ blast_NN of_IN wind_NN tore_VBD me_PRP away_RB from_IN you_PRP I_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT church_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB during_IN the_DT summer_NN I_PRP have_VBP picked_VBN up_RP the_DT flies_NNS and_CC spiders_NNS from_IN the_DT windows_NNS ,_, and_CC heard_VBD this_DT discourse_NN preached_VBD ._.
The_DT father_NN of_IN all_DT sparrows_NNS fed_VBD me_PRP all_PDT the_DT summer_NN through_IN ,_, and_CC kept_VBD me_PRP from_IN all_DT misfortune_NN and_CC from_IN ferocious_JJ birds_NNS ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, my_PRP$ dear_JJ son_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP take_VBP refuge_NN in_IN the_DT churches_NNS and_CC help_VB to_TO clear_VB away_RP spiders_NNS and_CC buzzing_VBG flies_NNS ,_, and_CC chirp_NNP unto_IN God_NNP like_IN the_DT young_JJ ravens_NNS ,_, and_CC commend_VB yourself_PRP to_IN the_DT eternal_JJ creator_NN ,_, all_DT will_MD be_VB well_RB with_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN even_RB if_IN the_DT whole_JJ world_NN were_VBD full_JJ of_IN wild_JJ malicious_JJ birds_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT poor_JJ widow_NN who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT lonely_JJ cottage_NN ._.
In_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT cottage_NN was_VBD a_DT garden_NN wherein_WRB stood_VBD two_CD rose-trees_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN which_WDT bore_VBD white_JJ and_CC the_DT other_JJ red_JJ roses_NNS ._.
She_PRP had_VBD two_CD children_NNS who_WP were_VBD like_IN the_DT two_CD rose-trees_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD was_VBD called_VBN snow-white_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ rose-red_VBN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD as_RB good_JJ and_CC happy_JJ ,_, as_RB busy_JJ and_CC cheerful_JJ as_IN ever_RB two_CD children_NNS in_IN the_DT world_NN were_VBD ,_, only_RB snow-white_NN was_VBD more_RBR quiet_JJ and_CC gentle_JJ than_IN rose-red_VBN ._.
Rose-red_NNP liked_VBD better_RBR to_TO run_VB about_IN in_IN the_DT meadows_NNS and_CC fields_NNS seeking_VBG flowers_NNS and_CC catching_VBG butterflies_NNS ,_, but_CC snow-white_NN sat_VBD at_IN home_NN with_IN her_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, and_CC helped_VBD her_PRP with_IN her_PRP$ house-work_NN ,_, or_CC read_VB to_IN her_PRP when_WRB there_EX was_VBD nothing_NN to_TO do_VB ._.
The_DT two_CD children_NNS were_VBD so_RB fond_JJ of_IN one_CD another_DT that_WDT they_PRP always_RB held_VBD each_DT other_JJ by_IN the_DT hand_NN when_WRB they_PRP went_VBD out_RB together_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB snow-white_NN said_VBD ,_, we_PRP will_MD not_RB leave_VB each_DT other_JJ ,_, rose-red_VBN answered_VBN ,_, never_RB so_RB long_RB as_IN we_PRP live_VBP ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ mother_NN would_MD add_VB ,_, what_WP one_NN has_VBZ she_PRP must_MD share_VB with_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
They_PRP often_RB ran_VBD about_IN the_DT forest_NN alone_RB and_CC gathered_VBD red_JJ berries_NNS ,_, and_CC no_DT beasts_NNS did_VBD them_PRP any_DT harm_NN ,_, but_CC came_VBD close_RB to_IN them_PRP trustfully_RB ._.
The_DT little_JJ hare_NN would_MD eat_VB a_DT cabbage-leaf_JJ out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, the_DT roe_NN grazed_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ side_NN ,_, the_DT stag_NN leapt_VB merrily_NN by_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT birds_NNS sat_VBD still_RB upon_IN the_DT boughs_NNS ,_, and_CC sang_VBD whatever_WP they_PRP knew_VBD ._.
No_DT mishap_NN overtook_VBD them_PRP ,_, if_IN they_PRP had_VBD stayed_VBN too_RB late_RB in_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC night_NN came_VBD on_RB ,_, they_PRP laid_VBD themselves_PRP down_RB near_IN one_CD another_DT upon_IN the_DT moss_NN ,_, and_CC slept_VBD until_IN morning_NN came_VBD ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ mother_NN knew_VBD this_DT and_CC did_VBD not_RB worry_VB on_IN their_PRP$ account_NN ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT king_NN ,_, but_CC where_WRB he_PRP reigned_VBD and_CC what_WP he_PRP was_VBD called_VBN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB ._.
He_PRP had_VBD no_DT son_NN ,_, but_CC an_DT only_JJ daughter_NN who_WP had_VBD always_RB been_VBN ill_JJ ,_, and_CC no_DT doctor_NN had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO cure_VB her_PRP ._.

Then_RB ,_, said_VBD the_DT little_JJ man_NN ,_, so_RB shall_MD they_PRP be_VB ,_, and_CC remain_VBP ._.

Hans_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, resolutely_RB maintained_VBD that_IN he_PRP most_RBS certainly_RB had_VBD no_DT frogs_NNS ,_, legs_NNS ,_, but_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT most_RBS beautiful_JJ apples_NNS in_IN the_DT whole_JJ kingdom_NN ._.
As_IN he_PRP spoke_VBD so_RB pleasantly_RB ,_, the_DT door-keeper_JJ thought_VBD he_PRP could_MD not_RB be_VB telling_VBG a_DT lie_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD him_PRP to_TO go_VB in_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD right_JJ ,_, for_IN when_WRB Hans_NNP uncovered_VBD his_PRP$ basket_NN in_IN the_DT kings_NNS presence_NN ,_, golden-yellow_JJ apples_NNS came_VBD tumbling_VBG out_RP ._.
The_DT king_NN was_VBD delighted_JJ ,_, and_CC caused_VBD some_DT of_IN them_PRP to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_IN his_PRP$ daughter_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB waited_VBD in_IN anxious_JJ expectation_NN until_IN news_NN should_MD be_VB brought_VBN to_IN him_PRP of_IN the_DT effect_NN they_PRP had_VBD ._.
But_CC before_IN much_JJ time_NN had_VBD passed_VBN by_RP ,_, news_NN was_VBD brought_VBN to_IN him_PRP ._.
And_CC who_WP do_VBP you_PRP think_VB it_PRP was_VBD who_WP came_VBD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD the_DT daughter_NN herself_PRP ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN she_PRP had_VBD eaten_VBN of_IN those_DT apples_NNS ,_, she_PRP was_VBD cured_VBN ,_, and_CC sprang_VBD out_IN of_IN her_PRP$ bed_NN ._.
The_DT joy_NN the_DT king_NN felt_VBD can_MD not_RB be_VB described_VBN ._.
But_CC now_RB he_PRP did_VBD not_RB want_VB to_TO give_VB his_PRP$ daughter_NN in_IN marriage_NN to_IN Hans_NNP ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP must_MD first_RB make_VB him_PRP a_DT boat_NN which_WDT would_MD go_VB quicker_RBR on_IN dry_JJ land_NN than_IN on_IN water_NN ._.
Hans_NNS agreed_VBD to_IN the_DT condition_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD home_RB ,_, and_CC related_VBD how_WRB it_PRP had_VBD fared_VBN with_IN him_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT father_NN sent_VBD uele_NNP into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT boat_NN of_IN that_DT kind_NN ._.
He_PRP worked_VBD diligently_RB ,_, and_CC whistled_VBD all_PDT the_DT time_NN ._.
At_IN mid-day_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT sun_NN was_VBD at_IN its_PRP$ highest_JJS ,_, came_VBD the_DT little_JJ icy_JJ man_NN and_CC asked_VBD what_WP he_PRP was_VBD making_VBG ._.

The_DT icy_NN man_NN said_VBD ,_, so_CC it_PRP shall_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC remain_VBP ._.
By_IN evening_NN uele_NNP thought_VBD he_PRP had_VBD now_RB made_VBN the_DT boat_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB he_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO get_VB into_IN it_PRP ,_, he_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN but_IN wooden_JJ bowls_NNS ._.
The_DT next_JJ day_NN same_JJ went_VBD into_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, but_CC everything_NN went_VBD with_IN him_PRP just_RB as_IN it_PRP had_VBD done_VBN with_IN uele_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN stupid_JJ Hans_NNP went_VBD ._.
He_PRP worked_VBD away_RP most_RBS industriously_RB ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT whole_JJ forest_NN resounded_VBD with_IN the_DT heavy_JJ blows_NNS ,_, and_CC all_PDT the_DT while_IN he_PRP sang_VBD and_CC whistled_VBN right_RB merrily_RB ._.

In_IN the_DT evening_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT sun_NN had_VBD turned_VBN into_IN gold_NN ,_, Hans_NNPS finished_VBD his_PRP$ boat_NN ,_, and_CC all_PDT that_DT was_VBD wanted_VBN for_IN it_PRP ._.
He_PRP got_VBD into_IN it_PRP and_CC rowed_VBN to_IN the_DT palace_NN ._.
The_DT boat_NN went_VBD as_RB swiftly_RB as_IN the_DT wind_NN ._.
The_DT king_NN saw_VBD it_PRP from_IN afar_RB ,_, but_CC would_MD not_RB give_VB his_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN Hans_NNPS yet_CC ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP must_MD first_RB take_VB a_DT hundred_CD hares_NNS out_IN to_TO pasture_VB from_IN early_JJ morning_NN until_IN late_JJ evening_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP got_VBD away_RB ,_, he_PRP should_MD not_RB have_VB his_PRP$ daughter_NN ._.
Hans_NNP was_VBD contented_VBN with_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ day_NN went_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ flock_NN to_IN the_DT pasture_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD great_JJ care_NN that_IN none_NN of_IN them_PRP ran_VBD away_RB ._.
Before_IN many_JJ hours_NNS had_VBD passed_VBN came_VBD a_DT servant_NN from_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, and_CC told_VBD Hans_NNPS that_IN he_PRP must_MD give_VB her_PRP a_DT hare_NN instantly_RB ,_, for_IN some_DT visitors_NNS had_VBD come_VBN unexpectedly_RB ._.
Hans_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD very_RB well_RB aware_JJ what_WP that_WDT meant_VBD ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP would_MD not_RB give_VB her_PRP$ one_CD ._.
The_DT king_NN might_MD set_VB some_DT hare_NN soup_NN before_IN his_PRP$ guest_NN next_JJ day_NN ._.

The_DT maid_NN told_VBD this_DT in_IN the_DT palace_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT daughter_NN did_VBD go_VB herself_PRP ._.

He_PRP said_VBD he_PRP had_VBD to_TO watch_VB over_RP a_DT hundred_CD hares_NNS and_CC see_VB that_IN none_NN of_IN them_PRP ran_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP might_MD marry_VB the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN and_CC be_VB king_NN ._.

The_DT king_NN wondered_VBD how_WRB Hans_NNPS had_VBD been_VBN able_JJ to_TO take_VB a_DT hundred_CD hares_NNS to_TO graze_VB without_IN losing_VBG any_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP still_RB would_MD not_RB give_VB him_PRP his_PRP$ daughter_NN yet_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP must_MD now_RB bring_VB him_PRP a_DT feather_NN from_IN the_DT griffins_NNS tail_NN ._.
Hans_NNS set_VBD out_RP at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC walked_VBD straight_JJ forwards_NNS ._.

Oh_UH ,_, to_IN the_DT griffin_NN ._.

Yes_UH ,_, indeed_RB ,_, said_VBD Hans_NNP ,_, I_PRP will_MD do_VB that_DT ._.
Early_RB the_DT next_JJ morning_NN he_PRP went_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN arrived_VBD at_IN another_DT castle_NN in_IN which_WDT he_PRP again_RB stayed_VBD the_DT night_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT people_NNS who_WP lived_VBD there_EX learnt_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD going_VBG to_IN the_DT griffin_NN ,_, they_PRP said_VBD they_PRP had_VBD in_IN the_DT house_NN a_DT daughter_NN who_WP was_VBD ill_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP had_VBD already_RB tried_VBN every_DT means_NNS to_TO cure_VB her_PRP ,_, but_CC none_NN of_IN them_PRP had_VBD done_VBN her_PRP any_DT good_JJ ,_, and_CC he_PRP might_MD be_VB so_RB kind_RB as_IN to_TO ask_VB the_DT griffin_NN what_WP would_MD make_VB their_PRP$ daughter_NN healthy_JJ again_RB ._.
Hans_NNS said_VBD he_PRP would_MD willingly_RB do_VB that_DT ,_, and_CC went_VBD onwards_RB ._.
Then_RB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT lake_NN ,_, and_CC instead_RB of_IN a_DT ferry-boat_NN ,_, a_DT tall_JJ ,_, tall_JJ man_NN was_VBD there_EX who_WP had_VBD to_TO carry_VB everybody_NN across_IN ._.
The_DT man_NN asked_VBD Hans_NNP whither_NNP he_PRP was_VBD journeying_VBG ._.
To_IN the_DT griffin_NN ,_, said_VBD Hans_NNP ._.

Yes_UH ,_, indeed_RB ,_, most_JJS certainly_RB Ill_NNP do_VBP that_DT ,_, said_VBD Hans_NNP ._.

At_IN length_NN Hans_NNPS arrived_VBD at_IN the_DT griffins_NNS house_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT wife_NN only_RB was_VBD at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB the_DT griffin_NN himself_PRP ._.

Yes_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT woman_NN ,_, one_PRP was_VBD here_RB to-day_: ,_, but_CC he_PRP went_VBD away_RB again_RB ._.
And_CC on_IN that_IN the_DT griffin_NN said_VBD no_DT more_JJR ._.
In_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT night_NN when_WRB the_DT griffin_NN was_VBD snoring_VBG loudly_RB ,_, Hans_NNPS reached_VBD out_RP and_CC plucked_VBD a_DT feather_NN from_IN his_PRP$ tail_NN ._.

He_PRP told_VBD me_PRP all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN things_NNS -_, that_IN in_IN one_CD castle_NN they_PRP had_VBD lost_VBN the_DT key_NN of_IN their_PRP$ money-chest_JJS ,_, and_CC could_MD find_VB it_PRP nowhere_RB ._.
Oh_UH ._.
The_DT fools_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT griffin_NN ._.
The_DT key_NN lies_VBZ in_IN the_DT wood-house_NN under_IN a_DT log_NN of_IN wood_NN behind_IN the_DT door_NN ._.
And_CC then_RB he_PRP said_VBD that_IN in_IN another_DT castle_NN the_DT daughter_NN was_VBD ill_JJ ,_, and_CC they_PRP knew_VBD no_DT remedy_NN that_WDT would_MD cure_VB her_PRP ._.
Oh_UH ._.
The_DT fools_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT griffin_NN ._.

And_CC then_RB he_PRP also_RB said_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT place_NN where_WRB there_EX was_VBD a_DT lake_NN and_CC a_DT man_NN beside_IN it_PRP who_WP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO carry_VB everybody_NN across_RB ._.
Oh_UH ,_, the_DT fool_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT griffin_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP only_RB put_VBD one_CD man_NN down_RP in_IN the_DT middle_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD never_RB have_VB to_TO carry_VB another_DT across_RB ._.
Early_RB the_DT next_JJ morning_NN the_DT griffin_NN got_VBD up_RP and_CC went_VBD out_RP ._.
Then_RB Hans_NNPS came_VBD forth_RB from_IN under_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ feather_NN ,_, and_CC had_VBD heard_VBN what_WP the_DT griffin_NN had_VBD said_VBN about_IN the_DT key_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT daughter_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT man_NN ._.
The_DT griffins_NNS wife_NN repeated_VBD it_PRP all_DT once_RB more_JJR to_IN him_PRP that_IN he_PRP might_MD not_RB forget_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP went_VBD home_RB again_RB ._.
First_RB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT man_NN by_IN the_DT lake_NN ,_, who_WP asked_VBD him_PRP what_WP the_DT griffin_NN had_VBD said_VBN ,_, but_CC Hans_NNP replied_VBD that_IN he_PRP must_MD first_RB carry_VB him_PRP across_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP would_MD tell_VB him_PRP ._.
So_RB the_DT man_NN carried_VBD him_PRP across_IN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD over_IN Hans_NNP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN all_DT he_PRP had_VBD to_TO do_VB was_VBD to_TO set_VB one_CD person_NN down_RP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT lake_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP would_MD never_RB have_VB to_TO carry_VB over_RP any_DT more_JJR ._.
The_DT man_NN was_VBD hugely_RB delighted_JJ ,_, and_CC told_VBD Hans_NNPS that_DT out_IN of_IN gratitude_NN he_PRP would_MD take_VB him_PRP once_RB more_RBR across_RB ,_, and_CC back_RB again_RB ._.
But_CC Hans_NNP said_VBD no_UH ,_, he_PRP would_MD save_VB him_PRP the_DT trouble_NN ,_, he_PRP was_VBD quite_RB satisfied_JJ already_RB ,_, and_CC pursued_VBD his_PRP$ way_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT castle_NN where_WRB the_DT daughter_NN was_VBD ill_JJ ._.
He_PRP took_VBD her_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS ,_, for_IN she_PRP could_MD not_RB walk_VB ,_, and_CC carried_VBD her_PRP down_RP the_DT cellar-steps_NNS and_CC pulled_VBD out_RP the_DT toads_NNS nest_NN from_IN beneath_IN the_DT lowest_JJS step_NN and_CC gave_VBD it_PRP into_IN her_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP sprang_VBD off_RP his_PRP$ shoulder_NN and_CC up_IN the_DT steps_NNS before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC was_VBD quite_RB cured_VBN ._.
Then_RB were_VBD the_DT father_NN and_CC mother_NN beyond_IN measure_NN rejoiced_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP gave_VBD Hans_NNPS gifts_NNS of_IN gold_NN and_CC of_IN silver_NN ,_, and_CC whatsoever_RB else_RB he_PRP wished_VBD for_IN ,_, that_IN they_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP ._.
And_CC when_WRB he_PRP got_VBD to_IN the_DT other_JJ castle_NN he_PRP went_VBD at_RB once_RB into_IN the_DT wood-house_NN ,_, and_CC found_VBD the_DT key_NN under_IN the_DT log_NN of_IN wood_NN behind_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD it_PRP to_IN the_DT lord_NN of_IN the_DT castle_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD not_RB a_DT little_RB pleased_JJ ,_, and_CC gave_VBD Hans_NNPS as_IN a_DT reward_NN much_JJ of_IN the_DT gold_NN that_WDT was_VBD in_IN the_DT chest_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN things_NNS besides_IN ,_, such_JJ as_IN cows_NNS ,_, and_CC sheep_NN ,_, and_CC goats_NNS ._.
When_WRB Hans_NNPS arrived_VBD before_IN the_DT king_NN ,_, with_IN all_PDT these_DT things_NNS -_: with_IN the_DT money_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT gold_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT silver_NN and_CC the_DT cows_NNS ,_, sheep_NN and_CC goats_NNS ,_, the_DT king_NN asked_VBD him_PRP how_WRB he_PRP had_VBD come_VBN by_IN them_PRP ._.
Then_RB Hans_NNPS told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT griffin_NN gave_VBD every_DT one_CD whatsoever_RB he_PRP wanted_VBD ._.
So_RB the_DT king_NN thought_VBD he_PRP himself_PRP could_MD make_VB use_NN of_IN such_JJ things_NNS ,_, and_CC set_VBD out_RP on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN to_IN the_DT griffin_NN ,_, but_CC when_WRB he_PRP got_VBD to_IN the_DT lake_NN ,_, it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT very_RB first_JJ who_WP arrived_VBD there_RB after_IN Hans_NNPS ,_, and_CC the_DT man_NN put_VBD him_PRP down_RP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN it_PRP and_CC went_VBD away_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT king_NN was_VBD drowned_VBN ._.
Hans_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, married_VBD the_DT daughter_NN ,_, and_CC became_VBD king_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD once_RB a_DT man_NN and_CC a_DT woman_NN who_WP had_VBD an_DT only_JJ child_NN ,_, and_CC lived_VBD quite_RB alone_RB in_IN a_DT solitary_JJ valley_NN ._.
It_PRP came_VBD to_TO pass_VB that_IN the_DT mother_NN once_RB went_VBD into_IN the_DT wood_NN to_TO gather_VB branches_NNS of_IN fir_NN ,_, and_CC took_VBD with_IN her_PRP$ little_JJ Hans_NNPS ,_, who_WP was_VBD just_RB two_CD years_NNS old_JJ ._.
As_IN it_PRP was_VBD spring-time_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT child_NN took_VBD pleasure_NN in_IN the_DT many-colored_JJ flowers_NNS ,_, she_PRP went_VBD still_RB further_RB onwards_RB with_IN him_PRP into_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
Suddenly_RB two_CD robbers_NNS sprang_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT thicket_NN ,_, seized_VBD the_DT mother_NN and_CC child_NN ,_, and_CC carried_VBD them_PRP far_RB away_RB into_IN the_DT black_JJ forest_NN ,_, where_WRB no_DT one_NN ever_RB came_VBD from_IN one_CD years_NNS end_NN to_IN another_DT ._.
The_DT poor_JJ woman_NN urgently_RB begged_VBD the_DT robbers_NNS to_TO set_VB her_PRP and_CC her_PRP$ child_NN free_JJ ,_, but_CC their_PRP$ hearts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN of_IN stone_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD not_RB listen_VB to_IN her_PRP$ prayers_NNS and_CC entreaties_NNS ,_, and_CC drove_VBD her_PRP on_IN farther_RBR by_IN force_NN ._.
After_IN they_PRP had_VBD worked_VBN their_PRP$ way_NN through_IN bushes_NNS and_CC briars_NNS for_IN about_RB two_CD miles_NNS ,_, they_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT rock_NN where_WRB there_EX was_VBD a_DT door_NN ,_, at_IN which_WDT the_DT robbers_NNS knocked_VBD and_CC it_PRP opened_VBD at_IN once_RB ._.
They_PRP had_VBD to_TO go_VB through_IN a_DT long_JJ dark_JJ passage_NN ,_, which_WDT burnt_VBD on_IN the_DT hearth_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT wall_NN hung_VBD swords_NNS ,_, sabres_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ deadly_JJ weapons_NNS which_WDT gleamed_VBD in_IN the_DT light_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT midst_NN stood_VBD a_DT black_JJ table_NN at_IN which_WDT four_CD other_JJ robbers_NNS were_VBD sitting_VBG gambling_VBG ,_, and_CC the_DT captain_NN sat_VBD at_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN it_PRP ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP saw_VBD the_DT woman_NN he_PRP came_VBD and_CC spoke_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC told_VBD her_PRP to_TO be_VB at_IN ease_NN and_CC have_VBP no_DT fear_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD do_VB nothing_NN to_TO hurt_VB her_PRP ,_, but_CC she_PRP must_MD look_VB after_IN the_DT housekeeping_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN she_PRP kept_VBD everything_NN in_IN order_NN ,_, she_PRP should_MD not_RB fare_VB ill_JJ with_IN them_PRP ._.
Thereupon_IN they_PRP gave_VBD her_PRP$ something_NN to_TO eat_VB ,_, and_CC showed_VBD her_PRP a_DT bed_NN where_WRB she_PRP might_MD sleep_VB with_IN her_PRP$ child_NN ._.
The_DT woman_NN stayed_VBD many_JJ years_NNS with_IN the_DT robbers_NNS ,_, and_CC Hans_NNPS grew_VBD tall_JJ and_CC strong_JJ ._.
His_PRP$ mother_NN told_VBD him_PRP stories_NNS ,_, and_CC taught_VBD him_PRP to_TO read_VB an_DT old_JJ book_NN of_IN tales_NNS about_IN knights_NNS which_WDT she_PRP found_VBD in_IN the_DT cave_NN ._.
When_WRB Hans_NNP was_VBD nine_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, he_PRP made_VBD himself_PRP a_DT strong_JJ club_NN out_IN of_IN a_DT branch_NN of_IN fir_NN ,_, hid_VBD it_PRP behind_IN the_DT bed_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB went_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, dear_JJ mother_NN ,_, pray_NN tell_VB me_PRP who_WP is_VBZ my_PRP$ father_NN ._.
I_PRP must_MD and_CC will_MD know_VB ._.
His_PRP$ mother_NN was_VBD silent_JJ and_CC would_MD not_RB tell_VB him_PRP ,_, that_IN he_PRP might_MD not_RB become_VB home-sick_JJ ._.
Moreover_RB she_PRP knew_VBD that_IN the_DT godless_NN robbers_NNS would_MD not_RB let_VB him_PRP go_VB away_RB ,_, but_CC it_PRP almost_RB broke_VBD her_PRP$ heart_NN that_IN Hans_NNP should_MD not_RB go_VB to_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, when_WRB the_DT robbers_NNS came_VBD home_RB from_IN their_PRP$ robbing_NN expedition_NN ,_, Hans_NNP brought_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ club_NN ,_, stood_VBD before_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP now_RB wish_VBP to_TO know_VB who_WP my_PRP$ father_NN is_VBZ ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP do_VBP not_RB tell_VB me_PRP at_IN once_RB I_PRP will_MD strike_VB you_PRP down_RB ._.
Then_RB the_DT captain_NN laughed_VBD ,_, and_CC gave_VBD Hans_NNPS such_PDT a_DT box_NN on_IN the_DT ear_NN that_IN he_PRP rolled_VBD under_IN the_DT table_NN ._.
Hans_NNS got_VBD up_RP again_RB ,_, held_VBD his_PRP$ tongue_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD wait_VB another_DT year_NN and_CC then_RB try_VBP again_RB ,_, perhaps_RB I_PRP shall_MD do_VB better_RBR then_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT year_NN was_VBD over_RB ,_, he_PRP brought_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ club_NN again_RB ,_, rubbed_VBD the_DT dust_NN off_IN it_PRP ,_, looked_VBD at_IN it_PRP well_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT stout_JJ strong_JJ club_NN ._.
At_IN night_NN the_DT robbers_NNS came_VBD home_RB ,_, drank_NN one_CD jug_NN of_IN wine_NN after_IN another_DT ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ heads_NNS began_VBD to_TO be_VB heavy_JJ ._.
Then_RB Hans_NNP brought_VBD out_RP his_PRP$ club_NN ,_, placed_VBD himself_PRP before_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD him_PRP who_WP his_PRP$ father_NN was_VBD ._.
But_CC the_DT captain_NN again_RB gave_VBD him_PRP such_PDT a_DT vigorous_JJ box_NN on_IN the_DT ear_NN that_IN Hans_NNP rolled_VBD under_IN the_DT table_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB long_JJ before_IN he_PRP was_VBD up_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC so_RB beat_VBP the_DT captain_NN and_CC the_DT robbers_NNS with_IN his_PRP$ club_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP could_MD no_RB longer_RBR move_VB either_CC their_PRP$ arms_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ legs_NNS ._.
His_PRP$ mother_NN stood_VBD in_IN a_DT corner_NN full_JJ of_IN admiration_NN for_IN his_PRP$ bravery_NN and_CC strength_NN ._.
When_WRB Hans_NNPS had_VBD done_VBN his_PRP$ work_NN ,_, he_PRP went_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, now_RB I_PRP have_VBP shown_VBN myself_PRP to_TO be_VB in_IN earnest_JJ ,_, but_CC now_RB I_PRP must_MD also_RB know_VB who_WP my_PRP$ father_NN is_VBZ ._.
Dear_JJ Hans_NNPS ,_, answered_VBD the_DT mother_NN ,_, come_VB ,_, we_PRP will_MD go_VB and_CC seek_VB him_PRP until_IN we_PRP find_VBP him_PRP ._.

They_PRP left_VBD the_DT cave_NN ,_, but_CC how_WRB Hans_NNPS did_VBD open_VB his_PRP$ eyes_NNS when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT darkness_NN into_IN daylight_NN ,_, and_CC saw_VBD the_DT green_JJ forest_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT flowers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT birds_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT morning_NN sun_NN in_IN the_DT sky_NN ._.

The_DT father_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG in_IN the_DT doorway_NN ._.

But_CC Hans_NNP ,_, although_IN he_PRP was_VBD not_RB twelve_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, was_VBD a_DT head_NN taller_JJR than_IN his_PRP$ father_NN ._.
They_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT little_JJ room_NN together_RB ,_, but_CC Hans_NNP had_VBD scarcely_RB put_VBN his_PRP$ sack_NN on_IN the_DT bench_NN by_IN the_DT stove_NN ,_, than_IN the_DT whole_JJ house_NN began_VBD to_TO crack_VB -_: the_DT bench_NN broke_VBD down_RP and_CC then_RB the_DT floor_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT heavy_JJ sack_NN fell_VBD through_RB into_IN the_DT cellar_NN ._.

The_DT father_NN and_CC Hans_NNPS at_IN once_RB began_VBD to_TO build_VB a_DT new_JJ house_NN ,_, to_TO buy_VB cattle_NNS and_CC land_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO keep_VB a_DT farm_NN ._.
Hans_NNS ploughed_VBD the_DT fields_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP followed_VBD the_DT plough_NN and_CC pushed_VBD it_PRP into_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, the_DT bullocks_NNS had_VBD scarcely_RB any_DT need_NN to_TO draw_VB ._.

When_WRB the_DT stick_NN was_VBD ready_JJ ,_, he_PRP left_VBD his_PRP$ fathers_NNS house_NN ,_, went_VBD forth_RB ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_IN a_DT deep_JJ ,_, dark_JJ forest_NN ._.
There_RB he_PRP heard_VBD something_NN crunching_VBG and_CC cracking_VBG ,_, looked_VBD round_RB ,_, and_CC saw_VBD a_DT fir-tree_NN which_WDT was_VBD wound_VBN round_RB like_IN a_DT rope_NN from_IN the_DT bottom_NN to_IN the_DT top_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP looked_VBD upwards_RB he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT great_JJ fellow_NN who_WP had_VBD laid_VBN hold_NN of_IN the_DT tree_NN and_CC was_VBD twisting_VBG it_PRP like_IN a_DT willow-wand_NN ._.

That_DT is_VBZ what_WP I_PRP like_VBP ,_, thought_VBD Hans_NNPS ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ some_DT strength_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP called_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, leave_VB that_DT alone_RB ,_, and_CC come_VB with_IN me_PRP ._.
The_DT fellow_NN came_VBD down_RB ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD taller_JJR by_IN a_DT whole_JJ head_NN than_IN Hans_NNP ,_, and_CC Hans_NNP was_VBD not_RB little_JJ ._.
Your_PRP$ name_NN is_VBZ now_RB fir-twister_JJ ,_, said_VBD Hans_NNP to_IN him_PRP ._.

When_WRB Hans_NNPS asked_VBD what_WP he_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG ,_, he_PRP answered_VBD ,_, at_IN night_NN ,_, when_WRB I_PRP want_VBP to_TO sleep_VB ,_, bears_NNS ,_, wolves_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ vermin_NN of_IN that_DT kind_NN come_VBP ,_, which_WDT sniff_NN and_CC snuffle_VB about_IN me_PRP and_CC wo_MD nt_RB let_VB me_PRP rest_VB ,_, so_RB I_PRP want_VBP to_TO build_VB myself_PRP a_DT house_NN and_CC lay_VBD myself_PRP inside_IN it_PRP ,_, so_IN that_IN I_PRP may_MD have_VB some_DT peace_NN ._.

You_PRP shall_MD be_VB called_VBN rock-splitter_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT evening_NN they_PRP came_VBD to_IN an_DT old_JJ deserted_JJ castle_NN ,_, went_VBD up_RP into_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC laid_VBD themselves_PRP down_RP in_IN the_DT hall_NN to_TO sleep_VB ._.
The_DT next_JJ morning_NN Hans_NNPS went_VBD into_IN the_DT garden_NN ._.
It_PRP had_VBD run_VBN quite_RB wild_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD full_JJ of_IN thorns_NNS and_CC brambles_NNS ._.
And_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD thus_RB walking_VBG round_RB about_IN ,_, a_DT wild_JJ boar_NN rushed_VBD at_IN him_PRP ,_, he_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, gave_VBD it_PRP such_PDT a_DT blow_NN with_IN his_PRP$ club_NN that_WDT it_PRP fell_VBD directly_RB ._.
He_PRP took_VBD it_PRP on_IN his_PRP$ shoulders_NNS and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP in_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP put_VBP it_PRP on_IN a_DT spit_NN ,_, roasted_VBD it_PRP ,_, and_CC enjoyed_VBD themselves_PRP ._.
Then_RB they_PRP arranged_VBD that_IN each_DT day_NN ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, two_CD should_MD go_VB out_RP hunting_NN ,_, and_CC one_PRP should_MD stay_VB at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC cook_VB nine_CD pounds_NNS of_IN meat_NN for_IN each_DT of_IN them_PRP ._.
Fir-twister_NNP stayed_VBD at_IN home_NN the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC Hans_NNPS and_CC rock-splitter_NN went_VBD out_RP hunting_NN ._.
When_WRB fir-twister_NNP was_VBD busy_JJ cooking_NN ,_, a_DT little_JJ shrivelled-up_HYPH old_JJ mannikin_NN came_VBD to_IN him_PRP in_IN the_DT castle_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD for_IN some_DT meat_NN ._.

But_CC how_WRB astonished_VBN fir-twister_NN was_VBD when_WRB the_DT little_JJ insignificant_JJ dwarf_NN sprang_VBD up_RP at_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC belabored_VBD him_PRP so_RB with_IN his_PRP$ fists_NNS that_IN he_PRP could_MD not_RB defend_VB himself_PRP ,_, but_CC fell_VBD on_IN the_DT ground_NN and_CC gasped_VBD for_IN breath_NN ._.
The_DT dwarf_NN did_VBD not_RB go_VB away_RB until_IN he_PRP had_VBD thoroughly_RB vented_VBN his_PRP$ anger_NN on_IN him_PRP ._.
When_WRB the_DT two_CD others_NNS came_VBD home_RB from_IN hunting_NN ,_, fir-twister_NN said_VBD nothing_NN to_IN them_PRP of_IN the_DT old_JJ mannikin_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT blows_NNS which_WDT he_PRP himself_PRP had_VBD received_VBN ,_, and_CC thought_VBN ,_, when_WRB they_PRP stay_VBP at_IN home_RB ,_, they_PRP may_MD just_RB try_VB their_PRP$ chance_NN with_IN the_DT little_JJ scrubbing-brush_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT mere_JJ thought_NN of_IN that_DT gave_VBD him_PRP pleasure_NN already_RB ._.
The_DT next_JJ day_NN rock-splitter_NN stayed_VBD at_IN home_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP fared_VBD just_RB as_IN fir-twister_NN had_VBD done_VBN ,_, being_VBG very_RB ill-treated_VBN by_IN the_DT dwarf_NN because_IN he_PRP was_VBD not_RB willing_JJ to_TO give_VB him_PRP any_DT meat_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT others_NNS came_VBD home_RB in_IN the_DT evening_NN ,_, fir-twister_NN saw_VBD clearly_RB what_WP he_PRP had_VBD suffered_VBN ,_, but_CC both_DT kept_VBD silence_NN ,_, and_CC thought_VBD ,_, Hans_NNP also_RB must_MD taste_VB some_DT of_IN that_DT soup_NN ._.
Hans_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD to_TO stay_VB at_IN home_NN the_DT next_JJ day_NN ,_, did_VBD his_PRP$ work_NN in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN as_IN it_PRP had_VBD to_TO be_VB done_VBN ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD standing_VBG skimming_VBG the_DT pan_NN ,_, the_DT dwarf_NN came_VBD and_CC without_IN more_RBR ado_NN demanded_VBD a_DT piece_NN of_IN meat_NN ._.
Then_RB Hans_NNP thought_VBD ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT poor_JJ wretch_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD give_VB him_PRP some_DT of_IN my_PRP$ share_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT others_NNS may_MD not_RB run_VB short_JJ ,_, and_CC handed_VBD him_PRP a_DT bit_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT dwarf_NN had_VBD devoured_VBN it_PRP ,_, he_PRP again_RB asked_VBD for_IN some_DT meat_NN ,_, and_CC good-natured_VBD Hans_NNP gave_VBD it_PRP to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC told_VBD him_PRP it_PRP was_VBD a_DT handsome_JJ piece_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB content_JJ with_IN it_PRP ._.
But_CC the_DT dwarf_NN begged_VBD again_RB for_IN the_DT third_JJ time_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT malicious_JJ dwarf_NN wanted_VBD to_TO spring_VB on_IN him_PRP and_CC treat_VB him_PRP as_IN he_PRP had_VBD treated_VBN fir-twister_NN and_CC rock-splitter_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP had_VBD chosen_VBN the_DT wrong_JJ man_NN ._.
Hans_NNP ,_, without_IN exerting_VBG himself_PRP much_JJ ,_, gave_VBD him_PRP a_DT couple_NN of_IN blows_NNS which_WDT made_VBD him_PRP jump_VB down_IN the_DT castle_NN steps_NNS ._.
Hans_NNP was_VBD about_JJ to_TO run_VB after_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC fell_VBD right_RB over_RB ,_, flat_JJ on_IN his_PRP$ face_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP rose_VBD up_RP again_RB ,_, the_DT dwarf_NN had_VBD got_VBN the_DT start_NN of_IN him_PRP ._.

Hans_NNP now_RB went_VBD home_RB ,_, but_CC he_PRP had_VBD marked_VBN the_DT spot_NN ._.

He_PRP told_VBD them_PRP what_WP had_VBD happened_VBN ,_, and_CC then_RB they_PRP no_RB longer_RBR concealed_VBD how_WRB it_PRP had_VBD fared_VBN with_IN them_PRP ._.
Hans_NNS laughed_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, it_PRP served_VBD you_PRP quite_RB right_RB ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT disgrace_NN that_IN you_PRP who_WP are_VBP so_RB big_JJ should_MD have_VB let_VBN yourselves_PRP be_VB beaten_VBN by_IN the_DT dwarf_NN ._.
Thereupon_RB they_PRP took_VBD a_DT basket_NN and_CC a_DT rope_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT three_CD went_VBD to_IN the_DT hole_NN in_IN the_DT rock_NN into_IN which_WDT the_DT dwarf_NN had_VBD slipped_VBN ,_, and_CC let_VB Hans_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ club_NN down_RB in_IN the_DT basket_NN ._.
When_WRB Hans_NNPS had_VBD reached_VBN the_DT bottom_NN ,_, he_PRP found_VBD a_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP opened_VBD it_PRP a_DT maiden_NN was_VBD sitting_VBG there_RB who_WP was_VBD lovely_JJ as_IN any_DT picture_NN ,_, nay_UH ,_, so_RB beautiful_JJ that_IN no_DT words_NNS can_MD express_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC by_IN her_PRP$ side_NN sat_VBD the_DT dwarf_NN and_CC grinned_VBN at_IN Hans_NNPS like_IN a_DT sea-cat_NN ._.
She_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD bound_VBN with_IN chains_NNS ,_, and_CC looked_VBD so_RB mournfully_RB at_IN him_PRP that_IN Hans_NNP felt_VBD great_JJ pity_NN for_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC thought_VBD to_IN himself_PRP ,_, you_PRP must_MD deliver_VB her_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT wicked_JJ dwarf_NN ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP such_PDT a_DT blow_NN with_IN his_PRP$ club_NN that_WDT he_PRP fell_VBD down_RB dead_JJ ._.
Immediately_RB the_DT chains_NNS fell_VBD from_IN the_DT maiden_NN ,_, and_CC Hans_NNP was_VBD enraptured_VBN with_IN her_PRP$ beauty_NN ._.
She_PRP told_VBD him_PRP she_PRP was_VBD a_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN whom_WP a_DT savage_JJ count_NN had_VBD stolen_VBN away_RB from_IN her_PRP$ home_NN ,_, and_CC imprisoned_VBD there_RB among_IN the_DT rocks_NNS ,_, because_IN she_PRP would_MD have_VB nothing_NN to_TO say_VB to_IN him_PRP ._.
The_DT count_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, had_VBD set_VBN the_DT dwarf_NN as_IN a_DT watchman_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP had_VBD made_VBN her_PRP$ suffer_VB misery_NN and_CC vexation_NN enough_RB ._.
And_CC now_RB Hans_NNPS placed_VBD the_DT maiden_NN in_IN the_DT basket_NN and_CC had_VBD her_PRP drawn_VBN up_RP ._.
The_DT basket_NN came_VBD down_RB again_RB ,_, but_CC Hans_NNP did_VBD not_RB trust_VB his_PRP$ two_CD companions_NNS ,_, and_CC thought_VBN ,_, they_PRP have_VBP already_RB shown_VBN themselves_PRP to_TO be_VB false_JJ ,_, and_CC told_VBD me_PRP nothing_NN about_IN the_DT dwarf_NN ._.
Who_WP knows_VBZ what_WDT design_NN they_PRP may_MD have_VB against_IN me_PRP ._.
So_RB he_PRP put_VBD his_PRP$ club_NN in_IN the_DT basket_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD lucky_JJ he_PRP did_VBD ,_, for_IN when_WRB the_DT basket_NN was_VBD half-way_JJ up_RB ,_, they_PRP let_VBP it_PRP fall_VB again_RB ,_, and_CC if_IN Hans_NNP had_VBD really_RB been_VBN sitting_VBG in_IN it_PRP he_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN killed_VBN ._.
But_CC now_RB he_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB he_PRP was_VBD to_TO work_VB his_PRP$ way_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT depths_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP turned_VBD it_PRP over_RP and_CC over_RB in_IN his_PRP$ mind_NN he_PRP found_VBD no_DT counsel_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ indeed_RB sad_JJ ,_, said_VBD he_PRP to_IN himself_PRP ,_, that_IN I_PRP have_VBP to_TO waste_VB away_RB down_RB here_RB ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD thus_RB walking_VBG backwards_RB and_CC forwards_NNS ,_, he_PRP once_RB more_RBR came_VBD to_IN the_DT little_JJ chamber_NN where_WRB the_DT maiden_NN had_VBD been_VBN sitting_VBG ,_, and_CC saw_VBD that_IN the_DT dwarf_NN had_VBD a_DT ring_NN on_IN his_PRP$ finger_NN which_WDT shone_VBD and_CC sparkled_VBD ._.
Then_RB he_PRP drew_VBD it_PRP off_RP and_CC put_VB it_PRP on_RP ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP turned_VBD it_PRP round_RB on_IN his_PRP$ finger_NN ,_, he_PRP suddenly_RB heard_VBD something_NN rustle_JJ over_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._.
He_PRP looked_VBD up_RP and_CC saw_VBD spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT air_NN hovering_NN above_RB ,_, who_WP told_VBD him_PRP he_PRP was_VBD their_PRP$ master_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD what_WP his_PRP$ desire_NN might_MD be_VB ._.
Hans_NNP was_VBD at_IN first_RB struck_VBN dumb_JJ ,_, but_CC afterwards_RB he_PRP said_VBD that_IN they_PRP were_VBD to_TO carry_VB him_PRP up_RP again_RB ._.
They_PRP obeyed_VBD instantly_RB ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD just_RB as_IN if_IN he_PRP had_VBD flown_VBN up_RP himself_PRP ._.
But_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD arrived_VBN there_RB ,_, he_PRP found_VBD no_DT one_NN in_IN sight_NN ._.

But_CC Hans_NNP turned_VBD the_DT ring_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT air_NN came_VBD and_CC told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT two_CD were_VBD on_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.
Hans_NNP ran_VBD and_CC ran_VBD without_IN stopping_VBG ,_, until_IN he_PRP came_VBD to_IN the_DT sea-shore_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX far_RB ,_, far_RB out_RB on_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, he_PRP perceived_VBD a_DT little_JJ boat_NN in_IN which_WDT his_PRP$ faithless_NN comrades_NNS were_VBD sitting_VBG ,_, and_CC in_IN fierce_JJ anger_NN he_PRP leapt_VBD ,_, without_IN thinking_VBG what_WP he_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG ,_, club_NN in_IN hand_NN into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC began_VBD to_TO swim_VB ,_, but_CC the_DT club_NN ,_, which_WDT weighed_VBD a_DT hundredweight_NN ,_, dragged_VBD him_PRP deep_RB down_RB until_IN he_PRP was_VBD all_DT but_CC drowned_VBN ._.
Then_RB in_IN the_DT very_RB nick_NN of_IN time_NN he_PRP turned_VBD his_PRP$ ring_NN ,_, and_CC immediately_RB the_DT spirits_NNS of_IN the_DT air_NN came_VBD and_CC bore_VBD him_PRP as_RB swift_JJ as_IN lightning_NN into_IN the_DT boat_NN ._.
He_PRP swung_VBD his_PRP$ club_NN and_CC gave_VBD his_PRP$ wicked_JJ comrades_NNS the_DT reward_NN they_PRP merited_VBD and_CC threw_VBD them_PRP into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP sailed_VBD with_IN the_DT beautiful_JJ maiden_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN in_IN the_DT greatest_JJS alarm_NN ,_, and_CC whom_WP he_PRP delivered_VBD for_IN the_DT second_JJ time_NN ,_, home_RB to_IN her_PRP$ father_NN and_CC mother_NN ,_, and_CC married_VBD her_PRP ,_, and_CC all_DT rejoiced_VBN exceedingly_RB ._.
A_DT poor_JJ wood-cutter_NN lived_VBD with_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN and_CC three_CD daughters_NNS in_IN a_DT little_JJ hut_NN on_IN the_DT edge_NN of_IN a_DT lonely_JJ forest_NN ._.

The_DT girl_NN found_VBD in_IN the_DT kitchen_NN abundance_NN of_IN everything_NN ,_, and_CC cooked_VBD a_DT good_JJ supper_NN ,_, but_CC had_VBD no_DT thought_NN of_IN the_DT animals_NNS ._.

The_DT girl_NN went_VBD up_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP had_VBD shaken_VBN the_DT beds_NNS and_CC put_VBN clean_JJ sheets_NNS on_RB ,_, she_PRP lay_VBD down_RP in_IN one_CD of_IN them_PRP without_IN waiting_VBG any_DT longer_RBR for_IN the_DT old_JJ man_NN ._.

Late_RB at_IN night_NN ,_, the_DT wood-cutter_NN came_VBD home_NN ,_, and_CC reproached_VBD his_PRP$ wife_NN for_IN leaving_VBG him_PRP to_IN hunger_NN all_DT day_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB my_PRP$ fault_NN ,_, she_PRP replied_VBD ,_, the_DT girl_NN went_VBD out_RP with_IN your_PRP$ dinner_NN ,_, and_CC must_MD have_VB lost_VBN herself_PRP ,_, but_CC surely_RB she_PRP will_MD come_VB back_RB to-morrow_RB ._.
The_DT wood-cutter_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, arose_VBD before_IN dawn_NN to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT forest_NN ,_, and_CC requested_VBD that_IN the_DT second_JJ daughter_NN should_MD take_VB him_PRP his_PRP$ dinner_NN that_DT day_NN ._.

The_DT girl_NN wandered_VBD about_IN in_IN the_DT forest_NN until_IN night_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP too_RB reached_VBD the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, was_VBD told_VBN to_TO go_VB in_RB ,_, and_CC begged_VBN for_IN food_NN and_CC a_DT bed_NN ._.

Outside_RB is_VBZ food_NN in_IN plenty_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD look_VB after_IN them_PRP first_RB ._.

Then_RB she_PRP fetched_VBD a_DT bucketful_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cock_NN and_CC hen_NN jumped_VBD on_RP to_IN the_DT edge_NN of_IN it_PRP and_CC dipped_VBD their_PRP$ beaks_NNS in_IN ,_, and_CC then_RB held_VBD up_RP their_PRP$ heads_NNS as_IN the_DT birds_NNS do_VBP when_WRB they_PRP drink_VBP ,_, and_CC the_DT brindled_VBN cow_NN also_RB took_VBD a_DT hearty_JJ draught_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT animals_NNS were_VBD fed_VBN ,_, the_DT girl_NN seated_VBD herself_PRP at_IN the_DT table_NN by_IN the_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC ate_VBD what_WP he_PRP had_VBD left_VBN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD not_RB long_JJ before_IN the_DT cock_NN and_CC the_DT hen_NN began_VBD to_TO thrust_VB their_PRP$ heads_NNS beneath_IN their_PRP$ wings_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN the_DT cow_NN likewise_RB began_VBD to_TO blink_VB ._.

There_EX was_VBD a_DT sound_NN of_IN cracking_VBG and_CC splitting_NN in_IN every_DT corner_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT doors_NNS sprang_VBD open_RB ,_, and_CC beat_VB against_IN the_DT walls_NNS ._.

No_DT one_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB with_IN me_PRP but_CC my_PRP$ three_CD attendants_NNS in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN a_DT cock_NN ,_, a_DT hen_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT brindled_VBN cow_NN ._.
The_DT spell_NN was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB broken_VBN until_IN a_DT girl_NN came_VBD to_IN us_PRP whose_WP$ heart_NN was_VBD so_RB good_JJ that_IN she_PRP showed_VBD herself_PRP full_JJ of_IN love_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB towards_IN mankind_NN ,_, but_CC towards_IN animals_NNS -_: and_CC that_IN you_PRP have_VBP done_VBN ,_, and_CC by_IN you_PRP at_IN midnight_NN we_PRP were_VBD set_VBN free_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ hut_NN in_IN the_DT forest_NN was_VBD changed_VBN back_RB again_RB into_IN my_PRP$ royal_JJ palace_NN ._.

Then_RB you_PRP will_MD see_VB what_WP will_MD happen_VB ._.
The_DT wife_NN did_VBD as_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN told_VBD her_PRP ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT girl_NN who_WP was_VBD young_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ ,_, but_CC she_PRP had_VBD lost_VBN her_PRP$ mother_NN when_WRB she_PRP was_VBD quite_PDT a_DT child_NN ,_, and_CC her_PRP$ step-mother_NN did_VBD all_DT she_PRP could_MD to_TO make_VB the_DT girls_NNS life_NN wretched_JJ ._.

One_CD day_NN she_PRP said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, here_RB are_VBP twelve_CD pounds_NNS of_IN feathers_NNS which_WDT you_PRP must_MD pick_VB ,_, and_CC if_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB done_VBN this_DT evening_NN ,_, you_PRP may_MD expect_VB a_DT good_JJ beating_NN ._.

The_DT poor_JJ girl_NN sat_VBD down_RP to_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, but_CC tears_NNS ran_VBD down_RP her_PRP$ cheeks_NNS as_IN she_PRP did_VBD so_RB ,_, for_IN she_PRP saw_VBD plainly_RB enough_RB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO finish_VB the_DT work_NN in_IN one_CD day_NN ._.

When_WRB she_PRP entered_VBD the_DT brightly_RB lighted_VBN hall_NN ,_, every_DT one_NN started_VBD back_RB in_IN amazement_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT one_CD knew_VBD who_WP she_PRP was_VBD ._.
The_DT kings_NNS son_NN went_VBD to_TO meet_VB her_PRP ,_, but_CC he_PRP did_VBD not_RB recognize_VB her_PRP ._.

They_PRP want_VBP to_TO put_VB an_DT end_NN to_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC cleanse_VB the_DT forest_NN of_IN such_PDT a_DT monster_NN as_IN you_PRP ._.
Oho_NNP ._.
Said_VBD the_DT giant_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD trample_VB you_PRP all_DT to_IN death_NN like_IN so_RB many_JJ ants_NNS ._.
Do_VBP you_PRP think_VB you_PRP can_MD do_VB anything_NN against_IN us_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT drummer_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP stoop_VBP to_TO take_VB hold_NN of_IN one_CD ,_, he_PRP will_MD jump_VB away_RB and_CC hide_VB himself_PRP ._.
But_CC when_WRB you_PRP are_VBP lying_VBG down_RP and_CC sleeping_VBG ,_, they_PRP will_MD come_VB forth_RB from_IN every_DT thicket_NN ,_, and_CC creep_VB up_IN to_IN you_PRP ._.
Every_DT one_CD of_IN them_PRP has_VBZ a_DT hammer_NN of_IN steel_NN in_IN his_PRP$ belt_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN that_DT they_PRP will_MD beat_VB in_IN your_PRP$ skull_NN ._.
The_DT giant_NN grew_VBD angry_JJ and_CC thought_VBD ,_, if_IN I_PRP meddle_VBP with_IN the_DT crafty_JJ folk_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD turn_VB out_RP badly_RB for_IN me_PRP ._.
I_PRP can_MD strangle_VB wolves_NNS and_CC bears_NNS ,_, but_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB protect_VB myself_PRP from_IN these_DT earth-worms_NNS ._.
Listen_VB ,_, little_JJ fellow_NN ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, go_VB back_RB again_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD promise_VB you_PRP that_IN for_IN the_DT future_NN I_PRP will_MD leave_VB you_PRP and_CC your_PRP$ comrades_NNS in_IN peace_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN there_EX is_VBZ anything_NN else_JJ you_PRP wish_VBP for_IN ,_, tell_VB me_PRP ,_, for_IN I_PRP am_VBP quite_RB willing_JJ to_TO do_VB something_NN to_TO please_VB you_PRP ._.
You_PRP have_VBP long_JJ legs_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT drummer_NN ,_, and_CC can_MD run_VB quicker_JJR than_IN I_PRP ._.
Carry_VB me_PRP to_IN the_DT glass-mountain_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP will_MD give_VB my_PRP$ followers_NNS a_DT signal_NN to_TO go_VB back_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP shall_MD leave_VB you_PRP in_IN peace_NN this_DT time_NN ._.
Come_VB here_RB ,_, worm_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT giant_NN ._.

The_DT giant_NN lifted_VBD him_PRP up_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT drummer_NN began_VBD to_TO beat_VB his_PRP$ drum_NN up_RP aloft_RB to_IN his_PRP$ hearts_NNS delight_NN ._.
The_DT giant_JJ thought_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ the_DT signal_NN for_IN the_DT other_JJ people_NNS to_TO turn_VB back_RP ._.
After_IN a_DT while_NN ,_, a_DT second_JJ giant_NN was_VBD standing_VBG in_IN the_DT road_NN ,_, who_WP took_VBD the_DT drummer_NN from_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC stuck_VBD him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ button-hole_NN ._.
The_DT drummer_NN laid_VBD hold_NN of_IN the_DT button_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD as_RB large_JJ as_IN a_DT dish_NN ,_, held_VBN on_RP by_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC looked_VBD merrily_RB around_RB ._.
Then_RB they_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT third_JJ giant_NN ,_, who_WP took_VBD him_PRP out_IN of_IN the_DT button-hole_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD him_PRP on_IN the_DT rim_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hat_NN ._.
Up_IN there_RB the_DT drummer_NN walked_VBD backwards_RB and_CC forwards_NNS ,_, and_CC looked_VBD over_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP perceived_VBD a_DT mountain_NN in_IN the_DT blue_JJ distance_NN ,_, he_PRP thought_VBD ,_, that_WDT must_MD be_VB the_DT glass-mountain_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB it_PRP was_VBD ._.
The_DT giant_NN only_RB made_VBD two_CD more_JJR steps_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP reached_VBD the_DT foot_NN of_IN the_DT mountain_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT giant_NN put_VBD him_PRP down_RP ._.
The_DT drummer_NN demanded_VBD to_TO be_VB put_VBN on_IN the_DT summit_NN of_IN the_DT glass-mountain_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT giant_NN shook_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, growled_VBD something_NN in_IN his_PRP$ beard_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD back_RB into_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
And_CC now_RB the_DT poor_JJ drummer_NN was_VBD standing_VBG before_IN the_DT mountain_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD as_RB high_JJ as_IN if_IN three_CD mountains_NNS were_VBD piled_VBN on_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN as_RB smooth_JJ as_IN a_DT looking-glass_NN ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO get_VB up_RP it_PRP ._.
He_PRP began_VBD to_TO climb_VB ,_, but_CC that_DT was_VBD useless_JJ ,_, for_IN he_PRP always_RB slipped_VBD back_RB again_RB ._.

The_DT saddle_NN is_VBZ worth_JJ fighting_VBG about_IN ,_, answered_VBD one_CD of_IN the_DT men_NNS ._.

On_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT mountain_NN was_VBD a_DT plain_JJ ._.

He_PRP saw_VBD neither_CC men_NNS nor_CC animals_NNS ,_, everything_NN was_VBD quiet_JJ ._.
Only_RB the_DT wind_NN rustled_VBD amongst_IN the_DT trees_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT clouds_NNS moved_VBN by_IN quite_RB close_JJ above_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._.

The_DT old_JJ woman_NN let_VBD him_PRP go_VB in_RB ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP some_DT food_NN and_CC a_DT good_JJ bed_NN at_IN night_NN ._.

He_PRP baled_VBD the_DT whole_JJ morning_NN ._.

So_CC he_PRP gave_VBD it_PRP up_RP and_CC sat_VBD down_RP ._.
Then_RB came_VBD a_DT maiden_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT house_NN who_WP set_VBD a_DT little_JJ basket_NN with_IN food_NN before_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, what_WP ails_VBZ you_PRP ,_, that_IN you_PRP sit_VBP so_RB sadly_RB here_RB ._.

As_RB soon_RB as_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS were_VBD shut_VBN ,_, she_PRP turned_VBD a_DT wishing-ring_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, rise_VB ,_, water_NN ._.
Fishes_NNS ,_, come_VB out_RP ._.
Instantly_RB the_DT water_NN rose_VBD on_IN high_JJ like_IN a_DT white_JJ mist_NN ,_, and_CC moved_VBD away_RB with_IN the_DT other_JJ clouds_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT fishes_NNS sprang_VBD on_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC laid_VBD themselves_PRP side_NN by_IN side_NN each_DT according_VBG to_IN his_PRP$ size_NN and_CC kind_NN ._.

She_PRP behaved_VBD as_IN if_IN she_PRP did_VBD not_RB notice_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD nothing_NN ,_, but_CC looked_VBD at_IN him_PRP with_IN malicious_JJ eyes_NNS ._.

She_PRP turned_VBD her_PRP$ wishing-ring_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN an_DT instant_JJ the_DT whole_JJ forest_NN fell_VBD down_RP with_IN a_DT crash_NN ,_, the_DT wood_NN split_NN ,_, and_CC arranged_VBD itself_PRP in_IN heaps_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP seemed_VBD just_RB as_IN if_IN unseen_JJ giants_NNS were_VBD finishing_VBG the_DT work_NN ._.

But_CC she_PRP pretended_VBD not_RB to_TO feel_VB it_PRP ,_, laughed_VBN scornfully_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, early_JJ to-morrow_JJ morning_NN you_PRP shall_MD arrange_VB all_PDT the_DT wood_NN in_IN one_CD heap_NN ,_, set_VB fire_NN to_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC burn_VB it_PRP ._.
He_PRP rose_VBD at_IN break_NN of_IN day_NN ,_, and_CC began_VBD to_TO pick_VB up_RP the_DT wood_NN ,_, but_CC how_WRB can_MD a_DT single_JJ man_NN get_VB a_DT whole_JJ forest_NN together_RB ._.
The_DT work_NN made_VBD no_DT progress_NN ._.
The_DT maiden_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, did_VBD not_RB desert_VB him_PRP in_IN his_PRP$ need_NN ._.
She_PRP brought_VBD him_PRP his_PRP$ food_NN at_IN noon_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD eaten_VBN ,_, he_PRP laid_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN on_IN her_PRP$ lap_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD to_IN sleep_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, the_DT entire_JJ pile_NN of_IN wood_NN was_VBD burning_VBG in_IN one_CD enormous_JJ flame_NN ,_, which_WDT stretched_VBD its_PRP$ tongues_NNS out_RP into_IN the_DT sky_NN ._.

Do_VBP whatever_WDT she_PRP asks_VBZ you_PRP without_IN fear_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO get_VB the_DT better_JJR of_IN you_PRP ,_, but_CC if_IN you_PRP are_VBP afraid_JJ ,_, the_DT fire_NN will_MD lay_VB hold_NN of_IN you_PRP ,_, and_CC consume_VBP you_PRP ._.
At_IN last_JJ when_WRB you_PRP have_VBP done_VBN everything_NN ,_, seize_VB her_PRP with_IN both_CC your_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, and_CC throw_VB her_PRP into_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT fire_NN ._.
The_DT maiden_NN departed_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT old_JJ woman_NN came_VBD sneaking_VBG up_RP to_IN him_PRP ._.

When_WRB you_PRP have_VBP done_VBN that_DT ,_, you_PRP are_VBP free_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD go_VB where_WRB you_PRP like_VBP ._.
Now_RB ,_, jump_NN in_RB ._.

He_PRP sprang_VBD into_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN the_DT flames_NNS ,_, but_CC they_PRP did_VBD not_RB hurt_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC could_MD not_RB even_RB singe_VB a_DT hair_NN of_IN his_PRP$ head_NN ._.
He_PRP carried_VBD the_DT log_NN out_RP ,_, and_CC laid_VBD it_PRP down_RP ._.

Just_RB as_IN she_PRP was_VBD about_RB to_TO fall_VB on_IN the_DT maiden_NN and_CC take_VB her_PRP away_RB ,_, the_DT youth_NN seized_VBD the_DT old_JJ woman_NN with_IN both_CC his_PRP$ hands_NNS ,_, raised_VBD her_PRP$ up_RP on_IN high_JJ ,_, and_CC threw_VBD her_PRP into_IN the_DT jaws_NNS of_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, which_WDT closed_VBD over_IN her_PRP as_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD delighted_JJ that_IN an_DT old_JJ witch_NN was_VBD to_TO be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
Then_RB the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN looked_VBD at_IN the_DT drummer_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP saw_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD a_DT handsome_JJ youth_NN and_CC remembered_VBD how_WRB he_PRP had_VBD risked_VBN his_PRP$ life_NN to_TO deliver_VB her_PRP ,_, she_PRP gave_VBD him_PRP her_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, you_PRP have_VBP ventured_VBN everything_NN for_IN my_PRP$ sake_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP also_RB will_MD do_VB everything_NN for_IN yours_PRP ._.
Promise_NN to_TO be_VB true_JJ to_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC you_PRP shall_MD be_VB my_PRP$ husband_NN ._.
We_PRP shall_MD not_RB want_VB for_IN riches_NNS ,_, we_PRP shall_MD have_VB enough_JJ with_IN what_WP the_DT witch_NN has_VBZ gathered_VBN together_RB here_RB ._.
She_PRP led_VBD him_PRP into_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, where_WRB there_EX were_VBD chests_NNS and_CC coffers_NNS crammed_VBN with_IN the_DT old_JJ womans_NNS treasures_NNS ._.
The_DT maiden_NN left_VBD the_DT gold_NN and_CC silver_NN where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ,_, and_CC took_VBD only_RB the_DT precious_JJ stones_NNS ._.
She_PRP would_MD not_RB stay_VB any_RB longer_RBR on_IN the_DT glass-mountain_NN ,_, so_CC the_DT drummer_NN said_VBD to_IN her_PRP ,_, seat_VB yourself_PRP by_IN me_PRP on_IN my_PRP$ saddle_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB we_PRP will_MD fly_VB down_RB like_IN birds_NNS ._.

Then_RB the_DT corn_NN grew_VBD from_IN the_DT bottom_NN to_IN the_DT very_JJ top_NN of_IN the_DT stalk_NN ,_, and_CC according_VBG to_IN the_DT length_NN of_IN the_DT stalk_NN was_VBD the_DT length_NN of_IN the_DT ear_NN ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT king_NN who_WP had_VBD a_DT daughter_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP caused_VBD a_DT glass_NN mountain_NN to_TO be_VB made_VBN ,_, and_CC said_VBD that_IN whosoever_WP could_MD cross_VB to_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN it_PRP without_IN falling_VBG should_MD have_VB his_PRP$ daughter_NN to_IN wife_NN ._.

The_DT princess_NN married_VBD her_PRP$ betrothed_JJ ,_, and_CC lived_VBD right_RB happily_RB in_IN great_JJ magnificence_NN and_CC joy_NN ._.

The_DT third_JJ son_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD afraid_JJ she_PRP might_MD change_VB him_PRP into_IN a_DT raging_VBG wild_JJ beast_NN -_: a_DT bear_NN perhaps_RB ,_, or_CC a_DT wolf_NN ,_, went_VBD secretly_RB away_RB ._.
He_PRP had_VBD heard_VBN that_IN a_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN who_WP was_VBD bewitched_VBN ,_, was_VBD imprisoned_VBN in_IN the_DT castle_NN of_IN the_DT golden_JJ sun_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD waiting_VBG to_TO be_VB set_VBN free_JJ ._.
Those_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, who_WP tried_VBD to_TO free_VB her_PRP risked_VBD their_PRP$ lives_NNS ._.

She_PRP went_VBD out_RB and_CC sought_VBD maid_NN maleen_NN ._.

But_CC what_WP did_VBD you_PRP say_VB to_IN the_DT foot-bridge_NN when_WRB we_PRP went_VBD over_IN it_PRP asked_VBD the_DT kings_NNS son_NN ._.
To_IN the_DT foot-bridge_NN ,_, she_PRP answered_VBD ._.
I_PRP do_VBP nt_RB talk_VB to_IN foot-bridges_NNS ._.
Then_RB you_PRP are_VBP not_RB the_DT true_JJ bride_NN ._.
And_CC ran_VBD out_RP and_CC scolded_VBD maid_NN maleen_NN ,_, girl_NN ,_, what_WP did_VBD you_PRP say_VB to_IN the_DT foot-bridge_NN ._.
That_DT costs_VBZ you_PRP your_PRP$ life_NN ,_, cried_VBD the_DT bride_NN ,_, but_CC she_PRP hurried_VBD into_IN the_DT room_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP know_VBP now_RB what_WP I_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT foot-bridge_NN ,_, and_CC she_PRP repeated_VBD the_DT words_NNS ._.
But_CC what_WP did_VBD you_PRP say_VB to_IN the_DT church-door_NN ._.

Then_RB you_PRP are_VBP not_RB the_DT true_JJ bride_NN ._.
She_PRP went_VBD out_RB and_CC scolded_VBD maid_NN maleen_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, girl_NN ,_, what_WP did_VBD you_PRP say_VB to_IN the_DT church-door_NN ._.
That_DT will_MD break_VB your_PRP$ neck_NN for_IN you_PRP ,_, cried_VBD the_DT bride_NN ,_, and_CC flew_VBD into_IN a_DT terrible_JJ passion_NN ,_, but_CC she_PRP hastened_VBD back_RB into_IN the_DT room_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP know_VBP now_RB what_WP I_PRP said_VBD to_IN the_DT church-door_NNP ,_, and_CC she_PRP repeated_VBD the_DT words_NNS ._.
But_CC where_WRB have_VBP you_PRP the_DT jewel_NN which_WDT I_PRP gave_VBD you_PRP at_IN the_DT church-door_NN ._.
What_WDT jewel_NN ,_, she_PRP answered_VBD ,_, you_PRP did_VBD not_RB give_VB me_PRP any_DT jewel_NN ._.

He_PRP drew_VBD the_DT veil_NN from_IN her_PRP$ face_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP saw_VBD her_PRP$ immeasurable_JJ ugliness_NN ,_, he_PRP sprang_VBD back_RB terrified_VBN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, how_WRB do_VBP you_PRP come_VB here_RB ._.
Who_WP are_VBP you_PRP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP your_PRP$ betrothed_VBN bride_NN ,_, but_CC because_IN I_PRP feared_VBD lest_IN the_DT people_NNS should_MD mock_VB me_PRP when_WRB they_PRP saw_VBD me_PRP out_IN of_IN doors_NNS ,_, I_PRP commanded_VBD the_DT scullery-maid_NN to_TO dress_VB herself_PRP in_IN my_PRP$ clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO go_VB to_IN church_NN instead_RB of_IN me_PRP ._.
Where_WRB is_VBZ the_DT girl_NN ,_, said_VBD he_PRP I_PRP want_VBP to_TO see_VB her_PRP ,_, go_VB and_CC bring_VB her_PRP here_RB ._.
She_PRP went_VBD out_RB and_CC told_VBD the_DT servants_NNS that_IN the_DT scullery-maid_NN was_VBD an_DT impostor_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP must_MD take_VB her_PRP out_RP into_IN the_DT court-yard_NN and_CC strike_VB off_RP her_PRP$ head_NN ._.
The_DT servants_NNS laid_VBD hold_NN of_IN maid_NN maleen_NN and_CC wanted_VBD to_TO drag_VB her_PRP out_RP ,_, but_CC she_PRP screamed_VBD so_RB loudly_RB for_IN help_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT kings_NNS son_NN heard_VBD her_PRP$ voice_NN ,_, hurried_VBD out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ chamber_NN and_CC ordered_VBD them_PRP to_TO set_VB the_DT maiden_NN free_JJ instantly_RB ._.
Lights_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN ,_, and_CC then_RB he_PRP saw_VBD on_IN her_PRP$ neck_NN the_DT gold_NN chain_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD given_VBN her_PRP at_IN the_DT church-door_NN ._.
You_PRP are_VBP the_DT true_JJ bride_NN ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, who_WP went_VBD with_IN me_PRP to_IN church_NN ,_, come_VB with_IN me_PRP now_RB to_IN my_PRP$ room_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP were_VBD both_DT alone_RB ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, on_IN the_DT way_NN to_IN the_DT church_NN you_PRP did_VBD name_VB maid_NN maleen_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD my_PRP$ betrothed_VBN bride_NN ._.
If_IN I_PRP could_MD believe_VB it_PRP possible_JJ ,_, I_PRP should_MD think_VB she_PRP was_VBD standing_VBG before_IN me_PRP -_, you_PRP are_VBP like_IN her_PRP in_IN every_DT respect_NN ._.
She_PRP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP maid_VBN maleen_NN ,_, who_WP for_IN your_PRP$ sake_NN was_VBD imprisoned_VBN seven_CD years_NNS in_IN the_DT darkness_NN ,_, who_WP suffered_VBD hunger_NN and_CC thirst_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ lived_VBN so_RB long_RB in_IN want_NN and_CC poverty_NN ._.
Today_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT sun_NN is_VBZ shining_VBG on_IN me_PRP once_RB more_RBR ._.

Then_RB they_PRP kissed_VBD each_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC were_VBD happy_JJ all_PDT the_DT days_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ lives_NNS ._.

The_DT tower_NN in_IN which_WDT maid_VBD maleen_NNP had_VBD been_VBN imprisoned_VBN remained_VBN standing_VBG for_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB on_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT mother_NN who_WP had_VBD three_CD daughters_NNS ,_, the_DT eldest_JJS of_IN whom_WP was_VBD rude_JJ and_CC wicked_JJ ,_, the_DT second_RB much_RB better_JJR ,_, although_IN she_PRP had_VBD her_PRP$ faults_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT youngest_JJS was_VBD a_DT pious_JJ ,_, good_JJ child_NN ._.
The_DT mother_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, was_VBD so_RB strange_JJ ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD just_RB the_DT eldest_JJS daughter_NN whom_WP she_PRP most_RBS loved_VBD ,_, and_CC she_PRP could_MD not_RB bear_VB the_DT youngest_JJS ._.
On_IN this_DT account_NN ,_, she_PRP often_RB sent_VBD the_DT poor_JJ girl_NN out_RP into_IN the_DT great_JJ forest_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO get_VB rid_VBN of_IN her_PRP ,_, for_IN she_PRP thought_VBD she_PRP would_MD lose_VB herself_PRP and_CC never_RB come_VB back_RB again_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT guardian-angel_NN which_WDT every_DT good_JJ child_NN has_VBZ ,_, did_VBD not_RB forsake_VB her_PRP ,_, but_CC always_RB brought_VBD her_PRP into_IN the_DT right_JJ path_NN again_RB ._.
Once_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT guardian-angel_NN behaved_VBD as_IN if_IN he_PRP were_VBD not_RB there_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT child_NN could_MD not_RB find_VB her_PRP$ way_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT forest_NN again_RB ._.
She_PRP walked_VBD on_IN constantly_RB until_IN evening_NN came_VBD ,_, and_CC then_RB she_PRP saw_VBD a_DT tiny_JJ light_NN burning_NN in_IN the_DT distance_NN ,_, ran_VBD up_RP to_IN it_PRP at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC came_VBD to_IN a_DT little_JJ hut_NN ._.
She_PRP knocked_VBD ,_, the_DT door_NN opened_VBD ,_, and_CC she_PRP came_VBD to_IN a_DT second_JJ door_NN ,_, where_WRB she_PRP knocked_VBD again_RB ._.
An_DT old_JJ man_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD a_DT snow-white_JJ beard_NN and_CC looked_VBN venerable_JJ ,_, opened_VBD it_PRP for_IN her_PRP ._.
And_CC he_PRP was_VBD no_DT other_JJ than_IN St_NNP ._.
Joseph_NNP ._.
He_PRP said_VBD quite_RB kindly_RB ,_, come_VB ,_, dear_JJ child_NN ,_, seat_VB yourself_PRP on_IN my_PRP$ little_JJ chair_NN by_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC warm_VB yourself_PRP ._.

St_NNP ._.
Joseph_NNP gave_VBD her_PRP the_DT roots_NNS ._.
The_DT girl_NN scraped_VBD them_PRP clean_JJ ,_, then_RB she_PRP brought_VBD a_DT piece_NN of_IN pancake_NN and_CC the_DT bread_NN that_WDT her_PRP$ mother_NN had_VBD given_VBN her_PRP to_TO take_VB with_IN her_PRP ,_, mixed_VBN all_DT together_RB in_IN a_DT pan_NN ,_, and_CC cooked_VBD herself_PRP a_DT thick_JJ soup_NN ._.
When_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ready_JJ ,_, St_NNP ._.

The_DT child_NN was_VBD quite_RB willing_JJ ,_, and_CC gave_VBD him_PRP more_JJR than_IN she_PRP kept_VBD for_IN herself_PRP ,_, but_CC Gods_NNPS blessing_NN was_VBD with_IN her_PRP ,_, so_IN that_IN she_PRP was_VBD satisfied_JJ ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD eaten_VBN ,_, St_NNP ._.

But_CC St_NNP ._.
Joseph_NNP took_VBD the_DT child_NN in_IN his_PRP$ arms_NNS ,_, and_CC carried_VBD her_PRP into_IN the_DT little_JJ bed_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB she_PRP said_VBD her_PRP$ prayers_NNS ,_, and_CC fell_VBD asleep_JJ ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN when_WRB she_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, she_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO say_VB good_JJ morning_NN to_IN St_NNP ._.
Joseph_NNP ,_, but_CC she_PRP did_VBD not_RB see_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP got_VBD up_RP and_CC looked_VBD for_IN him_PRP ,_, but_CC could_MD not_RB find_VB him_PRP anywhere_RB ._.
At_IN last_JJ she_PRP perceived_VBD ,_, behind_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, a_DT bag_NN with_IN money_NN so_RB heavy_JJ that_IN she_PRP could_MD just_RB carry_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC on_IN it_PRP was_VBD written_VBN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD for_IN the_DT child_NN who_WP had_VBD slept_VBN there_RB that_DT night_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT she_PRP took_VBD the_DT bag_NN ,_, bounded_VBD away_RP with_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC got_VBD safely_RB to_IN her_PRP$ mother_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN she_PRP gave_VBD her_PRP$ mother_NN all_PDT the_DT money_NN ,_, she_PRP could_MD not_RB help_VB being_VBG satisfied_JJ with_IN her_PRP ._.

The_DT eldest_JJS daughter_NN had_VBD by_IN this_DT time_NN grown_VBN inquisitive_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT next_JJ morning_NN also_RB insisted_VBD on_IN going_VBG out_RP into_IN the_DT forest_NN ._.
Her_PRP$ mother_NN gave_VBD her_PRP$ pancakes_NNS -_, as_RB many_JJ as_IN she_PRP wanted_VBD ,_, and_CC bread_NN and_CC cheese_NN as_RB well_RB ._.

But_CC she_PRP ate_VBD nearly_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC St_NNP ._.

She_PRP took_VBD it_PRP without_IN making_VBG any_DT opposition_NN ,_, laid_VBD herself_PRP down_RB in_IN the_DT little_JJ bed_NN ,_, and_CC left_VBD the_DT hard_JJ straw_NN to_IN the_DT white-haired_JJ man_NN ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN when_WRB she_PRP awoke_VBD ,_, St_NNP ._.
Joseph_NNP was_VBD not_RB to_TO be_VB found_VBN ,_, but_CC she_PRP did_VBD not_RB trouble_VB herself_PRP about_IN that_DT ._.
She_PRP looked_VBD behind_IN the_DT door_NN for_IN a_DT money-bag_NN ._.
She_PRP fancied_VBD something_NN was_VBD lying_VBG on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN she_PRP could_MD not_RB very_RB well_RB distinguish_VB what_WP it_PRP was_VBD ,_, she_PRP stooped_VBD down_RP ,_, so_IN that_IN she_PRP touched_VBD it_PRP with_IN her_PRP$ nose_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP remained_VBD hanging_NN ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP got_VBD up_RP again_RB ,_, she_PRP saw_VBD ,_, to_IN her_PRP$ horror_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT second_JJ nose_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD hanging_VBG fast_RB to_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ ._.
Then_RB she_PRP began_VBD to_TO scream_VB and_CC howl_NN ,_, but_CC that_DT did_VBD no_DT good_JJ ._.
She_PRP always_RB had_VBD to_TO look_VB at_IN her_PRP$ nose_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP stretched_VBD out_RP so_RB far_RB ._.
Then_RB she_PRP ran_VBD out_RP and_CC screamed_VBD without_IN stopping_VBG till_IN she_PRP met_VBD St_NNP ._.
Joseph_NNP ,_, at_IN whose_WP$ feet_NNS she_PRP fell_VBD and_CC begged_VBD until_IN ,_, out_IN of_IN pity_NN ,_, he_PRP took_VBD the_DT nose_NN off_RP her_PRP again_RB ,_, and_CC even_RB gave_VBD her_PRP$ two_CD farthings_NNS ._.
When_WRB she_PRP got_VBD home_RB ,_, her_PRP$ mother_NN was_VBD standing_VBG before_IN the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD ,_, what_WP have_VBP you_PRP had_VBD given_VBN to_IN you_PRP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP lied_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, a_DT great_JJ bag_NN of_IN money_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP have_VBP lost_VBN it_PRP on_IN the_DT way_NN ._.
Lost_VBD it_PRP ._.

At_IN first_RB she_PRP began_VBD to_TO cry_VB ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB wish_VB to_TO go_VB ,_, but_CC at_IN last_JJ she_PRP went_VBD ._.
On_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, so_RB many_JJ lizards_NNS and_CC snakes_NNS broke_VBD loose_JJ on_IN both_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, that_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB know_VB how_WRB to_TO save_VB themselves_PRP ._.
At_IN last_JJ they_PRP stung_VBD the_DT wicked_JJ child_NN to_IN death_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP stung_VBD the_DT mother_NN in_IN the_DT foot_NN ,_, because_IN she_PRP had_VBD not_RB brought_VBN her_PRP up_RP better_RBR ._.
Three_CD hundred_CD years_NNS before_IN the_DT birth_NN of_IN the_DT Lord_NNP christ_NN ,_, there_EX lived_VBD a_DT mother_NN who_WP had_VBD twelve_CD sons_NNS ,_, but_CC was_VBD so_RB poor_JJ and_CC needy_JJ that_IN she_PRP no_RB longer_RBR knew_VBD how_WRB she_PRP was_VBD to_TO keep_VB them_PRP alive_JJ ._.
She_PRP prayed_VBD to_IN God_NNP daily_RB that_IN he_PRP would_MD grant_VB that_IN all_PDT her_PRP$ sons_NNS might_MD be_VB on_IN the_DT earth_NN with_IN the_DT redeemer_NN who_WP was_VBD promised_VBN ._.
When_WRB her_PRP$ necessity_NN became_VBD still_RB greater_JJR she_PRP sent_VBD one_CD of_IN them_PRP after_IN the_DT other_JJ out_IN into_IN the_DT world_NN to_TO seek_VB their_PRP$ bread_NN ._.
The_DT eldest_JJS was_VBD called_VBN peter_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP went_VBD out_RB and_CC had_VBD already_RB walked_VBN a_DT long_JJ way_NN ,_, a_DT whole_JJ days_NNS journey_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP came_VBD into_IN a_DT great_JJ forest_NN ._.
He_PRP sought_VBD for_IN a_DT way_NN out_RB ,_, but_CC could_MD find_VB none_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD farther_RB and_CC farther_RB astray_RB ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN felt_VBD such_JJ great_JJ hunger_NN that_IN he_PRP could_MD scarcely_RB stand_VB ._.
At_IN length_NN he_PRP became_VBD so_RB weak_JJ that_IN he_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO lie_VB down_RP ,_, and_CC he_PRP believed_VBD death_NN to_TO be_VB at_IN hand_NN ._.
Suddenly_RB there_EX stood_VBD beside_IN him_PRP a_DT small_JJ boy_NN who_WP shone_VBD with_IN brightness_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD as_RB beautiful_JJ and_CC kind_RB as_IN an_DT angel_NN ._.
The_DT child_NN smote_VBD his_PRP$ little_JJ hands_NNS together_RB ,_, until_IN peter_NN was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO look_VB up_RP and_CC see_VB him_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT child_NN said_VBD ,_, why_WRB are_VBP you_PRP sitting_VBG there_RB in_IN such_JJ trouble_NN ._.
Alas_UH ._.

The_DT child_NN said_VBD ,_, come_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC your_PRP$ wish_NN shall_MD be_VB fulfilled_VBN ._.
He_PRP took_VBD poor_JJ peter_NN by_IN the_DT hand_NN ,_, and_CC led_VBD him_PRP between_IN some_DT cliffs_NNS to_IN a_DT great_JJ cavern_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP entered_VBD it_PRP ,_, everything_NN was_VBD shining_VBG with_IN gold_NN ,_, silver_NN ,_, and_CC crystal_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN it_PRP twelve_CD cradles_NNS were_VBD standing_VBG side_NN by_IN side_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD the_DT little_JJ angel_NN ,_, lie_VB down_RB in_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC sleep_VB a_DT while_NN ,_, I_PRP will_MD rock_VB you_PRP ._.
Peter_NNP did_VBD so_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT angel_NN sang_VBD to_IN him_PRP and_CC rocked_VBD him_PRP until_IN he_PRP was_VBD alseep_JJ ._.
And_CC when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD asleep_JJ ,_, the_DT second_JJ brother_NN came_VBD also_RB ,_, guided_VBN thither_RB by_IN his_PRP$ guardian_NN angel_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD rocked_VBN to_TO sleep_VB like_IN the_DT first_JJ ,_, and_CC thus_RB came_VBD the_DT others_NNS ,_, one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, until_IN all_DT twelve_CD lay_VBD there_RB sleeping_VBG in_IN the_DT golden_JJ cradles_NNS ._.

Then_RB they_PRP awoke_VBP ,_, and_CC were_VBD with_IN him_PRP on_IN earth_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD called_VBN the_DT twelve_CD apostles_NNS ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT poor_JJ woman_NN who_WP had_VBD two_CD children_NNS ._.
The_DT youngest_JJS had_VBD to_TO go_VB every_DT day_NN into_IN the_DT forest_NN to_TO fetch_VB wood_NN ._.
Once_RB when_WRB she_PRP had_VBD gone_VBN a_DT long_JJ way_NN to_TO seek_VB it_PRP ,_, a_DT little_JJ child_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD quite_RB strong_JJ ,_, came_VBD and_CC helped_VBD her_PRP industriously_RB to_TO pick_VB up_RP the_DT wood_NN and_CC carry_VB it_PRP home_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB before_IN a_DT moment_NN had_VBD passed_VBN the_DT strange_JJ child_NN disappeared_VBD ._.
The_DT child_NN told_VBD her_PRP$ mother_NN this_DT ,_, but_CC at_IN first_RB she_PRP would_MD not_RB believe_VB it_PRP ._.

He_PRP looked_VBD at_IN the_DT sky_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD so_RB beautifully_RB pure_JJ and_CC blue_JJ ,_, then_RB he_PRP sighed_VBD ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, how_WRB well_RB must_MD all_DT be_VB with_IN one_CD up_RB there_RB in_IN heaven_NN ._.
Then_RB he_PRP saw_VBD a_DT poor_JJ gray-haired_VBN man_NN who_WP was_VBD coming_VBG along_IN the_DT road_NN towards_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP spoke_VBD to_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC asked_VBD ,_, how_WRB can_MD I_PRP get_VB to_IN heaven_NN ._.
The_DT man_NN answered_VBN ,_, by_IN poverty_NN and_CC humility_NN ._.

He_PRP took_VBD nothing_NN but_CC a_DT little_JJ food_NN ,_, said_VBD nothing_NN ,_, but_CC prayed_VBD to_IN the_DT Lord_NNP to_TO take_VB him_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ heaven_NN ._.

There_EX were_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN two_CD sisters_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN whom_WP had_VBD no_DT children_NNS and_CC was_VBD rich_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ had_VBD five_CD and_CC was_VBD a_DT widow_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB poor_JJ that_IN she_PRP no_RB longer_RBR had_VBD food_NN enough_RB to_TO satisfy_VB herself_PRP and_CC her_PRP$ children_NNS ._.

There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT hermit_NN who_WP lived_VBD in_IN a_DT forest_NN at_IN the_DT foot_NN of_IN a_DT mountain_NN ,_, and_CC passed_VBD his_PRP$ time_NN in_IN prayer_NN and_CC good_JJ works_NNS ,_, and_CC every_DT evening_NN he_PRP carried_VBD ,_, to_IN the_DT glory_NN of_IN God_NNP ,_, two_CD pails_NNS of_IN water_NN up_IN the_DT mountain_NN ._.

And_CC because_IN the_DT hermit_NN was_VBD so_RB pious_JJ ,_, an_DT angel_NN of_IN God_NNP ,_, visible_JJ to_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS ,_, went_VBD up_RP with_IN him_PRP ,_, counted_VBD his_PRP$ steps_NNS ,_, and_CC when_WRB the_DT work_NN was_VBD completed_VBN ,_, brought_VBD him_PRP his_PRP$ food_NN ,_, even_RB as_IN the_DT prophet_NN of_IN old_JJ was_VBD by_IN Gods_NNPS command_NN fed_VBN by_IN the_DT raven_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT hermit_NN in_IN his_PRP$ piety_NN had_VBD already_RB reached_VBN a_DT great_JJ age_NN ,_, it_PRP happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP once_RB saw_VBD from_IN afar_RB a_DT poor_JJ sinner_NN being_VBG taken_VBN to_IN the_DT gallows_NNS ._.

He_PRP alone_RB sits_VBZ in_IN judgement_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT angel_NN stood_VBD beside_IN him_PRP with_IN a_DT dry_JJ branch_NN in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, you_PRP shall_MD carry_VB this_DT dry_JJ branch_NN until_IN three_CD green_JJ twigs_NNS sprout_VBP out_IN of_IN it_PRP ,_, but_CC at_IN night_NN when_WRB you_PRP will_MD sleep_VB ,_, you_PRP shall_MD lay_VB it_PRP under_IN your_PRP$ head_NN ._.

That_DT is_VBZ the_DT penance_NN which_WDT the_DT Lord_NNP lays_VBZ on_IN you_PRP ._.

And_CC the_DT old_JJ woman_NN was_VBD compassionate_JJ ,_, and_CC let_VB herself_PRP be_VB persuaded_VBN ._.

The_DT robbers_NNS were_VBD so_RB powerfully_RB touched_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ hearts_NNS by_IN this_DT story_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP were_VBD shocked_JJ with_IN their_PRP$ life_NN up_IN to_IN this_DT time_NN ,_, reflected_VBN ,_, and_CC began_VBD with_IN hearty_JJ repentance_NN to_TO do_VB penance_NN for_IN it_PRP ._.

Thus_RB the_DT Lord_NNP had_VBD once_RB more_RBR received_VBD him_PRP into_IN his_PRP$ favor_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT large_JJ town_NN there_EX was_VBD an_DT old_JJ woman_NN who_WP sat_VBD in_IN the_DT evening_NN alone_RB in_IN her_PRP$ room_NN thinking_VBG how_WRB she_PRP had_VBD lost_VBN first_RB her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, then_RB both_CC her_PRP$ children_NNS ,_, then_RB one_CD by_IN one_CD all_PDT her_PRP$ relatives_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN length_NN ,_, that_DT very_RB day_NN ,_, her_PRP$ last_JJ friend_NN ,_, and_CC now_RB she_PRP was_VBD quite_RB alone_RB and_CC desolate_JJ ._.
She_PRP was_VBD very_RB sad_JJ at_IN heart_NN ,_, and_CC heaviest_JJS of_IN all_PDT her_PRP$ losses_NNS to_IN her_PRP was_VBD that_DT of_IN her_PRP$ sons_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN her_PRP$ pain_NN she_PRP blamed_VBD God_NNP for_IN it_PRP ._.
She_PRP was_VBD still_RB sitting_VBG lost_VBN in_IN thought_NN ,_, when_WRB all_DT at_IN once_RB she_PRP heard_VBD the_DT bells_NNS ringing_VBG for_IN early_JJ prayer_NN ._.
She_PRP was_VBD surprised_JJ that_IN she_PRP had_VBD thus_RB in_IN her_PRP$ sorrow_NN watched_VBN through_IN the_DT whole_JJ night_NN ,_, and_CC lighted_VBD her_PRP$ lantern_NN and_CC went_VBD to_IN church_NN ._.

A_DT shoemaker_NN ,_, by_IN no_DT fault_NN of_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, had_VBD become_VBN so_RB poor_JJ that_IN at_IN last_JJ he_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN left_VBN but_CC leather_NN for_IN one_CD pair_NN of_IN shoes_NNS ._.

Now_RB it_PRP befell_VBD that_IN one_CD evening_NN not_RB long_RB before_IN christmas_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT man_NN had_VBD been_VBN cutting_VBG out_RP ,_, he_PRP said_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, before_IN going_VBG to_IN bed_NN ,_, what_WP think_VBP you_PRP if_IN we_PRP were_VBD to_TO stay_VB up_RB to-night_NN to_TO see_VB who_WP it_PRP is_VBZ that_DT lends_VBZ us_PRP this_DT helping_VBG hand_NN ._.

+++_NFP $_$ +++_NFP
There_EX was_VBD once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT man_NN who_WP was_VBD called_VBN frederick_JJ and_CC a_DT woman_NN called_VBN catherine_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD married_VBN each_DT other_JJ and_CC lived_VBD together_RB as_RB young_JJ married_JJ folks_NNS ._.
One_CD day_NN frederick_NN said_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD now_RB go_VB and_CC plough_NN ,_, catherine_NN ,_, when_WRB I_PRP come_VBP back_RB ,_, there_EX must_MD be_VB some_DT roast_JJ meat_NN on_IN the_DT table_NN for_IN hunger_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT fresh_JJ draught_NN for_IN thirst_NN ._.
Just_RB go_VB ,_, frederick_NN ,_, answered_VBN kate_NN ,_, just_RB go_VB ,_, I_PRP will_MD have_VB all_DT ready_JJ for_IN you_PRP ._.

At_IN this_DT same_JJ moment_NN up_RB came_VBD ,_, with_IN a_DT flock_NN of_IN sheep_NN ,_, the_DT very_RB shepherd_NN whom_WP the_DT peasant_NN knew_VBD had_VBD long_RB been_VBN wishing_VBG to_TO be_VB mayor_NN ,_, so_IN he_PRP cried_VBD with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ might_NN ,_, no_UH ,_, I_PRP will_MD not_RB do_VB it_PRP ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN the_DT fox_NN was_VBD talking_VBG to_IN the_DT wolf_NN of_IN the_DT strength_NN of_IN man_NN ._.

You_PRP have_VBP misled_VBN me_PRP finely_RB ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ._.

Next_JJ day_NN they_PRP again_RB went_VBD into_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT greedy_JJ wolf_NN once_RB more_RBR said_VBD ,_, red-fox_UH ,_, get_VB me_PRP something_NN to_TO eat_VB ,_, or_CC I_PRP will_MD eat_VB you_PRP yourself_PRP ._.

Yes_UH ,_, but_CC seat_VB yourself_PRP at_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN the_DT carriage_NN ,_, for_IN in_IN the_DT front_NN my_PRP$ little_JJ horses_NNS could_MD not_RB drag_VB you_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT procession_NN went_VBD onwards_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP reached_VBD a_DT stream_NN ._.
How_WRB are_VBP we_PRP to_TO cross_VB over_RB ,_, said_VBD the_DT little_JJ cock_NN ._.
A_DT straw_NN was_VBD lying_VBG by_IN the_DT stream_NN and_CC it_PRP said_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD lay_VB myself_PRP straight_RB across_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP can_MD drive_VB over_IN me_PRP ._.
But_CC when_WRB the_DT six_CD mice_NNS came_VBD to_IN the_DT bridge_NN ,_, the_DT straw_NN slipped_VBD and_CC fell_VBD into_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT six_CD mice_NNS all_DT fell_VBD in_IN and_CC were_VBD drowned_VBN ._.
Then_RB they_PRP were_VBD again_RB in_IN difficulty_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT coal_NN came_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP am_VBP large_JJ enough_RB ,_, I_PRP will_MD lay_VB myself_PRP across_RB ,_, and_CC you_PRP shall_MD drive_VB over_IN me_PRP ._.
So_IN the_DT coal_NN also_RB laid_VBD itself_PRP across_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, but_CC unhappily_RB just_RB touched_VBD it_PRP ,_, at_IN which_WDT the_DT coal_NN hissed_VBD ,_, was_VBD extinguished_VBN and_CC died_VBD ._.
When_WRB a_DT stone_NN saw_VBD that_IN ,_, it_PRP took_VBD pity_NN on_IN the_DT little_JJ cock_NN ,_, wished_VBD to_TO help_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC laid_VBD itself_PRP over_IN the_DT water_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT cock_NN drew_VBD the_DT carriage_NN himself_PRP ,_, but_CC when_WRB he_PRP got_VBD it_PRP over_RP and_CC reached_VBD the_DT shore_NN with_IN the_DT dead_JJ hen_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD about_JJ to_TO draw_VB over_IN the_DT others_NNS who_WP were_VBD sitting_VBG behind_RB as_RB well_RB ,_, there_EX were_VBD too_RB many_JJ of_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT carriage_NN ran_VBD back_RB ,_, and_CC they_PRP all_DT fell_VBD into_IN the_DT water_NN together_RB ,_, and_CC were_VBD drowned_VBN ._.
Then_RB the_DT little_JJ cock_NN was_VBD left_VBN alone_RB with_IN the_DT dead_JJ hen_NN ,_, and_CC dug_VBD a_DT grave_NN for_IN her_PRP and_CC laid_VBD her_PRP in_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC made_VBD a_DT mound_NN above_IN it_PRP ,_, on_IN which_WDT he_PRP sat_VBD down_RB and_CC fretted_VBN until_IN he_PRP died_VBD too_RB ,_, and_CC then_RB everyone_NN was_VBD dead_JJ ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT man_NN who_WP did_VBD nothing_NN but_IN gamble_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN that_DT reason_NN people_NNS never_RB called_VBD him_PRP anything_NN but_IN gambling_VBG Hansel_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN he_PRP never_RB ceased_VBD to_TO gamble_VB ,_, he_PRP played_VBD away_RP his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC all_PDT that_IN he_PRP had_VBD ._.
Now_RB the_DT very_JJ day_NN before_IN his_PRP$ creditors_NNS were_VBD to_TO take_VB his_PRP$ house_NN from_IN him_PRP ,_, came_VBD the_DT Lord_NNP and_CC St_NNP ._.

Then_RB gambling_VBG Hansel_NNP said_VBD ,_, for_IN my_PRP$ part_NN ,_, you_PRP may_MD stay_VB the_DT night_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP can_MD not_RB give_VB you_PRP a_DT bed_NN or_CC anything_NN to_TO eat_VB ._.

Meanwhile_RB St_NNP ._.

Our_PRP$ Lord_NNP then_RB inquired_VBD if_IN he_PRP had_VBD no_DT wine_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP said_VBD ,_, alack_UH ,_, sir_NN ,_, the_DT casks_NNS are_VBP all_RB empty_JJ ._.
