For_IN a_DT long_JJ time_NN he_PRP would_MD not_RB believe_VB this_DT ,_, but_CC at_IN length_NN he_PRP said_VBD ,_, well_UH ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB down_RB ,_, but_CC I_PRP know_VBP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ none_NN there_RB ._.
When_WRB he_PRP turned_VBD the_DT tap_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, lo_NN and_CC behold_VB ,_, the_DT best_JJS of_IN wine_NN ran_VBD out_RP ._.

Early_RB next_JJ day_NN our_PRP$ Lord_NNP told_VBD gambling_VBG Hansel_NNP that_IN he_PRP might_MD beg_VB three_CD favors_NNS ._.

Peter_NNP ._.
And_CC now_RB gambling_VBG Hansel_NNP at_IN once_RB set_VBN about_IN gambling_VBG in_IN real_JJ earnest_NN ,_, and_CC before_RB long_RB he_PRP had_VBD gained_VBN half_PDT the_DT world_NN ._.

Therefore_RB St_NNP ._.

So_RB they_PRP went_VBD to_IN him_PRP at_IN once_RB ,_, and_CC threw_VBD him_PRP down_RP ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ soul_NN broke_VBD into_IN fragments_NNS ,_, and_CC went_VBD into_IN the_DT gambling_NN vagabonds_NNS who_WP are_VBP living_VBG this_DT very_JJ day_NN ._.
The_DT fox_NN once_RB came_VBD to_IN a_DT meadow_NN in_IN which_WDT sat_VBD a_DT flock_NN of_IN fine_JJ fat_NN geese_NNS ,_, on_IN which_WDT he_PRP smiled_VBD and_CC said_VBD ,_, I_PRP come_VBP in_IN the_DT nick_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, you_PRP are_VBP sitting_VBG together_RB quite_RB beautifully_RB ,_, so_IN that_IN I_PRP can_MD eat_VB you_PRP up_RP one_CD after_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
The_DT geese_NNS cackled_VBN with_IN terror_NN ,_, sprang_VBD up_RP ,_, and_CC began_VBD to_TO wail_VB and_CC beg_VB piteously_RB for_IN their_PRP$ lives_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT fox_NN would_MD listen_VB to_IN nothing_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT mercy_NN to_TO be_VB had_VBN ._.
You_PRP must_MD die_VB ._.
At_IN length_NN one_CD of_IN them_PRP took_VBD heart_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, if_IN we_PRP poor_JJ geese_NNS are_VBP to_TO yield_VB up_RP our_PRP$ lives_NNS ,_, show_VB us_PRP the_DT only_JJ possible_JJ favor_NN and_CC allow_VB us_PRP one_CD more_JJR prayer_NN ,_, that_IN we_PRP may_MD not_RB die_VB in_IN our_PRP$ sins_NNS ,_, and_CC then_RB we_PRP will_MD place_VB ourselves_PRP in_IN a_DT row_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN you_PRP can_MD always_RB pick_VB yourself_PRP out_RP the_DT fattest_JJS ._.
Yes_UH ,_, said_VBD the_DT fox_NN ,_, that_DT is_VBZ reasonable_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT pious_JJ request_NN ._.
Pray_VB away_RB ,_, I_PRP will_MD wait_VB till_IN you_PRP are_VBP done_VBN ._.
Then_RB the_DT first_JJ began_VBD a_DT good_JJ long_JJ prayer_NN ,_, for_IN ever_RB saying_VBG ,_, ga_NN ,_, ga_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN she_PRP would_MD make_VB no_DT end_NN ,_, the_DT second_NN did_VBD not_RB wait_VB until_IN her_PRP$ turn_NN came_VBD ,_, but_CC began_VBD also_RB ,_, ga_NN ,_, ga_UH ._.
The_DT third_JJ and_CC fourth_JJ followed_VBD her_PRP ,_, and_CC soon_RB they_PRP were_VBD all_DT cackling_VBG together_RB ._.
When_WRB they_PRP have_VBP done_VBN praying_VBG ,_, the_DT story_NN shall_MD be_VB continued_VBN further_RBR ,_, but_CC at_IN present_JJ they_PRP are_VBP still_RB praying_VBG unceasingly_RB ._.
In_IN olden_JJ times_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT Lord_NNP himself_PRP still_RB used_VBN to_TO walk_VB about_RB on_IN this_DT earth_NN amongst_IN men_NNS ,_, it_PRP once_RB happened_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD tired_JJ and_CC overtaken_VBN by_IN the_DT darkness_NN before_IN he_PRP could_MD reach_VB an_DT inn_NN ._.
Now_RB there_EX stood_VBD on_IN the_DT road_NN before_IN him_PRP two_CD houses_NNS facing_VBG each_DT other_JJ ,_, the_DT one_CD large_JJ and_CC beautiful_JJ ,_, the_DT other_JJ small_JJ and_CC poor_JJ ._.
The_DT large_JJ one_NN belonged_VBD to_IN a_DT rich_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT small_JJ one_NN to_IN a_DT poor_JJ man_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT Lord_NNP thought_VBD ,_, I_PRP shall_MD be_VB no_DT burden_NN to_IN the_DT rich_JJ man_NN ._.
I_PRP will_MD stay_VB the_DT night_NN with_IN him_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT rich_JJ man_NN heard_VBD someone_NN knocking_VBG at_IN his_PRP$ door_NN ,_, he_PRP opened_VBD the_DT window_NN and_CC asked_VBD the_DT stranger_NN what_WP he_PRP wanted_VBD ._.
The_DT Lord_NNP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP only_RB ask_VBP for_IN a_DT nights_NNS lodging_NN ._.
Then_RB the_DT rich_JJ man_NN looked_VBD at_IN the_DT traveler_NN from_IN head_NN to_IN foot_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN the_DT Lord_NNP was_VBD wearing_VBG common_JJ clothes_NNS ,_, and_CC did_VBD not_RB look_VB like_IN one_PRP who_WP had_VBD much_JJ money_NN in_IN his_PRP$ pocket_NN ,_, he_PRP shook_VBD his_PRP$ head_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, no_UH ,_, I_PRP can_MD not_RB take_VB you_PRP in_RP ,_, my_PRP$ rooms_NNS are_VBP full_JJ of_IN herbs_NNS and_CC seeds_NNS ._.
And_CC if_IN I_PRP were_VBD to_TO lodge_VB everyone_NN who_WP knocked_VBD at_IN my_PRP$ door_NN ,_, I_PRP might_MD very_RB soon_RB go_VB begging_VBG myself_PRP ._.
Go_VB somewhere_RB else_RB for_IN a_DT lodging_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN this_DT he_PRP shut_VBD down_RP the_DT window_NN and_CC left_VBD the_DT Lord_NNP standing_VBG there_RB ._.
So_RB the_DT Lord_NNP turned_VBD his_PRP$ back_NN on_IN the_DT rich_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC went_VBD across_RB to_IN the_DT small_JJ house_NN and_CC knocked_VBD ._.
He_PRP had_VBD hardly_RB done_VBN so_RB when_WRB the_DT poor_JJ man_NN opened_VBD the_DT little_JJ door_NN and_CC bade_VB the_DT traveler_NN come_VB in_RB ._.
Pass_VB the_DT night_NN with_IN me_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ already_RB dark_JJ ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ._.

This_DT pleased_VBD the_DT Lord_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP went_VBD in_RB ._.
The_DT poor_JJ mans_NNS wife_NN shook_VBD hands_NNS with_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC welcomed_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD he_PRP was_VBD to_TO make_VB himself_PRP at_IN home_NN and_CC put_VB up_RP with_IN what_WP they_PRP had_VBD got_VBN ._.
They_PRP had_VBD not_RB much_JJ to_TO offer_VB him_PRP ,_, but_CC what_WP they_PRP had_VBD they_PRP would_MD give_VB him_PRP with_IN all_DT their_PRP$ hearts_NNS ._.
Then_RB she_PRP put_VBD the_DT potatoes_NNS on_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, and_CC while_IN they_PRP were_VBD boiling_VBG ,_, she_PRP milked_VBD the_DT goat_NN ,_, that_IN they_PRP might_MD have_VB a_DT little_JJ milk_NN with_IN them_PRP ._.
When_WRB the_DT cloth_NN was_VBD laid_VBN ,_, the_DT Lord_NNP sat_VBD down_RP with_IN the_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP enjoyed_VBD their_PRP$ coarse_JJ food_NN ,_, for_IN there_EX were_VBD happy_JJ faces_NNS at_IN the_DT table_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD had_VBN supper_VBN and_CC it_PRP was_VBD bed-time_JJ ,_, the_DT woman_NN called_VBD her_PRP$ husband_NN apart_RB and_CC said_VBD ,_, listen_VB ,_, dear_JJ husband_NN ,_, let_VB us_PRP make_VB up_RP a_DT bed_NN of_IN straw_NN for_IN ourselves_PRP to-night_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB the_DT poor_JJ traveler_NN can_MD sleep_VB in_IN our_PRP$ bed_NN and_CC have_VB a_DT good_JJ rest_NN ,_, for_IN he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN walking_VBG the_DT whole_JJ day_NN through_RB ,_, and_CC that_DT makes_VBZ one_CD weary_JJ ._.
With_IN all_PDT my_PRP$ heart_NN ,_, he_PRP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP will_MD go_VB and_CC offer_VB it_PRP to_IN him_PRP ._.
And_CC he_PRP went_VBD to_IN the_DT stranger_NN and_CC invited_VBD him_PRP ,_, if_IN he_PRP had_VBD no_DT objection_NN ,_, to_TO sleep_VB in_IN their_PRP$ bed_NN and_CC rest_VB his_PRP$ limbs_NNS properly_RB ._.
But_CC the_DT Lord_NNP was_VBD unwilling_JJ to_TO take_VB their_PRP$ bed_NN from_IN the_DT two_CD old_JJ folks_NNS ._.
However_RB ,_, they_PRP would_MD not_RB be_VB satisfied_JJ ,_, until_IN at_IN length_NN he_PRP did_VBD it_PRP and_CC lay_VB down_RP in_IN their_PRP$ bed_NN ,_, while_IN they_PRP themselves_PRP lay_VBP on_IN some_DT straw_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
Next_JJ morning_NN they_PRP got_VBD up_RP before_IN daybreak_NN ,_, and_CC made_VBD as_IN good_JJ a_DT breakfast_NN as_IN they_PRP could_MD for_IN the_DT guest_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT sun_NN shone_VBD in_IN through_IN the_DT little_JJ window_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Lord_NNP had_VBD got_VBN up_RP ,_, he_PRP again_RB ate_VBD with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB prepared_VBD to_TO set_VB out_RP on_IN his_PRP$ journey_NN ._.
But_CC as_IN he_PRP was_VBD standing_VBG at_IN the_DT door_NN he_PRP turned_VBD round_NN and_CC said_VBD ,_, as_IN you_PRP are_VBP so_RB kind_RB and_CC good_JJ ,_, you_PRP may_MD wish_VB three_CD things_NNS for_IN yourselves_NNS and_CC I_PRP will_MD grant_VB them_PRP ._.
Then_RB the_DT man_NN said_VBD ,_, what_WP else_RB should_MD I_PRP wish_VB for_IN but_CC eternal_JJ happiness_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN we_PRP two_CD ,_, as_RB long_RB as_IN we_PRP live_VBP ,_, may_MD be_VB healthy_JJ and_CC have_VB every_DT day_NN our_PRP$ daily_JJ bread_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT third_JJ wish_NN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB what_WP to_TO have_VB ._.

When_WRB they_PRP got_VBD to_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, hurrah_NN ._.
Everything_NN was_VBD already_RB very_RB merry_JJ there_RB ._.

And_CC went_VBD on_RP abusing_VBG him_PRP as_RB fast_RB as_IN he_PRP could_MD speak_VB ._.

My_PRP$ lord_NN judge_NN ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP come_VBN to_TO make_VB a_DT complaint_NN ,_, see_VB how_WRB a_DT rascal_NN has_VBZ robbed_VBN and_CC ill-treated_VBN me_PRP on_IN the_DT public_JJ highway_NN ._.

The_DT two_CD sat_VBD up_RP ,_, but_CC could_MD see_VB nothing_NN ._.

We_PRP must_MD return_VB to_IN the_DT innkeeper_NN ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ deceived_VBN us_PRP ._.

In_IN a_DT certain_JJ village_NN there_RB once_RB lived_VBD a_DT man_NN and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT wife_NN was_VBD so_RB lazy_JJ that_IN she_PRP would_MD never_RB work_VB at_IN anything_NN ._.
Whatever_WDT her_PRP$ husband_NN gave_VBD her_PRP to_TO spin_VB ,_, she_PRP did_VBD not_RB get_VB done_VBN ,_, and_CC what_WP she_PRP did_VBD spin_VB she_PRP did_VBD not_RB wind_VB ,_, but_CC let_VB it_PRP all_DT remain_VB entangled_VBN in_IN a_DT heap_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT man_NN scolded_VBD her_PRP ,_, she_PRP was_VBD always_RB ready_JJ with_IN her_PRP$ tongue_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, well_UH ,_, how_WRB should_MD I_PRP wind_VB it_PRP ,_, when_WRB I_PRP have_VBP no_DT reel_NN ._.

Then_RB the_DT woman_NN was_VBD afraid_JJ that_IN if_IN he_PRP had_VBD the_DT wood_NN he_PRP would_MD make_VB her_PRP a_DT reel_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC she_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO wind_VB her_PRP$ yarn_NN off_RP ,_, and_CC then_RB begin_VB to_TO spin_VB again_RB ._.

Well_UH ,_, he_PRP said_VBD at_IN last_JJ ,_, what_WP can_MD that_DT have_VB been_VBN ,_, my_PRP$ ears_NNS must_MD have_VB been_VBN singing_VBG ,_, I_PRP wo_MD nt_RB alarm_VB myself_PRP for_IN nothing_NN ._.

That_DT was_VBD enough_JJ for_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC all_DT inclination_NN had_VBD departed_VBN from_IN him_PRP ,_, so_IN he_PRP hastily_RB descended_VBD the_DT tree_NN ,_, and_CC set_VBD out_RP on_IN his_PRP$ way_NN home_RB ._.
The_DT woman_NN ran_VBD as_RB fast_RB as_IN she_PRP could_MD by_IN byways_NNS so_IN as_IN to_TO get_VB home_RB first_RB ._.

The_DT woman_NN was_VBD again_RB distressed_JJ ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, yes_UH ,_, we_PRP will_MD boil_VB it_PRP to-morrow_VB morning_NN early_RB ._.

The_DT horse_NN did_VBD as_IN the_DT fox_NN desired_VBD ,_, and_CC the_DT fox_NN went_VBD to_IN the_DT lion_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD his_PRP$ den_NN not_RB far_RB off_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, a_DT dead_JJ horse_NN is_VBZ lying_VBG outside_RB there_EX ,_, just_RB come_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_, you_PRP can_MD have_VB a_DT rich_JJ meal_NN ._.

The_DT Lord_NNP God_NNP had_VBD created_VBN all_DT animals_NNS ,_, and_CC had_VBD chosen_VBN out_RP the_DT wolf_NN to_TO be_VB his_PRP$ dog_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP had_VBD forgotten_VBN the_DT goat_NN ._.

Then_RB he_PRP had_VBD to_TO forfeit_VB his_PRP$ indemnity_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ rage_NN he_PRP put_VBD out_RP the_DT eyes_NNS of_IN all_PDT the_DT remaining_VBG goats_NNS ,_, and_CC put_VBD his_PRP$ own_JJ in_IN instead_RB ._.
This_DT is_VBZ why_WRB all_DT goats_NNS have_VBP devils_NNS eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ tails_NNS bitten_VBN off_RP ,_, and_CC why_WRB he_PRP likes_VBZ to_TO assume_VB their_PRP$ shape_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT sorcerer_NN who_WP was_VBD standing_VBG in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN a_DT great_JJ crowd_NN of_IN people_NNS performing_VBG his_PRP$ wonders_NNS ._.
He_PRP had_VBD a_DT cock_NN brought_VBN in_RP ,_, which_WDT lifted_VBD a_DT heavy_JJ beam_NN and_CC carried_VBD it_PRP as_IN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD light_JJ as_IN a_DT feather_NN ._.

So_RB she_PRP cried_VBD ,_, you_PRP people_NNS ,_, do_VBP you_PRP not_RB see_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT straw_NN that_IN the_DT cock_NN is_VBZ carrying_VBG ,_, and_CC no_DT beam_NN ._.

This_DT woman_NN begged_VBD likewise_RB ,_, and_CC when_WRB she_PRP got_VBD anything_NN she_PRP said_VBD ,_, may_MD God_NNP reward_VB you_PRP ._.
The_DT beggar-woman_NN came_VBD to_IN a_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB by_IN the_DT fire_NN a_DT friendly_JJ rogue_NN of_IN a_DT boy_NN was_VBD standing_VBG warming_VBG himself_PRP ._.

She_PRP came_VBD in_RB ,_, but_CC stood_VBD too_RB near_IN the_DT fire_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN her_PRP$ old_JJ rags_NNS began_VBD to_TO burn_VB ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD not_RB aware_JJ of_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT boy_NN stood_VBD and_CC saw_VBD that_DT ,_, but_CC he_PRP ought_MD to_TO have_VB put_VBN the_DT flames_NNS out_RP ._.

And_CC if_IN he_PRP had_VBD not_RB any_DT water_NN ,_, then_RB he_PRP should_MD have_VB wept_VBN all_PDT the_DT water_NN in_IN his_PRP$ body_NN out_IN of_IN his_PRP$ eyes_NNS ,_, and_CC that_DT would_MD have_VB supplied_VBN two_CD pretty_JJ streams_NNS with_IN which_WDT to_TO extinguish_VB them_PRP ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB on_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT maiden_NN who_WP was_VBD pretty_JJ ,_, but_CC idle_JJ and_CC negligent_JJ ._.
When_WRB she_PRP had_VBD to_TO spin_VB she_PRP was_VBD so_RB out_IN of_IN temper_NN that_IN if_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT little_JJ knot_NN in_IN the_DT flax_NN ,_, she_PRP at_IN once_RB pulled_VBD out_RP a_DT whole_JJ heap_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC strewed_VBD it_PRP about_RB on_IN the_DT ground_NN beside_IN her_PRP ._.
Now_RB she_PRP had_VBD a_DT servant_NN who_WP was_VBD industrious_JJ ,_, and_CC gathered_VBD together_RB the_DT bits_NNS of_IN flax_NN which_WDT were_VBD thrown_VBN away_RB ,_, cleaned_VBN them_PRP ,_, spun_VBD them_PRP fine_RB ,_, and_CC had_VBD a_DT beautiful_JJ gown_NN made_VBN out_IN of_IN them_PRP for_IN herself_PRP ._.
A_DT young_JJ man_NN had_VBD wooed_VBN the_DT lazy_JJ girl_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT wedding_NN was_VBD to_TO take_VB place_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT eve_NN of_IN the_DT wedding_NN ,_, the_DT industrious_JJ one_NN was_VBD dancing_VBG merrily_RB about_IN in_IN her_PRP$ pretty_JJ dress_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT bride_NN said_VBD ,_, ah_UH ,_, how_WRB that_DT girl_NN does_VBZ jump_VB about_RB ,_, dressed_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ hurds_NNS ._.
The_DT bridegroom_NN heard_VBD that_IN ,_, and_CC asked_VBD the_DT bride_NN what_WP she_PRP meant_VBD by_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB she_PRP told_VBD him_PRP that_IN the_DT girl_NN was_VBD wearing_VBG a_DT dress_NN made_VBN of_IN the_DT flax_NN which_WDT she_PRP had_VBD thrown_VBN away_RB ._.
When_WRB the_DT bridegroom_NN heard_VBD that_DT ,_, and_CC saw_VBD how_WRB idle_NN she_PRP was_VBD ,_, and_CC how_WRB industrious_JJ the_DT poor_JJ girl_NN was_VBD ,_, he_PRP gave_VBD her_PRP up_RP and_CC went_VBD to_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC chose_VBD her_PRP as_IN his_PRP$ wife_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN schlauraffen_NNS I_PRP went_VBD forth_RB and_CC saw_VBD rome_NN and_CC the_DT lateran_NN hanging_NN by_IN a_DT small_JJ silken_NN thread_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT man_NN without_IN feet_NNS who_WP outran_VBD a_DT swift_JJ horse_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT keen_JJ sharp_JJ sword_NN that_WDT cut_VBD through_IN a_DT bridge_NN ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD a_DT young_JJ ass_NN with_IN a_DT silver_JJ nose_NN which_WDT pursued_VBD two_CD fleet_NN hares_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT lime-tree_NN that_WDT was_VBD very_RB large_JJ ,_, on_IN which_WDT hot_JJ cakes_NNS were_VBD growing_VBG ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD a_DT lean_JJ old_JJ goat_NN which_WDT carried_VBD about_RB a_DT hundred_CD cart-loads_NNS of_IN fat_NN on_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ,_, and_CC sixty_CD loads_NNS of_IN salt_NN ._.
Have_VBP I_PRP not_RB told_VBN enough_JJ lies_NNS ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD a_DT plough_NN ploughing_VBG without_IN horse_NN or_CC cow_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT child_NN of_IN one_CD year_NN threw_VBD four_CD millstones_NNS from_IN ratisbon_NN to_IN treves_NNS ,_, and_CC from_IN treves_NNS to_IN strasburg_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT hawk_NN swam_NN over_IN the_DT rhine_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD a_DT perfect_JJ right_NN to_TO do_VB ._.
I_PRP heard_VBD some_DT fishes_NNS begin_VBP to_TO make_VB such_PDT a_DT disturbance_NN with_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, that_IN it_PRP resounded_VBD as_RB far_RB as_IN heaven_NN ,_, and_CC sweet_JJ honey_NN flowed_VBD like_IN water_NN from_IN a_DT deep_JJ valley_NN to_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN a_DT high_JJ mountain_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT were_VBD strange_JJ things_NNS ._.
There_EX were_VBD two_CD crows_NNS which_WDT were_VBD mowing_VBG a_DT meadow_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP saw_VBD two_CD gnats_NNS building_VBG a_DT bridge_NN ,_, and_CC two_CD doves_NNS tore_VBD a_DT wolf_NN to_IN pieces_NNS ,_, two_CD children_NNS brought_VBD forth_RP two_CD kids_NNS ,_, and_CC two_CD frogs_NNS threshed_VBN corn_NN together_RB ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD two_CD mice_NNS consecrating_VBG a_DT bishop_NN ,_, and_CC two_CD cats_NNS scratching_VBG out_RP a_DT bears_NNS tongue_NN ._.
Then_RB a_DT snail_NN came_VBD running_VBG up_RP and_CC killed_VBD two_CD furious_JJ lions_NNS ._.

There_EX I_PRP saw_VBD two_CD greyhounds_NNS which_WDT brought_VBD a_DT mill_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT water_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT broken-down_JJ old_JJ horse_NN was_VBD beside_IN it_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD it_PRP was_VBD right_JJ ._.
And_CC four_CD horses_NNS were_VBD standing_VBG in_IN the_DT yard_NN threshing_VBG corn_NN with_IN all_DT their_PRP$ might_NN ,_, and_CC two_CD goats_NNS were_VBD heating_VBG the_DT stove_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT red_JJ cow_NN shot_VBD the_DT bread_NN into_IN the_DT oven_NN ._.
Then_RB a_DT hen_NN crowed_VBN ,_, cock-a-doodle-doo_UH ._.
The_DT story_NN is_VBZ all_DT told_VBN ,_, cock-a-doodle-doo_UH ._.
I_PRP will_MD tell_VB you_PRP something_NN ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD two_CD roasted_JJ fowls_NNS flying_VBG ,_, they_PRP flew_VBD quickly_RB and_CC had_VBD their_PRP$ breasts_NNS turned_VBN to_IN heaven_NN and_CC their_PRP$ backs_NNS to_IN hell_NN ,_, and_CC an_DT anvil_NN and_CC a_DT mill-stone_NN swam_NN across_IN the_DT rhine_NN prettily_RB ,_, slowly_RB ,_, and_CC gently_RB ,_, and_CC a_DT frog_NN sat_VBD on_IN the_DT ice_NN at_IN whitsuntide_NN and_CC ate_VBD a_DT ploughshare_NN ._.
Three_CD fellows_NNS who_WP wanted_VBD to_TO catch_VB a_DT hare_NN ,_, went_VBD on_IN crutches_NNS and_CC stilts_NNS ,_, one_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD deaf_JJ ,_, the_DT second_JJ blind_NN ,_, the_DT third_JJ dumb_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT fourth_JJ could_MD not_RB stir_VB a_DT step_NN ._.
Do_VBP you_PRP want_VB to_TO know_VB how_WRB it_PRP was_VBD done_VBN ._.
First_RB ,_, the_DT blind_JJ man_NN saw_VBD the_DT hare_NN running_VBG across_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, the_DT dumb_JJ one_NN called_VBD to_IN the_DT lame_NN one_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT lame_JJ one_NN seized_VBD it_PRP by_IN the_DT neck_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD certain_JJ men_NNS who_WP wished_VBD to_TO sail_VB on_IN dry_JJ land_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP set_VBD their_PRP$ sails_NNS in_IN the_DT wind_NN ,_, and_CC sailed_VBD away_RB over_IN great_JJ fields_NNS ._.
Then_RB they_PRP sailed_VBD over_IN a_DT high_JJ mountain_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB they_PRP were_VBD miserably_RB drowned_VBN ._.
A_DT crab_NN was_VBD chasing_VBG a_DT hare_NN which_WDT was_VBD running_VBG away_RB at_IN full_JJ speed_NN ,_, and_CC high_JJ up_RP on_IN the_DT roof_NN lay_VBD a_DT cow_NN which_WDT had_VBD climbed_VBN up_RB there_RB ._.
In_IN that_DT country_NN the_DT flies_NNS are_VBP as_RB big_JJ as_IN the_DT goats_NNS are_VBP here_RB ._.
Open_VB the_DT window_NN that_WDT the_DT lies_NNS may_MD fly_VB out_RB ._.
Three_CD women_NNS were_VBD transformed_VBN into_IN flowers_NNS which_WDT grew_VBD in_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, but_CC one_CD of_IN them_PRP was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB in_IN her_PRP$ own_JJ home_NN at_IN night_NN ._.
Then_RB once_RB when_WRB day_NN was_VBD drawing_VBG near_RB ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN to_TO go_VB back_RB to_IN her_PRP$ companions_NNS in_IN the_DT field_NN and_CC become_VB a_DT flower_NN again_RB ,_, she_PRP said_VBD to_IN her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, if_IN you_PRP will_MD come_VB this_DT afternoon_NN and_CC gather_VB me_PRP ,_, I_PRP shall_MD be_VB set_VBN free_JJ and_CC henceforth_RB stay_VB with_IN you_PRP ._.
And_CC he_PRP did_VBD so_RB ._.
Now_RB the_DT question_NN is_VBZ ,_, how_WRB did_VBD her_PRP$ husband_NN know_VB her_PRP ,_, for_IN the_DT flowers_NNS were_VBD exactly_RB alike_RB ,_, and_CC without_IN any_DT difference_NN ._.
Answer_NN -_: as_IN she_PRP was_VBD at_IN her_PRP$ home_NN during_IN the_DT night_NN and_CC not_RB in_IN the_DT field_NN ,_, no_DT dew_NN fell_VBD on_IN her_PRP as_IN it_PRP did_VBD on_IN the_DT others_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN this_DT her_PRP$ husband_NN knew_VBD her_PRP ._.
How_WRB fortunate_JJ is_VBZ the_DT master_NN ,_, and_CC how_WRB well_RB all_DT goes_VBZ in_IN his_PRP$ house_NN ,_, when_WRB he_PRP has_VBZ a_DT wise_JJ servant_NN who_WP listens_VBZ to_IN his_PRP$ orders_NNS and_CC does_VBZ not_RB obey_VB them_PRP ,_, but_CC prefers_VBZ following_VBG his_PRP$ own_JJ wisdom_NN ._.
A_DT clever_JJ Hans_NNPS of_IN this_DT kind_NN was_VBD once_RB sent_VBN out_RP by_IN his_PRP$ master_NN to_TO seek_VB a_DT lost_VBN cow_NN ._.
He_PRP stayed_VBD away_RB a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT master_NN thought_NN ,_, faithful_JJ Hans_NNP does_VBZ not_RB spare_VB any_DT pains_NNS over_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ._.
But_CC when_WRB he_PRP did_VBD not_RB come_VB back_RB at_RB all_RB ,_, the_DT master_NN was_VBD afraid_JJ lest_IN some_DT misfortune_NN had_VBD befallen_VBN him_PRP ,_, and_CC set_VBD out_RP himself_PRP to_TO look_VB for_IN him_PRP ._.
He_PRP had_VBD to_TO search_VB a_DT long_JJ time_NN ,_, but_CC at_IN last_JJ he_PRP caught_VBD sight_NN of_IN the_DT boy_NN running_VBG up_RB and_CC down_IN a_DT large_JJ field_NN ._.
Now_RB ,_, dear_JJ Hans_NNP ,_, said_VBD the_DT master_NN when_WRB he_PRP had_VBD got_VBN up_RP to_IN him_PRP ,_, have_VBP you_PRP found_VBN the_DT cow_NN which_WDT I_PRP sent_VBD you_PRP to_TO seek_VB ._.
No_UH ,_, master_NN ,_, he_PRP answered_VBD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB found_VBN the_DT cow_NN ,_, but_CC then_RB I_PRP have_VBP not_RB looked_VBN for_IN it_PRP ._.
Then_RB what_WP have_VBP you_PRP looked_VBN for_IN ,_, Hans_NNP ._.
Three_CD blackbirds_NNS ,_, answered_VBD the_DT boy_NN ._.
And_CC where_WRB are_VBP they_PRP ,_, asked_VBD the_DT master_NN ._.
I_PRP see_VBP one_CD of_IN them_PRP ,_, I_PRP hear_VBP the_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP running_VBG after_IN the_DT third_JJ ,_, answered_VBD the_DT wise_JJ boy_NN ._.
Take_VB example_NN by_IN this_DT ,_, do_VBP not_RB trouble_VB yourselves_NNS about_IN your_PRP$ masters_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ orders_NNS ,_, but_CC rather_RB do_VB what_WP comes_VBZ into_IN your_PRP$ head_NN and_CC pleases_NNS you_PRP ,_, and_CC then_RB you_PRP will_MD act_VB just_RB as_RB wisely_RB as_IN clever_JJ Hans_NNPS ._.

Once_RB upon_IN a_DT time_NN a_DT poor_JJ pious_JJ peasant_NN died_VBD ,_, and_CC arrived_VBD before_IN the_DT gate_NN of_IN heaven_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN a_DT very_RB rich_JJ ,_, rich_JJ lord_NN came_VBD there_RB who_WP also_RB wanted_VBD to_TO get_VB into_IN heaven_NN ._.
Then_RB saint_NN peter_NN came_VBD with_IN the_DT key_NN ,_, and_CC opened_VBD the_DT door_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB the_DT great_JJ man_NN in_RP ,_, but_CC apparently_RB did_VBD not_RB see_VB the_DT peasant_NN ,_, and_CC shut_VBD the_DT door_NN again_RB ._.
And_CC now_RB the_DT peasant_NN outside_RB heard_VBD how_WRB the_DT great_JJ man_NN was_VBD received_VBN in_IN heaven_NN with_IN all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN rejoicing_NN ,_, and_CC how_WRB they_PRP were_VBD making_VBG music_NN ,_, and_CC singing_VBG within_RB ._.
At_IN length_NN all_DT became_VBD quiet_JJ again_RB ,_, and_CC saint_NN peter_NN came_VBD and_CC opened_VBD the_DT gate_NN of_IN heaven_NN ,_, and_CC let_VB the_DT peasant_NN in_IN ._.
The_DT peasant_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, expected_VBN that_IN they_PRP would_MD make_VB music_NN and_CC sing_VB when_WRB he_PRP went_VBD in_RB also_RB ,_, but_CC all_DT remained_VBD quite_RB quiet_JJ ._.
He_PRP was_VBD received_VBN with_IN great_JJ affection_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT angels_NNS came_VBD to_TO meet_VB him_PRP ,_, but_CC no_DT one_NN sang_VBD ._.
Then_RB the_DT peasant_NN asked_VBD saint_NN peter_NN how_WRB it_PRP was_VBD that_IN they_PRP did_VBD not_RB sing_VB for_IN him_PRP as_IN they_PRP had_VBD done_VBN when_WRB the_DT rich_JJ man_NN went_VBD in_RB ,_, and_CC said_VBD that_IN it_PRP seemed_VBD to_IN him_PRP that_IN there_RB in_IN heaven_CD things_NNS were_VBD done_VBN with_IN just_RB as_RB much_JJ partiality_NN as_IN on_IN earth_NN ._.
Then_RB said_VBD saint_NN peter_NN ,_, by_IN no_DT means_NNS ,_, you_PRP are_VBP just_RB as_RB dear_JJ to_IN us_PRP as_IN anyone_NN else_RB ,_, and_CC will_MD enjoy_VB every_DT heavenly_JJ delight_NN that_IN the_DT rich_JJ man_NN enjoys_VBZ ,_, but_CC poor_JJ fellows_NNS like_IN you_PRP come_VBP to_IN heaven_NNS every_DT day_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT rich_JJ man_NN like_IN this_DT does_VBZ not_RB come_VB more_JJR than_IN once_RB in_IN a_DT hundred_CD years_NNS ._.
Lean_NNP lisa_NNP was_VBD of_IN a_DT very_RB different_JJ way_NN of_IN thinking_VBG from_IN lazy_JJ harry_NN and_CC fat_NN trina_NN ,_, who_WP never_RB let_VBP anything_NN disturb_VB their_PRP$ peace_NN ._.
She_PRP slaved_VBD away_RB from_IN morning_NN till_IN evening_NN ,_, and_CC burdened_VBD her_PRP$ husband_NN ,_, long_JJ laurence_NN ,_, with_IN so_RB much_JJ work_NN that_IN he_PRP had_VBD heavier_JJR weights_NNS to_TO carry_VB than_IN an_DT ass_NN with_IN three_CD sacks_NNS ._.
But_CC it_PRP was_VBD all_DT to_IN no_DT purpose_NN ,_, for_IN they_PRP had_VBD nothing_NN and_CC came_VBD to_IN nothing_NN ._.
One_CD night_NN as_IN she_PRP lay_VBD in_IN bed_NN ,_, and_CC could_MD hardly_RB move_VB one_CD limb_NN for_IN weariness_NN ,_, she_PRP still_RB did_VBD not_RB allow_VB her_PRP$ thoughts_NNS to_TO go_VB to_IN sleep_NN ._.
She_PRP thrust_VBD her_PRP$ elbow_NN into_IN her_PRP$ husbands_NNS side_NN ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, listen_VBP ,_, lenz_NN ,_, to_IN what_WP I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN thinking_VBG ._.
If_IN I_PRP were_VBD to_TO find_VB one_CD florin_NN and_CC one_CD was_VBD given_VBN to_IN me_PRP ,_, I_PRP would_MD borrow_VB another_DT to_TO put_VB to_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC you_PRP too_RB should_MD give_VB me_PRP another_DT ,_, and_CC then_RB as_RB soon_RB as_IN I_PRP had_VBD got_VBN the_DT four_CD florins_NNS together_RB ,_, I_PRP would_MD buy_VB a_DT young_JJ cow_NN ._.
This_DT pleased_VBD the_DT husband_NN right_RB well_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ true_JJ ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, that_IN I_PRP do_VBP not_RB know_VB where_WRB I_PRP am_VBP to_TO get_VB the_DT florin_NN which_WDT you_PRP want_VBP as_IN a_DT gift_NN from_IN me_PRP ._.
But_CC ,_, if_IN you_PRP can_MD get_VB the_DT money_NN together_RB ,_, and_CC can_MD buy_VB a_DT cow_NN with_IN it_PRP ,_, you_PRP will_MD do_VB well_RB to_TO carry_VB out_RP your_PRP$ project_NN ._.
I_PRP shall_MD be_VB glad_JJ ,_, he_PRP added_VBD ,_, if_IN the_DT cow_NN has_VBZ a_DT calf_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB I_PRP shall_MD often_RB get_VB a_DT drink_NN of_IN milk_NN to_TO refresh_VB me_PRP ._.
The_DT milk_NN is_VBZ not_RB for_IN you_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT woman_NN ,_, we_PRP must_MD let_VB the_DT calf_NN suck_VB that_IN it_PRP may_MD become_VB big_JJ and_CC fat_JJ ,_, and_CC we_PRP may_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO sell_VB it_PRP well_RB ._.
Certainly_RB ,_, replied_VBD the_DT man_NN ,_, but_CC still_RB we_PRP will_MD take_VB a_DT little_JJ milk_NN ._.
That_DT will_MD do_VB no_DT harm_NN ._.
Who_WP has_VBZ taught_VBN you_PRP to_TO manage_VB cows_NNS ,_, said_VBD the_DT woman_NN ._.
Whether_IN it_PRP does_VBZ harm_VB or_CC not_RB ,_, I_PRP will_MD not_RB allow_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC even_RB if_IN you_PRP were_VBD to_TO stand_VB on_IN your_PRP$ head_NN for_IN it_PRP ,_, you_PRP should_MD not_RB have_VB a_DT drop_NN of_IN the_DT milk_NN ._.
Do_VBP you_PRP think_VB ,_, because_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT satisfying_VBG you_PRP ,_, long_JJ laurence_NN ,_, that_IN you_PRP are_VBP to_TO eat_VB up_RP what_WP I_PRP earn_VBP with_IN so_RB much_JJ difficulty_NN ._.
Wife_NNP ,_, said_VBD the_DT man_NN ,_, be_VB quiet_JJ ,_, or_CC I_PRP will_MD give_VB you_PRP a_DT blow_NN on_IN your_PRP$ mouth_NN ._.
What_WP ,_, cried_VBD she_PRP ,_, you_PRP threaten_VBP me_PRP ,_, you_PRP glutton_VBP ,_, you_PRP rascal_JJ ,_, you_PRP lazy_JJ harry_NN ._.
She_PRP was_VBD just_RB laying_VBG hold_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hair_NN ,_, but_CC long_JJ laurence_NN got_VBD up_RP ,_, seized_VBD both_DT lean_JJ lisas_NNS withered_JJ arms_NNS in_IN one_CD hand_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT other_JJ he_PRP pressed_VBD down_RP her_PRP$ head_NN into_IN the_DT pillow_NN ,_, let_VB her_PRP scold_NN ,_, and_CC held_VBD her_PRP until_IN she_PRP fell_VBD asleep_JJ for_IN very_RB weariness_NN ._.
Whether_IN she_PRP continued_VBD to_TO wrangle_VB when_WRB she_PRP awoke_VBD next_JJ morning_NN ,_, or_CC whether_IN she_PRP went_VBD out_RB to_TO look_VB for_IN the_DT florin_NN which_WDT she_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO find_VB ,_, that_IN I_PRP know_VBP not_RB ._.
There_EX was_VBD once_RB a_DT tailor_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD a_DT quarrelsome_JJ fellow_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ wife_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD good_JJ ,_, industrious_JJ ,_, and_CC pious_JJ ,_, never_RB could_MD please_VB him_PRP ._.
Whatever_WDT she_PRP did_VBD ,_, he_PRP was_VBD not_RB satisfied_JJ ,_, but_CC grumbled_VBN and_CC scolded_VBD ,_, and_CC knocked_VBD her_PRP about_IN and_CC beat_VB her_PRP ._.
As_IN the_DT authorities_NNS at_IN last_JJ heard_VBN of_IN it_PRP ,_, they_PRP had_VBD him_PRP summoned_VBN and_CC put_VBN in_IN prison_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB him_PRP better_JJR ._.
He_PRP was_VBD kept_VBN for_IN a_DT while_NN on_IN bread_NN and_CC water_NN ,_, and_CC then_RB set_VB free_JJ again_RB ._.
He_PRP was_VBD forced_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO promise_VB not_RB to_TO beat_VB his_PRP$ wife_NN any_DT more_RBR ,_, but_CC to_TO live_VB with_IN her_PRP in_IN peace_NN ,_, and_CC share_VBP joy_NN and_CC sorrow_NN with_IN her_PRP ,_, as_IN married_JJ people_NNS ought_MD to_TO do_VB ._.
All_DT went_VBD on_RB well_RB for_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, but_CC then_RB he_PRP fell_VBD into_IN his_PRP$ old_JJ ways_NNS and_CC was_VBD surly_RB and_CC quarrelsome_NN ._.
And_CC because_IN he_PRP dared_VBD not_RB beat_VB her_PRP ,_, he_PRP would_MD seize_VB her_PRP by_IN the_DT hair_NN and_CC tear_VB it_PRP out_RP ._.
The_DT woman_NN escaped_VBD from_IN him_PRP ,_, and_CC sprang_VBD out_RP into_IN the_DT yard_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP ran_VBD after_IN her_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ yard-measure_NN and_CC scissors_NNS ,_, and_CC chased_VBD her_PRP about_RB ,_, and_CC threw_VBD the_DT yard-measure_NN and_CC scissors_NNS at_IN her_PRP ,_, and_CC whatever_WDT else_RB came_VBD his_PRP$ way_NN ._.
When_WRB he_PRP hit_VBD her_PRP he_PRP laughed_VBD ,_, and_CC when_WRB he_PRP missed_VBD her_PRP ,_, he_PRP stormed_VBD and_CC swore_VBD ._.
This_DT went_VBD on_RB so_RB long_RB that_IN the_DT neighbors_NNS came_VBD to_IN the_DT wifes_NNS assistance_NN ._.
The_DT tailor_NN was_VBD again_RB summoned_VBN before_IN the_DT magistrates_NNS ,_, and_CC reminded_VBD of_IN his_PRP$ promise_NN ._.
Dear_JJ gentlemen_NNS ,_, said_VBD he_PRP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP kept_VBN my_PRP$ word_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP not_RB beaten_VBN her_PRP ,_, but_CC have_VBP shared_VBN joy_NN and_CC sorrow_VB with_IN her_PRP ._.
How_WRB can_MD that_DT be_VB ,_, said_VBD the_DT judge_NN ,_, as_IN she_PRP continues_VBZ to_TO bring_VB such_JJ heavy_JJ complaints_NNS against_IN you_PRP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB beaten_VBN her_PRP ,_, but_CC just_RB because_IN she_PRP looked_VBD so_RB strange_JJ I_PRP wanted_VBD to_TO comb_VB her_PRP$ hair_NN with_IN my_PRP$ hand_NN ._.
She_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, got_VBD away_RB from_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC left_VBD me_PRP quite_RB spitefully_RB ._.

At_IN last_JJ one_CD stepped_VBD forth_RB ,_, a_DT great_JJ strong_JJ man_NN who_WP was_VBD famous_JJ for_IN his_PRP$ warlike_JJ deeds_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, you_PRP will_MD not_RB drive_VB away_RP the_DT monster_NN by_IN merely_RB looking_VBG at_IN him_PRP ,_, we_PRP must_MD be_VB in_IN earnest_JJ here_RB ,_, but_CC I_PRP see_VBP that_IN you_PRP have_VBP all_DT tuned_VBN into_IN women_NNS ,_, and_CC not_RB one_CD of_IN you_PRP dares_VBZ to_TO encounter_VB the_DT animal_NN ._.

What_WP ._.

No_DT one_NN will_MD die_VB in_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP will_MD get_VB so_RB full_JJ of_IN people_NNS that_IN they_PRP wo_MD nt_RB have_VB room_NN to_TO stand_VB beside_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT meantime_NN a_DT young_JJ man_NN came_VBD along_IN the_DT road_NN ,_, who_WP was_VBD strong_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ ,_, singing_VBG a_DT song_NN ,_, and_CC glancing_VBG around_RB on_IN every_DT side_NN ._.

At_IN nightfall_NN he_PRP went_VBD into_IN the_DT churchyard_NN ,_, and_CC seated_VBD himself_PRP on_IN the_DT grave-mound_NN ._.
Everything_NN was_VBD quiet_JJ ,_, only_RB the_DT moon_NN appeared_VBD above_IN the_DT grave_NN ,_, and_CC frequently_RB an_DT owl_NN flew_VBD past_JJ and_CC uttered_VBD her_PRP$ melancholy_JJ cry_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT sun_NN rose_VBD ,_, the_DT poor_JJ man_NN betook_VBD himself_PRP in_IN safety_NN to_IN his_PRP$ home_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN the_DT second_JJ night_NN passed_VBD quietly_RB by_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT evening_NN of_IN the_DT third_JJ day_NN he_PRP felt_VBD a_DT strange_JJ uneasiness_NN ,_, it_PRP seemed_VBD to_IN him_PRP that_IN something_NN was_VBD about_IN to_TO happen_VB ._.
When_WRB he_PRP went_VBD out_RP he_PRP saw_VBD ,_, by_IN the_DT churchyard-wall_NN ,_, a_DT man_NN whom_WP he_PRP had_VBD never_RB seen_VBN before_RB ._.
He_PRP was_VBD no_RB longer_RBR young_JJ ,_, had_VBD scars_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ face_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ eyes_NNS looked_VBD sharply_RB and_CC eagerly_RB around_RB ._.
He_PRP was_VBD entirely_RB covered_VBN with_IN an_DT old_JJ cloak_NN ,_, and_CC nothing_NN was_VBD visible_JJ but_CC his_PRP$ great_JJ riding-boots_NNS ._.
What_WP are_VBP you_PRP looking_VBG for_IN here_RB ,_, the_DT peasant_NN asked_VBD ._.

I_PRP am_VBP like_IN the_DT youngster_NN who_WP went_VBD forth_RB to_TO learn_VB how_WRB to_TO shudder_VB ,_, and_CC had_VBD his_PRP$ labor_NN for_IN his_PRP$ pains_NNS ,_, but_CC got_VBD the_DT kings_NNS daughter_NN to_IN wife_NN and_CC great_JJ wealth_NN with_IN her_PRP ,_, only_RB I_PRP have_VBP remained_VBN poor_JJ ._.
I_PRP am_VBP nothing_NN but_IN a_DT paid-off_JJ soldier_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP mean_VBP to_TO pass_VB the_DT night_NN here_RB ,_, because_IN I_PRP have_VBP no_DT other_JJ shelter_NN ._.
If_IN you_PRP are_VBP without_IN fear_NN ,_, said_VBD the_DT peasant_NN ,_, stay_VB with_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC help_VB me_PRP to_TO watch_VB that_DT grave_NN there_RB ._.
To_TO keep_VB watch_NN is_VBZ a_DT soldiers_NNS business_NN ,_, he_PRP replied_VBD ,_, whatever_WP we_PRP fall_VBP in_IN with_IN here_RB ,_, whether_IN it_PRP be_VB good_JJ or_CC bad_JJ ,_, we_PRP will_MD share_VB it_PRP between_IN us_PRP ._.
The_DT peasant_NN agreed_VBD to_IN this_DT ,_, and_CC they_PRP seated_VBD themselves_PRP on_IN the_DT grave_NN together_RB ._.
All_DT was_VBD quiet_JJ until_IN midnight_NN ,_, when_WRB suddenly_RB a_DT shrill_NN whistling_NN was_VBD heard_VBN in_IN the_DT air_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT two_CD watchers_NNS perceived_VBD the_DT evil_JJ one_CD standing_VBG bodily_RB before_IN them_PRP ._.

I_PRP want_VBP to_TO take_VB him_PRP ,_, and_CC if_IN you_PRP do_VBP nt_RB go_VB away_RB I_PRP will_MD wring_VB your_PRP$ necks_NNS ._.

I_PRP have_VBP not_RB so_RB much_RB as_IN that_IN about_IN me_PRP ,_, said_VBD the_DT devil_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP will_MD fetch_VB it_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT neighboring_VBG town_NN lives_VBZ a_DT money-changer_NN who_WP is_VBZ a_DT good_JJ friend_NN of_IN mine_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD readily_RB advance_VB it_PRP to_IN me_PRP ._.

A_DT soldier_NN who_WP is_VBZ afraid_JJ of_IN nothing_NN ,_, troubles_VBZ himself_PRP about_IN nothing_NN ._.

The_DT chief_NN of_IN the_DT robbers_NNS was_VBD in_IN the_DT mood_NN to_TO humor_VB him_PRP in_IN this_DT also_RB ,_, and_CC called_VBD to_IN the_DT old_JJ woman_NN ,_, bring_VB a_DT bottle_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT cellar_NN ,_, and_CC mind_VB it_PRP be_VB of_IN the_DT best_JJS ._.

At_IN last_JJ when_WRB day_NN came_VBD ,_, he_PRP said_VBD ,_, now_RB it_PRP is_VBZ time_NN to_TO strike_VB our_PRP$ tents_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN order_NN that_IN our_PRP$ march_NN may_MD be_VB a_DT short_JJ one_CD ,_, the_DT old_JJ woman_NN shall_MD show_VB us_PRP the_DT nearest_JJS way_NN to_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
When_WRB they_PRP had_VBD arrived_VBN there_RB ,_, he_PRP went_VBD to_IN his_PRP$ old_JJ comrades_NNS ,_, and_CC said_VBD ,_, out_RP in_IN the_DT forest_NN I_PRP have_VBP found_VBN a_DT nest_NN full_JJ of_IN gallows_NNS ,_, birds_NNS ,_, come_VB with_IN me_PRP and_CC we_PRP will_MD take_VB it_PRP ._.
The_DT soldier_NN led_VBD them_PRP ,_, and_CC said_VBD to_IN the_DT huntsman_NN ,_, you_PRP must_MD go_VB back_RB again_RB with_IN me_PRP to_TO see_VB how_WRB they_PRP flutter_VBP when_WRB we_PRP seize_VBP them_PRP by_IN the_DT feet_NNS ._.
